According to the media, the magazine against the statements sounding from the administration of President Donald Trump was objected to his address.

title: Petr Sokol: Část republikánů již plánuje pro Trumpa i třetí funkční období. Jak to lze udělat?
description: Když radikální trumpista Steve Bannon nedávno vystupoval na republikánské konferenci CPAC, zůstalo trochu v pozadí, že během svého projevu jasně deklaroval, že by Donald Trump měl na prezidenta kandidovat znovu i v roce 2028. Trumpovi příznivci tehdy v sále odpověděli skandováním „Chceme Trumpa v roce 2028!“.
title_translated: Petr Sokol: Some of the Republicans are already planning a third term for Trump. How can this be done?
description_translated: When the radical trumpist Steve Bannon recently performed at the Republican CPAC conference, it remained a bit in the background that he clearly declared that Donald Trump was to run for the President again in 2028.

title: Pákistánský youtuber čelí obvinění z rouhání kvůli parfému, hrozí mu 10 let
description: Islámábád - Pákistánské úřady obvinily youtubera z rouhání, protože na trh uvedl parfém s názvem odkazujícím na zákon trestající tento čin. Nyní mu hrozí až deset let za mřížemi, napsala agentura AFP....
title_translated: Pakistani YouTuber faces charges of blasphemy due to perfume, threatened with 10 years
description_translated: Islamabad - the Pakistani authorities accused youtuber of blasphemy because he launched a perfume called the law to the law punishing this act. Now he faces up to ten years behind bars, AFP wrote ....

title: Americké akcie opět zazáří. Pomůže jim slabší dolar - Wilson z Morgan Stanley
description: Podle stratégů Morgan Stanley, včetně Michaela Wilsona, zlepší slabší dolar výhled zisků u amerických akcií a může tak zvrátit masivní rotaci, která na globálních trzích probíhá od začátku roku.
title_translated: American shares will shine again. Will help them a weaker dollar - Wilson of Morgan Stanley
description_translated: According to Morgan Stanley, including Michael Wilson, the weaker dollar will improve the outlook of US stocks and can reverse the massive rotation that has been running on the global markets since the beginning of the year.

title: Zapomeňte na letadlo. Z Česka můžete do řady destinací levnějšími vlaky
description: Cestování vlakem má své kouzlo. A pro ty, kteří příliš neholdují létání, jde i o skvělou alternativu. Z Česka se lze dopravit po železnici do řady destinací zejména v okolních zemích, například do Berlína, Vídně, Varšavy, ale i dál k polskému Baltu nebo do Budapešti. Výhodou vlaků je pak podle mluvčích předních tuzemských dopravců i větší pohodlí či menší ekologická zátěž.
title_translated: Forget the plane. From the Czech Republic you can go to a number of destinations with cheaper trains
description_translated: Traveling by train has its charm. And for those who do not like flying too much, it is a great alternative. From the Czech Republic you can go to a number of destinations, especially in neighboring countries, such as Berlin, Vienna, Warsaw, but also further to the Polish Baltic or Budapest. The advantage of trains is, according to the spokespersons of leading domestic carriers and greater comfort or less environmental burden.

title: Uvolnění tlaku, zlepšení nálady a další důvody, proč si občas všichni potřebujeme zakřičet
description: Máte někdy pocit, že pokud ze sebe okamžitě nedostanete všechen tlak a naštvání, zblázníte se? Pak vězte, že v tom nejste sami. Uvolnit napětí jednou za čas potřebuje každý a jde to hned několika způsoby. Jedním z nich je pořádně si zakřičet.
title_translated: Releasing pressure, improvement of mood and other reasons why we all need to shout at times
description_translated: Do you ever feel that if you do not immediately get all pressure and upset, you are going crazy? Then know that you are not alone. Everybody needs to release tension once in a while and it goes in several ways. One of them is to shout.

title: Místo do datovky na poštu. Co dělat, když úřad nekomunikuje, jak má
description: Odevzdávání daňových přiznání je v plném proudu a stát opakovaně varuje, že podnikatelé s datovou schránkou ho musí podat online. Pošlete papír? Zatěžujete úředníky, dostanete pokutu. Co ale hrozí úřadu, když sám neplní, co má, a místo elektronicky s vámi komunikuje přes Českou poštu?
title_translated: Place to the data store for the post office. What to do when the office does not communicate as it has
description_translated: Submission of tax returns is in full swing and the state repeatedly warns that entrepreneurs with a data box must file it online. Send paper? You burden the officials, you get a fine. But what threatens the office if it does not fulfill what it has and communicates with you electronically through the Czech Post?

title: 🎧 Realitní trh čeká obrat. Investoři se vracejí, Česko bude těžit z přeskupování dodavatelských řetězců
description: Po letech nejistoty se český realitní trh nadechuje k oživení. Rok 2025 by podle odborníků měl přinést zlom: investiční apetit roste, zahraniční kapitál se vrací a sílí i segmenty jako nájemní bydlení nebo logistické areály. O aktuálních trendech jsme v podcastu REcast mluvili s prezidentkou Asociace pro rozvoj trhu nemovitostí (ARTN) Zdenkou Klapalovou v souvislosti s novým Trend Reportem 2025, který ukazuje nejnovější trendy na realitním trhu a slouží dnes již jako kronika trhu.
title_translated: 🎧 The real estate market awaits a turn. Investors are returning, the Czech Republic will benefit from the regrouping of supplier chains
description_translated: After years of uncertainty, the Czech real estate market inhales to revive. According to experts, the year 2025 should bring a turning point: Investment appetite is growing, foreign capital is returning and segments such as rental housing or logistics areas are also growing. We talked to the current trends in the Recast podcast with the President of the Association for the Development of the Property Market (Artn) Zdenka Klapalová in connection with the new Trend Report 2025, which shows the latest trends in the real estate market and now serves as a market chronicle.

title: Jana Bendová: Rozmohl se nám tady nešvar. Rath, Bláha, Souček, kdo další se obslouží popravenou Horákovou?
description: O justiční komunistické vraždě Milady Horákové a spol. se učíme už ve škole. Přesto si stále někdo z veřejných činovníků lepí její proces na své trable a trablíčky: svého času exhejtman David Rath na své odsouzení v korupční kauze, exposlanec ANO Jiří Bláha na veřejný odpor proti instalaci komunisty Zdeňka Ondráčka, za totality člena pohotovostního pluku, do čela komise pro kontrolu GIBS či nejnověji generální ředitel ČT Jan Souček na výtky Rady ČT vůči svému konání. Pokaždé to část veřejnosti spravedlivě naštve. Pětku z dějepisu už tihle dospělí výtečníci dostat nemohou, za trest nebo jako pokání by mohli kupříkladu klečet alespoň hodinku u symbolického hrobu paní Horákové na Vyšehradě. Skutečný hrob nemá, i ten jí ve své zášti komunisti odepřeli.
title_translated: Jana Bendová: We got a lot here. Rath, Bláha, Soucek, who else will serve the executed Horáková?
description_translated: About the judicial communist murder of Milada Horáková et al. we are learning at school. Nevertheless, one of the public officials is still sticking to her troubles and troubles: EXHEJTman David Rath at his time on his conviction in a corruption case, YES Express Jiří Bláha to public resistance to the Communist installation Zdeněk Ondráček. Council complaints of CT to its action. Every time, part of the public is fairly annoyed. Five of history can no longer get these adults, for example, for punishment or repentance could kneel at least an hour at the symbolic grave of Mrs. Horáková in Vyšehrad. He does not have a real grave, even in their resentment the Communists denied it.

title: Roční Madlen hledá dárce kostní dřeně. Češi zavalili odběrová centra
description: Příběh malé Madlenky vzbudil vlnu solidarity v Česku. Stovky lidí se díky němu v posledních dnech zapsaly se do registru dárců kostní dřeně v naději, že možná pomohou nejen holčičce, ale i dalším pacientům s poruchou krvetvorby.
title_translated: The annual Madlen is looking for a bone marrow donor. Czechs have overwhelmed sampling centers
description_translated: The story of a small Madlenka aroused a wave of solidarity in the Czech Republic. In recent days, hundreds of people have entered the bone marrow donor register in the hope that they may help not only the girl but also other patients with hematopoiesis disorders.

title: Protitankové střely i drony. Macron slíbil Ukrajině pomoc za dvě miliardy eur
description: Francie poskytne Ukrajině další zbrojní pomoc za dvě miliardy eur (zhruba 50 miliard korun). Po středečním jednání s ukrajinským prezidentem Volodymyrem Zelenským to oznámil šéf Elysejského paláce Emmanuel Macron. Řekl také, že k další zbrojní pomoci chce vyzvat ostatní spojence na summitu o bezpečnosti Evropy a situaci na Ukrajině, který ve čtvrtek pořádá.
title_translated: Anti -tank missiles and drones. Macron promised Ukraine help for two billion euros
description_translated: France will provide Ukraine with other arms assistance worth two billion euros (about 50 billion crowns). After Wednesday's negotiations with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensko, the head of Emmanuel Macron, Elysee Palace, announced it. He also said that he wanted to call on other allies to summarize Europe's security and the situation in Ukraine, which he organizes on Thursday.

title: Boleslav - Mountfield HK 6:5p. Bruslaři si vynutili sedmý zápas. Rekonen rozhodl v prodloužení
description: Napínavý čtvrtfinálový duel č. 6 mezi Mladou Boleslaví a Mountfieldem HK zvládli lépe hokejisté z města automobilů a vynutili si rozhodující sedmý duel na východě Čech. O výhře 6:5 v prodlužení rozhodl Fin Aleksi Rekonen. Bruslaři během prvních dvaceti minut vedli už dokonce 3:0. Náskok ale prohospodařili a soupeř dokonal obrat na 5:3. V posledních minutách závěrečné periody ale Boleslavští vstřelili kýžené dvě branky a poslali zápas do prodloužení.
title_translated: Boleslav - Mountfield HK 6: 5p. Skaters forced the seventh match. Reconen decided in overtime
description_translated: Exciting quarterfinal duel no. 6 between Mlada Boleslav and Mountfield HK was better managed by hockey players from the city of cars and forced a decisive seventh duel in East Bohemia. Fin Aleksi RecONen decided to win 6: 5 in the extension. The skaters led even 3: 0 in the first twenty minutes. But the lead was successful and the opponent finished the turn at 5: 3. In the last minutes of the final period, however, the Boleslavs scored two goals and sent the match to the overtime.

title: Jihlava a Zlín jsou krok od finále první hokejové ligy
description: Hokejisty Jihlavy a Zlína dělí jediné vítězství od postupu do finále play off první ligy. Dukla vyhrála v pátém semifinále na ledě obhájce triumfu a vítěze základní části Vsetína 6:3 a Zlín doma porazil Litoměřice 4:1. Šesté zápasy se hrají v pátek v jihlavském azylu v Pelhřimově a v Litoměřicích.
title_translated: Jihlava and Zlín are a step from the final of the first hockey league
description_translated: The hockey players of Jihlava and Zlín divide the only victory from the advance to the finals of the first league. Dukla won the fifth semifinal on the ice defender of the triumph and the winner of the basic part of Vsetín 6: 3 and Zlín defeated Litoměřice 4: 1 at home. The sixth matches are played on Friday in Jihlava's asylum in Pelhřimov and Litoměřice.

title: Zelenskyj přijel za Macronem. Francie slíbila další zbrojní pomoc za 50 miliard
description: Francie poskytne Ukrajině další zbrojní pomoc za dvě miliardy eur (zhruba 50 miliard Kč). Po středečním jednání s hlavou ukrajinského státu Volodymyrem Zelenským to oznámil francouzský prezident Emmanuel Macron. Řekl také, že k další zbrojní pomoci chce vyzvat ostatní spojence na summitu o bezpečnosti Evropy a situaci na Ukrajině, který ve čtvrtek pořádá.
title_translated: Zelezkyj came to Macron. France promised another arms assistance for 50 billion
description_translated: France will provide Ukraine with further arms assistance worth two billion euros (about 50 billion CZK). After Wednesday's negotiations with the head of the Ukrainian state Volodymyr Zelensky, French President Emmanuel Macron announced it. He also said that he wanted to call on other allies to summarize Europe's security and the situation in Ukraine, which he organizes on Thursday.

title: Poslední obří slalom sezony vyhrál suvrénně Meillard. Odermatt převzal glóbus
description: Poslední obří slalom sezony Světového poháru vyhrál v Sun Valley Švýcar Loic Meillard. Úřadující mistr světa ve slalomu v součtu obou kol nadělil téměř sekundu majiteli malého křišťálového glóbu Marcu Odermattovi a v točivých disciplínách dominoval ve třetím závodu za sebou.
title_translated: The last giant slalom of the season was won by the Suvěrně Meillard. Odermatt took over a globe
description_translated: The last giant slalom of the World Cup season was won in Sun Valley Swiss Loic Meillard. The reigning world champion in the sum of both rounds gave almost a second to the owner of a small crystal globe Marc Odermatt and dominated in the rotating disciplines in the third race.

title: Únik vojenských plánů USA: Ministr byl při sdílení opilý, bouřil demokrat. Šéf CIA se neudržel
description: Demokraté obviňují amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa a nejvyšší představitelé jeho administrativy, že lžou o statusu utajení informací o vojenských úderech na Jemen sdílených v aplikaci pro zasílání zpráv Signal. Trump a jeho tým tvrdí, že v chatovací skupině, do které byl omylem přidán šéfredaktor časopisu The Atlantic Jeffrey Goldberg, nebyly poskytnuty utajované informace. Během zasedání sněmovního zpravodajského výboru dokonce došlo na překřikování mezi ředitelem CIA Johnem Ratcliffem a demokratickým kongresmanem Jimmym Gomezem - demokrat tvrdil, že ministr obrany Pete Hegseth byl během sdílení zpráv opilý.
title_translated: US military plans' escape: The Minister was drunk while sharing, democrat. CIA boss has not kept up
description_translated: The Democrats accuse US President Donald Trump and the highest representatives of his administration that they are lying on the status of secrecy about military strikes on Yemen shared in the signal report. Trump and his team say that in the chat group, which was mistakenly added by the editor -in -chief of The Atlantic Jeffrey Goldberg magazine, there was no classified information. During the meeting of the parliamentary intelligence committee, even the CIA director John Ratcliff and the Democratic Congressman Jimmy Gomez - Democrat claimed that Defense Minister Pete HegSeth was drunk.

title: Dohoda o ukrajinských nerostech. Co chce Trump a co za to Kyjev získá
description: Ještě v polovině března Donald Trump hlásal, že dohoda mezi USA a Ukrajinou o minerálech bude podepsána velmi brzy. Ačkoliv od tohoto výroku uplynuly skoro dva týdny, podpisy stále chybějí. Trump totiž svou pozornost přesunul k vyjednávání o příměří a možné privatizaci ukrajinských jaderných elektráren. I přesto ale jeho administrativa s ukrajinskými nerosty nejspíš stále počítá.
title_translated: Agreement on Ukrainian minerals. What does Trump want and what will Kyiv get for it
description_translated: Even in mid -March Donald Trump proclaimed that the agreement between the US and Ukraine on minerals would be signed very soon. Although almost two weeks have passed since this statement, signatures are still missing. Trump moved his attention to negotiations on the ceasefire and possible privatization of Ukrainian nuclear power plants. Still, his administration with Ukrainian minerals is still counting on.

title: Poslední obří slalom ovládl Meillard. Držiteli malého křišťálového glóbu dal skoro sekundu
description: Poslední obří slalom sezony Světového poháru vyhrál v Sun Valley Švýcar Loic Meillard. Úřadující mistr světa ve slalomu v součtu obou kol nadělil téměř sekundu majiteli malého křišťálového glóbu Marcu Odermattovi a v točivých disciplínách dominoval ve třetím závodu za sebou.
title_translated: Meillard dominated the last giant slalom. Holders of a small crystal globe gave almost a second
description_translated: The last giant slalom of the World Cup season was won in Sun Valley Swiss Loic Meillard. The reigning world champion in the sum of both rounds gave almost a second to the owner of a small crystal globe Marc Odermatt and dominated in the rotating disciplines in the third race.

title: U hřbitova za Opavou zemědělec našel stokilovou pumu, evakuováno bylo několik ulic
description: Stokilovou leteckou pumu pocházející z druhé světové války našli zemědělci při obhospodařování pole v katastru obce Velké Hoštice na Opavsku. Kvůli nálezu bylo evakuováno několik ulic, pumu následně zlikvidoval pyrotechnik.
title_translated: At the cemetery behind the Opava farmer he found a hundred bomb, several streets were evacuated
description_translated: Farmers found the Stokil air bomb from the Second World War in the management of the field in the village of Velké Hoštice in the Opava region. Due to the finding, several streets were evacuated, and the bomb was subsequently destroyed by the pyrotechnician.

title: Teplice proměnily obranu: nižší neznamená horší. Elitní čísla Halinského, co Slavia?
description: Když se zhruba před rokem podívali soupeři do vápna Teplic, chystaný centr si dvakrát rozmysleli. Zdenko Frťala v tu dobu často hrál obranu ve složení Štěpán Chaloupek, Jan Knapík a Ondřej Kričfaluši s průměrnou výškou 192 centimetrů. Po roce je situace jiná, vzadu jistí tým menší a typologicky odlišnější stopeři. Začne se v Edenu opět skloňovat jméno Denise Halinského?
title_translated: Teplice has changed defense: lower does not mean worse. Elite Halinsky figures, what about Slavia?
description_translated: When the opponents looked into the lime Teplice about a year ago, the upcoming center changed their mind twice. Zdenko Frťala often played defense composed of Štěpán Chaloupek, Jan Knapík and Ondřej Kricfaluši with an average height of 192 centimeters. After a year, the situation is different, the team is sure the team smaller and typologically different hitchhikers. Will the name of Denise Halinski become inflected in Eden again?

title: Vyhrožoval odpůrcům Fialy, soudkyně onemocněla. Ptali jsme se, co bude s Oganesjanem
description: Kontroverzní influencer arménského původu Mike Oganesjan se podle informací ParlamentníchListů.cz opět podívá před soud. Lidem před petičním stánkem u Úřadu vlády měl v roce 2024 vyhrožovat ublížením na zdraví pro jejich politické přesvědčení. Oganesjanovi, který je v podmínce, hrozí test odnětí svobody až ve výši jednoho roku.
title_translated: He threatened Fiala's opponents, the judge became ill. We asked what to do with Oganesjan
description_translated: According to ParlamentníListů.cz, the controversial influencer of Armenian origin Mike Oganesjan will again look forward to court. In 2024, he was supposed to threaten people before the petition at the Government Office by bodily harm for their political beliefs. Oganesjan, who is in the condition, is at risk of imprisonment of only one year.

title: Izrael zlikvidoval mluvčího teroristů Hamásu
description: Teroristická organizace Hamás oznámila, že během náletu na Džabáliji na severu Pásma Gazy zahynul Abdul Latíf Kánú, mluvčí organizace. Jeho smrt oznámila agentura Šiháb, pokládaná za spjatou s Hamásem, uvedl web deníku The Jerusalem Post.
title_translated: Israel destroyed the spokesman of the terrorists Hamas
description_translated: The terrorist organization Hamas announced that during the air raid on Jabájja in the north of the Gaza zone, Abdul Latíf Kanú, spokesman for the organization, died. His death was announced by the agency Šiháb, considered linked to Hamas, said The Jerusalem Post.

title: Den v obrazech: Migranti v Lamanšském průlivu, Protest rybářů v Chile a Kvetoucí magnólie v Rakousku
description: Světové události dne 26. března zaznamenané objektivem fotoaparátu.The post Den v obrazech: Migranti v Lamanšském průlivu, Protest rybářů v Chile a Kvetoucí magnólie v Rakousku appeared first on Epoch Times ČR.
title_translated: Day in Pictures: Migrants in the Lamansk Strait, Protest of Fishermen in Chile and Flowering Magnolia in Austria
description_translated: World events on March 26 recorded by the camera lens.The post day in paintings: migrants in the Lamansk Strait, protest fishermen in Chile and flowering magnolia in Austria Appeared First On Epoch Times ČR.

title: Konečná (KSČM): Reportéři ČT mrhají vašimi penězi
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k pronásledování redaktory pořadu Reportéři ČT
title_translated: Final (KSCM): CT reporters are wandering with your money
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile to persecute editors of reporters of CT

title: Přechod na střední školu se rodičům prodraží. Žák potřebuje pomůcky za tisíce
description: Ukončení povinné školní docházky na základní škole a přestup na střední školu nepřináší jen změnu učiva i stylu výuky. Na rodiče také čekají nové a často vyšší náklady na výbavu do prvního ročníku. Podle odborníků jsou i třikrát vyšší, na střední škole stoupají nároky dětí na techniku i mimoškolní činnost, cenu studia také prodražuje odborná literatura. Sáhnout hlouběji do kapsy musí většinou rodiče i kvůli zvýšení kapesného.
title_translated: The transition to high school will become more expensive. The pupil needs aids for thousands
description_translated: Termination of compulsory school attendance at elementary school and transfer to high school does not only bring a change in the curriculum and style of teaching. Parents are also waiting for new and often higher cost of equipment for the first year. According to experts, they are also three times higher, in the high school the demands of children for technology and extracurricular activities are increasing, and the price of study is also more expensive by professional literature. Most parents must usually reach deeper into the pocket to increase pocket money.

title: FOTO: Pomalá pochutina. Největší šnečí farma u nás chová miliony hlemýžďů k jídlu
description: Česká republika patří mezi významné producenty kvalitních šneků určených ke konzumaci. Do zahraničí, převážně do Francie, jich předloni (údaje z loňského roku ještě nejsou k dispozici) vyvezla 220 tun v hodnotě 89 milionů korun. Delikatesa pod ulitou míří ovšem i opačným směrem, import do tuzemska obnášel takřka 426 tun za celkovou cenu 46 milionů korun. Jinak řečeno: Šneci, které vyvážíme, jsou kvalitnější a dražší, šneci, které dovážíme, jsou méně kvalitní a levnější. Největší tuzemská šnečí farma Love Snails se nachází v Praze 8 a ročně vyprodukuje 30 tun hlemýžďů. Právě na jaře se jejich chov rozjíždí naplno.
title_translated: Photo: Slow delicacy. The largest snail farm in our country keeps millions of snails to eat
description_translated: The Czech Republic is one of the important producers of quality snails intended for consumption. Abroad, mostly to France, of them last year (data from last year are not yet available) exported 220 tons worth CZK 89 million. The delicacy under the shell, however, is also heading in the opposite direction, importing into the Czech Republic almost 426 tons for the total price of 46 million crowns. In other words, the snails that we balance are better and more expensive, the snails we import are less quality and cheaper. The largest domestic snail Farm Love Snails is located in Prague 8 and produces 30 tons of snails annually. In the spring, their breeding is starting to fully.

title: Pardubický kraj podpoří nové praktické lékaře a zubaře dotací až 900 tisíc korun
description: Pardubický kraj připravil nový dotační program „Podpora primární péče v Pardubickém kraji“, jehož cílem je přilákat do regionu nové praktické lékaře a zubaře. Program nabídne až 900 tisíc korun těm, kteří si zde otevřou ordinaci. „Dostupnost...
title_translated: The Pardubice Region will support new GPs and dentists subsidies up to 900 thousand crowns
description_translated: The Pardubice Region has prepared a new subsidy program “Support for primary care in the Pardubice Region”, which aims to attract a new general practitioner and dentist to the region. The program will offer up to 900 thousand crowns to those who open the office here. "Availability...

title: Mluvčí Hamásu byl zabit při izraelském náletu, uvedla agentura

"The country has agreed that Ukraine needs to be supported by intelligence information so that it can better defend itself," says the government advisor to National Security Tomáš Pojar.

title: Kometa je po šesti letech v semifinále. Postupovou trefu obstaral Konečný
description: Hokejisté Brna doprovodili Spartu a Pardubice do semifinále play-off extraligy. S jedním z této dvojice se v dalším kole utkají. Kometa rozhodla o postupu vítězstvím 1:0 v šestém utkání čtvrtfinále na ledě Karlových Varů. Moravané ovládli celou sérii 4:2 na zápasy. Teď už zbývá odhalit posledního semifinalistu, kterého určí rozhodující sedmá bitva mezi Hradcem Králové a Mladou Boleslaví.
title_translated: The comet is in the semifinal after six years. The progressive hit was provided by the final
description_translated: Brno hockey players accompanied Sparta and Pardubice to the playoffs of the extra league. They will compete with one of this couple in the next round. The comet decided to advance by winning 1: 0 in the sixth match of the quarterfinals on the ice of Karlovy Vary. The Moravians dominated the entire series 4: 2 for matches. Now it remains to reveal the last semifinalist, which will be determined by the decisive seventh battle between Hradec Králové and Mladá Boleslav.

title: Německo zničilo vlastní energetický poklad. Tři miliardy eur se obrátily v prach
description: Uhelná elektrárna Moorburg v Hamburku měla být technologickým triumfem německé energetické revoluce.

description_translated: The Moorburg coal power plant in Hamburg was to be a technological triumph of the German Energy Revolution.

title: Karlovy Vary - Kometa 0:1. Brno je třetím semifinalistou, utkání rozhodl Konečný
description: Kometa Brno si poprvé od roku 2019 zahraje semifinále play off extraligy. Po výhře 1:0 na ledě Karlových Varů ovládli její hokejisté sérii poměrem 4:2. O vítězství se jediným gólem utkání zasloužil ve druhé třetině Jakub Konečný. V nejlepší čtveřici Kometa doplní Spartu a Pardubice. O konečné podobě semifinálových dvojic rozhodne až páteční duel mezi Hradcem Králové a Mladou Boleslaví.

After winning 1: 0 on the ice of Karlovy Vary, her hockey players dominated the 4: 2 series. Jakub Konečný deserved the only goal of the match in the second period. The best four comet will be complemented by Sparta and Pardubice. The final form of the semifinal pairs will be decided by the Friday duel between Hradec Králové and Mladá Boleslav.

title: Ljutičová získala poprvé malý glóbus. Shiffrinová načala druhou stovku vítězství
description: Chorvatská lyžařka Zrinka Ljutičová získala poprvé v kariéře malý glóbus za hodnocení Světového poháru ve slalomu. V posledním závodu na finále sezony v Sun Valley skončila jednadvacetiletá specialistka na technické disciplíny desátá, druhou stovku vítězství dnes načala hvězdná Američanka Mikaela Shiffrinová.
title_translated: Ljutičová won a small globe for the first time. Shiffrin loaded the second hundred victory
description_translated: Croatian skier Zrinka Ljutičová won a small globe for the first time in her career for evaluating the World Cup in Slalom. In the last race at the final of the Sun Valley season, a 21 -year -old specialist in technical disciplines ended tenth, with the second hundred victories today was started by star American Mikaela Shiffrin.

title: Svobodné Evropě chtěl peníze sebrat Trump: Nakonec o nepřijde? Do případu se vložil soud
description: Agentura Spojených států pro globální média (USAGM) ve středu informovala Rádio Svobodná Evropa/Rádia Svoboda (RFE/RL), že ruší své předchozí rozhodnutí o ukončení jejího financování, a dohoda o grantu na letošní fiskální rok tak opět platí. Stanice RFE/RL to oznámila v dnešní tiskové zprávě.
title_translated: Free Europe wanted to take money Trump: eventually it won't lose? A court of court has been put in the case
description_translated: The United States Agency for Global Media (USAGM) reported on Wednesday Radio Free Europe/Radio Svoboda (RFE/RL) that it is canceling its previous decision to end its financing, and the grant agreement for this year's fiscal year. RFE/RL station announced it in today's press release.

title: Djokovič měl s očkováním pravdu. Zmanipulovali nás a zavřeli jak ovce, tvrdí Ivaniševič
description: Svým nekompromisním postojem proti očkování si nadělal zejména během coronavirové pandemie spoustu problémů. Přišel o hromadu peněz, možná i tituly a skončil také v detenční vazbě. Grandslamový rekordman Novak Djokovič byl podle slov jeho bývalého kouče a wimbledonského šampiona Gorana Ivaniševiče ochoten ukončit kariéru, pokud by její pokračování bylo podmíněno očkováním proti covidu-19.
title_translated: Djokovic was right with vaccination. They manipulated us and closed like sheep, says Ivaniševich
description_translated: With his uncompromising attitude against vaccination, he made a lot of problems especially during the coronavirus pandemic. He lost a lot of money, maybe even titles and ended in detention. According to his former coach and Wimbledon champion Goran Ivaniševich, Grand Slam record holder Djokovic was willing to end his career if its continuation was conditioned by vaccination against Covid-19.

title: Influencer Tate má na kontě další obvinění. Jeho přítelkyně tvrdí, že ji škrtil

Influencera Andrewa Tatea, který proslul svým nenávistným štvaním mužů proti ženám, obvinila jeho poslední přítelkyně Bri Sternová, že ji při sexu škrtil a psal jí, že ji chce zbít. Vše se podle ní stalo v Los Angeles před dvěma týdny. Tate tehdy dostal zpět cestovní pas a vrátil se z Bukurešti zpět do USA.
title_translated: Influencer Tate has more accusations. His girlfriend claims to strangle her
description_translated: While in Romania he cleans his name in front of the courts there, another problem jumped on him at home. Influencer Andrew Tate, who renowned for his hateful chase of men against women, accused his last girlfriend Bri Stern, that he strangled her during sex and wrote to she wanted to beat her. Everything happened in Los Angeles two weeks ago. At that time, Tate got a passport back and returned from Bucharest back to the US.

This applies to vehicles over 3.5 tonnes.

title: Američané nás ochrání, varuje Guyana Venezuelu. Ta baží po jejím území a ropě
description: Spojené státy ochrání celistvost a suverenitu Guyany, která vede územní spor s Venezuelou o oblast bohatou na ropu. Dnes to podle agentury AFP řekl po setkání s americkým ministrem zahraničí Markem Rubiem prezident Guyany Irfaan Ali. Rubio řekl, že pro Venezuelu by útok na sousední zemi či americkou ropnou společnost ExxonMobil, která v Guyaně působí, neskončil dobře.
title_translated: The Americans will protect us, warns Guyana Venezuela. She crawls in her territory and oil
description_translated: The United States will protect the integrity and sovereignty of Guyana, which leads a territorial dispute with Venezuela over the oil -rich area. Today, according to AFP, President Guyana Irfaan Ali said it after a meeting with US Foreign Minister Mark Rubium. Rubio said that for Venezuela an attack on a neighboring country or the US oil company Exxonmobil, which operates in Guyana, would not end well.

title: Zpěvačka Tereza Kerndlová: Nemůžu vysvětlit všem, jaká fakt jsem
description: Aby bylo jasné, že na novém albu jde v první řadě o písničky, neumístila Tereza Kerndlová na jeho obal svou fotku. V minulosti přitom na svou přirozenou ženskou přitažlivost obvykle sázela a k písničkám natáčela videoklipy, ve kterých jí to nadmíru slušelo. Teprve nyní však do sebe vše zapadlo. Album Diamanty je bezesporu její nejvydařenější.
title_translated: Singer Tereza Kerndlová: I can't explain to all what facts I am
description_translated: To make it clear that the new album is primarily songs, Tereza Kerndlová did not place her photo on his cover. In the past, she usually bet on her natural female attraction and filmed video clips of songs in which it suited her. Only now did everything fit together. The album Diamonds is undoubtedly its most successful.

title: Důchodci masově opustili penzijní spoření. Nové účastnické fondy přesto posílily
description: Těsně pod hranici čtyř milionů účastníků klesl meziročně počet lidí, kteří si spoří na důchod se státním příspěvkem. Plyne to z aktuálních údajů ministerstva financí. Na propadu se podepsalo především loňské zrušení státní podpory pro starobní penzisty, které pocítil zhruba jeden milion střadatelů.
title_translated: Pensioners left pension savings massively. Nevertheless, the new participating funds have strengthened
description_translated: Just below the four million participants, the number of people who save their retirement with a state contribution dropped year -on -year. This follows from the current data of the Ministry of Finance. The slump was mainly due to last year's abolition of state support for old -age pensioners, which felt about one million savers.

title: "Nejste tu vítáni." Češi odmítají migranty nejvíc v Evropě, ukazují data
description: Přistěhovalci nemají podle Čechů pozitivní přínos, vzbuzují v nich negativní pocity. Jde o strach z neznámého, hodnotí sociologové.
title_translated: "You're not welcome here." Czechs reject migrants most in Europe, show data
description_translated: According to Czechs, immigrants do not have a positive benefit, they evoke negative feelings. It is a fear of unknown, sociologists evaluate.

title: "Před pár měsíci to byla utopie." Čech Mac se vrátil od Kursku a popsal zásadní změnu
description: Český dobrovolník Mac se vrátil z Kurské oblasti, odkud se Ukrajinci stahují. Velmi zásadní zbraní podle něj jsou nyní drony řízené optickým vláknem.
title_translated: "A few months ago it was a utopia." Czech Mac returned from Kursk and described a fundamental change
description_translated: The Czech volunteer Mac returned from the Kursk region, where the Ukrainians are withdrawing. According to him, the drones controlled by optical fiber are now a very important weapon.

title: Příběh dvou českých e-shopů je u konce. Těží z toho nejen Alza
description: E-shop Mall.cz se stejně jako specialista na elektroniku CZC.cz přesunul na tržiště Allegro. Uzavírá se tím příběh dvou známých prodejců. Poláci však chtějí těžit z jejich značky.
title_translated: The story of two Czech e-shops is over. It benefits not only Alza
description_translated: E-shop Mall.cz, like a specialist in Electronics CZC.cz, moved to the marketplace Allegro. This closes the story of two well -known retailers. But the Poles want to benefit from their brand.

title: Přepálený olej v restauracích a fast foodech je stále problém, ukázaly kontroly
description: Desetina testovaných fritovacích olejů ve stravovacích zařízeních loni neprošlo kontrolou Státní zemědělské a potravinářské inspekce. Podle inspektorů je to méně než v předchozích letech. Situace podle nich ale není zdaleka uspokojivá. Přepálené oleje jsou škodlivé pro lidské zdraví. Deník se zeptal na dodržování zásad při přípravě smažených pokrmů také kuchařů nebo českého zastoupení sítě McDonald’s.
title_translated: Burned oil in restaurants and fast food is still a problem, showed checks
description_translated: A tenth of the frying oils tested in catering facilities did not pass last year by the control of the Czech Agriculture and Food Inspection Authority. According to inspectors, it is less than in previous years. According to them, however, the situation is far from satisfactory. Burned oils are harmful to human health. The daily asked to comply with the principles in the preparation of fried dishes also chefs or the Czech representation of the McDonald’s network.

title: Jak Trump pomohl Putinovi. Od ústupků v mírových rozhovorech až po napětí s Evropany

description_translated: The prestigious American newspaper The Washington Post described how Donald Trump - whether consciously or not - helped Vladimir Putin.

title: KVÍZ: Cla a jejich používání v historii
description: V současnosti je jejich popularizátorem americký prezident Donald Trump, celní poplatky za přechod zboží přes státní hranice neboli zkráceně cla však lidstvo používá už od začátku vzniku prvních států a jejich vzájemného obchodu. Prostřednictvím našeho kvízu nahlédneme do daleké, ale i poměrně nedávné historie uplatňování cel.
title_translated: Quiz: CLA and their use in history
description_translated: At present, the popularizer is US President Donald Trump, but customs fees for the transition of goods through the state borders, or abbreviated customs duties, however, humanity has been using the first states and their mutual trade since the beginning of the first states and their mutual trade. Through our quiz we can look into the far and relatively recent history of the application of the cells.

title: FOTO: Podivuhodná strašilka humří. Zoo Praha představuje hmyzí celebritu
description: Dlouhá desetiletí byly strašilky humří považovány za nenávratně vyhubený druh, který v jejich domovině na ostrově Lorda Howea v jižním Pacifiku po roce 1918 zlikvidovaly krysy z parníku uvízlého na útesech. Strašilky ovšem přežily, a to na nejméně očekávaném místě, na nedalekém nehostinném ostrůvku zvaném Ballova pyramida. Mrtvolku podivného skoro patnácticentimetrového tvora tam v 60. letech nalezla skupina horolezců. Vědci následně potvrdili, že jde o strašilku humří, a objevili dalších 24 živých jedinců. V roce 2003 ze skaliska odvezli čtyři strašilky humří, které vytvořily základ chovu v lidské péči. Od března 2025 je tento nejvzácnější hmyz světa k vidění i v Zoo Praha, která znovunalezené strašilky humří představuje veřejnosti jako jediná na evropském kontinentu.
title_translated: PHOTO: Wonderful Humids. Prague Zoo presents insect celebrity
description_translated: For decades, the Humuries have been considered an irreversibly exterminated species, which in their homeland on Lord Howe's island in the South Pacific after 1918 destroyed rats from the steamer stuck on the cliffs. The scares, however, survived in the least expected place, on a nearby inhospitable island called Ball Pyramid. A group of a strange almost 15 -inch creature at the age of 60 was found by a group of climbers. The scientists subsequently confirmed that it was a haunter and discovered another 24 living individuals. In 2003, they took four lady's launches from the rock, which created the basis of breeding in human care. Since March 2025, this most precious insect in the world has been seen in Prague Zoo, which is the only one on the European continent to the public.

title: Vodňanské jaro ve znamení výlovů. Rybáři loví násadové a plůdkové ryby
description: Jaro bývá na Vodňansku tradičně časem výlovů. Ani letos tomu není jinak, rybáře můžete při práci pozorovat do 10. dubna 2025. Sloveny již byly rybníky Malá Podvinice, Velka Outrata a Nový. U Malé Podvinice začala navíc po odlovu oprava hráze a přilehlého chodníku včetně instalace nového veřejného osvětlení. Jednatel Městského hospodářství Vodňany pan Ĺudovít Brehovský nám rybářství ve Vodňanech, které je jednou z hlavních ziskových činností města, přiblíží více.
title_translated: Vodňanské Spring in the sign of catches. Fishermen fish housing and fry fish
description_translated: Spring is traditionally a time of catching in Vodňany. This year it is no different, you can observe fishermen at work until April 10, 2025. Slovaks were already ponds Malá Podvinice, Large Outrata and new. In addition to Malá Podvinice, after the catch of the dam and the adjacent pavement, including the installation of new public lighting, began. The Managing Director of the Vodňany Municipal Economy Mr. Brehovský in Vodňany, which is one of the main profitable activities of the city, will tell us more.

title: Mluví o příměří, ale zesilují útoky. Rusové za den ztratili 1860 vojáků
description: Ruská vojska v pátek podnikla více než 50 útoků na frontě u Pokrovska v Doněcké oblasti na východě Ukrajiny, uvedl ukrajinský generální štáb ve večerní zprávě o situaci na bojišti. Celkem ukrajinské velení za celý den napočítalo 116 bojových střetů. O intenzitě bojů svědčí, že ruská armáda podle ukrajinského velení jen za uplynulých 24 hodin přišla o dalších 1860 vojáků.
title_translated: They talk about a ceasefire, but intensify the attacks. Russians for a day lost 1860 soldiers
description_translated: On Friday, Russian troops made more than 50 attacks on the front of Pokrovsko in the Donetsk region in the east of Ukraine, the Ukrainian General Staff said in the evening report on the situation on the battlefield. A total of Ukrainian command for the whole day counted 116 combat clashes. The intensity of the fighting is evidenced by the Russian army, according to the Ukrainian command only in the past 24 hours lost another 1860 soldiers.

title: Leverkusen porazil Bochum. Schick byl v základu, rozhodl ale jeho parťák Boniface
description: Fotbalisté Leverkusenu s českým reprezentačním útočníkem Patrikem Schickem v základní sestavě porazili v 27. kole německé ligy doma 3:1 Bochum. Brankář Matěj Kovář zůstal na lavičce vítězného celku. Obhájci titulu si upevnili druhou příčku o tři body za Bayernem Mnichov, který v sobotu přivítá St. Pauli.
title_translated: Leverkusen defeated Bochum. Schick was basically, but his partner boniface decided
description_translated: Leverkusen footballers with Czech national striker Patrik Schick defeated in the basic line -up in the 27th round of the German League at home 3: 1 Bochum. Goalkeeper Matěj Kovář remained on the bench of the winning whole. The defenders of the title strengthened the second place by three points for Bayern Munich, who will welcome on Saturday. Pauli.

title: Krasobruslaři Mrázkovi jsou po rytmickém tanci desátí, Taschlerovi třináctí
description: Krasobruslaři Kateřina a Daniel Mrázkovi jsou na mistrovství světa desátí po rytmickém tanci. Natálie a Filip Taschlerovi drží 13. pozici. Čeští reprezentanti jsou tak blízko k tomu, aby společně zajistili dvě místa v této kategorii na zimních olympijských hrách 2026 v Miláně a Cortině d’Ampezzo a příštím světovém šampionátu, který se uskuteční v Praze.
title_translated: Figure skaters Mrázek are tenth after rhythmic dance, Taschler thirteen
description_translated: Figure skaters Kateřina and Daniel Mrázek are the tenth at the World Championship after a rhythmic dance. Natalie and Filip Taschler hold 13. Position. Czech representatives are so close to securing two places in this category at the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan and Cortina d´Ampezzo and the next World Championship, which will be held in Prague.

title: Chodov postoupil do semifinále extraligy. Brno si vynutilo sedmý zápas
description: Florbalistky Chodova zvítězily v šestém čtvrtfinále play off extraligy v Olomouci 5:0, vyhrály sérii 4:2 na zápasy a postoupily do semifinále, kde doplnily FBC Ostrava a mistrovské Vítkovice. Vítěz základní části Tatran Střešovice prohrál v Brně s Bulldogs 4:5 a rozhodne sedmý zápas, který se bude hrát v neděli od 17:00 v Praze.
title_translated: Chodov advanced to the semifinals of the extra league. Brno forced the seventh match
description_translated: Floorball players of Chodov won in the sixth quarterfinals of the Play Off Extraliga in Olomouc 5: 0, won a series 4: 2 for matches and advanced to the semifinals, where they added FBC Ostrava and championship Vítkovice. The winner of the regular season Tatran Střešovice lost in Brno with Bulldogs 4: 5 and decides the seventh match, which will be played on Sunday from 17:00 in Prague.

title: Feri jde k Ústavnímu soudu. Soudy podle něj nekriticky naslouchaly ženám
description: Bývalý poslanec Dominik Feri se nevzdává boje o svou svobodu. Po neúspěchu u Nejvyššího soudu nyní podal ústavní stížnost, v níž zpochybňuje průběh svého trestního řízení. Jde o poslední možnost, jak zvrátit pravomocný tříletý trest za znásilnění dvou žen a pokus o znásilnění třetí.
title_translated: Feri goes to the Constitutional Court. The courts, according to him, listened uncritically to women
description_translated: Former deputy Dominik Feri does not give up the fight for his freedom. After failure at the Supreme Court, he now filed a constitutional complaint in which he questioned the course of his criminal proceedings. This is the last way to reverse the final three -year sentence for rape of two women and an attempt to rape the third.

description_translated: Pilsen - The group of the year in the ladder poll became Monkey Business. The band, which celebrates a quarter of a century of existence this year, has also succeeded with the song Homo Sovietikus in the composition category. For the album of the year voting public ...

title: Sportovní šéf Třince o změnách v kádru, fanoušcích či velké posile. Promluvil o Daňovi s Kundrátkem
description: Zkraje týdne skončila úchvatná třinecká hegemonie, která od roku 2019 čítala sedmnáct vítězných sérií za sebou a především pět mistrovských titulů. Nad síly Slezanů tentokrát byli hokejisté Sparty, kteří po vítězství 4:1 na zápasy proskočili do semifinále. Oceláři po desátém místě v základní části tak museli kousat vyřazení už ve čtvrtfinále. „Sezonu budeme hodnotit jako nepovedenou,“ nezastírá sportovní ředitel Ocelářů Jan Peterek. Jak se tým změní v létě a co spekulace o odchodech Tomáše Kundrátka nebo Marka Daňa?
title_translated: Sports chief of Třinec about changes in the cadre, fans or big reinforcements. Spoke about tax with Kundrák
description_translated: Early the week ended the stunning Třinec Hegemony, which since 2019 has consisted of seventeen winning series in a row and especially five championship titles. This time, Sparta hockey players were beyond the Silesians, who after the 4: 1 victory jumped into the semifinals. The steelmakers after the tenth place in the regular season had to bite the elimination in the quarterfinals. “We will consider the season as unsuccessful,” says Jan Peterek, sports director of the steelmakers. How will the team change in the summer and what about speculation about the departures of Tomáš Kundrátka or Mark Daň?

title: Poradíte si s matematikou a češtinou? Zkuste test k přijímačkám na střední školu
description: Přijímačky na střední školy jsou tu. Na začátku dubna čeká desítky tisíc dětí stres spojený s jednotným přijímacím řízením. Redakce Deníku ve spolupráci s odborníky společnosti Zkoušky nanečisto nachystala sérii testů, díky nimž si můžete každou sobotu (až do 5. dubna) vyzkoušet otázky z matematiky a češtiny pro uchazeče čtyřletých maturitních oborů. Jde o testy upravené přísnějším podmínkám, které avizovala státní organizace CERMAT zajišťující jednotné přijímačky. Autory tohoto dílu testů jsou RNDr. Petr Šedivý (matematika) a Barbora Bendíková (český jazyk).
title_translated: Can you deal with mathematics and Czech? Try a test for high school entrance exams
description_translated: The secondary schools are here. At the beginning of April, tens of thousands of children are facing stress associated with a uniform admission procedure. The editorial office of Diary, in cooperation with experts, has prepared a series of tests, thanks to which you can try questions from mathematics and Czech for four -year graduation applicants every Saturday (up to 5 April). These are tests modified by stricter conditions that the state organization CERMAT providing uniform admissions announced. The authors of this part of the tests are RNDr. Petr Šedivý (mathematics) and Barbora Bendíková (Czech language).

title: Pošta zavádí pětidenní doručování. Jak systém funguje, kde reklamovat, co ceny
description: Nepříjemnou změnu bude pro mnohé zákazníky České pošty znamenat prodloužení doby doručení obyčejných zásilek až na pět dní. Pošta tuto změnu zavádí kvůli úsporám od začátku dubna. Deník přináší odpovědi na nejdůležitější související otázky.
title_translated: Mail introduces a five -day delivery. How the system works, where to claim, what prices
description_translated: An unpleasant change will be for many Czech Post customers to extend the time of delivery of ordinary shipments for up to five days. Mail has been introducing this change for savings since the beginning of April. The diary brings answers to the most important related questions.

title: S obědem přiletí dron. V Česku proběhl první test v městském provozu
description: První test v České republice v městském prostředí má za sebou revoluční systém doručování zásilek s využitím dronů. Vývojáři si k němu vybrali areál brněnského výstaviště. Drony v něm automaticky přepravovaly zásilky o váze do tří kilogramů mezi čtyřmi místy od sebe vzdálenými až 2,5 kilometru. Jde o technologii budoucnosti, jednou by se tak mohly doručovat i obědy.
title_translated: A drone arrives with lunch. In the Czech Republic there was the first test in the city traffic
description_translated: The first test in the Czech Republic in the urban environment has a revolutionary delivery system of shipments using drones. The developers chose the Brno Exhibition Center. The drones automatically carried shipments weighing up to three kilograms between four seats apart up to 2.5 kilometers apart. It is a technology of the future, so once lunch could be delivered.

title: Famózní Menšík! V Miami udolal i světovou čtyřku a ve finále vyzve idola Djokoviče
description: Už tak životní turnaj povýšil do ještě úplně jiné dimenze. Jakub Menšík si na podniku Masters v Miami zahraje o titul, v semifinále po obrovské bitvě přemohl čtvrtého tenistu žebříčku Taylora Fritze 7:6, 4:6 a 7:6. Devatenáctiletý český talent se v nedělním finále střetne se svým idolem Novakem Djokovičem, který bude usilovat o jubilejní stý titul na okruhu ATP.

description_translated: The life tournament has already promoted a completely different dimension. Jakub Menšík will play for the title at the Masters in Miami, in the semifinals after a huge battle overwhelmed the fourth tennis player of Taylor Fritz 7: 6, 4: 6 and 7: 6. Nineteen -year -old Czech talent will meet his idol Novak Djokovic in the Sunday final, who will strive for the jubilee hundred title on the circuit, etc.

description_translated: Washington - Federal judge in the United States on Friday night (at night of CET) ordered US President Donald Trump's administration to suspend his efforts to abolish the voice of America ....

description: Stanjura: Dostavba dvou bloků jaderné elektrárny v Dukovanech. Vyjednávání o podmínkách smlouvy s korejským uchazečem KHNP se blíží do finále a já věřím, že se nám během příštích měsíců podaří smlouvu s ním podepsat a zapojení firem na dostavbě bude...

Negotiations on the terms of the contract with the Korean tenderer KHNP are approaching the finals and I believe that in the coming months we will be able to sign the contract with it and the involvement of companies will be on completion ...

title: Počet mrtvých po zemětřesení v Barmě vzrostl na téměř 700, uvedla státní média
description: Bilance obětí pátečního zemětřesení v Barmě o síle 7,7 stoupla na 694 mrtvých a 1670 zraněných. Podle zahraničních tiskových agentur o tom informovala tamní státní média, která se dovolávají na prohlášení vládní vojenské junty. Páteční bilance uváděla nejméně 144 mrtvých a 730 zraněných. Otřesy zasáhly také Thajsko a Čínu.
title_translated: The number of dead after the earthquake in Burma increased to almost 700, the state media said
description_translated: The balance of the victims of Friday's earthquake in Burma with a thickness of 7.7 rose to 694 dead and 1670 injured. According to foreign press agencies, the local state media involved in the statement of government military junta. Friday's balance reported at least 144 dead and 730 injured. Thailand and China also affected the shocks.

title: Jestřabí: Zaniklá obec ve vojenském újezdu Libavá skrývá tajemnou historii
description: V tomto příspěvku budeme, milí čtenáři, pokračovat v návštěvách zaniklých obcí vojenského újezdu Libavá a podíváme se do jedné z nich, do Jestřabí. Přiložené fotografie ukazují zbytky toho, co se do dnešních dob z Jestřabí zachovalo, některé z nich také okolní krajinu. Hned na úvod chci zdůraznit, že i Jestřabí je lidem volně nepřístupné a pohyb ve vojenském prostoru podléhá přísným pravidlům.
title_translated: Jestřabí: The extinct village in the military Újezd ​​Libavá hides a mysterious history
description_translated: In this post we will, dear readers, continue to visit the extinct villages of the Libavá Military Újezd ​​and look into one of them, Jestřabí. The attached photographs show the remnants of what has been preserved from Jestřabi to this day, some of them also the surrounding landscape. Immediately at the beginning, I would like to emphasize that even Jestry is free to people and movement in the military area is subject to strict rules.

title_translated: Prokšanová (KSCM): The Government Manual for Survival I can imagine lively
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile for survival manual, upcoming the Ministry of the Interior

title: Ceny 13 základních potravin jako na houpačce. Máslo sesadil ze špičky nový cenový sprinter
description: Strmý růst inflace v posledních letech se výrazně promítl i do cen potravin. A zatímco inflace svůj růst už zpomalila a v únoru její míra dosáhla 2,7 procenta, některé potraviny inflaci dál výrazně porážejí. Které to jsou? A které potraviny naopak všeobecnému zdražování vytrvale vzdorují, či naopak dokonce zlevňují? Podívejte se na náš přehled.
title_translated: Prices of 13 basic foods as on a swing. Butter dropped a new price sprinter from the tip
description_translated: In recent years, the steep growth of inflation has been significantly reflected in food prices. And while inflation has already slowed its growth and in February its rate reached 2.7 percent, some foods continue to defeat significantly. Which are they? And which foods, on the other hand, do generally resist, or even cheaper? Check out our overview.

title: Ukrajina díky českému softwaru sleduje naše lidi, běduje Rusko. Je to tak, přiznává hrdě firma
description: Ruská generální prokuratura si stěžuje, že ukrajinské ozbrojené síly a speciální služby sledují díky softwaru české firmy Compelson ruské občany. Ředitel společnosti Dušan Kožušník Novinkám sdělil, že se k tomu firma hrdě hlásí a že software Ukrajincům na začátku války poskytla sama zdarma. Kyjev následně podle něj sám od sebe přešel na placenou verzi.
title_translated: Thanks to Czech software, Ukraine watches our people, laments Russia. That's right, the company admits proudly
description_translated: The Russian Prosecutor's General complains that Ukrainian armed forces and special services follow Russian citizens thanks to the software of the Czech company Compelson. Director of Dušan Kožušník told the news that the company was proud of it and that the software had provided the Ukrainians at the beginning of the war for free. Kyiv then, according to him, switched from himself to a paid version.

title: Ráno letí tam a večer zpátky. Jednodenní výlety do zahraničí jsou novým trendem
description: Cesty do zahraničí většinou vyžadují důkladné balení, přípravu i několik volných dní. Ani jedno z toho však neplatí při takzvaných extrémních jednodenních výletech, kdy turisté do dané destinace letí ráno a v noci už si opět spokojeně hoví ve vlastní posteli. Nový trend nabírá na popularitě, zároveň je však kritizován kvůli dopadům na životní prostředí.
title_translated: In the morning he flies back and back in the evening. One -day trips abroad are a new trend
description_translated: Travels abroad usually require thorough packaging, preparation and several free days. However, neither of this is true in the so -called extreme one -day trips, when tourists fly to the destination in the morning and at night they are happy again in their own bed. The new trend is gaining popularity, but at the same time it is criticized for environmental impact.

title: Počet obětí zemětřesení v Barmě prudce vzrostl
description: Bilance potvrzených obětí pátečního zemětřesení v Barmě o síle 7,7 stupně prudce vzrostla na 694 mrtvých a 1670 zraněných, uvedla v sobotu podle zahraničních tiskových agentur barmská státní média, která se odvolávají na prohlášení tamní vládní vojenské junty. Páteční bilance uváděla nejméně 144 mrtvých a 730 zraněných, vůdce junty Min Aun Hlain nicméně připustil, že se počet obětí ještě zvýší.
title_translated: The number of victims of earthquakes in Burma has risen sharply
description_translated: The balance of confirmed victims of the Friday earthquake in Burma with a thickness of 7.7 degrees increased sharply to 694 dead and 1670 injured, said the Burmese state media on Saturday, referring to the statement of the government military junta there. Friday's balance reported at least 144 dead and 730 wounded, but the leader of Junta min Aun Hlain admitted that the number of victims would increase.

title: Benzin proti elektřině. Dvojtest Citroënů C3 má jen jednoho vítěze
description: Citroën C3 přijíždí ve čtvrté generaci a kromě spalovacího motoru nabízí i bateriovou verzi. V redakčním testu jsme zjišťovali, jaká se víc povedla.
title_translated: Petrol against electricity. The Citroën C3 has only one winner
description_translated: The Citroën C3 arrives in the fourth generation and offers a battery version in addition to the internal combustion engine. In the editorial test, we found out what was more successful.

title: Končící nejvyšší žalobce Stříž: Nezanechávám žádné pomníky a kostlivce
description: S posledním březnovým dnem opustí křeslo nejvyššího státního zástupce a zároveň odejde do soukromého sektoru pracovat jako advokát. Igor Stříž (60) v rozhovoru pro Novinky uvedl, že odchází bez větších emocí a těší se opět do jednací síně, nyní už v roli advokáta. Štve ho, že se vysocí politici vyjadřují jako hokynáři a že ho kritizovali za krátké působení u vojenské prokuratury před revolucí, aniž by znali jeho další více než třicetiletou práci na státním zastupitelství.
title_translated: Ending Supreme Prosecutor Stop: I don't leave any memorials and skeletons
description_translated: With the last day of March, he leaves the seat of the Supreme Public Prosecutor and at the same time goes to the private sector as a lawyer. Igor Stříž (60) said in an interview for news that he was leaving without much emotion and looking forward to the Chamber again, now as a lawyer. He annoys that tall politicians express themselves as grocers and that they criticized him in a short work at the Military Prosecutor's Office before the revolution without knowing his other more than thirty years of work at the prosecutor's office.

title: AM, A1, A2, máte v tom zmatek? S jakým oprávněním můžete řídit skútr, motorku či elektro
description: Rádi byste si letos udělali „papíry“ na motorku? Nebo přemýšlíte, zda si rozšířit své řidičské oprávnění o další kategorii? Jednotlivé motocyklové skupiny se liší výkonem, rychlostí stroje, ale i podmínkami pro jejich získaní.
title_translated: AM, A1, A2, are you confused? With which authority you can drive a scooter, motorbike or electro
description_translated: Would you like to make "papers" on a motorcycle this year? Or are you wondering whether to expand your driving license to another category? Individual motorcycle groups differ in power, machine speed, but also conditions for their acquisition.

title: Jak komunikuje Schumacher? Německý novinář poodhalil detaily o stavu legendy
description: Do mozaiky dohadů a spekulací vložil zjevně zasvěcenější pohled. Felix Gorner, novinář ze stanice RTL, který bedlivě sledoval celou kariéru sedminásobného mistra světa, tvrdí, že má širší přehled o Schumacherově současném, přísně střeženém zdravotním stavu.
title_translated: How does Schumacher communicate? German journalist revealing details about the state of legend
description_translated: He apparently put a more dedicated look into the mosaic of the conjecture and speculation. Felix Gorner, a journalist from the RTL station, who carefully watched the whole career of the seven world champion, claims that he has a wider overview of Schumacher's contemporary, strictly guarded health.

description_translated: Paris St. Germain after winning in St. Etienne 6: 1 had already secured the title in the French football league seven rounds before the end.

title: Slavia bez gólů na Dukle, Baník zdolal Pardubice, remízy v Ďolíčku a v Jablonci
description: Pražská Slavia nedokázala ve 27. ligovém kole vydolovat tříbodový zisk v malém derby na Dukle a nabídla Plzni se Spartou šanci stáhnout ztrátu na první místo. Vršovičtí mohli být nakonec rádi i za bod, který několika skvělými zákroky vychytal gólman Jindřich Staněk. Na góly bohatší byl zápas Baníku Ostrava proti Pardubicím, který domácí vyhráli 5:2, V Jablonci, který hrál s Olomoucí, a v Praze na Bohemians, kde domácí hostili Teplice, se pak urodily remízy.

In the end, the Vršovice people could also be happy for a point that was captured by the goalkeeper Jindřich Staněk with several great interventions. The richer goals were Baník Ostrava against Pardubice, who won the home team 5: 2, in Jablonec, who played with Olomouc, and in Prague on Bohemians, where the home hosted Teplice, then a draw.

description_translated: The head of the terrorist movement Hamas in the Gaza Chalil band said on Saturday that he agreed to the proposal of a ceasefire that received two days ago from the mediators from Egypt and Qatar. Informed about Reuters and AFP.

title: ONLINE: Rusko je potřeba k míru dotlačit, tvrdí Zelenskyj. A čtyři mrtví a desítky zraněných v Dnipru
description: Rusko příliš dlouho nereaguje na návrh Spojených států na bezpodmínečné příměří. K míru by mělo být donuceno, řekl ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj. Ruský útok na ukrajinské průmyslové město Dnipro si vyžádal nejméně čtyři mrtvé a 21 raněných, informoval šéf oblastní správy Serhij Lysak. Dramatické dění sledujeme na Blesk.cz v online přenosu.
title_translated: Online: Russia needs to be pushed to peace, Zelenksky says. And four dead and dozens of injured in Dnipr
description_translated: Russia does not respond for too long to the proposal of the United States to an unconditional ceasefire. The peace should be forced, said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenky. The Russian attack on the Ukrainian Industrial City of Dnipro claimed at least four dead and 21 wounded, reported the head of the regional administration Serhij Lysak. We watch dramatic events at Blesk.cz online.

title: Dukla po vynikajícím výkonu remizovala se Slavií
description: Fotbalisté Slavie ve 27. kole první ligy na vyprodané Julisce překvapivě pouze remizovali s domácí Duklou bez branek. Vršovický tým vede neúplnou tabulku už jen o 12 bodů před Ostravou a ještě další bod ze svého náskoku může ztratit v neděli, pokud Sparta porazí Plzeň. Čtrnáctá Dukla měla v pražském derby více šancí, lídra soutěže podržel brankář Jindřich Staněk. Nováček navázal na podzimní remízu 1:1 se Spartou.

The Vršovice team leads an incomplete table just 12 points ahead of Ostrava and another point from its lead can lose on Sunday if Sparta defeats Pilsen. The fourteenth Dukla had more chances in Prague's derby, the leader of the competition was held by the goalkeeper Jindřich Staněk. The newcomer followed the autumn draw 1: 1 with Sparta.

title: Dukla - Slavia 0:0. Sešívaným domácí atmosféra na vyprodané Julisce nepomohla
description: Velké výsledkové překvapení se urodilo v sobotu večer na vyprodané Julisce. Slavia, suverénní lídr aktuálního ročníku fotbalové Chance Ligy, si z malého pražského derby odváží pouze bod za bezbrankovou remízu 0:0. „Sešívaným“ nepomohla ani doslova domácí atmosféra, o kterou se postarali jejich fanoušci. Trenér Jindřich Trpišovský se proti Dukle musel obejít bez zraněného reprezentanta Tomáše Holeše, Štěpána Chaloupka ale i Igoha Ogbua. Do základní sestavy se po delší době vrátil Jan Bořil.
title_translated: Dukla - Slavia 0: 0. Stitched homemade atmosphere on sold out Juliska did not help
description_translated: The big results surprise was born on Saturday evening for a sold -out Juliska. Slavia, the sovereign leader of the current Chance League football, takes only a point for a defenseless draw 0: 0 from a small Prague derby. The "stitched" was not helped by the literally domestic atmosphere, which their fans took care of. Coach Jindřich Trpišovský had to do against Dukla without injured representative Tomáš Holeš, Štěpán Chaloupek and Igoha Ogbu. Jan Bořil returned to the basic lineup after a long time.

description: Házenkáři Karviné a Lovosic využili první mečbol a postoupili v nejkratším možném termínu do semifinále extraligového play off. Druhou výhru ve vyrovnaném duelu se Zubřím přidala Plzeň, Nové Veselí dokázalo poprvé porazit Duklu a snížilo stav série na 1:2 na zápasy.

The second win in a balanced duel was joined by Pilsen, New Veselí managed to beat Dukla for the first time and reduced the series to 1: 2 to matches.

title: První desítka Mrázkovým utekla, olympiádu ale mají i s Taschlerovými jistou
description: České taneční páry končí druhý rok po sobě v nejlepší patnáctce mistrovství světa. Kateřina a Daniel Mrázkovi neudrželi v Bostonu první desítku a propadli se na 12. místo. Natálie a Filip Taschlerovi skončili jen o příčku níž než jejich mladší kolegové. Takový výsledek zároveň České republice zaručuje dvě účastnická místa na olympijských hrách. Třetí titul mistrů světa si před domácím publikem vyjeli Madison Chocková a Evan Bates.
title_translated: The top ten fled, but they have a certain Olympics with Taschler.
description_translated: Czech dance couples end for the second year in the top fifteen world championship. Kateřina and Daniel Mrázek did not keep the top ten in Boston and fell to the 12th place. Natalie and Filip Taschler ended up only a lower rank than their younger colleagues. At the same time, such a result is guaranteed by two participating places at the Olympic Games. Madison Chock and Evan Bates were the third world champions title in front of the home audience.

title: Platforma Vize 0: Změna času na letní zvyšuje riziko vážných dopravních nehod
description: Spánková deprivace, únava a podrážděnost účastníků silničního provozu, to jsou hlavní hrozby, které přináší přechod na letní čas. Statistiky potvrzují, že v prvních dnech po změně času stoupá počet dopravních nehod. Nejvíce ohroženi jsou mladí řidiči, senioři, lidé pracující na směny a ti, kdo tráví za volantem hodiny denně.
title_translated: Platform Vision 0: Changing Time to Summer increases the risk of serious traffic accidents
description_translated: Sleep deprivation, fatigue and irritability of road users are the main threats that bring to the summer time. Statistics confirm that the number of traffic accidents increases in the first days after the change of time. Young drivers, seniors, shifts working and those who spend an hour a day behind the wheel are most at risk.

title: Salač dojel v kvalifikaci na Velkou cenu Ameriky Moto2 devátý
description: Filip Salač obsadil v kvalifikaci na Velkou cenu Ameriky Moto2 deváté místo a do nedělního závodu odstartuje ze třetí řady. Pole position si na okruhu v Austinu zajistil jeho týmový kolega Jake Dixon z Velké Británie, za kterým třiadvacetiletý český jezdec zaostal o půl sekundy.

The position of Position on the circuit in Austin was secured by his teammate Jake Dixon from the UK, behind which the twenty -three -year -old Czech rider lagged by half a second.

Anaheim Ducks s kapitánem Radko Gudasem hrají proti Torontu (David Kämpf). ONLINE přenosy utkání sledujte na iSport.cz.
