description_translated: The National Hockey League says goodbye to another weekend of eight matches. Buffalo Sabres and Jiří Kulich atone for a high defeat of 4: 7 in Philadelphia with a 8: 5 cannonade in Washington. But the Czech striker did not score in a goal -charged duel. Goalkeeper Karel Vejmelka captured Utah's victory 5: 2 on the ice of Chicago. Anaheim Ducks and Captain Radko Gudas play against Toronto (David Kämpf). Follow online broadcasts at iSport.cz.

title: Franz: Ideály o spáse by se neměly realizovat, končí to špatně. Je důležité si budovat vnitřní svobodu
description: V roce 2023 vydal hudební kompozici o stavu světa. Skládání hudby prokládá i výtvarný uměním. „Když píšu partituru, už ji mám tak v hlavě, že k tomu nepotřebuji hudební nástroj. Proto odjíždím do nějakého pustého kaňonu, na Gran Canarii nebo do pouště na jihu Fuerteventury, kde je úplný klid,“ říká skladatel Vladimír Franz o svém tvůrčím procesu v rozhovoru pro Radiožurnál.
title_translated: Franz: The ideals of salvation should not be realized, it ends badly. It is important to build internal freedom
description_translated: In 2023 he published a musical composition on the state of the world. Composing music also interleaves fine art. "When I write a score, I already have it in my head that I don't need a musical instrument. That's why I'm going to a desert canyon, Gran Canaria or a desert in the south of Fuerteventure, where there is complete peace," says composer Vladimir Franz.

title: Čím menší balení, tím vyšší cena. Skryté zdražování potravin pokračuje
description: Čokoláda, cukrovinky, káva, chipsy. Mnoho těchto výrobků si nově Češi koupí dráž. Nejen kvůli inflaci nebo cenové politice prodejců, ale zejména kvůli zmenšování jejich objemu či hmotnosti. Ekonomové tento jev nazývají „smrskflace“. Kromě toho, že lidé zaplatí více, dostanou i reálně menší objem zboží.
title_translated: The smaller the package, the higher the price. Hidden price price increases continues
description_translated: Chocolate, confectionery, coffee, chips. Many of these products are now purchased by Czechs. Not only because of inflation or price policy of retailers, but mainly because of reducing their volume or weight. Economists call this phenomenon "shrinks". In addition to paying more people, they will also receive a actually smaller volume of goods.

title: Zahajte sezónu v sedle legendy Harley-Davidson! Vyhrajte motorku na týden
description: Motocyklová sezóna klepe na dveře a členové iDNES Premium mají jedinečnou příležitost ji otevřít ve velkém stylu. Soutěžte o zapůjčení legendárního motocyklu Harley-Davidson na celý týden, a navíc získejte stylové oblečení této ikonické značky dle vlastního výběru v hodnotě 15 tisíc korun.
title_translated: Start the season in the saddle of the legend Harley-Davidson! Win a bike for a week
description_translated: The motorcycle season knocks on the door and iDNES Premium members have a unique opportunity to open it in style. Compete for lending the legendary Harley-Davidson motorcycle for the whole week, and get stylish clothing of this iconic brand of your choice worth 15 thousand crowns.

title: Berenika Kohoutová: Dva porody, výchova dvou dětí? To je proti rekonstrukci bytu nic
description: Je maminkou dvou malých holčiček, stále se věnuje práci a do toho se vrhli s manželem na předělávání bytu. Na jednoho člověka možná až příliš, ale přesto se z aktuálního zápřahu herečka a zpěvačka Berenika Kohoutová nehroutí. Naopak se těší na to, co ještě budoucnost přinese.
title_translated: Berenika Kohoutová: Two births, upbringing two children? This is against the reconstruction of the apartment nothing
description_translated: She is the mother of two little girls, she is still working on work, and she and her husband got into the apartment remodeling. Perhaps too much for one person, but the actress and singer Berenika Kohoutová will not collapse from the current harness. On the contrary, it looks forward to what the future will bring.

title: Šikana jako od Trumpa. Zkáza klubu NHL otevřela cestu k historické události
description: Právě před sto lety se v dosti divoké hokejové době zrodilo překvapení, které se výrazně odrazilo ve sportovních dějinách. Tradiční stříbrnou trofej zvanou Stanley Cup tenkrát naposledy NEvyhrál tým z NHL. Triumfovali totiž Cougars z kanadské Victorie, v níž se teď o víkendu konaly oslavy kulatého výročí.
title_translated: Bullying like Trump. NHL club destruction opened the way to the historical event
description_translated: Just a hundred years ago, a surprise was born in a rather wild hockey period, which was significantly reflected in sports history. The traditional silver trophy called Stanley Cup was not last time the NHL team. They triumphed Cougars from Victoria, Canada, where round anniversary celebrations were now held on the weekend.

title: 64 % Čechů nespí dobře. Zotavení z přechodu na letní čas může trvat i tři týdny, ukázal průzkum
description: V neděli 30. března se opět přepneme na letní čas – nikomu se nechce vstávat, ale nakonec nás stejně vytáhne ven dřív. I když se na delší večery těšíme, posun času dá tělu pořádně zabrat.
title_translated: 64 % of Czechs don't sleep well. Recovery from the transition to summer time can take three weeks, showed the survey
description_translated: On Sunday, March 30, we will switch to summer time again - no one wants to get up, but eventually pulls us out sooner. Although we are looking forward to longer evenings, the shift of time will take the body hard.

title: Nejkrásnější jarní výlety: Kam vyrazit za přírodou i zážitky?
description: Jakmile se jaro začne hlásit o slovo, probouzí se nejen příroda, ale i naše chuť vyrazit ven. Sluneční paprsky nás vytahují z pohodlí domova a lákají na procházky, dobrodružné výpravy do přírody nebo objevování kouzelných zákoutí. Pokud hledáte inspiraci na jarní výlety, máme pro vás několik tipů, kam vyrazit za čerstvým vzduchem, nádhernými scenériemi a nezapomenutelnými zážitky.
title_translated: The most beautiful spring trips: Where to go for nature and experiences?
description_translated: As soon as spring begins to report, not only nature wakes up, but also our desire to go out. The sun's rays pull us out of the comfort of their home and attract for walks, adventure expeditions to nature or discovering magic corners. If you are looking for inspiration for spring trips, we have some tips for you to go for fresh air, beautiful scenery and unforgettable experiences.

title: Smetanova Litomyšl chystá nový skládací sál od Josefa Pleskota. Jak bude vypadat?
description: Méně je více. Z tohoto hesla vyšel přední český architekt Josef Pleskot v návrhu nového demontovatelného sálu pro prestižní festival klasické hudby v Litomyšli. Montáž na nádvoří zámku začne v dubnu a v červnu už se tu bude hrát.
title_translated: Smetana's Litomyšl is preparing a new folding hall by Josef Pleskot. What will it look like?
description_translated: Less is more. The leading Czech architect Josef Pleskot came out of this motto in the design of a new removable hall for the prestigious classical music festival in Litomyšl. The installation in the courtyard of the chateau will begin in April and will be played in June.

title: Ze zdravotnictví k cukrařině. Bývalá sestřička boduje netradičním povidloněm
description: Denisa Krejzová z Vysokého Mýta pracovala roky jako zdravotní sestra v domově důchodců. Pak se jí narodila dcera a ona přičichla k cukrařině. Stejnokroj zdravotní sestry už neoblékla a ve Vysokém Mýtě otevřela espresso bar Moje Kredenc.
title_translated: From healthcare to sugar. The former nurse scores with an unconventional povidlon
description_translated: Denisa Krejzová from Vysoké Mýto worked for years as a nurse in a retirement home. Then her daughter was born and she smelled of sugar. The nursing uniform has no longer dress and in Vysoké Mýto opened the espresso bar my cupboard.

title: Jednoduché tipy na aprílové žerty aneb Jak dnes napálit kamarády a kolegy
description: Chcete na apríla někoho napálit a nevíte jak? Nabízíme vám 17 jednoduchých způsobů, jak vtipně vyzrát na vaše kolegy, členy rodiny nebo drahé polovičky. Podívejte se.
title_translated: Simple tips for April pranks or how to burn friends and colleagues today
description_translated: Do you want to burn someone on April and don't know how? We offer 17 simple ways to funnyly mature to your colleagues, family members or expensive halves. Look.

title: Trest pro Le Penovou je to samé, co chtěli udělat mně, míní Trump
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump přirovnal pondělní odsouzení vůdkyně francouzské krajní pravice Marine Le Penové ke svým právním bitvám ve Spojených státech. Verdikt označil za velmi důležitý, informovala agentura AFP.
title_translated: The punishment for Le Pen is the same thing they wanted to do to me, Trump says
description_translated: US President Donald Trump compared Monday's convictions of the leader of the French extreme right Marine Le Pen to her legal battles in the United States. He described the verdict very important, AFP reported.

title: Trump přirovnal odsouzení Le Penové ke svým právním bitvám v USA
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump přirovnal pondělní odsouzení vůdkyně francouzské krajní pravice Marine Le Penové ke svým právním bitvám ve Spojených státech. Verdikt označil za velmi důležitý, informovala dnes agentura AFP.
title_translated: Trump compared the convicts of Le Pen to their legal battles in the US
description_translated: US President Donald Trump compared Monday's convictions of the leader of the French extreme right Marine Le Pen to her legal battles in the United States. He described the verdict very important, AFP reported today.

title: Izraelská armáda uvedla, že provedla úder na příslušníka Hizballáhu v Bejrútu
description: Izraelská armáda v úterý uvedla, že na jižním předměstí Bejrútu provedla úder, jehož cílem byl příslušník hnutí Hizballáh. Podle libanonských úřadů zemřeli nejméně tři lidé, informovala agentura Reuters.
title_translated: The Israeli Army said it had a strike on a member of Hezbollah in Beirut
description_translated: The Israeli army said on Tuesday that in the southern suburbs of Beirut it was a strike aimed at a member of the Hezbollah movement. According to Lebanon's authorities, at least three people died, Reuters reported.

title: Tentokrát vajíčka, příště mléko. Klub originálně odměňuje hráče utkání
description: Norský fotbalový klub Bryne FK je pyšný na dvě věci: že tam svou kariéru začal obávaný kanonýr Erling Haaland, a hlavně na to, že leží na jihozápadě země v zemědělské krajině. Možná i proto se rozhodl odměnit nejlepšího hráče zápasu čtyřmi platy vajec.
title_translated: This time eggs, next time milk. The club original rewards players of the match
description_translated: The Bryne FK Norwegian football club is proud of two things: that the dreaded cannon Erling Haaland began his career, and especially that he lies in the southwest of the country in the agricultural landscape. Perhaps that is why he decided to reward the best player of the match with four salaries of eggs.

title: Erotika bez nahoty: Takhle kdysi vypadaly extravagantní tanečnice v pánských klubech
description: Mnoho lidí si představuje vystoupení burlesky jako laciný striptýz, ale profesionální tanečnice tohoto žánru tvrdí, že představení nesmí nikdy sklouznout k oplzlosti. V předminulém století tomu tak nebylo už vůbec. Vystoupení vždy měla erotický nádech, ale kořeny burleskních technik sahají hluboko do minulosti.
title_translated: Erotic without nudity: This is how extravagant dancers in men's clubs once looked like
description_translated: Many people imagine Burlesque performances like cheap striptease, but the professional dancer of this genre claims that the performance must never slip to obscenity. This was not the case in the last century. The performance has always had an erotic touch, but the roots of burlesque techniques reach deep into the past.

title: Izraelci v noci udeřili na velitele Hamásu v Bejrútu, tři mrtví
description: Izraelská armáda na jižním předměstí Bejrútu provedla úder, jehož cílem byl příslušník hnutí Hizballáh. Podle libanonských úřadů zemřeli nejméně tři lidé, informovala agentura Reuters.
title_translated: Israelis struck at the Hamas commander in Beirut at night, three dead
description_translated: The Israeli army in the southern suburbs of Beirut performed a blow to a member of the Hezbollah movement. According to Lebanon's authorities, at least three people died, Reuters reported.

title: Balaštíková (ANO): Potravinová bezpečnost není fráze – je to základní povinnost státu
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu ke zdražování mouky.
title_translated: Balaštíková (YES): Food safety is not a phrase - it is the basic duty of the state
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile to raise flour.

title: Sparta vs. Kometa, díl první: Flekův otvírák i Zohornův skotský střik. Vyloučení zabrzdilo Spartu
description: Sparta - Kometa 0:1. Tak vypadá aktuální stav semifinálové série, hosté z Brna dokázali vyloupit pražskou O2 arenu a v prvním utkání vyhráli 3:2. Rozhodující gól vstřelil v čase 56:57 útočník Lukáš Cingeľ. Kometě na vítězství stačilo pouhopouhých devět střel na branku. Co ukázal první semifinálový zápas odvěkých rivalů?
title_translated: Sparta vs. Comet, part first: Flek's opener and Zohorn's Scottish spray. Exclusion braked Sparta
description_translated: Sparta - comet 0: 1. This is the current state of the semifinal series, guests from Brno managed to rob the Prague O2 arena and won in the first match 3: 2. The decisive goal was scored at 56:57 striker Lukáš Cingeľ. Comet to win was enough for just nine shots on the goal. What did the first semifinal match of the ancient rivals show?

title: Itálií hýbe skandál. Olympijská medailistka se údajně musela svlékat při tréninku, klečet a prosit o odpuštění
description: V italském sportu vybublal skandál z prostředí moderní gymnastiky. Vyšetřování začalo už v roce 2022 poté, co několik gymnastek včetně známých jmen jako Nina Corradiniová a Anna Bastová vypovídalo o ponižování, kterému je vystavovala trenérka Emanuela Maccaraniová. Před pár dny byla téměř po třiceti letech z funkce propuštěna. Čerstvě na povrch pronikly další informace. Na zneužívání, týrání a psychickém nátlaku se podle Gazzetty dello Sport měla podílet také Julieta Cantaluppiová.
title_translated: Italy moves scandal. Olympic medalist allegedly had to undress during training, kneel and beg for forgiveness
description_translated: In Italian sport, a scandal of modern gymnastics has bubbled. The investigation began as early as 2022 after several gymnasts, including known names such as Nina Corradini and Anna Bast, testified of the humiliation exhibited by coach Emanuel Maccarani. A few days ago, he was released almost thirty years ago. Freshly more information has penetrated the surface. Julieta Cantaluppi was supposed to participate in abuse, abuse and mental pressure.

title: „Strašná tragédie. Oni to nepodepíšou.“ Topolánkovo zlé tušení ohledně energií
description: Česká energetika se podle bývalého premiéra Mirka Topolánka nachází v kritickém bodě. Vláda, která by měla v této oblasti vykazovat schopnost a strategické vedení, selhává v klíčových rozhodnutích, která ovlivní budoucnost nejen ekonomiky, ale i životní úroveň občanů. Neschopnost podepsat klíčovou smlouvu o jaderné energetice je jen jedním z příkladů. Česká republika se dostává do situace, kdy bude čelit zvyšujícím se cenám energií a stále rostoucí závislosti na externích dodavatelích.
title_translated: "A terrible tragedy. They won't sign it." Topolanek's evil hints about energy
description_translated: According to former Prime Minister Mirek Topolánek, Czech energy sector is at a critical point. The government, which should show the ability and strategic leadership in this area, fails in key decisions that will affect the future not only of the economy but also the standard of living of citizens. The inability to sign a key agreement on nuclear energy is just one example. The Czech Republic is in a situation where it will face increasing energy prices and increasing dependence on external suppliers.

title: RFE/RL začalo zaměstnance pražské centrály posílat na neplacenou dovolenou
description: Rádio Svobodná Evropa/Rádio Svoboda (RFE/RL) začalo dnes zaměstnance pražské centrály posílat na neplacenou dovolenou, kterou si vynutil fakt, že stále nedostalo Kongresem vyčleněné prostředky na duben. Administrativa prezidenta Donalda Trumpa chce financování RFE/RL ukončit, rozhlasová stanice se proti tomu brání soudně.
title_translated: RFE/RL started to send Prague headquarters employees for unpaid holiday
description_translated: Radio Free Europe/Radio Svoboda (RFE/RL) began to send employees of the Prague headquarters today for a unpaid holiday, which was forced by the fact that it still did not receive a congress settled for April. President Donald Trump's administration wants to end RFE/RL financing, the radio station defends against it.

title: Rádio Svobodná Evropa začalo zaměstnance pražské centrály posílat na neplacenou dovolenou
description: Rádio Svobodná Evropa/Rádio Svoboda (RFE/RL) začalo dnes zaměstnance pražské centrály posílat na neplacenou dovolenou, kterou si vynutil fakt, že stále nedostalo Kongresem vyčleněné prostředky na duben. Administrativa prezidenta Donalda Trumpa chce financování RFE/RL ukončit, rozhlasová stanice se proti tomu brání soudně.
title_translated: Radio Free Europe has begun to send employees of the Prague headquarters on unpaid holiday
description_translated: Radio Free Europe/Radio Svoboda (RFE/RL) began to send employees of the Prague headquarters today for a unpaid holiday, which was forced by the fact that it still did not receive a congress settled for April. President Donald Trump's administration wants to end RFE/RL financing, the radio station defends against it.

title: Sýrii zasáhl celostátní výpadek proudu
description: Sýrii v úterý večer zasáhl celostátní výpadek elektrického proudu. Píše to agentura Reuters s odkazem na prohlášení ministerstva energetiky. Podle úřadu za problém mohou technické potíže na několika místech distribuční sítě. Technické týmy pracují na obnovení dodávek.
title_translated: Syria hit a nationwide power outage
description_translated: Syria on Tuesday evening hit the nationwide power outage. This is written by Reuters, referring to the Ministry of Energy. According to the Office, technical problems in several places in the distribution network are a problem. Technical teams are working on renewing deliveries.

title: Radka Třeštíková po svých milostných eskapádách: Našla teď toho pravého?
description: Po rozvodu s Tomášem Třeštíkem (47) byla Radka Třeštíková (43) spojována s několika muži, mezi nimi figuroval DJ NobodyListen alias Jakub Strach, grafik Tomáš Břínek alias TMBK nebo režisér Adam Sedlák. Žádný z nich však vztah se slavnou spisovatelkou nikdy nepotvrdil. Až teď! Radka sdílela společné selfie s mužem, který ji konečně udělal šťastnou. A není jím nikdo jiný než podnikatel Jaroslav Vít (49), exmanžel moderátorky Ivety Lutovské (41). Jak se dali dohromady a co je spojuje?
title_translated: Radka Třeštíková after her love escapades: did she find the right one now?
description_translated: After the divorce with Tomáš Třeštík (47), Radka Třeštíková (43) was associated with several men, including DJ Nobodylisten alias Jakub Strach, graphic artist Tomáš Břínek alias TMBK or director Adam Sedlák. However, none of them has ever confirmed the relationship with the famous writer. Only now! Radka shared a common selfie with a man who finally made her happy. And it is none other than entrepreneur Jaroslav Vít (49), ex -husband of moderator Iveta Lutovská (41). How did they get together and what does they connect them?

title: Kometa v euforii. Výhru nad Spartou vystřelil Cingel tři minuty před koncem
description: Hokejisté Komety Brno zvítězili v úvodním semifinále play off extraligy na ledě Sparty 3:2. Zápas rozhodl v čase 56:57 slovenský útočník Lukáš Cingel.
title_translated: Comet in euphoria. The win over Sparta fired Cingel three minutes before the end
description_translated: Kometa Brno hockey players won the opening semifinals of the Play Off Extraliga on the ice of Sparta 3: 2. The match was decided at 56:57 Slovak striker Lukáš Cingel.

title: Sýrii zasáhl celostátní výpadek proudu
description: Kvůli občanské válce, která v Sýrii trvala 14 let, jsou výroba a distribuce elektrické energie v zemi velmi omezené.
title_translated: Syria hit a nationwide power outage
description_translated: Because of the Civil War, which lasted 14 years in Syria, the production and distribution of electricity in the country is very limited.

title: Trump a egyptský prezident probírali Pásmo Gazy a dopravu v Rudém moři
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump a jeho egyptský protějšek Abdal Fattáh Sísí spolu telefonicky mluvili o situaci v Pásmu Gazy či dopravě v Rudém moři, kterou ohrožují jemenští povstalci Húsíové. Informovala o tom podle agentury Reuters v úterý kancelář egyptského prezidenta a kontakt potvrdil i Trump.
title_translated: Trump and the Egyptian President discussed the Gaza and Transport Zone in the Red Sea
description_translated: US President Donald Trump and his Egyptian counterpart Abdal Fattah Sisi talked about the situation in the Gaza or Red Sea zone, which is threatened by the Yemeni insurgents of the Husi. According to Reuters on Tuesday, the office of the Egyptian President informed about it and Trump confirmed the contact.

title: Nymburk deklasoval Písek a donutil soupeře k rekordnímu počtu ztrát
description: Basketbalisté Nymburka deklasovali v osmém kole ligové nadstavby Písek 111:54 a dali zapomenout na pondělní vydřené vítězství v prodloužení o dva body v Brně. Sršni proti lídrům soutěže neměli šanci, nastříleli druhý nejnižší počet bodů ze všech týmů v sezoně, zaznamenali rekordních 37 ztrát a po porážce přišli o naději na druhé místo před play off.
title_translated: Nymburk declassified Písek and forced the opponent to a record number of losses
description_translated: Nymburk basketball players declassified in the eighth round of the league superstructure Písek 111: 54 and had forgotten Monday's earned victory by two points in Brno. Hornets against the leaders of the competition had no chance, they scored the second lowest number of points of all teams in the season, recorded a record 37 losses, and after defeat they lost their second place in front of the playoffs.

title: Tomášek skončil ve Färjestadu a podepsal smlouvu v NHL s Edmontonem
description: Karlstad (Švédsko) - Hokejový útočník a úřadující mistr světa David Tomášek po dvou sezonách opouští Färjestad a ze švédského klubu míří do NHL, kde podepsal smlouvu s Edmontonem. Oilers uvedli, že...
title_translated: Tomášek ended up in Färjestad and signed an NHL contract with Edmonton
description_translated: Karlstad (Sweden) - Färjestad leaves the hockey striker and reigning world champion David Tomášek after two seasons and heads to the NHL from the Swedish club, where he signed a contract with Edmonton. Oilers said ...

title: Košťálek, Bukarts a dalších sedm škrtů. Vítkovice oznámily změny v týmu
description: Devět hokejistů včetně produktivního obránce Jana Košťálka už nebude pokračovat ve Vítkovicích. Extraligový klub, který vypadl v předkole play off s Karlovými Vary a obsadil 12. místo, oznámil změny na svém webu. Vedle Košťálka skončili další beci Stuart Percy, Juraj Mikuš s Lukášem Kovářem, útočníci Petr Hašek, Jan Eberle, Robert Říčka a Rihards Bukarts i brankář Lukáš Pařík.
title_translated: Košťálek, Bukarts and seven other cuts. Vítkovice announced the changes in the team
description_translated: Nine hockey players, including the productive defender Jan Košťálek, will no longer continue in Vítkovice. The Extraleague Club, which fell out in the round of play off with Karlovy Vary and took 12th place, announced changes on his website. Next to Košťálka ended another Beci Stuart Percy, Juraj Mikuš with Lukáš Kovář, attackers Petr Hašek, Jan Eberle, Robert Ring and Rihars Bukarts and goalkeeper Lukáš Pařík.

title: Akademikům navýšení rozpočtu nestačí. Nikdo neví, jak si peníze přerozdělují
description: Ani dva roky od začátku velkých protestů českých univerzit nejsou akademici spokojeni se svými platy. A to přestože ministerstvo školství do rozpočtu vysokých škol pro letošek přidalo čtyři miliardy a navýšilo jej tak na téměř 35 miliard korun.
title_translated: Academics are not enough for budget increases. No one knows how to redistribute money
description_translated: Even two years since the beginning of the big protests of Czech universities, academics are not satisfied with their salaries. And although the Ministry of Education has added four billion to the universities for this year and increased it to almost CZK 35 billion.

title: Český mistr světa to zkusí po boku McDavida. Ze Švédska odchází do NHL
description: Útočník David Tomášek se po konci dvouletého angažmá ve Färjestadu upsal v NHL Edmontonu. Oilers uvedli, že smlouva je na rok a 1,2 milionu dolarů.
title_translated: The Czech World Champion will try it alongside McDavid. From Sweden is going to the NHL
description_translated: At the end of the two -year engagement in Färjestad, the striker David Tomášek signed up in the NHL Edmonton. Oilers said that the contract was for a year and $ 1.2 million.

title: ONLINE: Liverpool hraje derby s Evertonem, v akci i Manchester City
description: Druhý Arsenal i třetí Nottingham v úterý zvítězily, jak si ve vloženém třicátém kole Premier League povede vedoucí Liverpool? Od 21.00 ho čeká derby s Evertonem. O čtvrt hodiny dřív má výkop pět utkání, představí se i obhájce trofeje Manchester City. Všechny duely můžete sledovat v online reportážích.
title_translated: Online: Liverpool plays a derby with Everton, in action and Manchester City
description_translated: The second Arsenal and the third nottingham won on Tuesday, how will the leader Liverpool lead in the thirtieth round of the Premier League? From 21.00 he has a derby with Everton. A quarter of an hour earlier has five games, and the advocate of Manchester City trophy. You can watch all duels in online reports.

title: Žena na Šumpersku neukočírovala fabii, po nárazu do příkopu je vážně zraněná
description: Řízení nezvládla ve středu šedesátiletá řidička, která jela v úterý po silnici v katastru Nového Malína na Šumpersku. Z komunikace vyletěla do příkopu, přičemž utrpěla vážná zranění. Vrtulník ji musel transportovat do Fakultní nemocnice Olomouc. Okolnosti nehody šetří policie.
title_translated: The woman in the Šumperk region did not spoil the Fabia, after hitting the ditch she is seriously injured
description_translated: The driving was not able to do a sixty -year -old driver on Tuesday along the road in Nový Malín in the Šumperk region. She flew into the ditch from the road, suffering serious injuries. The helicopter had to transport it to the University Hospital Olomouc. The circumstances of the accident are saved by the police.

title: Běloruská novinářka musí opustit Česko, pracovala pro ruskou rozvědku
description: Vláda zařadila na vnitrostátní sankční seznam běloruskou novinářku Natalii Sudliankovou a příslušníka ruské tajné služby GRU Alexeje Šavrova, řekl po zasedání kabinetu novinářům premiér Petr Fiala (ODS). Podle ministra zahraničních věcí Jana Lipavského (nestr.) je Sudlianková klíčovou spolupracovnicí ruské vojenské zpravodajské služby GRU a řadu let v Česku skrytě a vědomě pracovala ve prospěch několika ruských organizací.
title_translated: Belarusian journalist must leave the Czech Republic, worked for Russian intelligence
description_translated: The government has included the Belarusian journalist Natalia Sudlianková and a member of the Russian Secret Service GRU Alexei Šlavrovo on the national sanction list, Prime Minister Petr Fiala (ODS) told reporters after the cabinet meeting. According to the Minister of Foreign Affairs Jan Lipavský (Nonr.), Sudlian is a key collaborator of the Russian Military Intelligence Service of the GRU and for many years in the Czech Republic hidden and consciously worked in favor of several Russian organizations.

title: Rada OSN kritizovala Izrael za přerušení příměří v Pásmu Gazy. Česko bylo proti
description: Rada OSN pro lidská práva v usnesení vyjádřila politování kvůli „porušení dohody o příměří ze strany Izraele“. Izrael útoky obnovil v březnu, tvrdí, že tak zvyšuje nátlak na hnutí Hamás, aby propustilo izraelské rukojmí.
title_translated: The UN Council criticized Israel for interruption of the ceasefire in the Gaza Strip. The Czech Republic was against
description_translated: The UN Human Rights Council expressed regret for "a breach of a ceasefire agreement by Israel". Israel renewed the attacks in March, claiming that it increases the pressure on the Hamas movement to release Israeli hostages.

title: Muskovy úplatky nepomohly, volby ve Wisconsinu vyhrála demokratická soudkyně
description: Soudkyní ve Wisconsinu se stane Susan Crawfordová, jež v noci na středu porazila republikánského kandidáta Brada Schimela.
title_translated: Muska's bribes did not help, Wisconsin's elections were won by a democratic judge
description_translated: The judge in Wisconsin will become Susan Crawford, who defeated the Republican candidate Brad Schimel on Wednesday night.

title: Fiala povede debatu o bezpečnosti, tématem chce koalice Spolu oslovit voliče
description: Praha - Debatu o aktuálních bezpečnostních otázkách, obranném průmyslu a ukotvení Česka v době rostoucích globálních výzev dnes v holešovickém centru La Fabrika a také na sociálních sítích povede premiér,...

title: Ministerstva a ŘSD projednají rozšíření dezinfekce kamionů kvůli slintavce
description: Praha - Zástupci ministerstev zemědělství a dopravy a také Ředitelství silnic a dálnic (ŘSD) dnes budou jednat o tom, jak zvýšit počty nákladních automobilů, které se na vybraných hraničních přechodech...
title_translated: Ministries and RMD discover the expansion of truck disinfection due to a drooling
description_translated: Prague - Representatives of the Ministries of Agriculture and Transport as well as the Road and Motorway Directorate (RMD) will discuss today how to increase the number of trucks that are at selected border crossings ...

title: Obří baterie v tenkém těle. Na vivo V50 Lite se spolehnete za každé situace
description: Máte pocit, že žijeme v době neustálého nabíjení? Existují výjimky. Novinka v podobě smartphonu vivo V50 Lite nabízí masivní 6500mAh baterii v elegantním, tenkém těle. Přináší svobodu od neustálého hledání zásuvek a obav z vybití přesně ve chvíli, kdy svůj přístroj potřebujete nejvíce.
title_translated: Giant batteries in a thin body. On Vivo V50 Lite you rely on in any situation
description_translated: Do you feel that we live at the time of constant charging? There are exceptions. The novelty in the form of a Vivo V50 Lite smartphone offers a massive 6500mAh battery in an elegant, thin body. It brings freedom from constant search for drawers and fear of discharging exactly when you need your device most.

title: Jak si loni vedly penzijní účastnické fondy? Rozdíly jsou veliké. Ten nejlepší přesáhl 30 %
description: Účastnické fondy v loňském roce přinesly zajímavé zhodnocení, za rokem 2023 ale stejně zaostaly. Podívejte se na jejich výsledky.
title_translated: How did pension funds do last year? The differences are great. The best exceeded 30 %
description_translated: Participation funds last year brought interesting appreciation, but in 2023 they lagged. See their results.

title: Od kdy lze zaměstnanci přiznat a vyplácet osobní ohodnocení jako navýšení základního platu?
description: Lze přiznat osobní příplatek zaměstnanci ve státní a veřejné správě už před skončením zkušební doby? A jak se pravidla pro osobní příplatek změnila?
title_translated: Since when can employees be granted and paid personal evaluation as an increase in the basic salary?
description_translated: Is it possible to grant employees in state and public administration before the trial period? And how has the rules for personal surcharge changed?

title: Smartphone s maximální výdrží baterie ve své kategorií
description: Máte pocit, že žijeme v době neustálého nabíjení? Pořádky se mění. Nové vivo V50 Lite nabízí nejen masivní 6500mAh baterii, ale i bleskové 90W nabíjení. Tento chytrý telefon přináší svobodu od neustálého hledání zásuvek a obav z vybití přesně ve chvíli, kdy svůj přístroj potřebujete nejvíce.
title_translated: Smartphone with maximum battery life in its category
description_translated: Do you feel that we live at the time of constant charging? The order is changing. The new VIVO V50 Lite offers not only a massive 6500mAh battery, but also lightning 90W charging. This smartphone brings freedom from the constant search for drawers and fear of discharging exactly when you need your device most.

title: Ascendent prozradí, jaké máte charisma, descendent zase zrcadlí vaše vztahy
description: Pravděpodobně víte, v jakém jste se narodili znamení horoskopu. Ale znáte také svůj ascendent a descendent? Obě tyto charakteristiky o nás řeknou mnohdy ještě víc. Třeba jak působíme na druhé nebo koho budeme celý život přitahovat. Podívejte se, jak jste na tom právě vy.
title_translated: Ascendant reveals what charisma you have, descendent mirrors your relationships
description_translated: You probably know in which you were born a horoscope sign. But do you also know your ascendant and descendant? Both of these characteristics often say about us even more. Maybe how we work on others or who we will attract all our lives. See how you are.

title: Nejkrásnější dům v Beverly Hills si pořídili modelka a miliardář
description: Pohádkově bohatý miliardář si mohl koupit zámek postavený ve třicátých letech dvacátého století v nejlukrativnější části Beverly Hills celkem snadno. A rád, vždyť jeho krásná žena Christina Estrada si zasloužila to nejlepší. Ke štěstí to však nestačilo, přišel rozvod. A dům zůstal jejím majetkem.
title_translated: The most beautiful house in Beverly Hills was bought by a model and billionaire
description_translated: The fairy -tale -rich billionaire could buy a chateau built in the 1930s quite easily in the most lucrative part of Beverly Hills. And glad, for his beautiful wife Christina Estrada deserved the best. But it was not enough for happiness, divorce came. And the house remained her property.

title: Královské námořnictvo pořizuje pro lodě lasery. Jsou levné, ale mají mouchy
description: Vybraná plavidla Jeho Veličenstva by měla už za dva roky disponovat laserovými zbraněmi. Nejvíc se hodí proti levným cílům typu dronů nebo malých člunů. Jejich použití by mělo stát výrazně méně než munice pro kanóny, případně rovnou řízené střely. Bez těch se však válečné lodě dál neobejdou.
title_translated: The Royal Navy is buying lasers for ships. Are cheap but have flies
description_translated: Vybraná plavidla Jeho Veličenstva by měla už za dva roky disponovat laserovými zbraněmi. Nejvíc se hodí proti levným cílům typu dronů nebo malých člunů. Jejich použití by mělo stát výrazně méně než munice pro kanóny, případně rovnou řízené střely. However, the warships can no longer do without them.

title: Nemovitosti zdaňte víc, práci naopak méně, navrhují ekonomové
description: Výrazně vyšší daň pro pozemky, ochrana chudých vlastníků i motivace víc stavět. Ekonomové z výzkumné organizace PAQ Research přišli s návrhem, jak změnit danění nemovitostí. Nelíbí se jim, že do státní kasy teče z této daně jen velmi málo, zatímco zdanění práce patří v Česku k těm nejvyšším v Evropě.
title_translated: Real estate tax more, work less, suggests economists
description_translated: Significantly higher tax for land, protection of poor owners and motivation to build more. Economists from the research organization Paq Research came up with a proposal on how to change real estate tax. They do not like that very little is flowing into the state cash register, while the taxation of work is one of the highest in Europe in the Czech Republic.

title: Trump Američanům řekne, že za inflaci a recesi kvůli clům nemůže on, ale ostatní, věří ekonom Hnát
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump ohlásil balík cel, který děsí nejen ekonomy a země, na které mají dopadnout, ale také americké firmy, investory i domácnosti. Evropská unie chystá odvetná opatření, chce ale dál s americkým prezidentem jednat. „Evropa potřebuje ukázat, že má sílu. Pokud bychom jí teď nevyužili, je možné, že by to Evropu poškodilo,“ upozorňuje v pořadu Řečí peněz prorektor Vysoké školy ekonomické v Praze Pavel Hnát.
title_translated: Trump tells Americans that for inflation and recession because of the cloths, he is not responsible for him, but others, believe the economist drive
description_translated: US President Donald Trump announced a package of cells that frightens not only the economists and countries to fall, but also American companies, investors and households. The European Union is preparing retaliatory measures, but it wants to negotiate with the US President. "Europe needs to show that it has strength. If we do not use it now, it is possible that it will damage Europe," Pavel Hnát, Vice -Rector of the Economic University in Prague, points out.

title: Fiala: Válku nikdo nechce! Jsme terčem řady útoků, ale nejsme bezzubí. A co dál s Ukrajinou?
description: Premiér Petr Fiala (ODS) promluvil na čtvrteční bezpečnostní konferenci v Praze - Holešovicích o hybridní válce, rozpínavosti Ruska a jeho podvratných akcích, otevřených dveřích pro Ukrajinu a další pomoci Ukrajincům, ale také o výdajích na obranu a bezpečnost. Válku nikdo nechce, svět ale není pěkný a v mnoha směrech je brutální, podotýkal předseda vlády. Do publika usedli třeba Miroslav Kalousek, expremiér Petr Nečas či exministr Ivan Langer.
title_translated: Fiala: No one wants war! We are the target of a number of attacks, but we are not toothless. What else to do with Ukraine?
description_translated: Prime Minister Petr Fiala (ODS) spoke at Thursday's Security Conference in Prague - Holešovice about hybrid war, the expansion of Russia and its subversive events, open doors for Ukraine and other assistance to the Ukrainians, but also about defense and security. No one wants the war, but the world is not nice and in many ways it is brutal, the Prime Minister pointed out. Miroslav Kalousek, ex -Prime Minister Petr Nečas and ex -minister Ivan Langer sat in the audience.

title: Florbalové semifinále bez Moravanů. Bohemians, Tatran a Boleslav doplnila Sparta
description: Florbalisté Sparty porazili v šestém čtvrtfinále play off superligy doma Vítkovice 4:3 v prodloužení, ovládli sérii 4:2 na zápasy a poprvé od roku 2022 postoupili mezi nejlepší čtyři. V čase 68:40 rozhodl svým druhým gólem v utkání Jan Krejča. Vítkovice naposledy chyběly v semifinále v roce 2007.
title_translated: Floorball semifinals without Moravians. Bohemians, Tatran and Boleslav added Sparta
description_translated: Sparta floorball players defeated Vítkovice 4: 3 in overtime in the sixth quarterfinals, dominated the 4: 2 series for matches, and for the first time since 2022 they advanced to the top four. At 68:40, Jan Krejča decided with his second goal in the match. Vítkovice was last lacked in the semifinals in 2007.

title: ONLINE: Kanada zavádí odvetná 25procentní cla na dovoz automobilů z USA
description: Kanada zavede cla na dovoz automobilů ze Spojených států ve výši 25 procent. Nové opatření se netýká dovozu zboží splňujícího podmínky dohody o volném obchodu mezi Spojenými státy, Mexikem a Kanadou (USMC). V reakci na krok USA, jež počínaje čtvrtkem dnem začínají vybírat vlastní 25procentní poplatek na dovoz automobilů, to oznámil kanadský premiér Mark Carney.
title_translated: Online: Canada introduces retaliatory 25 percent duties on the import of cars from the USA
description_translated: Canada will introduce duties on the import of cars from the United States of 25 percent. The new measure does not apply to the import of goods meeting the condition of the free trade agreement between the United States, Mexico and Canada (USMC). In response to the US step, starting on Thursday on Thursday day, their own 25 percent fee for car imports is starting to collect, Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced.

title: Zemřel mistr světa Kochta. Dvojnásobnému olympijskému medailistovi bylo 78 let
description: Zemřel hokejový mistr světa z roku 1972 a dvojnásobný olympijský medailista Jiří Kochta. Bylo mu 78 let. Někdejší střední útočník měl ze světových šampionátů kompletní sbírku cenných kovů a celkem sedm medailí. S Jihlavou dvakrát vyhrál československou ligu, ale největší část kariéry strávil ve Spartě. Pražský klub o dnešním úmrtí člena Síně slávy českého hokeje po dlouhém boji s nemocí informoval na svém webu.
title_translated: The world champion Kochta died. The double Olympic medalist was 78 years old
description_translated: The 1972 World Hockey Champion and the double Olympic medalist Jiří Kochta died. He was 78 years old. The former middle striker had a complete collection of valuable metals and a total of seven medals from the world championships. He won the Czechoslovak League twice with Jihlava, but spent the largest part of his career in Sparta. The Prague Club of today's death of a member of the Hall of Fame of Czech Hockey after a long struggle with the disease informed on its website.

title: Velké peníze za ztrátu důstojnosti. Fekální večírky v Dubaji vyšetřuje policie
description: Bizarní, sadistické a fekální praktiky ohodnocené hodně penězi jako klíč k luxusnímu životu. Tak by se dal nazvat trend dubajských „Porta potty“ večírků, rozšířený mezi instagramovými influencerkami a modelkami. Jeden z večírků může mít i první oběť. Koncem března u dubajské silnice našli zmrzačenou ukrajinskou modelku, u níž policie prověřuje, že mohla bohatým Arabům na akci kývnout.
title_translated: Big money for losing dignity. Fecal parties in Dubai are investigating the police
description_translated: Bizarre, sadistic and faecal practices rated a lot of money as the key to luxury life. This could be called the trend of Dubai's "Potty" parties, extended between instagram influencers and models. One of the parties can have the first victim. At the end of March, they found a crippled Ukrainian model on the Dubai road, where the police are checking that it could nod the rich Arabs to the event.

title: Zlín vyrovnal 64 vteřin před koncem, pak rychle rozhodl prodloužení a srovnal stav prvoligového finále
description: Třikrát vyrovnávali hokejisté Zlína v druhém finálovém zápase prvoligového play off vedení jihlavské Dukly, naposledy 64 vteřin před koncem základní hrací doby. Vítěze na zlínském ledě tak muselo určit prodloužení, které po 75 vteřinách rozhodl domácí Válek a dosáhl srovnání série na 1:1 na zápasy.
title_translated: Zlín equalized 64 seconds before the end, then quickly decided to extend and leveled the condition of the first league finals
description_translated: Three times the hockey players of Zlín equalized the lead of the Jihlava Dukla in the second final match of the first league playoff, for the last 64 seconds before the end of the regular time. The winner on the Zlín ice had to determine the extension, which after 75 seconds decided the home wars and achieved a comparison of the series to 1: 1 for matches.

title: Rasistické pokřiky, pyro. Disciplinární komise řeší fanoušky Sigmy
description: Ne příliš dobrou reklamu dělají na venkovních hřištích fanoušci Sigmy Olomouc svému klubu. Několikrát už se řešilo poničení vybavení stadionu soupeře Hanáků, naposledy v Jablonci dvakrát přerušili utkání - pyrotechnikou a rasistickými pokřiky. Vše bude řešit Disciplinární komise LFA která s klubem zahájila řízení. Sigma se ihned od chování fans distancovala.

description_translated: Not very good advertising on outdoor playgrounds fans Sigma Olomouc to their club. Several times it was solved by damaging the equipment of the opponent's stadium Hanák, most recently in Jablonec twice interrupted the match - pyrotechnics and racist shouts. Everything will be solved by the Disciplinary Commission of the LFA, which initiated the club with the club. Sigma distanced himself from the behavior of the fans.

title: Zlín - Jihlava 4:3p. Berani třikrát prohrávali, ale slaví v prodloužení. Rozhodl Válek
description: Zlín vyhrál ve druhém finále Maxa ligy nad Jihlavou 4:3 v prodloužení. V utkání třikrát prohrával, ale 64 sekund před koncem poslal zápas do overtimu Jakub Šlahař. Záhy pak vyrovnanou bitvu rozsekl Lukáš Válek. Druhý tým po základní části tak srovnal stav série na 1:1. Pokračuje se v neděli a pondělí v Pelhřimově, kde nastupuje Dukla v azylu.
title_translated: Zlín - Jihlava 4: 3p. The rams lost three times, but celebrate in overtime. He decided the wars
description_translated: Zlín won in the second final of Max League nad Jihlava 4: 3 in overtime. He lost three times in the match, but Jakub Šlahař, 64 seconds before the end. Soon Lukáš Válek cut the balanced battle. The second team after the regular season compared the status of the series to 1: 1. It continues on Sunday and Monday in Pelhřimov, where Dukla starts in asylum.

title: ONLINE: Mountfield HK - Pardubice 2:3. Smejkal vrátil Dynamu vedení
description: Derby východočeských rivalů nabízí druhá semifinálová série Tipsport extraligy, v níž proti sobě stojí stojí hokejisté Hradce Králové a Pardubice. Domácí mají Dynamu co vracet - oba celky se potkaly v play off i loni a Pardubičtí ovládli sérii 4:1 na zápasy. Úvodní duel se hraje na královéhradeckém ledě od 18:00, jeho ONLINE přenos sledujte na iSport.cz.
title_translated: Online: Mountfield HK - Pardubice 2: 3. Smejkal returned Dynamo leadership
description_translated: The Derby of East Bohemian rivals offers the second semi -final series of the Tipsport Extraliga, which stands against each other hockey players Hradec Králové and Pardubice. The home team has a lot to return - both teams met in the playoffs last year and Pardubice dominated the series 4: 1 for matches. The opening duel is played on the Hradec Králové ice from 18:00, watch its online broadcast at iSport.cz.

title: "Ne ruskému zákonu". Slováci demonstrovali proti zákonu o nevládních organizacích
description: Sociolog, spisovatel a diplomat Martin Bútora vyslovil obavy, že Slovensko je v současnosti svědkem "kontrarevoluce proti listopadu 89".
title_translated: "Not to the Russian law". Slovaks demonstrated against the Act on NGOs
description_translated: Sociologist, writer and diplomat Martin Butora said fears that Slovakia is currently witnessing "counter -revolution against November 89".

title: Lyžařka Nová nemůže po nehodě hýbat polovinou těla, čeká ji další operace hlavy
description: K obyčejným aktivitám se ještě dlouho nevrátí. Zdravotní stav lyžařky Terezy Nové, která při lednovém pádu v tréninku na sjezd Světového poháru v Garmisch-Partenkirchenu utrpěla vážné poranění mozku, se ovšem po pěti týdnech v nemocnici v Motole výrazně zlepšil. Informovala o tom Česká televize.
title_translated: A new skier cannot move half of her body after an accident
description_translated: He will not return to ordinary activities for a long time. The health condition of the skier Tereza Nový, who suffered serious brain injuries in the Garmisch-Partenkirchen congress in the January fall in the World Cup training in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, but after five weeks in the Motol hospital, he improved significantly. Czech Television informed about it.

title: Stojíme na počátku globální obchodní války. Trumpova cla se zapíší do historie, myslí si Rusnok
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump ve středu oznámil, že Spojené státy zavedou reciproční cla vůči řadě ostatních zemí. Jak se tím promění trend globalizace? A zasáhne zavedení cel i Českou republiku? „Jsme malá, velmi otevřená ekonomika závislá na exportu průmyslových výrobků. Dopadne to na nás velmi silně,“ upozorňuje v pořadu Dvacet minut Radiožurnálu bývalý guvernér České národní banky a ekonomického poradce Allianz pojišťovny Jiří Rusnok.
title_translated: We are standing at the beginning of the Global Trade War. Trump's customs duties are written in history, Rusnok thinks
description_translated: US President Donald Trump announced on Wednesday that the United States will introduce reciprocal duties against many other countries. How will the trend of globalization turn? And will the introduction of cells and the Czech Republic hit? "We are a small, very open economy depending on the export of industrial products. It will turn out very strongly," says former Governor of the Czech National Bank and economic advisor Allianz insurance companies Jiří Rusnok.

title: Šťastný (PRO): Už můžeme mluvit pravdu bez nálepek, bez cenzury, bez hysterie?
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu ke korupci na Ukrajině.
title_translated: Happy (for): Can we speak the truth without stickers, without censorship, without hysteria?
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile for corruption in Ukraine.

title: Smutná Jihlava. Je to hořké, přiznal obránce Strejček. Góly ve Zlíně ho netěšily
description: Tohle bude ještě hodně bolet. Jihlava přišla 64 vteřin před koncem o druhou výhru ve finále hokejové Maxa ligy, ve Zlíně musela jít do prodloužení a v něm dostala rozhodující gól od Lukáše Válka. Dvě trefy obránce Jana Strejčka byly nakonec k ničemu. „Je to hrozně hořké, bolí to,“ povzdechl si jednatřicetiletý zadák Dukly, která v utkání třikrát vedla. Na víkend si nakonec veze domů na Vysočinu jedno vítězství.
title_translated: Sad Jihlava. It's bitter, the defender Strejček admitted. The goals in Zlín did not enjoy him
description_translated: This will still hurt a lot. Jihlava lost 64 seconds before the end of the second win in the final of the Max League hockey, in Zlín had to go into the overtime and got a decisive goal from Lukáš Válek. Two hits of the defender Jan Strejcek were useless. "It's really bitter, it hurts," sighed thirty -one -year -old Dukla's quarterback, who led three times in the match. He finally takes one victory in the Highlands for the weekend.

title: Nemluvila a ležela, ale nastal významný posun, říká otec vážně zraněné české sjezdařky
description: Zdravotní stav lyžařky Terezy Nové, která při lednovém pádu v tréninku na sjezd Světového poháru v Garmisch-Partenkirchenu utrpěla vážné poranění mozku, se po pěti týdnech v nemocnici v Motole výrazně zlepšil. Informovala o tom Česká televize.
title_translated: She did not speak and lay, but there was a significant shift, says the father of the seriously injured Czech downstairs
description_translated: The health of the skier Tereza Nový, who suffered serious brain injuries in the Garmisch-Partenkirchen congress in the January fall in the World Cup training in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, has improved significantly after five weeks in Motol Hospital. Czech Television informed about it.

title: Česko zaspalo, říká expert o investicích do obrany. V 3D tisku ale může být lídrem
description: Ministryně obrany Jana Černochová (ODS) v úterý podepsala za svůj resort memorandum s Českým vysokým učením technickým (ČVUT) o spolupráci v oblasti inovací obranného průmyslu. Podle expertů je spolupráce mezi obranou a technickými vysokými školami prakticky nutná. Investice do obrany se navíc podle nich vždy odrazí i na ekonomickém rozkvětu země. Kritizují ale současné mechanismy financování.
title_translated: The Czech Republic has fallen asleep, says an expert on investment in defense. In 3D printing, however, can be a leader
description_translated: Minister of Defense Jana Černochová (ODS) on Tuesday signed a memorandum with the Czech Technical University (CTU) on cooperation in the field of innovation of the defense industry. According to experts, cooperation between defense and technical universities is practically necessary. In addition, investment in defense will always be reflected in the economic flourishing of the country. But they criticize the current financing mechanisms.

title: Tomášek se omluvil z mistrovství světa
description: Hokejový útočník David Tomášek se podle serveru iSport ze zdravotních důvodů omluvil z mistrovství světa, kde mohl obhajovat loňské zlato z Prahy.
title_translated: Tomášek apologized from the World Championship
description_translated: Hockey striker David Tomášek, according to iSport, apologized for health reasons from the World Championship, where he could defend last year's gold from Prague.

title: Premiérka vzkázala Trumpovi: Nemůžete anektovat jinou zemi. Grónsko a Dánsko se musí víc sblížit
description: Nemůžete anektovat jinou zemi. Administrativě amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa to dnes podle agentury AFP vzkázala dánská premiérka Mette Frederiksenová z Nuuku, hlavního města největšího ostrova světa Grónska, na něž si Spojené státy činí nárok. Zdůraznila, že Dánsko neustoupí. Také dánský ministr zahraničí Lars Lökke Rasmussen dnes během jednání ministrů zahraničí NATO v Bruselu svému americkému protějšku Marku Rubiovi řekl, že Dánsko odmítne jakékoli nároky na Grónsko, které je autonomním územím Dánského království.
title_translated: The Prime Minister told Trump: You can't annex another country. Greenland and Denmark have to get closer to
description_translated: You can't annex any other country. According to AFP, Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen of Nuuk, the capital of the world's largest island of Greenland, which the United States is entitled to. She stressed that Denmark would not retreat. Danish Foreign Minister Lars Lökke Rasmussen also told his American counterpart Mark Rubio during the meeting of NATO Foreign Ministers in Brussels in Brussels that Denmark will reject any demands on Greenland, which is the autonomous territory of the Kingdom of Danish.

title: Rusko zná slabé stránky Evropy, varoval Fiala. Pár let, a vydá se k nám
description: Premiér Petr Fiala varuje, že v případě porážky Ukrajiny by Rusko mohlo pokračovat ve své expanzi směrem na západ, možná až do České republiky. Na bezpečnostní konferenci v centru La Fabrica tak premiér poukázal na potřebu zvýšeného zbrojení a finančních investic do obrany, neboť podpora Spojených států v otázce evropské bezpečnosti není jistá. K dalším investicím do zbrojení se pak vyjádřil i Fialův poradce pro národní bezpečnost Tomáš Pojar. Slovo dodal i k roli Donalda Trumpa ve vztazích mezi USA a Evropou.
title_translated: Russia knows the weaknesses of Europe, Fiala warned. For a few years, and he will go to us
description_translated: Prime Minister Petr Fiala warns that in the event of a defeat of Ukraine, Russia could continue its expansion to the West, perhaps to the Czech Republic. At the La Fabrica security conference, the Prime Minister thus pointed out the need for increased arms and financial investments in defense, as the support of the United States on European Security is not sure. Fiala's National Security Advisor Tomáš Pojar also commented on further investments in the arms. He also added the word to the role of Donald Trump in relationships between the US and Europe.

title: Správa jeskyní: 14 jeskyní zahájilo sezóny, zacílí na rodiny s dětmi
description: Zpřístupněné jeskyně České republiky od tohoto týdne otevřely své brány a dveře naplno. Tři z nich byly přes zimu zavřené zcela kvůli ochraně netopýrů, ostatní fungovaly v omezeném provozu. V uplynulých týdnech zaměstnanci jeskyní zapracovali na úklidu a modernizaci návštěvnických tras a od dubna mají všechny otevřeno od úterý do neděle, některé i v pondělky. V Punkevních jeskyních v Pustém žlebu v Moravském krasu finišuje oprava osvětlení po podzimních povodních, a tak se dočasně návštěvníci namísto plavby na elektrolodích vracejí ze dna propasti Macocha unikátně jindy nepřístupnou Tunelovou chodbou. S otevírací dobou jednotlivých jeskyní se lze seznámit na webu www.caves.cz.
title_translated: Cave Administration: 14 caves started seasons, target families with children
description_translated: The caves of the Czech Republic opened their gates and the door to the fullest. Three of them were closed over the winter to protect the bats, others operated in limited operation. In recent weeks, cave employees have incorporated the cleaning and modernization of visitor routes and have been open from April from Tuesday to Sunday, some even on Monday. In the Punkva Caves in the desert Žleb in the Moravian Karst, the repair of lighting after the autumn floods is finalizing, so visitors are temporarily returning from the bottom of the Macocha abyss uniquely inaccessible tunnel corridor. The opening hours of the individual caves can be acquainted at www.caves.cz.

description_translated: In Slovakia, there was a large protesting against a law to limit the functioning of NGOs. Demonstrations took place in many cities around the country, according to organizers, 9000 people participated in the protest.

title: Radil dostal vypínačku, Šťastný musel do sprch. Sudí vyslali jasný vzkaz: Hlavy chráníme
description: Byl to jeden ze zásadních momentů úvodního semifinálového utkání mezi Hradcem Králové a Pardubicemi. Hostující Lukáš Radil zavážel puk za branku a následně mu postavil strom David Šťastný. Rozhodčí po zhlédnutí videa ukázali jasný verdikt. Trest na pět minut a do konce utkání za zásah do hlavy nebo krku. Dynamo dlouhou přesilovku využilo a otevřelo skóre, následně sice promarnilo dvougólové vedení, přesto slaví výhru poměrem 4:2.
title_translated: Radil got a switch, happy had to go to the showers. Judge sent a clear message: We protect the heads
description_translated: It was one of the fundamental moments of the opening semifinal match between Hradec Králové and Pardubice. Guest Lukáš Radil pledged the puck behind the goal and then built a tree David Šťastný. After watching the video, the referees showed a clear verdict. Penalty for five minutes and by the end of the match for intervention in the head or neck. Dynamo took advantage of the long power play and opened the score, then it wasted the two -goal lead, but it celebrates the win with a 4: 2 ratio.

title: Sexuální orgie v Rusku. Trump zažaloval firmu, že o něm psala, platit bude ale on
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump musí zaplatit pokutu 625 tisíc liber (18,5 milionu Kč) za soudní náklady londýnské společnosti Orbis Business Intelligence, kterou zažaloval v roce 2022 kvůli spisu s kompromitujícími údaji, podle kterých se Trump údajně spojil s Ruskem, aby zvítězil v roce 2016 v prezidentských volbách.
title_translated: Sexual orgy in Russia. Trump sued the company that she wrote about it, but he will pay him
description_translated: US President Donald Trump has to pay a fine of £ 625,000 (CZK 18.5 million) for the court costs of the London company Orbis Business Intelligence, which he sued in 2022 due to a file with compromising data that Trump allegedly associated with Russia to win the presidential elections in 2016.

description: V pondělí 7. dubna zprovozní ŘSD úsek mezi 194. a 196. kilometrem dálnice, který na šestipruh rozšířilo jako první. Na podzim začne rozšiřovat křižovatku dálnic D1 a D2. ŘSD plánuje, že na šest pruhů rozšíří celý 30 kilometrů dlouhý úsek mezi

title: Nové knihy: Juřík, Reeves či Adamec
description: Korunovační klenoty patří mezi nejdůležitější symboly státu, ale víme o nich něco víc? Po přečtení publikace Pavla Juříka určitě ano. Keanu Reeves není jen herec a baskytarista, ale také spisovatel. Společně s britským autorem sci-fi se podílel na literárním příběhu o nesmrtelném válečníkovi. Dále nás čeká encyklopedie druhé světové války, která skončila před osmdesáti lety, detektivka z prostředí náboženské komunity amišů či kniha s texaskými hraničáři a indiány v hlavní roli.
title_translated: New Books: Juřík, Reeves or Adamec
description_translated: The coronation jewels are among the most important symbols of the state, but do we know something more about them? After reading the publication Pavel Juřík certainly yes. Keanu Reeves is not only an actor and bassist, but also a writer. Together with the British sci-fi author, he participated in a literary story about the immortal warrior. In addition, the encyclopedia of World War II, which ended eighty years ago, a detective story from the religious community of Amish and a book with Texas Hraničář and Indians in the lead role.

title: Přehled letních prázdnin v roce 2025: Kdy má Evropa volno a kde čekat zácpy
description: Každé léto nastane v Evropě stěhování národů. Lidé sedají do letadel či aut a vydávají se na letní dovolenou. Její čas do značné míry určují i termíny letních prázdnin. A ty má každá země jiné. Přinášíme přehled školních prázdnin pro rok 2025 ve dvou desítkách evropských zemí.
title_translated: Overview of summer holidays in 2025: When Europe is free and where to wait constipation
description_translated: Every summer there is a move of nations in Europe. People sit on aircraft or cars and set out on a summer holiday. Its time is largely determined by the dates of summer holidays. And each country has different. Here is an overview of school holidays for 2025 in two dozen European countries.

title: Byt prosvětlují jemné odstíny barev a rytmus mu dávají jasné svislé a vodorovné linie
description: Majitelé pražského bytu se obrátili na architekty s žádostí o zařízení jeho interiéru. Hotová byla zatím jen koupelna. Architekti se tedy zaměřili na obývací pokoj, ložnici a předsíň. V obývacím pokoji a ložnici byla původně dřevěná podlaha, kterou si klienti přáli nahradit světlejším typem.
title_translated: The apartment illuminates fine shades of color and rhythm give it clear vertical and horizontal lines
description_translated: The owners of the Prague apartment turned to architects asking for the facility of its interior. Only the bathroom has been done so far. The architects therefore focused on the living room, bedroom and hallway. In the living room and bedroom was originally a wooden floor that clients wanted to replace with a lighter type.

title: Dorazí opravdu levné plastové hodinky od Applu? Firma se rozmýšlí
description: V posledních dnech se opět rozproudila debata ohledně chystaných levných hodinek od Applu s přívlastkem SE. Analytici se totiž přou o to, zda se skutečně uchýlí Apple k levným materiálům a srazí cenu neobvykle nízko.
title_translated: Will really cheap plastic watch arrive from Apple? The company is thinking
description_translated: In the last few days, a debate on the upcoming cheap watch from Apple with the attribute SE has begun again. Analysts argue about whether Apple really resorts to cheap materials and knocks the price unusually low.

title: Pierce Brosnan ukázal štíhlou manželku: Dříve obézní Keely je k nepoznání
description: Keely Shaye Smith (61), manželka Pierce Brosnana (71), šokovala svět svou neuvěřitelnou proměnou, když na premiéře filmu MobLand v New Yorku vystavila svou výrazně štíhlejší postavu. Ohromila nejen svou krásou, ale i vděčností vůči svému tělu, které ji provází celý život. Co všechno stojí za její proměnou?
title_translated: Pierce Brosnan showed a slim wife: formerly obese keely is unrecognizable
description_translated: Keely Shay Smith (61), the wife of Pierce Brosnan (71), shocked the world with its incredible transformation when she exhibited her significantly slimmer character at the premiere of Mobland in New York. She was amazed not only with her beauty, but also by gratitude towards her body, which has been accompanying her all her life. What is behind her transformation?

title: Veronika Kopřivová si užívá exotiku: Vzala s sebou i své děti
description: Jen pár měsíců po narození druhé dcery si Veronika Kopřivová (34) dopřála zasloužený relax v exotickém ráji. Společně s rodinou vyrazila na Mauricius, kde si užívá slunce, bílých pláží a nekonečného oceánu. A jak je u ní zvykem, své fanoušky na sociálních sítích nezapomněla zásobovat pohledy na své dokonalé tělo v plavkách. Fotografie z dovolené vyvolaly bouřlivé reakce, a to nejen kvůli nádherné přírodě, ale především kvůli jejím křivkám, které si po dvou porodech zaslouží obdiv.
title_translated: Veronika Kopřivová enjoys exotic: she took her children with her
description_translated: Just a few months after the birth of the second daughter, Veronika Kopřivová (34) indulged in the well -deserved relaxation in an exotic paradise. Together with her family, she went to Mauritius, where she enjoyed the sun, white beaches and an endless ocean. And as is customary with her, she has not forgotten her fans on social networks to supply her perfect body in a swimsuit. Photographs from the holiday caused stormy reactions, not only because of the beautiful nature, but mainly because of its curves, which after two births deserve admiration.

title: The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered - Oficiálny trailer k uvedeniu na PC
description: Nenechajte si ujsť upútavku na uvedenie hry The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered na PC. Hráči zažijú kritikmi oceňované pokračovanie ako nikdy predtým vďaka optimalizáciám pre PC, ako je podpora širokouhlej obrazovky, softvérová podpora upscalingu s DLSS 3 a AMD FSR3.1, generovanie snímok a ďalšie. Hra The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered je už k dispozícii pre PC (Steam a Epic Games Store).

Players experience critics awarded by continued, never the pre -Optimization of the PRE PC, AKO is a support of a wide screen, softera support for upscaling with DLSS 3 and AMD FSR3.1, Generation Sensor and Dalšie. The game is a tie equipped with new updates of the fan -backed NO Return regime returns new stands and map. The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered is already available for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

title: Velká výměna průkazů pro osoby s postižením se blíží. Na co se připravit?
description: Skoro 140 tisíc osob se zdravotním postižením si bude muset letos vyřídit nový průkaz ZT, ZTP nebo ZTP/P. Některé navíc čeká i nové posouzení jejich zdravotního stavu. Co je nutné vyřídit a kolik to bude stát?
title_translated: A large exchange of cards for people with disabilities is approaching. What to prepare for?
description_translated: Nearly 140,000 people with disabilities will have to deal with a new license of ZTP or ZTP/P this year. Some also have a new assessment of their health. What must be done and how much will it cost?

title: Jižní Korea míří k populační katastrofě. Být rodičem je tady extrémní sport
description: Jižní Korea je zemí s nejnižší porodností na světě, zároveň patří k těm s nejdelší délkou dožití. Visí nad ní hrozba vážné krize, kterou vyléčí jedině zásadní revize společenských návyků i přežitých tradic.
title_translated: South Korea is heading towards a population disaster. Being a parent is an extreme sport here
description_translated: South Korea is a country with the lowest birth rate in the world, while being one of the longest life expectancy. There is a threat of serious crisis, which will only be cured by fundamental revision of social habits and survived traditions.

title: Mountfield HK - Pardubice 3:2p. Série je srovnaná, hrdina Jergl rozhodl v prodloužení
description: Mountfield HK srovnává sérii! Hradečtí hokejisté zvládli napínavý druhý semifinálový duel proti Pardubicím a po výhře 3:2 v prodloužení vyrovnávají stav na 1:1. Hrdinou zápasu se stal útočník Aleš Jergl, který vyrovnal na 2:2 v 58. minutě a poté rozhodl v prodloužení.

description_translated: Mountfield HK compares the series! Hradec hockey players managed a thrilling second semifinal duel against Pardubice and after winning 3: 2 in the extension they equalize the condition to 1: 1. The hero of the match became the striker Aleš Jergl, who equalized to 2: 2 in the 58th minute and then decided in overtime.

title: Trump prodloužil lhůtu pro prodej amerických aktivit TikToku o 75 dní
description: Trumpův tým dle prezidenta nadále pracuje na možnosti zachování TikToku pro Američany. Aplikace se dle zákona musí zbavit svého vlastníka ByteDance, čínská firma by tak musela prodat svá americká aktiva.

description_translated: According to the president, Trump's team continues to work on the possibilities of maintaining tiktoku for Americans. According to the law, the application has to get rid of its owner's owner, so the Chinese company would have to sell its US assets.

title: Atletika jako UFC: Sprinter Johnson rozjíždí nové závody. Větší peníze než Diamantová liga, zůstává jen běh
description: Ospalým klidem globální atletiky otřásl projekt legendárního sprintera Michaela Johnsona. Čtyřnásobný olympijský šampion a jeden z hrdinů zlaté éry devadesátek sehnal 30 milionů dolarů (682 milionů korun) a ze země vykopal svůj sen – novou atletickou ligu Grand Slam Track, která začíná v noci na sobotu v jamajském Kingstonu. Kromě hromady peněz Johnson slibuje atletice větší mediální pozornost na základě soubojů nejzářivějších hvězd. „Pevně věřím, že náš sport může být UFC či formulí 1,“ říká Johnson. Všechna esa ale nenalákal a technické disciplíny vynechal úmyslně.

description_translated: The legendary sprinter project Michael Johnson shook sleepy calm athletics. The four -time Olympic champion and one of the heroes of the golden era of the nineties got $ 30 million (682 million crowns) and dug his dream out of the country - the new Athletic League Grand Slam Track, which starts on Saturday night in Kingston, Jamaica. In addition to a pile of money, Johnson promises athletics more media attention on the basis of fights the most brilliant stars. "I firmly believe that our sport can be UFC or Formula 1," says Johnson. But he did not attract all aces and omitted technical disciplines intentionally.

title: Vietnam je připraven srazit cla na nulu, hlásí Trump

Tvrdí to americký prezident Donald Trump, který s generálním tajemníkem vietnamské komunistické strany To Lamem telefonoval poté, co oznámil smršť nových cel proti množství zemí. Na Vietnam Trumpova administrativa uvalila nová dodatečná plošná cla ve výši 46 procent.

description_translated: Vietnam is ready to reduce duties on imports of the American to zero if he manages to reach an agreement with the United States. It is said by US President Donald Trump, who with the Secretary General of the Vietnamese Communist Party phoned it by Lame after announcing a whirlwind of new cells against a number of countries. On Vietnam Trump's administration, a new additional blanket of 46 percent was imposed.

title: Francouzská policie zadržela na moři pašeráky s 800 kilogramy kokainu
description: Francouzská policie rozbila síť pašeráků, kteří do země na lodích dováželi kokain. Na palubě jedné z nich objevili 800 kilogramů tohoto bílého prášku. Pašeráci chtěli balíky s drogou shodit do moře. Státní zástupce Frédéric Teillet označil případ za první takový v zemi.
title_translated: French police detained smugglers with 800 kilograms of cocaine at sea
description_translated: The French police broke the network of smugglers who imported cocaine into the country on ships. On board one of them discovered 800 kilograms of this white powder. The smugglers wanted to drop the drug packages into the sea. Prosecutor Frédéric Teillet described the case as the first in the country.

title: Ryb bude letos méně, na střední Moravě po nich jdou kormoráni. Rybáři se bojí velkých ztrát
description: Rybí hospodářství na střední Moravě letos trpí kvůli velkým hejnům kormoránů. Tito chránění ptáci způsobují rybářům každoročně milionové škody. Stát se ztracené ryby snaží kompenzovat, podle hospodářů ale neplatí dost. „Náhrady jsou nedostačující, sotva pokryjí padesát procent škod,“ říká Jiří Zahradníček, vedoucí rybářství v Tovačově.
title_translated: There will be fewer fish this year, in Central Moravia there are cormorants after them. Fishermen are afraid of great losses
description_translated: This year, fish farm in Central Moravia suffers due to large flocks of cormorants. These protected birds cause millions of damage to fishermen every year. The state is trying to compensate for lost fish, but according to farmers, there are not enough. "Replacements are insufficient, they can barely cover fifty percent of the damage," says Jiří Zahradníček, head of fishing in Tovačov.

title: Němeček se zlobil: Hráli jsme profesorsky. Neuznané góly? Nechceme se vymlouvat

title: Mráz přijde i v neděli. Trpět budou meruňky, varují ovocnáře meteorologové
description: V Česku se během soboty citelně ochladilo, v neděli k ránu teploty klesnou až čtyři stupně pod nulu. Mrazy mohou v nižších polohách poškodit rozkvetlé stromy, zvláště ohrožené jsou meruňky. Příznivější by měla být situace na Moravě a ve Slezsku, kde má víc foukat a bude zatažená obloha.
title_translated: Frost will come on Sunday. Will suffer apricots, warn meteorologists warn
description_translated: In the Czech Republic, the temperature drops up to four degrees below zero on Sunday on Saturday. Frosts can damage blooming trees in lower altitudes, apricots are particularly endangered. The situation in Moravia and Silesia, where it should blow more and will be overcast, should be more favorable.

title: „Putin s příměřím váhá, ale neustále bombarduje Ukrajinu.“ Francouzský ministr zahraničí o situaci na Ukrajině
description: Rusko dluží Spojeným státům rychlou odpověď na jejich návrh na příměří na Ukrajině, uvedl v Bruselu francouzský ministr zahraničí Jean-Noël Barrot. Šéf francouzské diplomacie v sídle NATO hovořil po boku britského ministra zahraničí Davida Lammyho. Podle Lammyho by ruský prezident Vladimir Putin mohl přistoupit na příměří hned teď, ale neustále bombarduje Ukrajinu. Právě Británie a Francie tvoří základ takzvané koalice ochotných, tedy zemí, které společně diskutují o další podpoře Ukrajiny.
title_translated: "Putin hesitates with a ceasefire, but constantly bombing Ukraine." French Foreign Minister about the situation in Ukraine
description_translated: Russia owes the United States a quick response to their proposal for a ceasefire in Ukraine, said French Foreign Minister Jean-Noël Barrot in Brussels. The head of French diplomacy at NATO headquarters spoke alongside British Foreign Minister David Lammy. According to Lammy, Russian President Vladimir Putin could proceed to a ceasefire right now, but constantly bombing Ukraine. Britain and France form the foundation of the so -called coalition willing, ie countries that together discuss further support for Ukraine.

title: Íránci chtěli zavraždit rabína v Baku. Najali si pašeráka drog
description: Po plánovaném atentátu na aktivistku Masih Alinejadovou nevyšel íránskému režimu další vražedný plán. Terčem atentátu se měl stát známý rabín z ázerbajdžánsk metropole Baku.

description_translated: After the planned assassination for activist Masih Alinajad, another murderous plan did not work for the Iranian regime. The assassination was to become a well -known rabbi of Azerbaijan Metropolis Baku.

I enjoyed it full," said a twenty -year -old midfielder and a member of the national team after the match.

title: Pět let za propagaci komunismu? Na ty vaše lumpárny upozorňovat nepřestanu, nikdy, vzkazuje Konečná

Nikdy nepřestanu upozorňovat na ty vaše lumpárny, bojovat za naši zemi..., “ vzkazuje vládě europoslankyně a předsedkyně KSČM Kateřina Konečná.
