In the fifth duel of the Play Off Tipsport Extraliga finals, they took advantage of the huge gross in the Pardubice defensive and led by three goals, but with a comfortable lead, they gambled. Yet they won 4: 2 and are a step away from the title. An important leader was written by attacker Jakub Konečný. "She started us and gave us peace," he praised.

title: Hokejisté Eisbären Berlín s českým útočníkem Lednem obhájili titul
description: Hokejisté Eisbären Berlín s českým útočníkem Matějem Lednem získali po jedenácté titul německých šampionů. Obhájci trofeje porazili v pátém utkání finále play off Kolín nad Rýnem stejně jako v předchozích dvou duelech 7:0 a sérii ovládli 4:1.
title_translated: Hockey players Eisbären Berlin with Czech striker January defended the title
description_translated: Hockey players Eisbären Berlin with Czech striker Matěj January won the eleventh title of German champions. In the fifth match, the trophy defenders defeated the finals of the Play Off Cologne as in the previous two duels 7: 0 and dominated the series 4: 1.

title: Výstava mapuje komunistický útlak církve
description: Nebe bylo plné hvězd je název expozice v Městské knihovně v Dobříši, která připomíná snahu československého komunistického režimu zlikvidovat církevní život v zemi.
title_translated: The exhibition maps the Communist oppression of the Church
description_translated: Heaven was full of stars is the name of the exhibition in the Municipal Library in Dobříš, which resembles the efforts of the Czechoslovak communist regime to destroy church life in the country.

title: Na Kačině bude den plný her
description: Den plný dobových her a zábavy se koná na Zámku Kačina ve Svatém Mikuláši tuto sobotu. Návštěvníci si budou moci vyzkoušet historické hry, při kterých se kdysi bavila šlechta i chudý lid.
title_translated: There will be a day full of games on Kačina
description_translated: A day full of period games and entertainment takes place at Kačina Castle in St. Nicholas this Saturday. Visitors will be able to try historical games in which the nobility and the poor people once enjoyed.

title: Lukáš Radil: Vůbec nic nebalíme! Chceme si zopakovat atmosféru v Pardubicích
description: Pardubické Dynamo čelí těžké výzvě po prohraném pátém finálovém zápase proti Kometě Brno. Navzdory střelecké aktivitě domácích rozhodly rychlé branky soupeře ve druhé třetině. Hokejisté Dynama se nyní musí soustředit na vítězství na Moravě, aby si udrželi naději na další zápas v enteria areně. Klíčová bude disciplína a podpora fanoušků, kterou si hráči přejí zopakovat.
title_translated: Lukáš Radil: We are not packing anything at all! We want to repeat the atmosphere in Pardubice
description_translated: Pardubice Dynamo faces a heavy challenge after lost fifth final match against Kometa Brno. Despite the shooting activity of the home, the quick goal of the opponent decided in the second period. Dynamo hockey players now have to focus on victory in Moravia to maintain the hope of another match in the Enteria Arena. The discipline and support of fans that players wish to repeat will be crucial.

title: Opavané oddálili konec čtvrtfinále, Nymburk se na třetí výhru nadřel
description: Opavští basketbalisté oddálili konec čtvrtfinálové série s Olomouckem a po domácím vítězství 86:67 se udrželi ve hře o postup. Stav série snížili na 2:3, dalšímu mečbolu budou čelit v neděli v hale soupeře. Na jedinou výhru se k účasti v semifinále přiblížili obhájci titulu z Nymburka, ve třetím utkání ale v Ostravě zvítězili 95:91 až po obratu v poslední čtvrtině. Sérii budou moci vítězové základní části ukončit už v sobotu znovu na palubovce Nové huti.
title_translated: The Opavians delayed the end of the quarterfinals, Nymburk has made the third win
description_translated: Opava basketball players delayed the end of the quarterfinal series with Olomouc and after a home victory of 86:67 they stayed in the game for advancement. The series was reduced to 2: 3, they will face another sword on Sunday in the opponent's hall. For the only win, defending champions from Nymburk approached participation in the semifinals, but in the third match they won 95:91 in Ostrava after turnover in the last quarter. The series will be able to end the series on Saturday on the deck of the new metallurgical.

title: V Nelahozevsi se konají Hrnčířské trhy
description: Oslavit příchod jara na jedinečně dochovaném renesančním zámku z 16. století Nelahozeves mohou zájemci o tomto víkendu. V sobotu a neděli se tam totiž koná 20. ročník Hrnčířských slavností.
title_translated: Pottery markets are held in Nelahozeves
description_translated: Nelahozeves can celebrate the arrival of spring at a uniquely preserved Renaissance chateau from the 16th century. On Saturday and Sunday there is a 20th year of pottery festivities.

title: Vláda bude zřejmě moci navyšovat výdaje na obranu nad dvě procenta HDP
title_translated: Government will probably be able to increase defense spending over two percent of GDP

title: Slaný bude patřit vlakům a autobusům
description: Ve Slaném se o víkendu koná Regionální den Pražské integrované dopravy (PID) a Den Cyklohráčku. Součástí akce budou tradiční jízdy historickými autobusy i vlaky nejen po Slaném, ale i v jeho okolí. Nebude chybět ani den otevřených dveří provozovny ČSAD Slaný.
title_translated: Slan will belong to trains and buses
description_translated: In Slaný, the Regional Day of Prague Integrated Transport (PID) and a cycling day will take place on the weekend. Part of the event will be traditional rides by historic buses and trains not only after Slaný but also in its surroundings. There will also be an open day of the ČSAD Slaný establishment.

title: Armáda ČR: Vojenští policisté v Kosovu procházeli při výcviku ohněm
description: Od ledna letošního roku je v Kosovu nasazena 4. jednotka Vojenské policie. Je součástí mise Joint Enterprise a úzce spolupracuje s italskými karabiniéry, s nimiž dohlíží na bezpečnosti v oblasti. Ačkoliv jednotka prošla rozsáhlou přípravou už v ČR, ve výcviku pokračuje i v místě nasazení.
title_translated: Army of the Czech Republic: Military police officers in Kosovo went through fire
description_translated: Since January this year, 4 military police unit has been deployed in Kosovo. It is part of the Joint Enterprise mission and closely cooperates with Italian carabiners with which it oversees security in the area. Although the unit has undergone extensive preparation already in the Czech Republic, the training continues at the site of deployment.

title: Trump dorazil na pohřeb papeže Františka. Melania okouzlila, jeho čeká třetí řada
description: Donald Trump a jeho manželka Melania včera večer dorazili do Říma, aby se dnes zúčastnili pohřbu papeže Františka. Jejich přílet na letiště Fiumicino upoutal pozornost nejen díky prezidentskému speciálu Air Force One, ale i díky silné atmosféře okamžiku: Trump poprvé navštívil Evropu od svého letošního znovuzvolení prezidentem USA.
title_translated: Trump arrived at the funeral of the Pope Francis. Melania enchanted his third row
description_translated: Donald Trump and his wife Melania arrived in Rome last night to participate in the funeral of Pope Francis today. Their arrival at Fiumicino Airport caught attention not only because of the presidential special Air Force One, but also because of the strong atmosphere of the moment: Trump first visited Europe since this year's re -election by the US President.

title: Svobodná Evropa skončí, uvolní se „barák“. Žantovský už ví, koho tam nastěhovat. Nebude se líbit
description: TÝDEN V MÉDIÍCH Předvolební čas a varování před dezinformacemi. Co mají společného? Sjednocování České televize a Českého rozhlasu by díky nedávným krokům Donalda Trumpa nemuselo být zbytečně drahé. A 85. narozeniny jednoho z nejvýznamnějších žijících českých umělců. To jsou témata, která pro tento Týden v médiích vybral mediální analytik Petr Žantovský.
title_translated: Free Europe will end, a "house" will relax. Žantovský already knows who to move there. Will not like
description_translated: Week in the media election time and warning of misinformation. What do they have in common? The unification of Czech Television and Czech Radio would not have to be unnecessarily expensive thanks to the recent steps of Donald Trump. And the 85th birthday of one of the most important living Czech artists. These are the topics that media analyst Petr Žantovský chose for this week in the media.

title: Kuřák v bráně Barcelony: Boj se závislostí jsem prohrál. Neberte si ze mě příklad
description: Ještě v září hrál golf v Marbelle, kam po konci kariéry přesídlil. Jenže teď končí duben a Wojciech Szczesny stojí v bráně Barcelony a hledí na tři lesklé trofeje - v Lize mistrů, La Lize i španělském poháru, v němž ho čeká sobotní finále proti Realu. „Chci všechny poháry! Byl by to jeden z nejlepších fotbalových příběhů vůbec,“ zasní se pětatřicetiletý Szczesny.
title_translated: Smoker in the gate of Barcelona: I lost the fight with addiction. Don't take an example of me
description_translated: Even in September he played Golf in Marbelle, where he moved after his career. But now ends April and Wojciech Szczesny stands in the gate of Barcelona and looks at three shiny trophies - in the Champions League, La League and the Spanish Cup, where he will face Saturday's final against Real. "I want all the cups! It would be one of the best football stories ever," Szczesny, 35, dreams.

title: ONLINE: „Sbohem, otče.“ Den velkolepého pohřbu papeže Františka je tu
description: Vatikán naplánoval na sobotních 10:00 pohřeb papeže Františka, který zemřel na Velikonoční pondělí. Obřadu se zúčastní 50 státníků a 130 zahraničních delegací, organizátoři čekají také až 200 000 věřících. Papež bude poprvé po více než 100 letech pohřben mimo historické zdi Vatikánu, v bazilice Panny Marie Sněžné, kam se jeho rakev dostane po cestě napříč centrem Říma. Dění sledujeme v online reportáži.
title_translated: Online: "Goodbye, Father." The day of the magnificent funeral of Pope Francis is here
description_translated: The Vatican planned for Saturday 10:00 Pope Francis, who died of Easter Monday. The ceremony will be attended by 50 statesmen and 130 foreign delegations, and the organizers also expect up to 200 000 believers. For the first time more than 100 years, the Pope will be buried outside the historic walls of the Vatican, in the Basilica of the Virgin Mary of the Snow, where his coffin reaches the way across the center of Rome. We watch the events in an online report.

title: Podle Trumpa je mírová dohoda Ruska s Ukrajinou blízko, vyzval strany k setkání
description: Ukrajina a Rusko jsou velmi blízko mírové dohodě a měly by uspořádat setkání na velmi vysoké úrovni, aby tuto dohodu dokončily. Uvedl to americký prezident Donald Trump na své sociální síti Truth Social krátce po příletu do Itálie, kde se zúčastní pohřbu papeže Františka.
title_translated: According to Trump, the Peace Agreement is close to Ukraine, invited the parties to meet
description_translated: Ukraine and Russia are very close to the peace agreement and should organize a high -level meeting to complete this agreement. This was stated by US President Donald Trump on his social network Truth Social shortly after his arrival in Italy, where he will participate in the funeral of Pope Francis.

title: Do Žďáru dorazil Festival kostek, velká výstava Lega
description: Statisíce dílků a tisíce figurek z oblíbené stavebnice Lego zaplní o víkendu budovu Active ve žďárské Horní ulici. Festival kostek představí mimo jiné obrazové mozaiky, historické i moderní stavby, vesnice, dioramata z oblíbených filmových sérií a plno dalších modelů.
title_translated: The Festival of Kostek arrived in Žďár, a large exhibition Lego
description_translated: Hundreds of thousands of pieces and thousands of figures from the popular LEGO kit will fill the Active building in Žďárská Horní Street this weekend. The cubes festival will present, among other things, image mosaics, historical and modern buildings, villages, dioramas from popular film series and many other models.

title: Pomáhá vozíčkářům i dětem v Brně. Je to pro mě celoživotní přirozenost, říká muž
description: Chuť pomáhat a zlepšovat náladu druhým má Milan Konečný už od malička. Jeho jméno je dobře známé v Lize Vozíčkářů v Brně, kterou nejen finančně podporuje, ale zároveň se aktivně zapojuje jako dobrovolník. Je Dobrou duší z Deníku.
title_translated: It helps wheelchair users and children in Brno. It's a lifelong nature for me, says a man
description_translated: Milan Konečný has the desire to help and improve the mood for others since childhood. His name is well known in the wheelchair league in Brno, which he not only supports financially, but also actively participates as a volunteer. He is a good soul from the diary.

title: Dobeš vítězně debutoval v play off, Palát byl u snížení New Jersey
description: V pátek nabídlo play off hokejové NHL tři duely, ve kterých uspěly domácí celky a shodně snížily stav série na 1:2. Montreal i díky střídajícímu brankáři Jakubu Dobešovi porazil Washington 6:3, New Jersey i zásluhou asistence Ondřeje Paláta porazilo 3:2 po prodloužení Carolinu a poprvé ve vyřazovacích bojích uspěl i Edmonton. Stalo se tak díky čtyřgólové třetí třetině a výsledku 7:4 nad Los Angeles.
title_translated: Dobeš triumphantly debuted in the play off, the palate was at the New Jersey Reduce
description_translated: On Friday, playoffs offered three duels in the NHL hockey, in which the domestic units succeeded and the status of the series to 1: 2. Montreal also defeated Washington 6: 3 thanks to the alternating goalkeeper Jakub Dobeš, and thanks to the assistance of Ondřej Palát, he defeated 3: 2 after the overtime of Carolin and for the first time in the knockout fighting, Edmonton succeeded. This happened thanks to the four -goal third period and the result 7: 4 over Los Angeles.

title: Nejdůležitější z kardinálů: Kdo řídí pohřeb papeže Františka
description: Povede pohřeb papeže Františka a svou roli sehraje i po zvolení jeho nástupce během konkláve. Děkan sboru kardinálů Giovanni Battista Re má ve Vatikánu vliv, ve vysokých funkcích se pohybuje už desítky let.
title_translated: The most important of the Cardinals: Who manages the funeral of the Pope Francis
description_translated: He will lead the funeral of the Pope Francis and play his role even after the election of his successor during the conclave. The Dean of the Cardinal Corps Giovanni Battista Re has an impact in the Vatican, and has been in high functions for decades.

title: Obrovským nasazením a vůlí jsme zápas dotáhli, vyzdvihl výkon svých svěřenců trenér Komety Pokorný
description: Hokejisté brněnské Komety se ujali klíčového vedení 3:2 na zápasy ve finálové sérii Tipsport extraligy. Na dosah titulu je dostalo vítězství 4:2 na ledě Pardubic. Kometa v zápase trestala chyby domácích a vybojovala vedení 3:0, které Dynamo dotahovalo marně.
title_translated: By huge commitment and will we tightened the match, highlighted the performance of his wards Coach Kometa Pokorný
description_translated: Hockey players of the Brno Comet took the key lead 3: 2 for matches in the final series Tipsport Extraliga. The title was given them 4: 2 on the ice of Pardubice. The comet in the match punished home mistakes and won the lead 3: 0, which Dynamo tightened in vain.

title: Trump s Melanií dorazil do Říma na pohřeb papeže: „Fantastický muž!“ Macronovi se poklonili u rakve
description: Prezident USA Donald Trump dorazil do Říma, aby se zúčastnil sobotního pohřbu papeže Františka ve Vatikánu spolu s dalšími státníky z celého světa. Trump před odletem nevyloučil setkání se svým ukrajinským protějškem Volodymyrem Zelenským, který je již v Itálii také. Na první zahraniční cestě Trumpa v jeho druhém funkčním období nechybí jeho manželka Melania. Se svou ženou Janou přiletěl do Říma rovněž český premiér Petr Fiala (ODS). Do Vatikánu v pátek zamířili také Viktor Orbán či Emmanuel Macron s manželkou Brigitte.
title_translated: Trump and Melanie arrived in Rome at the funeral of the Pope, "Fantastic man!" Macron bowed at the coffin
description_translated: US President Donald Trump arrived in Rome to participate in the Saturday's funeral of Pope Francis in the Vatican along with other statesmen from all over the world. Trump did not rule out a meeting with his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenský, who is already in Italy as well. On the first foreign trip Trump in his second term of office is missing his wife Melania. Czech Prime Minister Petr Fiala (ODS) also arrived in Rome. Viktor Orbán and Emmanuel Macron and his wife Brigitte also headed to the Vatican on Friday.

title: (Ne)obyčejné sasanky rozsvítí stinná místa
description: Všichni je známe, rozkvétají každé jaro v listnatých lesích, na mezích a loukách. Řeč je o naší nejběžnější sasance hajní (Anemone nemorosa), která tvoří celé porosty bílých květů se žlutými středy. Někdy ji doplňuje ještě žlutokvětá sasanka pryskyřníkovitá (Anemone ranunculoides). Obě mohou udělat spoustu parády i na zahradě, zvláště na stinných místech.
title_translated: (Not) ordinarynefies illuminate shady places
description_translated: We all know them, they bloom every spring in deciduous forests, on limits and meadows. We are talking about our most common Sasance gamekeeper (anemone nestorosa), which forms the whole stands of white flowers with yellow centers. Sometimes it is complemented by a yellow -flowered resin (anemone ranunculoides). Both can do a lot of great in the garden, especially in shady places.

title: Slok o „dobrovolné recesi“ - Víkendář (video)
description: Na Yahoo Finance hovořili o stupňujících se útocích Donalda Trumpa směrem k Jay Powellovi, který stojí v čele americké centrální banky, s tím, že tyto útoky spolu se cly a některými dalšími vládními kroky táhnou dolů akciový trh.
title_translated: Stanza about "voluntary recession" - weekender (video)
description_translated: The Yahoo Finance spoke about the escalating attacks by Donald Trump towards Jay Powell, who heads the US Central Bank, with the fact that these attacks along with the duty and some other government steps are pulling down the stock market.

title: Víkendář: Slok o „dobrovolné recesi“
description: Na Yahoo Finance hovořili o stupňujících se útocích Donalda Trumpa směrem k Jay Powellovi, který stojí v čele americké centrální banky, s tím, že tyto útoky spolu se cly a některými dalšími vládními kroky táhnou dolů akciový trh.
title_translated: Weekendar: A stanza about the "voluntary recession"
description_translated: The Yahoo Finance spoke about the escalating attacks by Donald Trump towards Jay Powell, who heads the US Central Bank, with the fact that these attacks along with the duty and some other government steps are pulling down the stock market.

title: Zelenskyj přiletěl do Říma na papežův pohřeb, jeho účast byla v pátek nejistá
description: Vatikán - Ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj dorazil do Říma, kde se zúčastní pohřbu papeže Františka, informuje dnes agentura AFP. O jeho účasti v pátek panovaly pochybnosti....
title_translated: Zeletsky arrived in Rome to the Pope's funeral, his participation was uncertain on Friday
description_translated: Vatican - Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenkyj arrived in Rome, where he will participate in the funeral of Pope Francis, today reports AFP. There was doubt about his participation on Friday ....

title: Rozvoral (SPD): Požadujeme vyvození odpovědnosti za zpackanou digitalizaci stavebního řízení
description: Digitalizace není zlo. Zlem je, když se do ní pustí nekompetentní a nezodpovědní lidé, kteří místo službě veřejnosti slouží jen svému PR a svým zájmům. Projekt digitalizace stavebního řízení se stal symbolem vládního selhání. Nejde jen o technologii – jde o selhání důvěry, odpovědnosti a státu samotného.
title_translated: Wheelbase (SPD): We require liability for a botched digitization of the construction procedure
description_translated: Digitization is not evil. Evil is when it embarks on incompetent and irresponsible people who only serve their PR and their interests instead of public service. The project of digitization of the construction management has become a symbol of government failure. It is not just a technology - it is a failure of trust, responsibility and the state itself.

title: GTA V je na vrcholu, ve streamování na Twitchi nemělo v loňském roce konkurenci
description: Grand Theft Auto V bylo na Twitchi sledováno za rok 2024 přes 1,4 miliardy hodinRoleplay servery a komunita okolo nich zůstávají tahounem zájmuPopularita je poháněna i očekáváním nového GTA VI, které vyjde koncem roku 2025Možná vás ani nepřekvapí fakt, že Twitch vydal oficiální statistiky, které ukazují, že nejvíc sledovanou hrou na platformě za minulý rok je GTA V. Hra, která vyšla v roce 2013 žije i po neuvěřitelných 12 letech. Grand Theft Auto je zkrátka držák, a ne jen tak nějaký, doslova totiž dominuje celou scénou. Uživatelé ho sledovali přes 1,4 miliardy hodin, což hru posunulo na samotný vrchol Twitch žebříčku.Přečtěte si celý článek GTA V je na vrcholu, ve streamování na Twitchi nemělo v loňském roce konkurenci
title_translated: GTA V is on top, in streaming on Twitchi had no competition last year
description_translated: The Grand Theft Auto V has been watched on Twitch in 2024 over 1.4 billion hours ofroleplay servers and the community around them remains the driver of interest is also powered by the new GTA VI, which will be released at the end of 2025. It is GTA V. The game, which was published in 2013, lives even after an incredible 12 years. The Grand Theft Auto is simply a holder, and not just one, because it literally dominates the whole scene. Users watched it over 1.4 billion hours, which moved the game to the very top of the Twitch ranking.

title: Kontroverzní Character.AI se chlubí nástrojem AvatarFX: Vytvoří realistická videa skutečných lidí i animovaných postav
description: Služba Character.AI představila novinku AvatarFX – nástroj, který přetváří statické obrázky na realistická videa s mluvícími a pohybujícími se postavami. A to nejen lidskými. Tvořit lze i s kreslenými zvířaty nebo mýtickými bytostmi. Model zvládá dlouhá videa, mimiku, gesta i pohyb těla, a navíc pracuje s více postavami najednou. Nejde o generátor, který přetvoří textový [...]Celý článek si můžete přečíst na Kontroverzní Character.AI se chlubí nástrojem AvatarFX: Vytvoří realistická videa skutečných lidí i animovaných postav
title_translated: Controversial Character.ai boasts Avatarfx: Creates realistic videos of real people and animated characters
description_translated: Character.ai introduced Avatarfx - a tool that transforms static images into realistic videos with speaking and moving characters. And not just human. It can also be created with cartoon animals or mythical beings. The model manages long videos, facial expressions, gestures and body movement, and works with multiple characters at the same time. This is not a generator that transforms the text [...] full article on the controversial character.Ai boasts Avatarfx: Creates realistic videos of real people and animated characters

title: Týdeník iROZHLASu: Víme první! Cibulka vs. Česko 1:0 a sestra Bony a běhání bez hábitu
description: Jaké to je bojovat se státem? Víme. Jak se žije řádovým sestrám? Víme. Jaké to je obsahově inspirovat konkurenci? Víme. Aneb vítejte u týdenního newsletteru iROZHLASu, který se tentokrát hodně zaměřil na věci, které se nám v uplynulém týdnu povedly.
title_translated: Weekly iRozhlai: We know the first! Cibulka vs. Czech Republic 1: 0 and sister bony and running without robes
description_translated: What is it like to fight the state? We know. How are the nuns living? We know. What is it like to inspire competition? We know. Or Welcome to the weekly newsletter Irozhlade, which this time focused a lot on things we did last week.

title: Dostávat komplimenty od svých hrdinů je zavazující, říká houslista David Garrett
description: Narodil se jako zázračné dítě – od svých čtyř let hrál na housle, v pěti letech vyhrál první cenu a v sedmi letech už koncertoval. Dnes je mu čtyřiačtyřicet a mezitím se David Garrett vypracoval v jednoho z nejvýraznějších umělců své doby, který je známý svými přesahy do různých hudebních žánrů, včetně klasiky a rocku. Houslový virtuóz Yehudi Menuhin ho dokonce označil za největšího houslistu své generace. V sobotu 3. května provede David Garrett návštěvníky pražského O2 universa světem plným klasické hudby a nezapomenutelných melodií.
title_translated: Getting compliments from their heroes is binding, says violinist David Garrett
description_translated: He was born as a miraculous child - he played the violin since he was four years old, won the first prize at the age of five, and at the age of seven he was performing. Today he is forty -four, and in the meantime David Garrett has developed into one of the most prominent artists of his time, known for his overlaps into various music genres, including classics and rock. The violin virtuoso Yehudi Menuhin even called him the greatest violinist of his generation. On Saturday, May 3, David Garrett will perform visitors to Prague O2 Universa by the world full of classical music and unforgettable melodies.

title: O Brita se strhla bitva, škodovky šly za hubičku. Na Jawu "Šneka" už milion nestačí
description: Sobotní aukce veteránů Retro Garáž v Lysé nad Labem přinesla nečekané zvraty i pozoruhodně výhodné nákupy.
title_translated: The Battle of Battle broke down, Skoda went to the mouthpiece. On Jawa "snail" a million no longer enough
description_translated: Saturday's veterans auction retro garage in Lysá nad Labem brought unexpected twists and remarkably advantageous shopping.

title: Návštěvu krále v Česku mám na prvním místě seznamu, říká velvyslanec Field
description: Podpora Ukrajiny, výzvy česko-britských vztahů a co se pro Čechy změnilo po brexitu. Britský velvyslanec Matt Field v rozhovoru pro Deník popisuje, zda se chystá návštěva britské královské rodiny, i vztahy mezi Velkou Británií a USA. „Trump chce, aby Evropa převzala větší odpovědnost za vlastní obranu. S tím souhlasíme," říká.
title_translated: I have a visit to the king in the Czech Republic first, says Ambassador Field
description_translated: Support for Ukraine, challenges of Czech-British relations and what changed for Czechs after Brexit. British ambassador Matt Field describes in an interview with the daily whether he is going to visit the British royal family, as well as relations between the UK and the US. "Trump wants Europe to take more responsibility for its own defense. We agree," he says.

title: Miliardář Ratcliffe vsadil na Trumpa. Jeho impérium Ineos na to doplácí
description: Britský miliardář Jim Ratcliffe vsadil na americký trh i na politiku Donalda Trumpa. Kvůli novým americkým clům na automobily se ale tato rozhodnutí obracejí proti němu. Cesta automobilky Ineos k ziskovosti se pravděpodobně značně prodlouží. Nedaří se navíc ani hlavní oblasti podnikání Ratcliffovy skupiny.
title_translated: Billionaire Ratcliffe bet on Trump. His Ineos Empire pays for that
description_translated: British billionaire Jim Ratcliffe bet on the US market and the politics of Donald Trump. But because of the new American cars for cars, these decisions turn against him. The way of Ineos to profit is likely to be prolonged. In addition, the main area of ​​the Ratcliff group.

title: „Děkujeme, že platíte hotově.“ Ficova transakční daň dostihla i jeho voličskou baštu
description: Sedm z deseti obyvatel Čadce volilo vládní strany Směr, Hlas, SNS či krajně pravicovou Republiku. Vítězná nálada by se ovšem mohla brzy změnit.
title_translated: "Thank you for paying cash." Fic's transaction tax caught up with his voter bastion
description_translated: Seven out of ten people of Čadec elected the government parties, voice, CIS or the far -right republic. The winning mood could change soon.

title: Test Audi S5 Avant: Komfort i zábava na každý den
description: Klasická kombi velikosti střední třídy z běžného automobilového trhu mizí. Prémiové značky ale nadále sypou z rukávu další generace. Nová Audi A5 chce kombinovat konzervativní přístup spolu s novými technologiemi. Vyzkoušeli jsme řidičsky orientovanou variantu S5.
title_translated: Audi S5 Avant test: comfort and entertainment for every day
description_translated: The classic combi size of the middle class from the conventional automotive market disappears. But premium brands continue to pour from the next generation sleeve. The new Audi A5 wants to combine a conservative approach along with new technologies. We tried the driver -oriented S5 variant.

title: Krev a stopy v písku: Oblíbeného rybáře roztrhal jaguár! Tělo se nenašlo
description: Brazilskou obcí Aquidauna otřásl šokující případ brutálního útoku divoké šelmy. Oblíbeného místního rybáře Jorgeho (†62) napadl a zabil jaguár. Hrůzné fotografie z místa neštěstí ukazují obrovskou kaluž krve na molu. Útoky jaguárů na lidi jsou přitom poměrně vzácné.
title_translated: Blood and tracks in the sand: The favorite fisherman has torn Jaguar! The body was not found
description_translated: The Brazilian village of Aquidauna shook a shocking case of a brutal wild beast attack. The popular local fisherman Jorge († 62) attacked and killed Jaguar. The horrific photographs from the site of the disaster show a huge pool of blood on the pier. Jaguar attacks on humans are quite rare.

title: Stavba vily Krainové v Karibiku: Komplikace kvůli lijákům!
description: Po třech měsících v zahraničí se konečně objevila v pražské společnosti. Modelka Simona Krainová (52) s manželem Karlem Vágnerem (49) nechyběli na otevření baru, který je jen pár desítek metrů od jejich bytu v Dejvicích.
title_translated: Building Villa Krainová in the Caribbean: Complications for downpours!
description_translated: After three months abroad she finally appeared in Prague society. Model Simona Krainová (52) with her husband Karel Vágner (49) was not missing to open the bar, which is just a few tens of meters from their apartment in Dejvice.

title: Nejsilnější momenty pohřbu Františka: Horko a omdlévající hosté, módní trapasy, Fiala s manželkou a „hvězda“ Zelenskyj
description: Stovky tisíc lidí v ulicích, obrovské horko, desítky státníků a s tím související bezpečnostní opatření. S papežem Františkem se loučil ve Vatikánu celý svět. Zastoupení Česka vedl premiér Petr Fiala. Rozloučení s papežem se neobešlo bez módních přešlapů, kolapsů i nečekaných politických jednání.
title_translated: The strongest moments of the funeral of František: Horko and fainting guests, fashion traps, Fiala with his wife and "star" Zelezkyj
description_translated: Hundreds of thousands of people in the streets, huge heat, dozens of statesmen and related security measures. He said goodbye to Pope Francis in the Vatican. Prime Minister Petr Fiala was represented by the Czech Republic. Farewell to the Pope was not without fashion fakes, collapse and unexpected political negotiations.

title: Případ Studny z Vonoklas si scenáristé upravili: Co bylo ve Třiceti případech majora Zemana a nové minisérii jinak?
description: 13. února 1968 se ve Vonoklasech nedaleko Prahy odehrála hrůza, které mnohé straší dodnes. V jednom z domů bylo nalezeno ohořelé tělo Marie Jelínkové, ve studni pak plavala mrtvola jejího manžela Stanislava. Jejich stejnojmenný syn přežil. Měl právě on ve smrti rodičů prsty? Případ Studny zná veřejnost také jako jeden z nejděsivějších dílů Třicet případů majora Zemana, ale nově i z mini série z produkce Voyo Originals (Oneplay). Co si v nich ale scénáristé upravili?
title_translated: The sculptors have modified the case of Vonoklas: What was Major Zeman and the new mini -series in thirty cases?
description_translated: 13 February 1968 in Vonoklasy near Prague took place, which still haunts many. In one of the houses, the charred body of Marie Jelínková was found, and in the well the corpse of her husband Stanislav floated. Their son of the same name survived. Did he have his fingers in the death of his parents? The case is also known to the public as one of the most frightening parts of thirty cases of Major Zeman, but also from the mini series produced by Voyo Originals (OnePlay). But what did the screenwriters adjust in them?

title: Šéf Českých drah v Hráčích: Další prodej za 2,3 miliardy!
description: Nejen dopravou živy jsou dráhy! Akciová společnost stoprocentně vlastněná státem totiž „sedí“ na řadě zajímavých nemovitostí, pozemků a tzv. brownfieldů, které časem odprodává a vynáší to miliardy. Jako třeba, jak v Hráčích řekl šéf Českých drah Michal Krapinec, před pár dny prodej pozemků u nákladového nádraží Žižkov v Praze, za který utržili 2,3 miliardy.
title_translated: Czech Railways chief in players: Another sale for 2.3 billion!
description_translated: Not only the transport is the tracks! The joint -stock company is 100 % owned by the state "sitting" on a number of interesting properties, land and so -called brownfields, which over time sells and brings billions. Like, as the players of Czech Railways said in the players Michal Krapinec, a few days ago the sale of land at the Žižkov freight station in Prague, for which they received 2.3 billion.

title: Vlak u Berouna srazil a zabil chodce. Provoz na trati je pozastavený
description: Osobní vlak v neděli krátce před devátou hodinou večer v obci Tetín na Berounsku srazil a usmrtil zatím neztotožněného člověka. Provoz na železniční trati je pozastavený, termín jeho obnovení zatím nejasný.
title_translated: The train near Beroun knocked down and killed pedestrians. Operation on the track is suspended
description_translated: A passenger train on Sunday shortly before nine o'clock in the village of Tetín in the Beroun region knocked down and killed a non -identified person. Operation on the railway line is suspended, the date of its restoration so far unclear.

title: Friis po zmaru v Plzni: Zasloužená prohra. Druhé místo? Dokud je šance, stále věříme
description: Výmluvy nehledal a dobře věděl, že takové představení je od sparťanských fotbalistů prostě málo. „Není o čem. Zasloužili jsme si prohrát. Soupeř byl mnohem lepší. V pohybu, aktivitě,“ vyčítal dánský kouč Lars Friis po porážce 0:2 v Plzni.
title_translated: Friis after ruin in Pilsen: deserved loss. Second place? As long as there is a chance we still believe
description_translated: He did not look for excuses and knew well that such a show was just few from Spartan footballers. "There is nothing. We deserved to lose. The opponent was much better. In motion, activity," said Danish coach Lars Friis after defeat 0: 2 in Pilsen.

title: Maříková (SPD): Krok zpět ve spravedlivém přístupu k veřejnoprávním službám
description: Prezident Petr Pavel nedávno podepsal zákon, který mění pravidla placení koncesionářských poplatků a zároveň vyvolává ostrou vlnu kritiky napříč veřejností.
title_translated: Maříková (SPD): step back in fair access to public service services
description_translated: President Petr Pavel has recently signed a law that changes the rules of paying concessionaire fees and at the same time provokes a sharp wave of criticism across the public.

title: Google přesouvá výrobu Pixelů kvůli šokujícím americkým clům. Kam to bude?
description: Společnost Alphabet Inc., mateřská firma Googlu, začala jednat se svými partnery v Indii – konkrétně se společnostmi Dixon Technologies a Foxconn – o přesunu části globální výroby smartphonů Pixel z Vietnamu do Indie. Cílem tohoto kroku zajistit dodávky určené pro americký trh. První kolo jednání proběhlo zhruba před dvěma týdny. Tato diskuze je součástí širší [...]Celý článek si můžete přečíst na Google přesouvá výrobu Pixelů kvůli šokujícím americkým clům. Kam to bude?
title_translated: Google is shifting pixels' production due to shocking American clients. Where will it be?
description_translated: Alphabet Inc., a parent company Google, has begun to negotiate with its partners in India - specifically with Dixon Technologies and Foxconn - to move part of the global production of Pixel from Vietnam to India. The aim of this step to ensure supplies for the US market. The first round of negotiations took place about two weeks ago. This discussion is part of the wider [...] You can read the full article on Google Moves pixels for shocking American closses. Where will it be?

title: NHL ONLINE: Blues s Faksou srovnali sérii proti Jets. Hraje Montreal i Los Angeles
description: V zámoří pokračuje v nejlepší hokejové lize světa první kolo vyřazovacích bojů. St. Louis s Radkem Faksou srovnali sérii s Jets. Montreal vynaloží své síly proti Capitals s Alexandrem Ovečkinem, aby dal sérii nový náboj. Edmonton čelí Los Angeles. Dostanou se mezi tři tyče také čeští brankáři Jakub Dobeš a David Rittich? Všechny zápasy sledujte ONLINE na webu iSport.
title_translated: NHL Online: Blues and Faksa compared the series against the Jets. Plays Montreal I Los Angeles
description_translated: Overseas continues in the best hockey league of the world the first round of knockout fighting. St. Louis and Radek Faksa compared the series with the Jets. Montreal will spend their strength against Capitals with Alexander Ovechkin to give the series a new charge. Edmonton is facing Los Angeles. Will Czech goalies Jakub Dobeš and David Rittich also get among the three poles? Watch all matches online on the ISPORT website.

title: „Už toho máme dost.“ V Irsku vyšli lidé do ulic proti migrantům. Přidala se celebrita
description: V sobotu se v centru Dublinu konaly dvě souběžné demonstrace - velký protiimigrační protest a menší protirasistická protidemonstrace. Obě akce proběhly pod silným policejním dohledem. Přesto došlo při setkání obou táborů k několika slovním potyčkám a agresivním interakcím. Protiimigrační protest podpořil i zápasník Conor McGregor, který označil shromáždění za „velký den pro Irsko“.
title_translated: "We've got enough." In Ireland, people went to the streets against migrants. Celebrity joined
description_translated: On Saturday, two parallel demonstrations took place in the center of Dublin - a large anti -immigration protest and a smaller anti -racist anti -semi -resistance. Both events took place under strong police supervision. Nevertheless, there were several verbal skirmishes and aggressive interactions at the meeting of both camps. The anti -immigration protest was also supported by the wrestler Conor McGregor, who described the assembly as a "big day for Ireland".

title: Friis po prohře: V kabině je ticho, jsme smutní. Birmančevič jel do nemocnice
description: Mluvil zklamaně, smutně, ale zároveň hodně opatrně. Trenér Lars Friis nedokázal jasně pojmenovat hlavní příčiny nedělní porážky 0:2 s Plzní v prvním kole Skupiny o titul. „Musím se na to podívat ještě jednou,“ řekl. Každopádně moc dobře ví, že Sparta aktuálně ztrácí na Viktorii v boji o druhé místo Chance Ligy šest bodů. „Plzeň vyhrála naprosto zaslouženě,“ přiznal Friis, který po zápase přišel za Adolfem Šádkem, šéfem Západočechů, a potřásl mu rukou.
title_translated: Friis after loss: There is silence in the cabin, we are sad. Birmanchevich went to the hospital
description_translated: He spoke disappointed, sad, but at the same time very carefully. Coach Lars Friis failed to clearly name the main causes of Sunday defeat 0: 2 with Pilsen in the first round of the group for the title. "I have to look at it again," he said. Anyway, he knows very well that Sparta is currently losing six points to Victoria in the fight for the second place of Chance League. "Pilsen won absolutely deservedly," admitted Friis, who after the match came to Adolf Šádek, the head of the West Bohemian, and shook his hand.

title: Obchody se na den uzavřou i v květnu. Zákon mluví jasně
description: Květnové svátky jsou za rohem. Až skončí víkend, čekají nás poslední tři dubnové dny. Půjde zároveň poslední dny před dalším volnem. Dva následující čtvrtky jsou totiž vyhrazeny státním svátkům. A zákon stanovuje, že obchody budou během jednoho z těchto svátků mimo provoz.
title_translated: The shops will be closed on the day in May. The law speaks clearly
description_translated: The May holidays are around the corner. When the weekend ends, the last three days will be waiting for us. It will also go the last days before the next free. The two following quarters are reserved for public holidays. And the law stipulates that trades will be out of service during one of these holidays.

title: NHL ONLINE: Blues s Faksou srovnali proti Jets, Palát čelí Carolině. Hraje Montreal i Los Angeles
description: V zámoří pokračuje v nejlepší hokejové lize světa první kolo vyřazovacích bojů. St. Louis s Radkem Faksou srovnali sérii s Jets. O to samé se pokouší Ondřej Palát v dresu Devils proti Carolině. Montreal vynaloží své síly proti Capitals s Alexandrem Ovečkinem, aby dal sérii nový náboj. Edmonton čelí Los Angeles. Dostanou se mezi tři tyče také čeští brankáři Jakub Dobeš a David Rittich? Všechny zápasy sledujte ONLINE na webu iSport.
title_translated: NHL Online: Blues and Faksa compared against Jets, Palát faces Carolina. Plays Montreal I Los Angeles
description_translated: Overseas continues in the best hockey league of the world the first round of knockout fighting. St. Louis and Radek Faksa compared the series with the Jets. Ondřej Palát in the Devils jersey against Carolina attempts the same. Montreal will spend their strength against Capitals with Alexander Ovechkin to give the series a new charge. Edmonton is facing Los Angeles. Will Czech goalies Jakub Dobeš and David Rittich also get among the three poles? Watch all matches online on the ISPORT website.

title: Plzeň vyhrála zaslouženě, přiznal smutný kouč Sparty
description: Ve středu připravil fotbalovou Spartu na souboj s Plzní perfektně, na Letné se zrodilo pohárové vítězství 1:0, které znamenalo postup do finále. Nedělní ligové repete vyšlo úřadujícímu šampionovi prachbídně. Čtvrtá Sparta na hřišti druhé Viktorie v úvodním kole nadstavby prohrála 0:2 a ztrácí na ni v tabulce už šest bodů. „Jsme smutní. Porážka byla zasloužená,“ uznal trenér Lars Friis.
title_translated: Pilsen won deservedly, the sad coach of Sparta admitted
description_translated: On Wednesday he prepared Sparta football for a duel with Pilsen perfectly, at Letná was born a cup victory 1: 0, which meant advance to the finals. The Sunday league repete came out to the reigning champion dusty. The fourth Sparta on the second Victoria pitch lost 0: 2 in the opening round of the superstructure and loses six points in the table. "We are sad. The defeat was deserved," said coach Lars Friis.

title: Palátova asistence na výhru nestačila, prohrál také Montreal s Dobešem v brance
description: New York - Český hokejový útočník Ondřej Palát asistoval u jednoho gólu New Jersey při domácí prohře 2:5 s Carolinou. Devils nenavázali na vítězství z prvního domácího duelu a v sérii prohrávají 1:3...
title_translated: Palát's assistance was not enough to win, and Montreal with Dobeš in the goal also lost
description_translated: New York - Czech hockey striker Ondřej Palát assisted at one New Jersey goal with a home loss of 2: 5 with Carolina. Devils did not follow the victory from the first home duel and in the series they lose 1: 3 ...

title: Palátova asistence na výhru nestačila, prohrál i Montreal s Dobešem v brance
description: New York - Český hokejový útočník Ondřej Palát asistoval u jednoho gólu New Jersey při domácí prohře 2:5 s Carolinou. Devils nenavázali na vítězství z prvního domácího duelu a v sérii prohrávají 1:3...
title_translated: Palát's assistance was not enough to win, and Montreal and Dobeš lost in the goal
description_translated: New York - Czech hockey striker Ondřej Palát assisted at one New Jersey goal with a home loss of 2: 5 with Carolina. Devils did not follow the victory from the first home duel and in the series they lose 1: 3 ...

title: Na První máj bude teplo a slunečno, v pátek se ale opět vrátí déšť
description: Ráno mrazíky, odpoledne až 20 °C - tak bude podle Českého hydrometeorologického ústavu (ČHMÚ) vypadat pondělí. Vyšší teploty vydrží celý pracovní týden, maxima budou dosahovat až 24 °C. Zlom nastane v pátek, kdy polojasnou oblohu vystřídá déšť a ojediněle i bouřky. Přeháňky nevylučují meteorologové ani ve středu na čarodějnice, První máj však bude slunečný.
title_translated: The first May will be warm and sunny, but on Friday the rain will return again
description_translated: In the morning frosts, in the afternoon to 20 ° C - so, according to the Czech Hydrometeorological Institute (CHMI), Monday will look. Higher temperatures will last the entire working week, maxima will reach up to 24 ° C. The turning point will occur on Friday, when the cloudy sky will be replaced by rain and occasionally thunderstorms. The showers are not excluded by meteorologists even on Wednesday witch, but the first May will be sunny.

title: Vypadá jako kůlnička, ale skrývá v sobě překvapení. Trendy domek si můžete pronajmout
description: Rekreační domek, který na první pohled připomíná kůlnu, v sobě skrývá překvapení - trendy interiér plný příjemných barev.
title_translated: She looks like a shed, but she hides a surprise. Trendy house can be rented
description_translated: A recreational house, which at first glance resembles a shed, hides a surprise - trendy interior full of pleasant colors.

title: Češi chystají revoluci v ekologické výrobě čipů. A ukazují, v čem je Evropa stále skvělá
description: Projekt, na němž se vedle firmy z Brna podílí třeba slavný Fraunhofer, by mohl být game changerem v ekologické čipové produkci.
title_translated: Czechs are preparing a revolution in the ecological production of chips. And show what Europe is still great in
description_translated: The project, which, in addition to the company from Brno is involved in the famous Fraunhofer, could be a game Changer in ecological chip production.

title: Válka na Ukrajině ONLINE: Severokorejští vojáci přispěli k vyhnání Ukrajinců z ruského území, tvrdí KLDR
description: Severní Korea dnes poprvé potvrdila, že vyslala své vojáky, aby bojovali na straně Ruska ve válce s Ukrajinou. Pchjongjang tvrdí, že tak významně přispěl k vyhnání ukrajinských vojsk z ruského území, píší agentury s odvoláním na severokorejská státní média. Moskva uvedla, že ruská armáda vytlačila z Kurské oblasti všechny zbývající ukrajinské vojáky, kteří část tohoto ruského regionu obsadili loni v létě. Ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj naopak v neděli sdělil, že ukrajinští vojáci dál bojují v Kurské a Belgorodské oblasti na západě Ruska.
title_translated: War in Ukraine Online: North Korean soldiers contributed to the expulsion of Ukrainians from Russian territory, says DPRK
description_translated: North Korea first confirmed for the first time that she had sent her troops to fight Russia in the war with Ukraine. Pyongyang claims that he has so significantly contributed to the expulsion of Ukrainian troops from Russian territory, they write agencies referring to the North Korean state media. Moscow said the Russian army pushed all the remaining Ukrainian soldiers who occupied part of this Russian region last summer. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenky, on the other hand, said on Sunday that Ukrainian soldiers were still fighting in the Kurnský and Belgorod regions in the west of Russia.

title: Motoristům se nedaří získávat zklamané pravicové voliče, loví spíše v opozičních vodách, ukazují data
description: Motoristy sobě tvoří bývalí občanští demokraté, s aktuální ODS ale nechtějí mít nic společného – kromě toho, že jí chtějí sebrat voliče. Pokud k vzájemnému přesunu voličů ale docházelo, tento pramen už nejspíš vyschl. Větší voličské překryvy mají nyní Motoristé i s komunistickým Stačilo!, zatímco koalice Spolu například se Zelenými, ukazují data výzkumných agentur.
title_translated: Motorists fail to obtain disappointed right -wing voters, hunt more in opposition waters, show data
description_translated: Motorists are former Civic Democrats, but they do not want to have anything to do with the current ODS - except that they want to pick up voters. But if the voters were moved, this spring has probably already dried up. Motorists now have larger voters with the communist!

title: Severní Korea potvrdila vyslání vojáků na pomoc Rusku ve válce s Ukrajinou
description: Severní Korea dnes poprvé potvrdila, že vyslala své vojáky, aby bojovali na straně Ruska ve válce s Ukrajinou. Pchjongjang tvrdí, že tak významně přispěl k vyhnání ukrajinských vojsk z ruského území, píší agentury s odvoláním na severokorejská státní média.
title_translated: North Korea confirmed sending soldiers to help Russia in the war with Ukraine
description_translated: North Korea first confirmed for the first time that she had sent her troops to fight Russia in the war with Ukraine. Pyongyang claims that he has so significantly contributed to the expulsion of Ukrainian troops from Russian territory, they write agencies referring to the North Korean state media.

title: Ten, který se nebojí nikoho. Nakřáplý Menšík v Madridu vylepšuje svůj unikát
description: Rok co rok si připichuje na ledničku žebříčkové cíle pro aktuální sezonu. Jakub Menšík ale sviští rankingem tak rychle, že ani nestíhá papírky psát.
title_translated: The one who is not afraid of anyone. Curded Menšík in Madrid improves its unique
description_translated: Year after year, he stabbed the ranking targets for the current season. Jakub Menšík, however, whistles with ranking so fast that it does not even manage to write papers.

title: Prezident Pavel přijme Fialu. Mohli by řešit i platy bezpečnostních složek
description: Prezident Petr Pavel přijme na Pražském hradě premiéra a předsedu ODS Petra Fialu. Jedním z témat setkání by mohly být platy bezpečnostních složek. „Jestli v poslední době k žádnému průběžnému zvyšování nedocházelo, tak je namístě zvážit zvýšení platů i u ozbrojených složek,“ řekl Pavel minulý týden při návštěvě Královéhradeckého kraje.
title_translated: President Pavel will accept Fiala. They could also solve the salaries of security forces
description_translated: President Petr Pavel will accept the Prime Minister and ODS chairman Petr Fiala at Prague Castle. One of the topics of the meeting could be the salaries of security forces. "If there has been no continuous increase recently, it is necessary to consider an increase in salaries even in armed forces," Pavel said last week during a visit to the Hradec Králové Region.

title: Piknik s nejcennějšími veterány. Všechny uhranulo jedinečné auto, které málokdo zná
description: Výstava Automobilové klenoty letos zajistila fanouškům veteránů jedinečný zážitek. Na trávníku se představily výjimečné sběratelské kousky.
title_translated: Picnic with the most valuable veterans. All of the evil a unique car that few know
description_translated: This year, the automotive jewel exhibition provided fans of veterans a unique experience. Exceptional collector pieces were presented on the lawn.

title: "Bylo to státní tajemství." Režim nechal usmrtit vzácné žirafy, dodnes se neví proč
description: Komunistický režim nechal 29. dubna 1975 zlikvidovat v zoo ve Dvoře Králové nad Labem 48 žiraf a několik buvolů a antilop.
title_translated: "It was a state secret." The regime has been killed by rare giraffes, it still does not know why
description_translated: The Communist regime was destroyed by 48 giraffes and several buffaloes and antelopes at the Zoo in Dvůr Králové nad Labem.

title: Coco nejlépe poslechne za burger. Její majitel slíbil, že už lišku nezastřelí
description: Myslivec Radomil Holík miloval přírodu natolik, že si jednoho dne přinesl na sídliště malou lišku. Teď s ní šíří osvětu. Když v mysliveckém klobouku se svou Coco za krkem vejde do kavárny, okamžitě vzbudí zájem okolí. Jedna žena si chce dvojici vyfotit. Holík s úsměvem souhlasí.
title_translated: Coco best listens to the burger. Its owner promised not to shoot the fox anymore
description_translated: Hunter Radomil Holík loved nature so much that one day he brought a small fox to the housing estate. Now she spreads awareness with her. When he fits in the hunting hat with his Coco behind his neck, he immediately wakes the interest of the surroundings. One woman wants to take a picture of the couple. Holík agrees with a smile.

title: Kanadští liberálové Marka Carneyho vyhráli volby, ale ve stínu Trumpových hrozeb
description: Kanadská Liberální strana pod vedením premiéra Marka Carneyho podle tamních médií směřuje k vítězství ve federálních volbách. Kampaň ale poznamenaly provokace a hrozby novými cly ze strany amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa.
title_translated: Canadian liberals Mark Carney won the elections, but in the shadow of Trump's threats
description_translated: The Canadian Liberal Party, led by Prime Minister Mark Carney, according to the media, is heading towards victory in the federal elections. But the campaign marked the provocations and threats of new dies by US President Donald Trump.

title: Nasazení dronů mění bojiště: Zóna nikoho je širší, Rusům se tam osvědčily motorky
description: Podobu bojiště válka na Ukrajině výrazně proměnila. Už se proti sobě netáhnou dlouhé linie zákopů jako za první světové války, mezi nimiž bylo půlkilometrová zóna nikoho. Šedá zóna, kterou nekontroluje ani jedna strana, se kvůli použití dronů rozšířila za jediný rok na sedm kilometrů. Jejich nasazení také omezilo použití těžké techniky provádějící průlomy nebo obchvaty, kterou snadno odhalí a zničí. Rusko proto plánuje všechny motostřelce vybavit motocykly nebo čtyřkolkami.
title_translated: Drone deployment changes the battlefield: no one is wider, the Russians have proved their worth
description_translated: The battlefield of the war in Ukraine has changed significantly. There are no long lines of trenches against each other as during the World War I, including no one half -kilometer. The gray zone, which is not controlled by not one side, has expanded to use drones in a single year to seven kilometers. Their deployment has also reduced the use of heavy techniques performing breakthroughs or bypasses, which they easily detect and destroy. Therefore, Russia plans to equip all motorcycle motorcycles or quads.

title: Coco nejlépe poslechne za burger. Její majitel slíbil, že už lišku nezastřelí
description: Myslivec Radomil Holík miloval přírodu natolik, že si jednoho dne přinesl na sídliště malou lišku. Teď s ní šíří osvětu. title: První operátorka Temelína: Jaderné elektrárny jsou budoucnost. Výbuch u nás je mýtus
description: Jaderné elektrárny jsou podle jediné ženské operátorky Temelína budoucností. "I Němci teď zjišťují, že odstavit jaderné elektrárny nebylo ideální."
title_translated: The first operator of Temelín: Nuclear power plants are the future. The explosion in our country is the myth
description_translated: According to the only female operator of Temelín, nuclear power plants are the future. "Even the Germans are now finding that weaning nuclear power plants was not ideal."

title: Otevírací doba obchodů o svátcích 1. a 8. května 2025: Pozor na druhý čtvrtek
description: Po nedávném volnu o Velikonocích čekají Čechy další nepracovní dny. Květnové státní svátky letos vycházejí na čtvrtek. Kdo si tak v pátek bere dovolenou, užije si čtyřdenní prodloužený víkend. Zákazníci obchodů se ale musí připravit na zavřené prodejny. Zatímco Svátek práce 1. května se na otevírací dobu obchodů nevztahuje, na Den vítězství 8. května si lidé až na výjimky nenakoupí. Jak to přesně bude a proč? Deník přináší přehled v otázkách a odpovědích, který pomůže naplánovat nákupy.
title_translated: Opening hours of public holidays 1 and 8 May 2025: Beware of the second Thursday
description_translated: After a recent free time, Czechs are waiting for other non -working days. The May public holidays are released on Thursday this year. Those who take a holiday on Friday will enjoy a four -day long weekend. However, shop customers have to prepare for closed stores. While the work of the Labor 1st. How exactly will it be and why? The diary brings an overview of questions and answers to help plan purchases.

title: "Do očí mi řekli, že jméno utají." Totožnost svědků policie většinou moc neskrývá
description: Aktuálně.cz líčí příběhy lidí nespokojených s tím, že policie neutajila jejich identitu. Ta tvrdí, že u svědků je to nutné jen v některých případech.
title_translated: "They told me that the name would run." The identity of the police's witnesses mostly does not hide much
description_translated: Aktualne.cz depicts the stories of people dissatisfied with the fact that the police have not kept their identity. She claims that witnesses are only necessary in some cases.

title: Nová vláda, staré dilema: Německo hledá, jak zkrotit sociální výdaje bez ztráty sociálního smíru
description: Největším problémem Německa je robustní sociální systém, s nímž se naposledy snažili, jistě paradoxně, pohnout sociální demokraté. To když vládl kancléř Gerhard Schröder (SPD) a angažoval bývalého manažera Volkswagenu pro lidské zdroje, dnes třiaosmdesátiletého Petera Hartze, aby vypracoval zásadní změnu sociálních výdajů. Série Hartzových reforem podle jedněch uvolnila pracovní trh, podle druhých ožebračila řadu lidí na okraji, které přitiskla ke zdi, aby je donutila pracovat, přičemž řada z nich (zejména jejich děti) potřebovala pomoc úplně jiného typu.
title_translated: New government, old dilemma: Germany is looking for how to tame social spending without losing social reconciliation
description_translated: The biggest problem of Germany is the robust social system with which they last tried, certainly, paradoxically, to move the Social Democrats. It was when Chancellor Gerhard Schröder (SPD) ruled and engaged former Volkswagen manager for human resources, now eighty -eight -year -old Peter Hartz to develop a fundamental change in social expenditure. According to one, the Hartz reform series has released the labor market, according to others, it has been impoverished by a number of people on the edge they pressed against the wall to force them to work, and many of them needed a completely different type.

title: Kauza propalestinské demonstrantky: nepodporovala terorismus, mikina byla pouze kostým, píše policie
description: Policie odložila stíhání ženy, která upoutala na propalestinské demonstraci v Praze mikinou s nápisem „Olympics 1972“. Podle premisy policistů měla odkazovat na masakr izraelských sportovců palestinskými teroristy. Jak ale z prověřování vyplynulo, šlo o shodu náhod. Mikina s nápisem byla jen kostým, odkazjící na americký film. A to, že si ji dívka vzala na demonstraci, byla náhoda. Svědčí o tom zajištěné důkazy. Zveřejňujeme celé usnesení.
title_translated: Causion of Propalestin Demonstrators: She did not support terrorism, the sweatshirt was only a costume, the police writes
description_translated: Police postponed the prosecution of a woman who attracted a 1972 sweatshirt in Prague with the inscription "Olympics 1972". According to the premise of police officers, she was to refer to the massacre of Israeli athletes by Palestinian terrorists. However, as the screening emerged, it was a coincidence. The sweatshirt with the inscription was just a costume referring to an American film. And the fact that the girl took her for a demonstration was a coincidence. This is evidenced by the ensured evidence. We publish the whole resolution.

title: Brněnský plán se stadiony má zádrhel, cyklisté nechtějí opustit starý velodrom
description: Brno chce za Lužánkami postavit novou halu pro dráhové cyklisty, kteří mají opustit starý velodrom na výstavišti, a uvolnit tak místo fotbalovému stadionu. Jenže cyklistický oddíl Favorit je proti. Obává se, že v moderním stánku nebude prostor pro tréninky dětí.
title_translated: The Brno plan with the stadiums has a hitch, cyclists do not want to leave the old velodrome
description_translated: Brno wants to build a new hall for track cyclists to leave the old velodrome at the Exhibition Grounds behind Lužánky and free up instead of a football stadium. But the cycling section Favorit is against. He is afraid that there will be no room for children's training in a modern stand.

title: Brněnský plán se stadiony má zádrhel, cyklisté nechtějí opustit starý velodrom
description: Brno chce za Lužánkami postavit novou halu pro dráhové cyklisty, kteří mají opustit starý velodrom na výstavišti, a uvolnit tak místo fotbalovému stadionu. Jenže cyklistický oddíl Favorit je proti. Obává se, že v moderním stánku nebude prostor pro tréninky dětí.

But the cycling section Favorit is against. He is afraid that there will be no room for children's training in a modern stand.

title: Stovky severokorejských vojáků zahynuly v bojích na Ukrajině, tvrdí Soul
description: Zhruba 600 severokorejských vojáků ve službách ruské armády zahynulo v bojích proti Ukrajině. S odkazem na jihokorejské zákonodárce o tom informovala agentura Reuters, podle níž KLDR do Ruska poslala dohromady ve dvou vlnách 15 tisíc vojáků.
title_translated: Hundreds of North Korean soldiers died in fighting in Ukraine, Soul says
description_translated: About 600 North Korean soldiers in the service of the Russian army died in fighting against Ukraine. Referring to the South Korean legislator, the Reuters agency reported that the DPRK sent 15,000 soldiers to Russia in two waves.

title: Niedermayer (TOP 09): Každý, kdo na to má, si může koupit občanství v EU. I Rusové
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k prodeji občanství Kypru.
title_translated: Niedermayer (TOP 09): Anyone who has it can buy citizenship in the EU. And the Russians
description_translated: Commentary on his public Facebook profile for the sale of Cyprus citizenship.

title: V bojích proti Ukrajincům zahynulo na 600 vojáků KLDR, tvrdí Soul
description: Soul - V bojích proti Ukrajině zahynulo na 600 severokorejských vojáků, kteří pomáhali ruské armádě. Podle agentur AFP a Reuters to dnes uvedl jihokorejský poslanec na základě informací tajných služeb....
title_translated: 600 DPRK soldiers died in fighting against the Ukrainians, Soul says
description_translated: Seoul - 600 North Korean soldiers died in fighting against Ukraine who helped the Russian army. According to AFP and Reuters, this was stated today by a South Korean MP on the basis of secret services ....

title: Video: čínský robot se pohybuje úplně jako člověk, může za to revoluční algoritmus
description: Čínská společnost PNDbotics prezentuje humanoidního robota jménem AdamTen se díky pokročilému algoritmu pohybuje úplně jako člověkVývoj tohoto modelu by mohl pomoci celému odvětví robotikyRobotika jde v posledních měsících a letech velmi kupředu. Už dávno jsou pryč doby, kdy byli androidi nemotorní a moc toho neuměli – dnešní stroje zvládají i pokročilou motoriku a v mnoha případech se již vyrovnají živým lidem. To je také případ čínského modelu Adam, který je špičkovým humanoidním robotem s vlastním algoritmem posilujícím učení. Tento inovativní algoritmus, zdokonalený na základě rozsáhlých simulací a velkého množství tréninkových dat, umožňuje Adamovi zvládnout pohyb podobný pohybu člověka.Přečtěte si celý článek Čínský robot se pohybuje úplně jako člověk, může za to převratný algoritmus
title_translated: VIDEO: A Chinese robot moves entirely like a human, it is a revolutionary algorithm
description_translated: The Chinese company Pndbotics presents a humanoid robot named Adamten, thanks to the advanced algorithm, is entirely like the man's production of this model could help the entire roboticrobotic industry has been very forward in recent months and years. There are times long ago when Androids were clumsy and they couldn't do much - today's machines can handle even advanced motor skills and in many cases they are already equal to living people. This is also the case of the Chinese model Adam, which is a top humanoid robot with its own algorithm strengthening learning. This innovative algorithm, improved on the basis of extensive simulations and large amounts of training data, allows Adam to manage the movement of a person's movement.

title: Smskou pošlete i vůně a chutě. Je to budoucnost v podobě internetu smyslů, tvrdí manažerka z Vodafonu
description: Rozšiřování 5G sítí, příprava na nástup 6G nebo umělá inteligence. To jsou globální trendy ve světě podnikání, na které firmy musí reagovat. Díky technologickým vymoženostem zvládneme už nyní komplexní věci, budoucnost ale nabízí možnosti na hranici lidské představivosti.
title_translated: Smoka send scents and tastes. It is the future in the form of the Internet of the Senses, says Vodafone manager
description_translated: Expansion of 5G networks, preparation for boarding 6g or artificial intelligence. These are global trends in the world of business that companies must respond to. Thanks to technological conveniences, we can handle complex things now, but the future offers opportunities on the edge of human imagination.

title: Podpora v nezaměstnanosti 2026 - chystané změny
description: Chystaná novela zákona přinese pro rok 2026 výrazné změny v čerpání podpory v nezaměstnanosti. Změní se věk žadatelů, kteří jsou zvýhodnění, vyšší podpora v prvních měsících.
title_translated: Unemployment benefit 2026 - planned changes
description_translated: The forthcoming amendment to the Act will bring significant changes in the drawing of unemployment benefits for 2026. The age of applicants who are advantage will change, higher support in the first months.

title: Živě: Představení systému podpory pro ředitele škol
description: Ministerstvo školství, mládeže a tělovýchovy připravilo a schválilo strategický rámec, který zásadně promění podporu a vedení ředitelů škol v České republice. Tento krok vychází z dlouhodobých priorit vzdělávací politiky státu a je součástí širšího úsilí o zvýšení kvality vzdělávání a rovného přístupu ke vzdělávacím příležitostem. Tisková konference se koná ve středu 30. dubna 2025.
title_translated: LIGHT: introduction of support system for school heads
description_translated: The Ministry of Education, Youth and Sports has prepared and approved a strategic framework that will fundamentally transform the support and management of school heads in the Czech Republic. This step is based on the long -term priorities of the state's educational policy and is part of a wider effort to improve the quality of education and equal access to educational opportunities. The press conference takes place on Wednesday, April 30, 2025.

title: Zájemci vyrazí historickým autobusem nejen za textilkami
description: Už třetí rok v řadě mohou zájemci od 4. května až do října využít několika termínů jízd historickým autobusem po trase mezi někdejšími frýdecko-místeckými textilkami. Jedna ze tří tras je zavede i do cvičné štoly dolu ve Staříči.
title_translated: Those interested will set off by a historic bus not only for textiles
description_translated: For the third year in a row, interested parties from 4 May until October can use several dates by a historic bus on the route between the former Frýdek-Místek textile textile. One of the three routes will take them to the training gallery mine in Staříč.

title: Ruský dronový útok na Oděsu zabil dva lidi, dalších pět se zranilo
description: Ruský dronový útok na rezidenční čtvrť v Oděse zabil v noci na čtvrtek dva lidi, oznámil na platformě Telegram šéf vojenské správy Oděské oblasti Oleh Kiper. Dalších pět lidí se zranilo. Výbuchy byly slyšet také ve městě Sumy. V Kyjevské, Charkovské, Sumské, Doněcké, Dněpropetrovské, Černihivské a Záporožské oblasti se rozezněly sirény. Informovala o tom agentura AFP.
title_translated: Russian drone attack on Odessa killed two people, five more injured
description_translated: The Russian drone attack on the residential area in Odessa killed two people on Thursday night, announced the head of the Oleh Kiper Odessa Region on the Telegram platform. The next five people were injured. The explosions were also heard in the town of sums. In the Kiev, Kharkov, Sum, Donetsk, Dniepropetrov, Chernihiv and Zonorož regions, sirens sounded. AFP reported.

title: Nadace ČEZ: Nekonečný příběh, to je obnova Svatohorského sadu
description: Další nové ovocné přírůstky zakořeňují na svahu Svatohorského sadu v Příbrami. Jedná se původní druhy různých odrůd jabloní, třešní a hrušní, které vyplnily prázdná místa po v průběhu let již odumřelých ovocných stromech. Ovocný sad na svazích Svaté Hory má více než sto let. Celková rozloha pozemků je 23 hektarů a co se týče stáří, jde o evropský unikát. Starost o sad si vzal před časem za svou (jak také jinak) zapsaný spolek Svatohorské sady Příbram. Samozřejmě mu v tom pomáhá celá řada dobrovolníků všech věkových kategorií a nejrůznějších profesí, včetně žáků ze základních a středních škol, externí společnosti a firmy v rámci svých dobrovolnických dnů. A pochopitelně také instituce, díky nimž se daří sehnat dotace na uskutečnění záměru, který nebude mít nikdy konce. Jednou z nich je i Nadace ČEZ, od níž spolek získal na jarní výsadbu v rámci grantu Stromy požadovanou částku 50 000 korun. Podstatná část z 20 nových stromů byla vysazena v pátek 25. dubna.
title_translated: CEZ Foundation: An endless story is the restoration
description_translated: Other new fruit increments are rooted on the slope of the Svatohorský sady in Příbram. These are the original types of different varieties of apple, cherries and pear, which have filled the empty spots over the years of already dead fruit trees. The orchard on the slopes of the Holy Mountain has more than a hundred years. The total area of ​​the land is 23 hectares and in terms of age, it is a unique European. He took care of the SAD some time ago (as otherwise otherwise) registered association of Svatohorské sady Příbram. Of course, a number of volunteers of all ages and various professions, including pupils from primary and secondary schools, external companies and companies on their volunteer days, are helped. And, of course, institutions that make it possible to get subsidies for realization of a project that will never end. One of them is the ČEZ Foundation, from which the association received the required amount of CZK 50,000 for the spring planting within the grant. A substantial part of the 20 new trees was planted on Friday, April 25.

title: Tesla hledala náhradu za Muska. Nevěnuje se vedení firmy, vadí investorům
description: Členové představenstva společnosti Tesla hledali nástupce Elona Muska v pozici generálního ředitele. Zhruba před měsícem oslovili několik firem zaměřených na nábor vrcholových manažerů. Ve středu o tom informoval deník The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) s odvoláním na své zdroje.
title_translated: Tesla was looking for a refund for Musk. The company management does not pay attention to the investors
description_translated: Tesla's board members were looking for the successor to Elon Musk in the position of CEO. About a month ago, several companies focused on recruitment of top managers approached. On Wednesday, The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) reported on its resources.

title: Mohou začít vznikat sousedské dětské skupiny. Navyšuje se i počet hodin s příspěvkem, určuje novela
description: V Česku mohou od čtvrtka začít vznikat sousedské dětské skupiny. Je možné je provozovat doma pro nejvýš čtyři děti. Evidenci skupin přebírají od ministerstva práce úřady práce. Rodiče mohou dát měsíčně potomka do zařízení až na 120 hodin, o rodičovskou nepřijdou. Dosud to bylo nejvýš 92 hodin. Stanovuje to novela o dětských skupinách, která je od čtvrtka účinná.
title_translated: Neighboring children's groups may start. The number of hours with the contribution is also increased, determines the amendment
description_translated: Neighboring children's groups may start in the Czech Republic since Thursday. They can be operated at home for a maximum of four children. The registration of groups is taken from the Ministry of Labor. Parents can put offspring a monthly into the facility for up to 120 hours, they will not lose parental. So far it has been the highest 92 hours. This is determined by the amendment to children's groups, which has been effective from Thursday.

title: Co říká váš pes? AI vám to přeloží
description: Aplikace Traini, určená pro překlad jazyka domácích mazlíčků pomocí umělé inteligence (AI), si od svého uvedení na trh rychle získala velkou pozornost. Je vyvinutá ve spolupráci s odborníky na chování zvířat a využívá technologii analýzy fotografií, videí a zvuku k překlenutí komunikační propasti mezi lidmi a jejich mazlíčky, čímž nabízí revoluční způsob interakce. Není tedy divu, že se stala virální.
title_translated: What does your dog say? AI will translate it
description_translated: Traini, designed to translate pets of pets using artificial intelligence (AI), has quickly gained much attention since its launch. It is developed in cooperation with animal behavior experts and uses technology to analyze photographs, videos and sound to bridge the communication gap between people and their pets, thus offering a revolutionary way to interact. No wonder she has become viral.

title: Ve věku 116 let zemřela brazilská jeptiška: Byla nejstarším člověkem na světě
description: Ve věku 116 let zemřela ve středu brazilská jeptiška Inah Canabarrová Lucasová, která byla nejstarším žijícím člověkem na světě. Oznámila to kongregace sester karmelitek svaté Terezie, s nimiž žila ve městě Porto Alegre, píše agentura AFP.
title_translated: Brazilian nuns died at the age of 116: she was the oldest person in the world
description_translated: At the age of 116, Lucas, Brazilian nun, died on Wednesday, who was the oldest living person in the world. This was announced by the Congregation of Sisters of Carmelite of St. Theresa, with whom she lived in Porto Alegre, writes AFP.

title: Teď už vás opravdu honí čas. Všechno, co potřebujete k daňovému přiznání
description: Co je tentokrát jinak? Jaké odpočty můžete využít a jak jsou teď vysoké? Do kdy je potřeba odevzdat přehledy OSVČ? Poradíme.
title_translated: You are really chasing you now. Everything you need for a tax return
description_translated: What is different this time? What deductions can you use and how high are they now? Until when is it necessary to submit self -employed reports? We will advise.

title: Láska prochází peněženkou. Pět tipů, jak ji nenechat odnést všechno
description: Drahý. Drahá. Doslova, přátelé. Písnička praví, že láska přináší jen žal a výdaje. To je nadsázka – láska přináší i radost, lepší trávení a zvýšenou osobní hygienu, mimo jiné. Ale o těch výdajích – to je pravda, bohužel. Neplačte ale, jsme tu proto, abychom vám poradili pár drobných hacků, se kterými láska vyjde levněji.
title_translated: Love goes through a wallet. Five tips on how not to let it take away everything
description_translated: Expensive. Path. Literally, friends. The song says that love brings only grief and expenses. This is an exaggeration - love brings joy, better digestion and increased personal hygiene, among other things. But about those expenditures - that's true, unfortunately. But do not cry, we are here to advise you a few small hacks that love will come cheaper.

title: Tesla hledala náhradu za Muska. Nevěnuje se vedení firmy, vadí investorům
description: Členové představenstva společnosti Tesla hledali nástupce Elona Muska v pozici generálního ředitele. Zhruba před měsícem oslovili několik firem zaměřených na nábor vrcholových manažerů. Ve středu o tom informoval deník The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) s odvoláním na své zdroje.
title_translated: Tesla was looking for a refund for Musk. The company management does not pay attention to the investors
description_translated: Tesla's board members were looking for the successor to Elon Musk in the position of CEO. About a month ago, several companies focused on recruitment of top managers approached. On Wednesday, The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) reported on its resources.
