title: I přes snahy se gestapu nedařilo prolomit odpor Čechů. Domácí odboj měl na jaře 1945 poslední úkol
description: Šest let bojovali muži a ženy v domácím odboji proti německým okupantům. I když se gestapu ve vlnách dařilo jednotlivé odbojové struktury rozbíjet, odpor potlačit nedokázalo. Na jaře 1945 byl před odbojáři poslední cíl - definitivně se zbavit nacistické nadvlády. Jak vypadal domácí odboj na sklonku druhé světové války, uslyšíte v pátečním díle našeho seriálu.
title_translated: Despite the efforts, the Gestapo failed to break the resistance of Czechs. Home resistance had the last task in the spring of 1945
description_translated: For six years, men and women in the domestic resistance against the German occupiers. Although the Gestapo in the waves managed to break the individual resistance structures, the resistance failed to suppress. In the spring of 1945, before the resistance fighters, the last goal was to get rid of Nazi domination. What the home resistance looked like at the end of World War II, you will hear on Friday's episode of our series.

title: Dům hrůzy plný exkrementů. Děti v něm žily zamčené čtyři roky
description: Osmiletá dvojčata a desetiletý chlapec žili téměř čtyři roky v naprosté izolaci ve španělském Ovideu. Rodiče, Němec a Američanka, je drželi zamčené v domě plného odpadků a exkrementů. Ani oni nevycházeli. Po zásahu policie děti převzala sociální ochrana a případ vyšetřují místní úřady.
title_translated: House of horror full of excrement. The children lived in it locked for four years
description_translated: Eight -year -old twins and a ten -year -old boy have lived for almost four years in total isolation in Ovideo, Spain. Parents, German and American, held locked in a house full of garbage and excrement. Neither did they come out. After the intervention of the police, the children took over social protection and the case is being investigated by local authorities.

title: Diablo (2025) - Oficiálny trailer
description: Po prepustení z väzenia sa Kris Chaney (Scott Adkins) rozhodne napraviť starú krivdu – aj keby ho to malo stáť život. Ako skúsený bojovník unáša dcéru vplyvného kolumbijského narkobaróna, aby splnil dávny sľub, ktorý dal matke dievčaťa. Jeho čin však vyvolá krvavú odvetu – gangster mobilizuje celé podsvetie a povoláva brutálneho nájomného vraha El Corva (Marko Zaror). Kris tak musí použiť všetky schopnosti, ktoré získal počas tvrdých rokov za mrežami i mimo nich, aby prežil a dokázal, že sľuby sa plnia – bez ohľadu na cenu.
title_translated: Diablo (2025) - official trailer
description_translated: After weighing from Väzenia, Kris Chaney (Scott Adkins) decides to fix the old Krivda - and the key has little life. Ako scored warrior carrier Naša's daughter of the vulneous Colombian narcobaron to fulfill the elderly, who gave Mother Dievčaťa. However, his act will cause a bloody retaliation - the gangster mobilizes the entire sub -set and called the brutal murderer El Corva (Marko Zaror). Thus, Kris must use the all -time skills that the hard year of the hard year received for and outside the Mržs, to show and prove that the Sa Plnia - without the price for the price.

title: ADAM mužům na dva roky zablokuje spermie. Biotechnologický startup vyvíjí antikoncepci pro otrlé
description: ** ADAM je hydrogel který brání spermiím a nenarušuje přirozenou ejakulaci ** Klinické testy ukazují že metoda může vydržet minimálně dva roky ** Reversibilitu implantátu bude nutné ověřit v dalších navazujících studiích
title_translated: Adam will block the sperm for two years. Biotechnology Startup develops contraception for hardened
description_translated: ** Adam is a hydrogel that prevents sperm and does not disturb natural ejaculation ** clinical tests show that the method can last at least two years ** The implant reversibility will have to be verified in other follow -up studies

title: KEMEL: Líbání na Svátek práce
description: Co je s tebou? Vždyť ty líbáš, jako kdybys tím slavil Svátek práce!!!
title_translated: KEMEL: Kissing on the Labor Day
description_translated: What's the matter with you? You kiss you, as if you were celebrating a work holiday !!!

title: Na zámku odhalí tajemství staré truhly
description: Během nedělního odpoledne se návštěvníkům mimořádně otevře skryté podzemí Zámku Pardubice, kde po staletí stojí slavná Pernštejnská truhla.
title_translated: At the chateau reveal the secrets of the old chest
description_translated: During the Sunday afternoon, visitors will be extremely open to the hidden underground of the Pardubice Castle, where the famous Pernštejn chest has been standing for centuries.

title: Botanička Petra Svobodová provede jarní přírodou v Žamberku
description: V neděli 4. května se v Žamberku uskuteční botanická vycházka s odborným výkladem botaničky Petry Svobodové.
title_translated: Botany Petra Svobodová will perform spring nature in Žamberk
description_translated: On Sunday 4th May in Žamberk will take place in Žamberk with a professional interpretation of Botany Petra Svobodová.

title: Florida popravila válečného veterána. Zastřelil ženu a tři děti
description: V americké státě Florida byl ve čtvrtek večer místního času popraven veterán z války v Perské zálivu Jeffrey Hutchinson. Muž v roce 1998 zastřelil svou přítelkyni a její tři děti. Trpěl psychickými problémy. Byl čtvrtým odsouzeným, kterého letos na Floridě popravili a patnáctým v USA.
title_translated: Florida executed a war veteran. Shot a woman and three children
description_translated: In the US state of Florida, a veteran from the Gulf War was executed on Thursday evening of local time. The man in 1998 shot his girlfriend and her three children. He suffered from psychological problems. He was the fourth convict, whom this year in Florida and fifteenth in the US.

title: Deep Cuts - Oficiálny trailer k uvedeniu na Steam
description: Pozrite si trailer k hororovej akčnej adventúre Deep Cuts od vývojárov zo Scythe Dev Team, ktorá práve dorazila na Steam. V novej časti herného univerza Scythe Saga sa hráči vžijú do postavy Elise Weberovej, ktorá sa vydáva na napínavú misiu s cieľom zachrániť svojho najlepšieho priateľa. Deep Cuts je teraz dostupná pre PC (Steam) aj na platforme Meta Quest.
title_translated: Deep Cuts - Official Trailer to State on Steam
description_translated: Give a trailer for horror action adventúre Deep Cuts from the development of ZO Scythe Dev Team, who rightly arrived on Steam. In the new part of the Scythe Saga game universe, players in the character of Elis Weberova, who set out on a strain Misiu with a cie. Deep Cuts is the TERAZ Available PRE PC (Steam) and on the META QUEST platform.

title: Ukrajina hlásí zabité a zraněné po ruských útocích v Doněcké oblasti a Záporoží
description: Kyjev - Devětadvacet lidí utrpělo zranění při dronových útocích, které Rusko ve čtvrtek večer podniklo proti Záporoží na jihovýchodě Ukrajiny. Na svém telegramovém účtu o tom informoval šéf vojenské...
title_translated: Ukraine reports killed and injured after Russian attacks in the Donetsk region and Zaporoz
description_translated: Kiev - Twenty -nine people suffered injuries in drone attacks that Russia undertaken on Thursday evening against Zaporozi in the southeast of Ukraine. In his telegram account, the head of the military ...

title: Barcelona žije. Satoranského tým srovnal čtvrtfinále, rozhodne se v Monaku
description: Barcelona zvládla i druhý domácí zápas ve čtvrtfinále Euroligy basketbalistů a po výhře 79:72 vyrovnala sérii na 2:2. Tomáš Satoranský přispěl k vítězství třemi body, sedmi asistencemi a třemi doskoky. Jan Veselý kvůli zranění chyběl Barceloně ve třetím zápase za sebou. O postupujícím se rozhodne v úterý v Monaku.
title_translated: Barcelona lives. The Satoran team leveled the quarterfinals, decides in Monaco
description_translated: Barcelona also managed the second home game in the quarterfinals of the Euroleague basketball players and after winning 79:72 equalized the series to 2: 2. Tomáš Satoranský contributed to victory with three points, seven assists and three rebounds. Jan Veselý missed Barcelona in the third match. He will decide on the advancing on Tuesday in Monaco.

title: Mrakodrapy i nové čtvrti. Podívejte se na projekty, které mají změnit Česko
description: Nové nejvyšší budovy v zemi, rekonstrukce prvního pražského mrakodrapu nebo obnova desítky let chátrajícího nádraží. To je jen zlomek z projektů, které by v následujících letech mohly proměnit tvář měst v celém Česku. Redakce iDNES.cz připravila přehled těch hlavních vizí – chystaných i těch, které už se staví.
title_translated: Skyscrapers and new neighborhoods. Check out projects to change the Czech Republic
description_translated: New tallest buildings in the country, reconstruction of the first Prague skyscraper or renovation of decades of dilapidated railway station. This is just a fraction of projects that could turn the face of cities throughout the Czech Republic in the coming years. The editors of iDNES.cz have prepared an overview of the main visions - the upcoming and those who are already building.

title: Běhejte raději v přírodě. Tvrdé povrchy stojí za nárůstem zánětů šlach u běžců
description: Alespoň jednou týdně běhá 25 procent Čechů. Vedle cyklistiky jde o nejoblíbenější sport, který navíc není náročný na vybavení. Možná i proto ale mnoho lidí podceňuje přípravu – zapomíná na rozcvičku a ničí si nohy na asfaltových površích. Nějaké svalové zranění si každý rok přivodí až dvě třetiny běžců.
title_translated: Run in nature. Hard surfaces are behind the increase in tendonitis in runners
description_translated: 25 percent of Czechs run at least once a week. In addition to cycling, this is the most popular sport, which is also not demanding on equipment. Maybe that's why many people underestimate the preparation - they forget about warm -up and destroy their legs on asphalt surfaces. Every year, up to two thirds of the runners bring some muscle injury.

title: Muž z bankovky a Češi na Filipínách. Z příběhů hrdinů ze hřbitova veteránů mrazí
description: O hroby Čechů padlých v boji s Japonci v Manile se stará pravnuk generála Lima, filipínského národního hrdiny.
title_translated: Man from banknotes and Czechs in the Philippines. From the stories of the heroes from the cemetery of veterans freezing
description_translated: The graves of the Czechs fallen in the fight with the Japanese in Manila are taken care of by the great -grandson of General Lima, the Philippine National Hero.

title: Jediný letuschopný Bristol Blenheim se proměnil ve šrot vinou špatného výpočtu
description: Byl to jediný letuschopný exemplář tohoto typu letadla na světě. Nehoda během přistání na letišti v anglickém Duxfordu v srpnu 2003 zanechala lehký bombardér Bristol Blenheim Mk. IV v silně poškozeném stavu, i když oba letci opustili palubu po svých. Podobně jako celé toto letadlo je zajímavá i příčina nehody.
title_translated: The only airworthy bristol Blenheim turned into scrap due to poor calculation
description_translated: It was the only airworthy specimen of this type of aircraft in the world. The accident during the landing at Duxford, England, in August 2003, left the light bomber Bristol Brenheim MK. IV in a heavily damaged state, although both pilots left the deck on their own. Like all this aircraft, the cause of the accident is interesting.

title: Finský kouč je doma v Boleslavi, s Českem chce zlato. Nejsem fanda knedlíků, říká
description: Co mají společného Česko a Finsko? Na první pohled nic moc, ale při bližším zkoumání odhalíte silné sportovní propojení. Kometa Brno velebí Arttua Ilomäkiho, hokejové reprezentaci šéfoval Kari Jalonen, v severské zemi má kořeny olympionička Kristiina Mäki. A florbalisté Mladé Boleslavi zvládli druhou, velmi úspěšnou sezonu pod vedením trenéra Joonase Naavy.
title_translated: The Finnish coach is at home in Boleslav, he wants gold with the Czech Republic. I'm not a fan of dumplings, says
description_translated: What do the Czech Republic and Finland have in common? At first glance, not much, but on closer examination you will reveal a strong sports connection. Kometa Brno praise Arttu Ilomäki, the hockey team was headed by Kari Jalonen, in the Nordic country the roots of the Olympian Kristiina Mäki. And floorball players Mladá Boleslav managed the second, very successful season led by coach Joonas Naava.

title: Dolar rychle ztrácí, v ohrožení je i jeho pověst rezervní měny. Dusí ho Trump
description: Americký dolar se vůči koruně pohybuje kolem hranice 22 korun, ještě na začátku roku přitom stál skoro pětadvacet. Po Velikonocích dolar načas oslabil dokonce až na 21,62 koruny, přičemž takhle levný byl naposledy v polovině července 2023.
title_translated: The dollar is losing quickly, and its reputation is a reserve currency. Suffocates him Trump
description_translated: The US dollar is about 22 crowns against the crown, while at the beginning of the year it cost nearly twenty -five. After Easter, the dollar weakened up to 21.62 crowns for a while, with this cheap was last in mid -July 2023.

title: Stát rozjel v Číně dotace smartphonů, přestože jsou tamní ceny velmi nízké
description: Huawei, který po americkém embargu strádal nejenom globálně, ale i na domácím trhu, je zpět. Aktuálně je to čínská jednička a meziročně si výrazně polepšil. Trh ovlivňují státní dotace, ale efekt není dostatečný.
title_translated: State started in China subsidies of smartphones, although the prices are very low
description_translated: Huawei, who suffered not only globally but also on the domestic market after the American embargo, is back. Currently, it is Chinese number one and has improved significantly year -on -year. The market is influenced by state subsidies, but the effect is not sufficient.

title: Od bolesti hlavy po žaludek: Jak znamení zvěrokruhu ovlivňuje vaše zdraví
description: Každé znamení zvěrokruhu má své specifické zdravotní výzvy, které mohou být ovlivněny osobními rysy a astrologickými vlivy. Zjistěte, jaké zdravotní problémy mohou jednotlivá znamení potkat a na co si dát pozor. Co myslíte, odpovídá váš zdravotní stav vašemu znamení zvěrokruhu?
title_translated: From headache to stomach: How the zodiac sign affects your health
description_translated: Each zodiac sign has its specific health challenges that can be influenced by personal features and astrological influences. Find out what health problems can meet each sign and what to watch out for. What do you think your health corresponds to your zodiac sign?

title: Zloději dechu: astma či zákeřný plicní tlak. Mnozí netuší, že je dusí vážné nemoci
description: Jste unavení a zadýcháváte se? Možná to svádíte na věk, stres či jarní únavu. Ale měli byste jít k lékaři. Může jít o projevy nejméně dvou vážných nemocí: vysokého plicního tlaku či astmatu. Mají shodné příznaky, ale rozdílné příčiny i léčbu. První zatěžuje srdce, druhá zužuje dýchací cesty. Na rizika upozorňují odborníci vždy 5. května ve Světový den plicní hypertenze a 6. května ve Světový den astmatu.
title_translated: Breath thieves: asthma or insidious pulmonary pressure. Many have no idea that they suffocate serious illnesses
description_translated: Are you tired and breathing? Maybe you tempt it for age, stress or spring fatigue. But you should go to the doctor. These may be at least two serious illnesses: high lung pressure or asthma. They have the same symptoms, but different causes and treatment. The first burden the heart, the second narrows the airways. Experts always draw attention to the risks on May 5, World Pulmonary Hypertension and 6 May on World Asthma Day.

title: Osvobození Prahy provází řada mýtů. Proč Američané nepomohli?
description: V Praze propuká 5. května povstání. Rozhlas volá o pomoc. Situace se zhoršuje, na předměstích metropole se tvrdě bojuje. Hrozbou jsou zasahují jednotky SS z Benešova na Pankráci i Schörnerova armádní skupina Střed. Proudové Messerschmitty 262 bombardují budovu rozhlasu. Oči se upírají na západ. Americké jednotky se dávají do pohybu. Plzeň osvobozují 6. května. Na Prahu ani na České Budějovice už nepostupují. Proč? V projektu Novinek Rok osvobození odpovídá historik Vít Smetana.
title_translated: The liberation of Prague is accompanied by a number of myths. Why didn't Americans help?
description_translated: In Prague he breaks up on May 5. The radio calls for help. The situation deteriorates, the suburbs of the metropolis are fighting hard. The threat is intervened by SS units from Benešov to Pankrác and Schörner's army group Central. Messerschmitts 262 bombard the radio building. The eyes are west. US units are moving. Pilsen liberate on 6 May. They do not proceed to Prague or České Budějovice. Why? In the project News The Year of Liberation corresponds to historian Vít Smetana.

title: Diplomatická přestřelka mezi USA a Německem kvůli AfD. Vance sáhnul k silným slovům
description: Představitelé americké administrativy zkritizovali rozhodnutí německé kontrarozvědky zařadit AfD (Alternativu pro Německo) mezi extremistické strany. Německé úřady se proti kritice ohradily: „Toto je demokracie,“ stojí v odpovědi.
title_translated: Diplomatic shootout between US and Germany for AfD. Vance reached for strong words
description_translated: Representatives of US administration criticized the decision of German counterintelligence to include AfD (alternative for Germany) among extremist parties. The German authorities objected to the criticism: "This is democracy," he says.

title: Senátor Hraba: Otřesné chování dvou pirátek
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k účasti na odporu proti Pochodu pro život pirátských poslankyň Gregorové a Kocmanové.
title_translated: Senator Hraba: The appalling behavior of two pirates
description_translated: Commentary on her public Facebook profile to participate in the resistance of the March for the Life of Pirate Members Gregorová and Kocmanová.

title: Šumperk bude slavit výročí 80. let od konce druhé světové války až do listopadu
description: Město Šumperk si připomíná 80. výročí od konce 2. světové války a společně s místními kulturními institucemi připravilo sérii akcí, které připomenou život za okupace, osudy obyvatel města i příběhy jejich hrdinů.
title_translated: Šumperk will celebrate the anniversary of 80.
description_translated: The town of Šumperk commemorates 80. Anniversary since the end of the 2nd World War and together with local cultural institutions has prepared a series of events that will commemorate the life of the occupation, the fate of the city's inhabitants and the stories of their heroes.

title: ONLINE: Skoro 50 zraněných po obřím ruském náletu na Charkov. Výbuchy otřásly i Kyjevem
description: Ukrajinské úřady během noci informovaly, že mohutný nálet ruských dronů na druhé největší ukrajinské město Charkov si vyžádal skoro padesátku zraněných. Výbuchy byly podle médií slyšet také v Kyjevě a Mykolajivu na jihu Ukrajiny. Dění kolem války na Ukrajině sledujeme na Blesk.cz od jejího počátku online.
title_translated: Online: Almost 50 injured after a giant Russian air raid on Kharkov. The explosions were shaking and Kiev
description_translated: During the night, the Ukrainian authorities reported that the massive raid of Russian drones on the second largest Ukrainian city of Kharkov claimed almost fifty injured. According to the media, the explosions were also heard in Kiev and Mycolaiv in the south of Ukraine. We have been watching the events around the war in Ukraine at Blesk.cz from its beginning online.

title: Téměř stoletý mistr úhořů z Tokia: celý život zasvětil jedinému pokrmu a jediné omáčce
description: Téměř stoletý japonský šéfkuchař strávil celou svou kariéru přípravou jednoho jídla - úhoří pochoutky zvané unagi.The post Téměř stoletý mistr úhořů z Tokia: celý život zasvětil jedinému pokrmu a jediné omáčce appeared first on Epoch Times ČR.
title_translated: Almost 100 -year -old Master of Eel from Tokyo: All his life has dedicated to a single dish and a single sauce
description_translated: Almost a hundred -year -old Japanese chef spent his entire career by preparing one meal - eels of delicacies called unaGi.The Post almost a hundred -year -old champion of the eels from Tokyo: all his life has dedicated to a single dish and only Appeared First On Epoch Times ČR.

title: Blackout ve Španělsku – příčiny a poučení
description: Jaké byly příčiny Blackoutu na Pyrenejském poloostrově, jaké si z nich vzít ponaučení a jak ochránit sebe, svůj dům, firmu?
title_translated: Blackout in Spain - Causes and Instruction
description_translated: What were the causes of Blackout on the Iberian Peninsula, which of them to learn from them and how to protect themselves, your house, the company?

title: V posledních dnech se na sociálních sítích šíří video, které tvrdí, že nová evropská směrnice o energetické náročnosti budov (EPBD) nás „připraví o domy“, „znemožní jejich prodej“ a „způsobí peklo“
description: V posledních dnech se na sociálních sítích šíří video, které tvrdí, že nová evropská směrnice o energetické náročnosti budov (EPBD) nás „připraví o domy“, „znemožní jejich prodej“ a „způsobí peklo“ pro vlastníky starších nemovitostí. To není pravda.
title_translated: In recent days, a video has been spreading on social networks, claiming that the new European Directive on the Energy Performance of Buildings (EPBD) will “deprive us of houses”, “prevent their sale” and “cause hell”
description_translated: In recent days, a video has been spreading on social networks that claims that the new European Directive on Energy Performance of Buildings (EPBD) will "deprive us of houses", "prevent them from selling" and "cause hell" for older real estate owners. That's not true.

title: Favority na vítězství MS v hokeji jsou podle bookmakerů Kanada a Švédsko
description: Favoritem na vítězství v letošním mistrovství světa v hokeji je týden před jeho začátkem Kanada. Sázející zatím nejvíce věří Švédsku, které je druhou nejpravděpodobnější možností i podle bookmakerů. Po skandinávském týmu sázkové kanceláře věří nejvíce Čechům, kteří letos budou obhajovat titul z loňského domácího šampionátu, a USA. Na letošní triumf českého týmu zatím míří zhruba pětina všech sázek. Vyplývá to z dat společností Tipsport, Fortuna, Chance a Sazkabet.
title_translated: The favorites of the victory of the Hockey World Championship are by bookmakers Canada and Sweden
description_translated: The favorite of winning this year's World Hockey Championship is Canada a week before its start. The bettors so far believe in Sweden, which is the second most likely option by bookmakers. After the Scandinavian team bookmakers, most Czechs who will defend the title from last year's home championship, and the USA this year. About one fifth of all bets are heading for this year's triumph of the Czech team. This stems from data from Tipsport, Fortuna, Chance and Sazkabet.

title: Faksa asistoval u výhry St. Louis, o postupu rozhodne až sedmý zápas
description: Hokejisté St. Louis v jediném pátečním duelu play off NHL porazili vítěze základní části z Winnipegu 5:2 a srovnáním série na 3:3 na zápasy si vynutili rozhodující sedmé klání. Dvěma asistencemi se na výsledku přičinil i český centr Blues Radek Faksa.
title_translated: Faksa assisted at the win of St. Louis, the progress decides up to the seventh match
description_translated: Hockey players St. Louis defeated the winners of the regular season from Winnipeg 5: 2 in the only Friday duel of the NHL playoffs and the comparison of the 3: 3 series for the matches forced the decisive seventh contest. The Czech Center Blues Radek Faksa also contributed to the result.

title: Autor: Pražské hospody a pivnice jsou od 19. století centry národního života
description: Praha - V pražských restauracích a pivnicích se od druhé poloviny 19. století formoval český národní život, byly centry spolků a místem potkávání osobností kulturního, politického i ekonomického života...
title_translated: Author: Prague pubs and pubs have been centers of national life since the 19th century
description_translated: Prague - Czech national lives have been formed in Prague restaurants and pubs since the second half of the 19th century, and were centers of associations and the place of meetings of personalities of cultural, political and economic life ...

title: Komunita u kosmodromu SpaceX v Texasu odhlasovala vznik města Starbase
description: V Texasu vzniklo nové město Starbase. O jeho vzniku hlasovali zaměstnanci společnosti SpaceX.
title_translated: The community at the SpaceX spaceport in Texas voted for the establishment of the city of Starbase
description_translated: The New Town of Starbase was established in Texas. SpaceX employees voted on its inception.

title: Soud v USA zablokoval rozhodnutí vrátit zaměstnance Hlasu Ameriky do práce
description: Federální okresní soudce nařídil minulý týden Trumpově vládě navrátit zaměstnance rozhlasové stanice Hlas Ameriky do práce. Podle odvolacího soudu však neměl k tomuto rozhodnutí pravomoc.
title_translated: The US court blocked the decision to return the employee of the voice of America to work
description_translated: Last week, the federal district judge ordered Trump's government to restore employees of the America's radio station to work. However, according to the Court of Appeal, he did not have the power to do so.

title: Městská nemocnice Ostrava buduje robotický operační sál za 150 milionů
description: Několika operačním oborům bude sloužit nový robotický sál, jehož výstavbu aktuálně zahájila Městská nemocnice Ostrava. I se stavebními úpravami jde o investici za zhruba 150 milionů korun.
title_translated: Ostrava Municipal Hospital is building a robotic operating room for 150 million
description_translated: Several operational fields will be served by a new robotic hall, whose construction was currently opened by the Ostrava Municipal Hospital. Even with construction modifications, this is an investment worth about 150 million crowns.

title: Britská policie zatkaly čtyři Íránce. Měli připravovat teroristický útok
description: Britská policie v neděli zatkla pět mužů včetně čtyř Íránců, které podezírá z přípravy teroristického útoku na konkrétní objekt. Informuje o tom agentura AFP s odvoláním na londýnskou metropolitní policii.
title_translated: The British police arrested four Iranians. Were to prepare a terrorist attack
description_translated: The British police arrested five men on Sunday, including four Iranians, which suspects the preparation of a terrorist attack on a specific building. The AFP agency informs about it, referring to the London Metropolitan Police.

title: KOMENTÁŘ: Skvostný podívaná v Edenu aneb Český fotbal umí být skvělý. Po svém
description: Zápas, který možná měl být o ničem. Slavii byl po mistrovských oslavách výsledek tabulkově úplně buřt. Plzeň se zase v Edenu mohla uchýlit k hraní zanďoura, jako to na sešívané půdě činí řada týmů. Jenže ani jeden z předpokladů, který by atraktivitu sobotního mače zkazil, se nenaplnil. Naopak. Česká liga ukázala, že souboje top týmů mohou být zatraceně zábavné. A že k tomu ani nemusí být následovány zahraniční trendy posledních fotbalových let...
title_translated: Commentary: A magnificent spectacle in Eden or Czech football can be great. In its own
description_translated: A match that may have been about nothing. After the championship celebrations, Slavia was the result of the table completely. Pilsen in Eden could resort to Zanďoura playing, as many teams do on the stitched soil. But none of the prerequisites that would spoil the attractiveness of the Saturday cat was fulfilled. On the contrary. The Czech League showed that the fights of top teams can be damn fun. And that it may not be followed by foreign trends in the last football years ...

title: Rusko v noci útočilo na Kyjev, začalo hořet několik obytných budov
description: Rusko v noci na neděli opět udeřilo na ukrajinskou metropoli Kyjev. V důsledku dronových útoků vypukly požáry v několika obytných budovách, v různých částech města vzplála auta. S odvoláním na prohlášení ukrajinské armády a kyjevských úřadů o tom informovala agentura Reuters.
title_translated: Russia attacked Kiev at night, several residential buildings began to burn
description_translated: Russia on Sunday night hit the Ukrainian capital Kyiv again. As a result of drone attacks, fires broke out in several residential buildings, and in different parts of the city, the car burned. Referring to the statement of the Ukrainian Army and Kiev authorities, Reuters reported.

title: Až milion lidí nemá praktického lékaře. ‚Zhoršuje se dostupnost primární péče,‘ poukazují doktoři
description: Ministerstvo zdravotnictví snížilo podporu rezidenčních míst pro absolventy. Praktičtí lékaři nyní ve své kampani žádají kraj o spolufinancování rezidenčních míst a dotace na školení a praxe nových lékařů. Například v Plzeňském kraji teď devět a půl tisíce dětí nemá vlastního pediatra. V celém Česku pak přibližně milion dospělých a dětí nemá praktického lékaře.
title_translated: Up to a million people do not have a GP. 'The availability of primary care deteriorates,' the doctors point out
description_translated: The Ministry of Health reduced the support of residential sites for graduates. GPs are now asking the region for co -financing of residential sites and subsidies for training and practice of new doctors in their campaign. For example, in the Pilsen Region, nine and a half thousand children now do not have their own pediatricians. Throughout the Czech Republic, approximately a million adults and children do not have a GP.

title: Po volbách navrhneme úplné zrušení televizních poplatků, vzkazuje Okamura
description: Úplné zrušení televizních a rozhlasových poplatků a převedení České televize a Českého rozhlasu na státní příspěvkovou organizaci, podléhající kontrole NKÚ. To bude podle Tomio Okamury požadovat SPD po příštích volbách.
title_translated: After the elections we will propose complete cancellation of television fees, says Okamura
description_translated: Complete abolition of television and radio fees and the transfer of Czech Television and Czech Radio to a state contributory organization, subject to the SAO. According to Tomio Okamura, this will require the SPD after the next elections.

title: Dallas po obratu vyřadil Colorado. Bývalé spoluhráče zničil hattrickem Rantanen
description: Hokejisté Dallasu porazili v rozhodujícím utkání 1. kola play off NHL doma Colorado 4:2 a postoupili do semifinále Západní konference. Stars prohrávali ve 48. minutě 0:2. Obrat řídil proti svým bývalým spoluhráčům hattrickem a jednou přihrávkou Mikko Rantanen. Sezona skončila v zámoří Martinovi Nečasovi, který loni pomohl české reprezentaci získat na mistrovství světa titul.
title_translated: Dallas eliminated Colorado after turnover. The former teammates destroyed the hat trick rantanen
description_translated: Dallas hockey players defeated the 1st round of the NHL at home Colorado 4: 2 and advanced to the Western Conference semifinals. Stars lost in the 48th minute 0: 2. He managed the turn against his former teammates with a hat trick and one pass by Mikko Rantanen. The season ended overseas Martin Nečas, who helped the Czech national team last year to win the title at the World Championship.

title: Servis chtěl desetitisíce, opravili jsme ji za hubičku sami. Zrezlá Fabia prokoukla
description: Skoro to vypadalo, že opravovat tuto Škodu Fabia druhé generace nemá cenu. A tak jsme se pustili do práce sami.
title_translated: The service wanted tens of thousands, we repaired it for the mouthpiece. The rusty Fabia has seen
description_translated: It almost seemed that repairing this damage to the second generation is not worth it. And so we started to work ourselves.

title: Vracejí se přízemní mrazíky
description: Od 5. do 11. května nás v České republice čeká chladnější týden. Teploty budou na rozhraní průměrných a podprůměrných hodnot, srážky se očekávají podprůměrné. Vrátí se navíc také přízemní mrazíky, zejména uprostřed týdne.
title_translated: Ground frosts return
description_translated: From 5 to 11 May in the Czech Republic we will have a colder week. Temperatures will be at the interface of average and below average values, precipitation is expected below average. In addition, ground frosts will also return, especially in the middle of the week.

title: Z hýčkaných nutrií v Olomouci vyrostl problém, v centru města zvažují odchyt
description: Hlodavci i vděční strávníci, kteří spořádají vše, co jim lidé hodí. Nutrie zprvu považované za atraktivní se však pro Olomouc postupně staly problémem a město teď zvažuje jejich odchyt alespoň v centru. Od doby, co ochránci přírody zaznamenali výskyt nutrií ve městě, uplynulo bezmála třicet let. Tehdy náhodný pozorovatel na řece Bystřici u Hodolan nahlásil přimrzlého bobra. Byla to však nutrie.
title_translated: A problem has grown out of the pampered nutria in Olomouc;
description_translated: Rodents and grateful boarders who eat everything people throw them. Nutria initially considered attractive, however, has gradually become a problem for Olomouc and the city is now considering their capture at least in the center. For nearly thirty years have passed since nature conservationists have seen the occurrence of nutria in the city. At that time, the random observer on the Bystřice River near Hodolan reported a frozen beaver. But it was a nutria.

title: Češi podceňují pojištění vážných chorob
description: Životní pojištění má sjednáno zhruba polovina Čechů. Nejčastějším důvodem je snaha zajistit své blízké v případě dlouhodobých následků úrazu nebo nemoci či smrti. Na zajištění vlastních potřeb při vážných chorobách nebo po úrazu myslí Češi podle každoročních průzkumů České asociace pojišťoven až na druhém místě.
title_translated: Czechs underestimate the insurance of serious diseases
description_translated: About half of Czechs have agreed life insurance. The most common reason is the effort to secure your loved ones in the case of long -term consequences of injury or illness or death. According to annual surveys of the Czech Association of Insurance Companies, the Czechs think of ensuring their own needs in serious illnesses or after an accident.

title: Výročí konce války? Velkolepé oslavy chystá Londýn i Moskva
description: Příští týden svět oslaví 80 let od konce evropské části druhé světové války, tedy od porážky nacistického Německa. Velkolepé akce přípravují v Londýně, Paříži i Moskvě. Třeba v britském hlavním městě budou trvat rovnou několik dní, v ruské metropoli se chystá tradiční vojenská přehlídka. A pozadu nezůstane ani Česká republika. Deník přináší přehled toho nejzajímavějšího, co se chystá.
title_translated: The anniversary of the end of the war? London and Moscow are preparing spectacular celebrations
description_translated: Next week, the world will celebrate 80 years since the end of the European part of World War II, ie from the defeat of Nazi Germany. Magnificent events are being prepared in London, Paris and Moscow. For example, in the British capital they will last several days, in the Russian capital there is a traditional military parade. And the Czech Republic will not be left behind either. The diary brings an overview of the most interesting thing.

title: České zpoždění v britské loterii. Už ho probírají i ve Sněmovně lordů
description: Modernizace zastaralé britské Národní loterie, kterou loni začal provozovat Karel Komárek, nabírá zpoždění. Komárkův Allwyn poukazuje na problémy zděděné z minulosti a říká, že všechny sliby splní.
title_translated: Czech delay in the British lottery. They are already discussing it in the House of Lords
description_translated: The modernization of the outdated British National Lottery, which Karel Komárek began last year, is delayed. Komárek's Allwyn points out the problems inherited from the past and says he will fulfill all promises.

title: Češi ostrouhali. Armádní vrtulníky za miliardy opraví až na druhé straně Atlantiku
description: Zakázku, za niž má Praha zaplatit necelé čtyři miliardy korun, získala americká společnost DLF. Český průmysl prý na tyto opravy nestačí.
title_translated: The Czechs were crushing. Army helicopters for billions will repair up to the other side of the Atlantic
description_translated: The contract for which Prague is to pay less than four billion crowns was received by the American company DLF. The Czech industry is not enough for these repairs.

title: Do stavby rychlotratí se musí zapojit soukromý kapitál, říká ministr dopravy Kupka
description: V Česku má během příštích dekád vzniknout síť vysokorychlostních železnic o celkové délce až 767 kilometrů. Pro její vybudování se dají očekávat náklady blížící se bilionu korun, a proto je podstatné zapojit do stavby peníze ze soukromé sféry. V rozhovoru pro e15 to řekl ministr dopravy Martin Kupka (ODS), který zároveň zmínil, jaké jsou zásadní milníky rozvoje českých dálnic. Pokročit se má i v klíčovém projektu tuzemské říční dopravy.
title_translated: Private capital must be involved in the construction of the high -speed.
description_translated: In the Czech Republic, a network of high -speed railways with a total length of up to 767 kilometers is to be created over the next decades. For its construction, the costs of the approaching trillion crowns can be expected, so it is essential to involve money from the private sphere. In an interview with E15, the Minister of Transport Martin Kupka (ODS) said it, who also mentioned the essential milestones of the development of Czech motorways. It should also be moved in the key project of domestic river transport.

title: Švédsko zmírní omezení, povolí prodej alkoholu poučeným turistům
description: Švédsko povolí malým pivovarům, likérkám či výrobcům vína, aby prodávali alkohol turistickým skupinám. Země striktně regulující prodej alkoholických nápojů zmírní svá pravidla a dovolí jejich nákup účastníkům placených turistických výprav. Podmínkou je, že se jim dostane řádného poučení, napsala agentura Reuters.
title_translated: Sweden will alleviate restrictions, allow alcohol sale to enlightened tourists
description_translated: Sweden will allow small breweries, liqueurs or wine manufacturers to sell alcohol to tourist groups. A country strictly regulating the sale of alcoholic beverages will alleviate its rules and allow their purchase to participants of paid tourist expeditions. The condition is that they get proper lessons, Reuters wrote.

title: Audioknižní detektivka o cestě Evropou
description: Pětasedmdesátiletý švédský spisovatel Håkan Nesser bývá označován za krále psychologické detektivky. Každopádně o úspěchu jeho knih svědčí nejen četné překlady a zahraniční vydání, ale i fakt, že v rodném Švédsku získal třikrát po sobě prestižní cenu za nejlepší detektivní román.
title_translated: Audiobook detective story about Europe's journey
description_translated: The 75 -year -old Swedish writer Håkan Nesser is referred to as the king of a psychological detective story. In any case, the success of his books is evidenced not only by numerous translations and foreign editions, but also by the fact that in his native Sweden he won three times in a row a prestigious prize for the best detective novel.

title: Vladimír Ustyanovič: Vyděrač?
description: Zelenskyj hrozí poslancům, kteří nebudou souhlasit s ratifikací dohody o minerálech. Poslanci, kteří nebudou hlasovat, by měli být zbaveni svých amerických víz (ECHO24). K oslavě výročí ukončení Velké vlastenecké války 9. května, jež se uskuteční v Moskvě a kde budou pozvány hlavy států, jak premiéři, tak prezidenti, prohlásil Zelenskyj, že nemůže zaručit jejich bezpečnost. Opravdu chce bombardovat Rudé náměstí?
title_translated: Vladimir Ustyanovic: The extortionist?
description_translated: Zeletsky threatens deputies who will not agree to ratify the Mineral Agreement. MEPs who will not vote should be deprived of their American visa (Echo24). To celebrate the anniversary of the end of the Great Patriotic War 9. Does he really want to bomb the red square?

title: OBRAZEM: Plzní projel rekordní Konvoj svobody. Sledovaly ho desetitisíce lidí
description: Hlavním lákadlem nedělních plzeňských oslav konce druhé světové války se stal Konvoj svobody. Ulicemi západočeské metropole tak projely stovky historických vojenských vozidel. Přehlídku sledovaly desetitisíce diváků.
title_translated: Picture: Pilsen passed a record convoy of freedom. Tens of thousands of people watched him
description_translated: The main attraction of the Sunday Pilsen celebrations of the end of World War II became the Svoboda convoy. Hundreds of historical military vehicles passed through the streets of the West Bohemian metropolis. Tens of thousands of spectators watched the show.

title: Kdo bude papežem? Konkláve jako krvavý i humorný umělecký příběh
description: Sedmého května se sejdou nejvyšší představitelé katolické církve ve vatikánské Sixtinské kapli. Zvolí tam 267. papeže, který nahradí zesnulého Františka (1936-2025). Proces volby hladký nebývá. Provázely ho vraždy, pletichy, ale také zábavné momenty. Napínavé události tak opakovaně zachytili umělci. Ve filmech, seriálech, v knihách, v obrazech i vtipech. Konkláve popsal rovněž sám papež František.
title_translated: Who will be the Pope? Conclave as a bloody and humorous artistic story
description_translated: The Supreme Representatives of the Catholic Church in the Vatican Sistine Chapel will meet. He chooses the 267th Pope to replace the deceased Francis (1936-2025). The process of choice is not smooth. It was accompanied by murders, plot, but also fun moments. The exciting events were repeatedly captured by artists. In movies, series, books, paintings and jokes. Pope Francis himself also described the conclave.

title: Hokejisty Kanady posílí na MS hvězdný útočník Crosby, ve hře je i MacKinnon
description: Ottawa - Kanadu bude na blížícím se mistrovství světa v Dánsku a Švédsku reprezentovat i jeden z nejlepších hokejistů historie Sidney Crosby. Kapitán Pittsburghu se na šampionátu představí po deseti...
title_translated: Canada hockey players will strengthen the star striker Crosby, and Mackinnon is also in the game
description_translated: Ottawa - Canada will represent one of the best hockey players of Sidney Crosby at the upcoming World Championship in Denmark and Sweden. Captain Pittsburgh will perform at the Championship after ten ...

title: K Hieldovi v transu se přidal Curry a Warriors ovládli sedmý duel s Houstonem
description: Basketbalisté Golden State Warriors vyhráli sedmý zápas na palubovce Houstonu 103:89 a postoupili do druhého kola play off NBA. V něm se utkají s Minnesotou. Hrdinou se stal Buddy Hield, který trefil devět trojek z jedenácti pokusů a dal celkem 33 bodů. Další fázi vyřazovacích bojů už odstartovala Indiana, která na úvod překvapivě zvítězila 121:112 u druhého nejlepšího týmu sezony Clevelandu.
title_translated: Curry and Warriors dominated the seventh duel with Houston
description_translated: Basketball players Golden State Warriors won the seventh match on the Houston deck 103: 89 and advanced to the second round of the playoff NBA. They will compete with Minnesota. The hero became Buddy Hield, who hit nine threes of eleven attempts and scored a total of 33 points. Another phase of the knockouts has already started Indiana, which surprisingly won 121: 112 at the second best team of the Cleveland season.

title: Mašek (ANO): Opravdu jsme svobodní, když se k nám chovají jako k neposlušným ovečkám?
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu ke stavu demokracie v ČR.
title_translated: Mašek (yes): Are we really free when they treat us as disobedient sheep?
description_translated: Commentary on his public Facebook profile to the state of democracy in the Czech Republic.

title: Mototour veteránů v Javorníku. Historická auta, motocykly (video)
description: Mototour veteránů v Javorníku. ?? Historická auta, motocykly, traktory i všelijaká další letitá vozítka mohli v sobotu obdivovat milovníci veteránů na 29. ročníku Mototour v Javorníku na Jesenicku. Mnohá historická vozidla se pak navíc vydala na...
title_translated: Mototour veterans in Javorník. Historic cars, motorcycles (video)
description_translated: Mototour veterans in Javorník. ?? Historical cars, motorcycles, tractors and all sorts of long -lived vehicles could be admired on Saturday lovers of veterans at the 29th Mototour in Javorník in the Jeseníky region. Many historical vehicles then went on ...

title: Spor mezi dvěma cizinci v Klatovech skončil pokusem o vraždu
description: Případem zvlášť závažného zločinu vraždy ve stadiu pokusu se od nočních hodin zabývají policisté v Klatovech. K incidentu došlo mezi dvěma cizinci, kteří si vyřizovali osobní spory. Podezřelého se policistům podařilo zadržet a provádějí s ním procesní úkony, informovali na síti X.
title_translated: The dispute between two foreigners in Klatovy ended with an attempt to murder
description_translated: The case of a particularly serious crime of murder at the attempt has been dealt with by police officers in Klatovy at night. The incident occurred between two foreigners who handled their personal disputes. The suspects managed to detain the suspects and perform procedural acts with him, reported on the X network.

title: Při náhlé bouři se v Číně převrhly čtyři turistické lodě: nejméně devět mrtvých
description: Nejméně devět mrtvých a jeden pohřešovaný, taková je prozatímní bilance po převržení čtyř turistických lodí na řece Wu v Číně. K neštěstí došlo v malebné čínské provincii Kuej-čou. Čtyři lodě se převrhly na řece, jež je přítokem Jang-c'-ťiang, během náhlé bouře, kterou provázel extrémně silný vítr, krupobití a liják, uvedla státní televize CCTV.
title_translated: In a sudden storm, four hiking ships were overturned in China: at least nine dead
description_translated: At least nine dead and one missing, such is the temporary balance after the four hiking ships on the Wu River in China. The misfortune occurred in the picturesque Chinese province of Kuej-Chou. The four ships were overturned on the river, which is a tributary of yang-c'jiang, during a sudden storm accompanied by an extremely strong wind, hail and downpour, said state television CCTV.

title: Fed bude vyčkávat, ČNB by mohla sazby dále snížit (Týdenní zpráva z finančního trhu)
description: Tento týden se do popředí zájmu na finančních trzích opět vrátí centrální banky. Zatímco Fed podle nás zvolí vzhledem k výrazné nejistotě ohledně cel a jejich dopadu vyčkávací taktiku, ČNB by mohla po březnové pauze úrokové sazby s ohledem na inflaci u...
title_translated: Fed will wait, the CNB could further reduce rates (a weekly financial market report)
description_translated: This week, the central banks will return to the financial markets. While the Fed chooses to have a significant uncertainty about the cells and their impact, the CNB could after the March break of interest rate with regard to inflation u ...

title: K míči patří i kniha. Slavia spustila nový projekt pro děti z dětských domovů
description: Do prvního ročníku společensko-odpovědného projektu Slavie „K míči patří i kniha“ se zapojilo 262 dětí ze 37 dětských domovů z celé České republiky. Hlavním cílem bylo rozvinout u dětí a mladistvých lásku ke čtení a posílit jejich čtenářskou gramotnost. Zapojil se i trenér Jindřich Trpišovský.
title_translated: The ball also includes a book. Slavia launched a new project for children from children's homes
description_translated: 262 children from 37 children's homes from all over the Czech Republic were involved in the first year of the social-responsible project of Slavia “The ball”. The main goal was to develop children and youthful love for reading and strengthen their reading literacy. Coach Jindřich Trpišovský also joined.

title: RECENZE: Star Wars v nové minisérii odhalují odvrácenou tvář galaxie
description: Na oslavu dne Star Wars, který každoročně připadá na 4. května, připravil kreativní ředitel Lucasfilmu Dave Filoni novou minisérii, ve které představuje osudy oblíbených postav, jež se mihly už v jeho dřívějších animovaných projektech. A ani s třetími „Příběhy“ nešlápl vedle.
title_translated: Reviews: Star Wars in the new mini -series reveal averting face galaxy
description_translated: The Creative Director of Lucasfilm Dave Filoni has prepared a new mini -series to celebrate the Day of Star Wars, which falls on May 4, in which it presents the fate of the favorite characters that flickered in his earlier animated projects. And even with the third "stories" he did not step on.

title: KVÍZ: Prověřte si znalosti o Vatikánu i papežském úřadu
description: Hlava katolické církve a zástupce Ježíše Krista na Zemi by měl být příkladem pro všechny věrné ovečky. Mnohé osobnosti se tímto způsobem v úřadu Svatého otce zapsaly, jiné se chovaly spíše jako zástupci Antikrista. Pojďte si projít své znalosti týkající se papežského stolce, ale i papežů, k nimž se vážou jak superlativy, tak negativní „nej“.
title_translated: Quiz: Check out the knowledge of the Vatican and the Papal Office
description_translated: The head of the Catholic Church and the representative of Jesus Christ on Earth should be an example for all faithful sheep. Many personalities enrolled in the office of the Holy Father in this way, others behaved more like representatives of the Antichrist. Let's go through your knowledge of the papal table, as well as the popes, which are both superlatives and the negative "best".

title: Šéf Pentagonu nařídil snížit počet elitních generálů o pětinu
description: Americký ministr obrany Pete Hegseth v pondělí nařídil snížit o pětinu počet elitních generálů v aktivní armádní službě. Informují o tom tiskové agentury, podle nichž jde o další krok administrativy prezidenta Donalda Trumpa ve snaze zefektivnít armádu a přizpůsobit ji Trumpově představě. Ministr požaduje i další škrty na předních pozicích armády.
title_translated: Pentagon chief ordered to reduce the number of elite generals by one fifth
description_translated: American Defense Minister Pete HegSeth on Monday ordered to reduce the number of elite generals in the active army service by one fifth. This is reported by press agencies, according to which the next step of the administration of President Donald Trump in an effort to streamline the army and adapt it to Trump's idea. The Minister also requires other cuts in the leading positions of the army.

title: Test motocyklu Royal Enfield Hunter 350: Vstupenka do světa klasiky
description: Hunter 350 je nejdostupnějším modelem značky Royal Enfield. Britská legenda vyráběná v Indii slibuje především styl a charakter, ale také jednoduchost a spolehlivost. Zjistíme tedy, jak si vede v praxi, a také, zda je to motorka vhodná pro začátečníky. Na závěr se nevyhneme ani srovnání s letošní novinkou od Hondy - GB350S.
title_translated: Motorcycle Test Royal Enfield Hunter 350: Ticket to the World of Classic
description_translated: The Hunter 350 is the most affordable model of the Royal Enfield. The British legend produced in India promises primarily style and character, but also simplicity and reliability. So we will find out how it does in practice and also whether it is a motorcycle suitable for beginners. Finally, we will not avoid a comparison with this year's news from Honda - GB350S.

title: Mrtví, nevstupovat! Masakr v Úsobské ulici se stal tragickým symbolem 6. května
description: Neslýchaná brutalita, jakou ve svém posledním vzepětí použila před 80 lety německá okupační moc při marné snaze potlačit pražské povstání, se vepsala i do děsivého zločinu, k němuž došlo v neděli 6. května 1945 ve večerních hodinách v pražské Úsobské ulici (dnes ulici Obětí 6. května). Esesáci tam ve sklepě domu povraždili 35 civilistů, z toho 10 dětí a 13 žen. A nebyla to jediná masová vražda v ulici.
title_translated: Dead, don't enter! The massacre in Úsobská Street became a tragic symbol of 6 May
description_translated: The unheard of brutality used in her last rebellion 80 years ago by the German occupation power in the futile attempt to suppress the Prague uprising was also written in a terrible crime that occurred on Sunday 6 May 1945 in the evening in Prague's Úsobská Street (today the street 6 May). The SS men in the cellar of the house killed 35 civilians, of which 10 children and 13 women. And it wasn't the only mass murder in the street.

title: Dvacet let žila pro nemocnou dceru: Teď Lenka bojuje s agresivní rakovinou mozku
description: Celý život pomáhala druhým, teď sama bojuje o život. Lence (50) z Prahy lékaři diagnostikovali jeden z nejagresivnějších mozkových nádorů, glioblastom. Prognóza je tvrdá, ale naděje se nevzdává. Jedinou šanci jí dává léčba, kterou v Česku pojišťovny nehradí.
title_translated: For twenty years she lived for a sick daughter: now Lenka is fighting aggressive brain cancer
description_translated: All her life she has helped others, now she fights for life. Lenka (50) from Prague was diagnosed with one of the most aggressive brain tumors, glioblastoma. The prognosis is hard, but hope does not give up. The only chance gives her a treatment that insurance companies do not pay in the Czech Republic.

title: Koh-i-noor zvažujeme přesunout do USA. Závod v Rusku jsme odepsali, říká Bříza
description: Americká cla, evropská byrokracie i generační předávání rodinného impéria. Zakladatel a šéf holdingu Koh-i-noor Vlastislav Bříza starší v rozhovoru pro FLOW otevřeně popisuje, s jakými výzvami se jeho podnikání potýká a co považuje za klíč k úspěchu.
title_translated: Koh-i-noor is considering moving to the US. We have written a race in Russia, says Birch
description_translated: American customs duties, European bureaucracy and generational handover of the family empire. The founder and chief of Koh-i-noor holding Vlastislav Bříza the Elder in an interview for Flow openly describes what challenges his business is struggling and what he considers to be the key to success.

title: Apokalypsa na frontě u Pokrovsku: Moskva ho chce konečně dobýt a pak slavit porážku Hitlera
description: Pokrovsk v Doněcké oblasti zažívá už půl roku jedny z nejtvrdších bojů celé fronty na Ukrajině. Ruská armáda se tu usilovně snaží o postup, v posledních dnech ještě usilovněji – snahou je ovládnout strategické město do 9. května, kdy Rusko slaví Den vítězství, 80. výročí porážky nacistického Německa. Zatím jediným výsledkem je, že město vypadá „apokalypticky“, líčí zpravodaj televize Nastojaščeje vremja.
title_translated: Apocalypse on the queue near Pokrovsko: Moscow wants to finally conquer him and then celebrate the defeat of Hitler
description_translated: Pokrovsk in the Donetsk region has been experiencing one of the toughest struggles of the entire queue in Ukraine for half a year. The Russian army is trying to advance here, even more hard in recent days - the effort is to dominate the strategic city by May 9, when Russia celebrates the Day of Victory, the 80th anniversary of the defeat of Nazi Germany. So far, the only result is that the city looks "apocalyptic", depicts the newsletter of TV Natojaščeje Vremja.

title: Na Horké lince Blesku právníci, šéf notářů i odbornice na oddlužení: Volejte o radu ZDARMA už DNES!
description: Zákony nejsou jen bludiště paragrafů. Ve schopných rukou se můžou stát účinnou zbraní, se kterou převálcujete soupeře. Jenže kde najít odborníka, který vás za radu nesedře z kůže? Stačí zavolat na horkou linku Blesku!
title_translated: On the hot line Lightning Lawyers, head of notaries and debt relief expert: call for free advice today!
description_translated: The laws are not just a maze of paragraphs. In capable hands, they can become an effective weapon with which you overwhelm your opponents. But where to find an expert who does not fit you from the skin for advice? Just call the hot lightning line!

title: Kvitová: První vítězství? Jako bych vyhrála titul. Asi si dám zmrzlinu a sklenku vína
description: Bekhend soupeřky zamířil do sítě, a tak se mohla usmát a zatnout ruku v pěst. Načekala se, ale konečně si může oddechnout. Petra Kvitová po čtyřech porážkách a více než dvou měsících slaví první výhru po návratu z mateřské pauzy, v úterý v úvodním kole turnaje v Římě předčila Rumunku Irinu-Camelii Beguovou 7:5 a 6:1. „Je to úleva,“ přiznala pětatřicetiletá česká tenistka.
title_translated: Kvitova: First victory? As if I won the title. I guess I'll have ice cream and a glass of wine
description_translated: The backhand headed into the net, so she could smile and clench her hand. She was waiting, but she could finally relax. Petra Kvitova after four defeats and more than two months celebrates the first win after returning from the parent pause, on Tuesday in the opening round of the tournament in Rome surpassed Romanian Irina-Camelia Begu 7: 5 and 6: 1. "It's a relief," the 35 -year -old Czech tennis player admitted.

title: Další ztráta pro americké námořnictvo. Opět utopilo stíhačku, spadla z paluby
description: Americké námořnictvo v úterý přišlo o další bojový letoun F/A-18, který se z paluby letadlové lodě USS Harry S. Truman zřítil do vod Rudého moře. Informovala o tom zpravodajská televize CNN s tím, že je to druhý incident na této lodi za zhruba týden.
title_translated: Another loss for the US Navy. Again drowned the fighter, fell off the deck
description_translated: The US Navy lost another F/A-18 combat aircraft on Tuesday, which crashed from the deck of the USS Harry S. Truman into the Red Sea. Informed CNN news television, saying it is the second incident on this ship in about a week.

title: Požár nákladního vlaku v Ústí nad Orlicí zastavil provoz na železničním koridoru
description: Požár vozu nákladního vlaku ve stanici Ústí nad Orlicí zastavil provoz na železničním koridoru mezi Kolínem a Českou Třebovou. Vlaky nabírají zpoždění, v regionální dopravě zajišťují České dráhy (ČD) náhradní autobusovou dopravu. Správa železnic odhadovala obnovení provozu zatím na 06:15. Vyplývá to z informací na webu ČD.
title_translated: The fire train fire in Ústí nad Orlicí stopped the traffic on the railway corridor
description_translated: The fire of the cargo train at the station Ústí nad Orlicí stopped the operation on the railway corridor between Kolín and Česká Třebová. Trains are delayed, in regional transport they provide Czech Railways (ČD) substitute bus service. Railway Administration estimated the restoration of operation at 06:15. This stems from information on the ČD website.

title: Ako si vycvičiť draka - Oficiálny IMAX trailer
description: Nenechajte si ujsť nový IMAX trailer k filmu Ako si vycvičiť draka – hranému spracovaniu obľúbenej animovanej klasiky, ktoré do kín prináša spoločnosť Universal Pictures. Tento vizuálne veľkolepý film bol nakrútený špeciálne pre IMAX, čo zaručuje jedinečný filmový zážitok v plnom formáte. Dej sa odohráva na nehostinnom ostrove Berk, kde medzi Vikingami a drakmi zúri večný konflikt. Uprostred tejto vojny sa ocitá mladý Štikút (Mason Thames) – bystrý, ale podceňovaný syn náčelníka Stoicka Vastného (Gerard Butler), ktorý si zopakuje svoju ikonickú úlohu z animovanej série. Keď Štikút nečakane nadviaže priateľstvo s legendárnym drakom Bezzubým, ich puto začne meniť pohľad na celé generácie nenávisti a strachu. Spolu s odvážnou Astrid (Nico Parker) a svojráznym kováčom Gobberom (Nick Frost) sa postavia svetu plnému predsudkov. Film, inšpirovaný knižnou sériou Cressidy Cowellovej, režíroval, napísal a produkoval Dean DeBlois. Na produkcii sa podieľajú aj Marc Platt (Wicked, La La Land) a Adam Siegel (Drive, 2 Guns). Ako si vycvičiť draka v kinách od 13. júna 2025.
title_translated: AKO to train the dragon - official IMAX trailer
description_translated: Do not keep the new IMAX trailer for the film AKO to train the dragon - played by the premises of the obvious animated classics, which in Kin Prhodnosa universal Pictures. This visual feline film Boltoned by a spectacular premax, what is guaranteed by a unique film experience in the full form. Put Sa on the inhostinnom island of Berk, where the Medzi Vikingami and the Dragon of the Surrounding Conflict. In the middle of the war, the young pike (Mason Thames) - a bright but underestimated son of the Chief of Stoick (Gerard Butler), will repeat the role of the animated series. When Štikút Nejakan Nadviaže, the legendary Drakom to the toothless, will begin to move the Meniť for the whole generations of hate and fear. Together with the bold Astrid (Nico Parker) and Svojráznym Kováčom Gobberom (Nick Frost) Sa Posteta full of Predsudkov. The film, incorporated by the book Cressidy Cowell, directed, wrote and produced Dean Deblois. For the production of sajajú and Marc Platt (Wicked, La La Land) and Adam Siegel (Drive, 2 Guns). AKO to train the dragon in cinemas from 13 June 2025.

title: Vražedná matematika a fyzika. Důvody, proč se mladým nechce na techniku
description: Český vzdělávací systém se odtrhl od toho, co firmy potřebují, stěžují si podnikatelé. Někteří z nich neváhali a vzali věci do svých rukou. Proč a jak by se mělo české školství proměnit, řešili i řečníci na Konferenci České elity.
title_translated: Murdering mathematics and physics. Reasons why young people do not want to be a technique
description_translated: The Czech educational system broke away from what companies need, complaining entrepreneurs. Some of them did not hesitate and took things into their hands. Why and how the Czech education system should be transformed was also solved by speakers at the Czech elite conference.

title: Vláda bude řešit, jak dál s Dukovany, když soud zablokoval podpis smlouvy
description: Vláda bude jednat o situaci kolem plánované stavby dalších bloků jaderné elektrárny Dukovany poté, co brněnský soud předběžným opatřením zablokoval na středu plánovaný finální podpis smlouvy mezi společností Elektrárna Dukovany II a vítězem tendru, korejskou KHNP. Soud to udělal na návrh francouzské firmy EDF, která napadla žalobou rozhodnutí Úřadu pro ochranu hospodářské soutěže.
title_translated: Government will deal with Dukovany when the court blocked the signature of the contract
description_translated: The Government will discuss the situation around the planned construction of other blocks of the Dukovany nuclear power plant after the Brno court blocked the planned final signature of the contract between the Dukovany II power plant and the winner of the tender, Korean KHNP on Wednesday. The court did it on the proposal of the French company EDF, which challenged the decision of the Office for the Protection of Competition.

title: Británie bojuje s migrací. Chce omezit víza studentům, u kterých hrozí žádost o azyl
description: Britská vláda plánuje zveřejnit plán, jak chce snížit počet migrantů, kteří každoročně přicházejí do země. Zvažuje, že omezí vydávání víz studentům, kteří pocházejí ze zemí, u nichž je vysoká pravděpodobnost žádosti o azyl. Podle britských médií krok přichází poté, co rozhořčení voliči v místních volbách nezvolili labouristického premiéra Keira Starmera.
title_translated: Britain is fighting migration. Wants to limit visas to students who are threatened to apply for asylum
description_translated: The British government plans to publish a plan on how to reduce the number of migrants who come to the country every year. It is considering limiting the issue of visa to students who come from countries with a high probability of asylum application. According to the British media, the step comes after the voters in the local elections did not choose the Labor Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

title: Buffett opět šetří a trhy se bojí. Proč Berkshire sedí na 347 miliardách a neinvestuje?
description: „Warren Buffett drží rekordní hotovost, odprodává americké akcie, obává se dluhové situace USA a předává žezlo svému nástupci Gregu Abelovi,“ říká analytik BHS Timur Barotov.
title_translated: Buffett saves again and the markets are afraid. Why is Berkshire sitting at 347 billion and not investing?
description_translated: "Warren Buffett holds record cash, sells US stocks, worries about the US debt situation, and gives the scepter Greg Abel," says analyst BHS Timur Barotov.

title: Edmonton otočil zápas na ledě Vegas, Carolina uspěla nad Washingtonem
description: Ve dvou úterních zápasech play off NHL se radovaly hostující celky. Hokejistům Vegas nepomohlo rychlé dvougólové vedení, když na domácím ledě nakonec podlehli 2:4 Edmontonu. Ve Washingtonu rozhodovalo až prodloužení, v jehož 64. minutě trefil výsledek 1:2 pro Carolinu obránce Slavin.
title_translated: Edmonton turned the match on the ice of Vegas, Carolina succeeded over Washington
description_translated: In two Tuesday playoffs of the NHL play off, the guest teams rejoiced. Hockey players did not help Vegas a fast two -goal lead when they finally succumbed to 2: 4 Edmonton on home ice. In Washington, the extension was decided, in which the 64th minute hit the 1: 2 result for Carolina defender Slavin.

title: Slováci v zoufalství před MS řeší kata Sparty. Haló, budeme hrát o záchranu, varuje Gáborík
description: Do velmi kritické situace se dostali tvůrci slovenské hokejové reprezentace před blížícím se MS ve Švédsku a Dánsku. Po sérii omluvenek z NHL i z řad finalistů české extraligy se možnosti výběru trenéru Vladimíru Országhovi, náhradníkovi za zdravotně indisponovaného Craiga Ramsayho, značně zúžily. I proto se u východních sousedů znovu rozjela debata, proč reprezentace ignoruje jednoho z nejúspěšnějších slovenských krajánků v Evropě.
title_translated: Slovaks in despair before the World Championship solves Kata Sparta. Hello, we will play for rescue, warns Gáborík
description_translated: The creators of the Slovak hockey team before the upcoming World Championship in Sweden and Denmark got into a very critical situation. After a series of apologies from the NHL and the finalists of the Czech Extraliga, the possibility of choosing a coach Vladimir Országh, a substitute for a healthy -indisposed Craig Ramsay, has narrowly narrowed. This is one of the reasons why the eastern neighbors have started again, why the national team ignores one of the most successful Slovak compatriots in Europe.

title: Seďa (SOCDEM): O bydlení podruhé
description: Všechny kandidující politické strany v komunálních volbách v roce 2022 měly jako svoji prioritu bydlení. Hradišťská radniční pravicová koalice tento problém řeší opět podporou developerů. Jiná řešení ke škodě města Uherské Hradiště nenabízí.
title_translated: SODA (SOCDEM): About Housing For the second time
description_translated: All candidate political parties in the municipal elections in 2022 had housing as their priority. Hradišťská Town Hall Coalition solves this problem again by supporting developers. It does not offer other solutions to the Škoda of Uherské Hradiště.

title: Kdy je správný čas pro výsev mrkve a jak ji správně zalévat
description: Kdy je ten pravý čas na výsev mrkve a jak na bohatou úrodu? Důležitou roli v úspěchu hraje načasování.
title_translated: When is the right time for sowing carrots and how to water it properly
description_translated: When is the right time to sow carrots and how to rich harvest? The timing plays an important role in success.

title: Nejde o cenu, ale o myšlenku. Den matek je příležitost říct víc než slova
description: Nejhezčí dárek je vždy ten osobní. Co se dává ke Dni matek a jak vymyslet nebo vyrobit originální dárek, co mamince rozhodně udělá radost?
title_translated: It is not a price, but an idea. Mother's Day is an opportunity to say more than words
description_translated: The nicest gift is always the personal one. What is given to mothers' Day and how to think or make an original gift, what will make your mother happy?

title: Sucho a mráz klíšťatům nesvědčí. Teplé jaro ale může přinést opačný efekt
description: Příroda se v teplých jarních dnech probouzí k životu. A s ní bohužel i klíšťata. Tito drobní parazité na první pohled nevypadají nebezpečně, mohou však přenášet závažná onemocnění, jako je lymská borelióza nebo klíšťová encefalitida. Jak počasí ovlivňuje výskyt klíšťat a jejich aktivitu? A máme se letos obávat většího rizika než dřív?
title_translated: Drought and frost do not testify to ticks. But the warm spring can bring the opposite effect
description_translated: Nature awakens to life on warm spring days. And unfortunately with her ticks. At first glance, these small parasites do not look dangerous, but serious diseases such as Lyme borreliosis or tick -borne encephalitis can transmit. How does the weather affect the incidence of ticks and their activity? And should we worry more risk this year than before?

title: Tipy z Číny: Netradiční Android telefony z Aliexpressu
description: V dnešním dílu našeho seriálu Tipy z Číny se vydáme do světa netradičních chytrých telefonů, které na českém trhu běžně neseženete. Zatímco většina tuzemských zákazníků vybírá z nabídky známých značek jako Samsung, Xiaomi či Apple, na čínských tržištích existuje fascinující svět alternativních zařízení určených pro specifické potřeby. Od ultramalých kapesních telefonů přes extrémně odolné modely [...]Celý článek si můžete přečíst na Tipy z Číny: Netradiční Android telefony z Aliexpressu
title_translated: Tips from China: Non -traditional Android phones from Aliexpress
description_translated: In today's episode of our series Tips from China, we will go to the world of non -traditional smartphones that you will not normally get on the Czech market. While most domestic customers choose from the offer of well -known brands such as Samsung, Xiaomi or Apple, there is a fascinating world of alternative devices designed for specific needs at Chinese marketplaces. From ultramble handheld phones to extremely durable models [...] You can read the full article on tips from China: Non -traditional Android phones from Aliexpress

title: S ranními mrazíky ještě není konec, na teplo si počkáme
description: Do Česka bude i v následujících dnech proudit studený vzduch. Dostávat se k nám bude z polárních oblastí po přední straně tlakové výše se středem nad Britskými ostrovy. Srážky se až do soboty vyskytnou jen ojediněle, ale až do konce týdne musíme počítat s četnými přízemními mrazíky. Mírné oteplení meteorologové očekávají až začátkem příštího týdne.
title_translated: The morning frosts are not over yet, we'll wait for the heat
description_translated: Cold air will flow to the Czech Republic in the following days. It will come to us from the polar regions on the front side of the pressure level with the center above the British islands. Until Saturday, the rainfall will occur rarely, but until the end of the week we have to count on numerous ground floor frosts. Mild warmers expect meteorologists only at the beginning of next week.

title: Proti bolševikům bojovali před 100 lety na Sibiři Jakuti i Evenkové
description: Před 100 lety, 9. května 1925, skončila jedna z nejvýznamnějších domorodých rebelií proti sovětské moci – povstání Jakutů a Evenků na Dálném východě, známé jako Tunguská republika.
title_translated: Against the Bolsheviks fought 100 years ago in Siberia Yakuti and Evenkova
description_translated: 100 years ago, 9 May 1925, one of the most important indigenous rebellions ended against Soviet power - the rebellion of the Yakut and the event in the Far East, known as the Tungus Republic.

title: Plachý pták chřástal polní volá o pomoc. Jeho počty zůstávají nízké
description: Přichází období, kdy bude zase možné zaslechnout jednoho z nejohroženějších ptáků české přírody - chřástala polního (Crex crex). Tento plachý a na loukách skrytě žijící pták je známý svým nezaměnitelným nočním voláním „crex-crex“, podle nějž získal své latinské označení.
title_translated: The shy bird was a crushed field calling for help. Its numbers remain low
description_translated: There is a period when it will be possible to hear one of the most vulnerable birds of Czech nature - has part of the field (Crex Crex). This shy and hidden bird is known for its unmistakable night call by "Crex-Crex", according to which he has acquired his Latin sign.

title: MS v hokeji ONLINE: Trenéři oznámí soupisku, za týmem přiletí Nečas
description: Čeští hokejisté obhajují na mistrovství světa zlaté medaile. Přímo z dějiště šampionátu v dánském Herningu a švédském Stockholmu vám přinášíme aktuální informace v online reportáži.
title_translated: MS in Hockey Online: Coaches will announce the roster, Nečas will arrive behind the team
description_translated: Czech hockey players defend gold medals at the World Championship. Directly from the venue of the championship in the Danish Herning and Swedish Stockholm we bring you up -to -date information in the online report.

title: Lunární kalendář přehledně. Kdy se letos dočkáme superúplňku
description: Měsíc je naším nejbližším vesmírným sousedem a zároveň tělesem, které po staletí přitahuje lidskou pozornost. Ovlivňuje příliv a odliv, některé biologické rytmy i kulturní zvyklosti. Přinášíme přehled jeho fází a přehledná data novoluní, úplňků, superúplňků i zatmění pro rok 2025.
title_translated: Lunar calendar clearly. When will we see a superplay this year
description_translated: The moon is our closest space neighbor and at the same time a body that has been attracting human attention for centuries. It affects the tides, some biological rhythms and cultural habits. Here is an overview of its phases and clear data of new moon, full moon, super -filters and eclipses for 2025.

title: Jak se politici staví k elektrickým autům? Podívejte se na závěrečnou část šesté debaty Česko 2025
description: Evropská pravidla prakticky znemožní koupit si od roku 2035 nový automobil na benzín či naftu. Důvodem je životní prostředí i zdraví. Podle průzkumu agentury Median pro Radiožurnál a Český rozhlas Plus by normu skoro dvě třetiny Čechů zrušily. Jak se k normě hodlají postavit strany, které mají šanci na to dostat se ve volbách do Poslanecké sněmovny? Podívejte se na závěrečnou část šesté debaty Česko 2025.
title_translated: How do politicians come to electric cars? See the final part of the sixth debate Czech 2025
description_translated: European rules practically make it impossible to buy a new car or diesel car since 2035. The reason is the environment and health. According to a survey by Median for Radiožurnál and Czech Radio Plus, nearly two thirds of Czechs would cancel the norm. How do the parties intend to build parties who have a chance to get to the Chamber of Deputies in the elections? Check out the final part of the sixth debate Czech Republic 2025.

title: Basketbalisté Minnesoty využili absence Curryho a srovnali sérii s Warriors
description: Basketbalisté Minnesoty zvítězili nad Golden State 117:93 a srovnali čtvrtfinálovou sérii play-off NBA na 1:1 na zápasy. Warriors bez své zraněné hvězdy Stephena Curryho od začátku ztráceli a ani v obraně nenavázali na dobrý výkon z prvního utkání. Minnesotu táhl Julius Randle s 24 body a 11 asistencemi.
title_translated: Minnesota basketball players used the absence of Curry and compared the series with Warriors
description_translated: Minnesoty basketball players won over Golden State 117: 93 and compared the quarterfinal series Playoff NBA to 1: 1 for matches. Warriors lost without their wounded star Stephen Curry from the beginning and did not follow the defense of a good performance from the first match. Julius Randle with 24 points and 11 assists pulled Minnesota.

title: Vysokorychlostní železnice do deseti let? Podívejte se na druhou část šesté debaty Česko 2025
description: Vysokorychlostní železnice by měla Česko protnout ze severu na jih i ze západu na východ. Celkem se podle plánů Správy železnic mají vlaky prohánět rychlostí až 320 kilometrů v hodině na 767 kilometrech tratí. Pokud se podaří dodržet stavební plány, na prvním úseku by se lidi mohli svézt do deseti let. Podaří se termín dodržet? Co proto hodlají politici udělat? Podívejte se na druhou část šesté debaty Česko 2025.
