title_translated: High -speed railway under ten years? Check out the second part of the sixth debate Czech 2025
description_translated: The high -speed railway should intersect the Czech Republic from north to south and from west to east. In total, according to the plans of railway administration, trains should drive up to 320 kilometers per hour at 767 kilometers of tracks. If the building plans are observed, people could take a ride within ten years. Will the deadline be kept? What do politicians intend to do? Take a look at the second part of the sixth debate Czech Republic 2025.

title: Jaké investice do dopravy plánují politické strany? Podívejte se na úvodní část šesté debaty Česko 2025
description: Dálniční síť v Česku loni narostla o rekordních 111 kilometrů asi 1500. Přesto Česko stále ve srovnání hustoty dálnic vychází v Evropské unii jako průměrné. Lépe je na tom s hustotou celé silniční sítě. Kvalitou silnice ale patří podle Indexu prosperity mezi nejhoršími. Do jakých dopravních projektů politické strany plánují investovat? A jak rychle se má na českých silnicích jezdit? Podívejte se na úvodní část šesté debaty Česko 2025.
title_translated: What investments in transport do political parties plan? Check out the introductory part of the sixth debate Czech 2025
description_translated: The highway network in the Czech Republic increased by a record 111 kilometers last year. Nevertheless, the Czech Republic is still average in the European Union compared to the highway density. It is better off with the density of the entire road network. According to prosperity, the quality of the road is one of the worst. In what traffic projects do the political parties plan to invest? And how fast is the Czech roads to ride? Check out the opening part of the sixth debate Czech Republic 2025.

title: Na Jablonecku a v okolí řádí falešní policisté
description: Policisté z Jablonecka varují před podvodníky, kteří se vydávají za falešné kriminalisty. Snaží se z lidí vylákat peníze a posílají falešná předvolání, služební průkazy a zneužívají policejní databázi osob v pátrání. Jednu ze svých obětí tento týden připravili o tři miliony korun.
title_translated: In the Jablonec region and around the fake police officers raging
description_translated: Police officers from the Jablonec region warn against fraudsters who follow false criminalists. They try to lure money from people and send false summons, service cards and abuse the police database of people in the search. One of their victims deprived three million crowns this week.

title: V Čeladné se zřítil strop hotelu, tři lidé zraněni, nikdo nezůstal pod sutinami
title_translated: In Čeladná crashed the ceiling of the hotel, three people injured, no one stayed under the rubble

title: V hotelu v Čeladné se propadl strop: Při neštěstí byly uvnitř desítky lidí
description: V noci na pátek se v Hotelu Zámeček v Čeladné zřítil strop a část vnitřních konstrukcí. V době neštěstí bylo uvnitř asi 20 lidí, tři z nich utrpěli středně těžká zranění. Záchranáři potvrdili, že pod sutinami nezůstali žádní uvěznění. Příčina zřícení je stále předmětem vyšetřování.
title_translated: A ceiling fell in a hotel in Čeladná: there were dozens of people inside the disaster
description_translated: On Friday night, the ceiling and part of the internal structures collapsed at the Hotel Hotel in Čeladná. At the time of the disaster there were about 20 people inside, three of them suffered moderate injuries. Rescuers confirmed that there were no imprisonment under the rubble. The cause of collapse is still subject to investigation.

title: Okupace? Osvobodili jsme se sami? Vyskočil, Schneider a další skoncovali s nesmysly
description: „Nesmí se zapomínat na oběti, které nám umožnily se vůbec narodit. Nesmí se zapomínat na ta strašná čísla na dětských ručičkách v Osvětimi!“ I to zaznělo v souvislosti s výročím 8. května 1945. Pěkně „po ostravsky“ pak padla například slova o „Blbuších“. Došlo i na oslavy ukončení druhé světové války v Moskvě. „JE SUIS FICO,“ nechybělo. Promluvili herec Ivan Vyskočil, několikanásobný bloger roku Ladislav Větvička, autor literatury faktu Bruno Solařík a publicista a bezpečnostní analytik Jan Schneider, jenž mj. spolupracoval s legendární kapelou.
title_translated: Occupation? Did we free ourselves? Jumped up, Schneider and others ended up with nonsense
description_translated: "It must not be forgotten the victims that allowed us to be born at all. It must not be forgotten about the terrible figures on the children's hands in Auschwitz!" This was also said in connection with the anniversary of May 8, 1945. Pretty "after Ostrava" then fell, for example, words about "foolish". There was also a celebration of the end of World War II in Moscow. "He's Suis Fico," she didn't miss. The actor Ivan Vyskočil, the multiple blogger of the year Ladislav Větvička, the author of the Literature of the Union of Bruno Solařík and the publicist and the security analyst Jan Schneider, who worked with the legendary band.

title: Rusko řeší zničený pomník Rudoarmějců v Teplicích. Zahájilo trestní stíhání
description: Šéf ruského vyšetřovacího výboru Alexandr Bastrykin nařídil zahájení trestního řízení v souvislosti s nedávným zničením sochy rudoarmějce v Teplicích. Pomník sovětského vojáka, který stál v teplických Havlíčkových sadech od roku 1955 coby součást pietního místa, byl v noci na středu stržen z podstavce a zcela zničen neznámými pachateli. Vedení severočeského města tento čin odsoudilo.
title_translated: Russia solves a destroyed monument to the Red Army in Teplice. Has initiated criminal prosecution
description_translated: The head of the Russian Investigation Committee Alexandr Bastrykin ordered the initiation of criminal proceedings in connection with the recent destruction of the Red Army statue in Teplice. The memorial of the Soviet soldier, who stood in Teplice Havlíčkovy sady since 1955 as part of the memorial place, was pulled from the pedestal on Wednesday night and completely destroyed by unknown perpetrators. The leadership of the North Bohemian city condemned this act.

title: Washington srovnal sérii s Carolinou, Edmonton slaví už šestou výhru v řadě
description: Hokejisté Washingtonu ve druhém kole play off NHL zvítězili nad Carolinou 3:1 a srovnali tak stav série na 1:1 na zápasy. O srovnání usilovali rovněž hráči Vegas, kteří ve druhé partii za stavu 4:4 hráli s Edmontonem prodloužení. V 76. minutě ale z přečíslení 2 na 1 rozhodla o šesté výhře Oilers v letošních vyřazovacích bojích za sebou produktivní dvojice Connor McDavid - Leon Draisaitl.
title_translated: Washington leveled the series with Carolina, Edmonton celebrates the sixth win in a row
description_translated: Washington hockey players in the second round of the NHL play off over Carolina 3: 1 and compared the status of the series to 1: 1 for matches. Vegas players also sought to compare, playing with Edmonton's extension in the second game. In the 76th minute, however, from renumbering 2 to 1 decided on the sixth win of Oilers in this year's knockout fighting, the productive pair Connor McDavid - Leon Draisaitl.

title: Malířské válečky datuji podle postelových scén z filmů, říká sběratel
description: Co mají společného postelové scény ze starých českých filmů a malířské válečky? A proč lidé považují kostrbaté vzory na válečcích, které vznikaly v družstvu invalidů Slezanka, za secesní výtvory? Na to vše umí odpovědět Ondřej Matula, který už několik let malířské válečky sbírá a také mapuje jejich historii.
title_translated: I date painting rollers by bed scenes from movies, says collector
description_translated: What do the bed scenes from old Czech films and paint rollers have in common? And why do people consider rough patterns on rollers that were created in the Slezanka Invalid team as Art Nouveau creations? Ondřej Matula can answer all of this, who has been collecting paintings for several years and also maps their history.

title: Nový klub, ve smlouvě klauzule o NHL. Kubalík si zahraje s Kovářem a Voženílkem
description: Dominik Kubalík bude od příští sezony nastupovat za švýcarský Zug. S vedením klubu, jehož kapitánem je Jan Kovář a za tým hraje i další český hokejista Daniel Voženílek, se dohodl na dvouleté smlouvě. Její součástí je výstupní klauzule pro případný návrat devětadvacetiletého kanonýra do NHL. Klub o tom informoval na webu.
title_translated: New club, in the contract clause on the NHL. Kubalík will play with a blacksmith and Voženílek
description_translated: Dominik Kubalík will start for the Swiss Zug from next season. With the management of the club, whose captain is Jan Kovář and other Czech hockey player Daniel Voženílek plays for the team, he agreed on a two -year contract. It includes an exit clause for a possible return of a 19 -year -old cannon to the NHL. The club informed about it on the web.

title: Praze 4 se nelíbí pracovní názvy stanic metra D. Radnici vadí třeba pojmenování Olbrachtova

Řekl to mluvčí městské části Aleš Berný. Obecně podle něj vedení radnice preferuje místopisné názvy, a to nejlépe jednoslovná pojmenování jako Ryšánka, Lhotka či Nusle. Filip Drápal, a spokesman for the Prague Transport Organizer, said the Municipal Topography Commission assesses the proposals.

description_translated: What made the "weaker" sexes to accept industry work during the war or engage in fighting? In addition to the need to help and the feeling of patriotism, it was the desire to become finally equal.

title: Oči mu lezly z důlků, popsal agent. Před 65 lety dostali Izraelci Eichmanna
description: Byla středa 11. května 1960, blížila se půl osmá večer. V argentinské metropoli Buenos Aires zastavil v Garibaldiho ulici asi deset metrů od křižovatky vůz. Z jeho posádky vystoupil jeden muž, zvedl kapotu a začal se zabývat motorem. Třicet metrů od něj, mezi mostem a rohem Garibaldiho ulice, stálo druhé auto. Také jeho řidič vypadal, že řeší poruchu. Ale o nic takového nešlo. Chystal se únos Adolfa Eichmanna.
title_translated: His eyes climbed out of the sockets, the agent described. Israelis of Eichmann received 65 years ago
description_translated: It was Wednesday 11th May 1960, approaching half past eight in the evening. In the Argentine capital Buenos Aires, he stopped the car in Garibaldi Street about ten meters from the intersection. One man stepped out of his crew, lifted the hood and began to deal with the engine. Thirty meters from him, between the bridge and the corner of Garibaldi Street, there was a second car. His driver also seemed to solve a failure. But it wasn't like that. The kidnapping of Adolf Eichmann was about to kidnap.

title: Město na hranici dvou světů. Nejslabší místo v obraně NATO láká Putina
description: Na estonském hraničním městě může ruský diktátor ideálně otestovat, zda Severoatlantická aliance ještě funguje a jestli je Západ ochotný jít do otevřeného střetu. Tzv. „scénář Narva“ hrozí podle expertů už v příštích pár letech.
title_translated: A city on the border of two worlds. The weakest place in NATO's defense attracts Putin
description_translated: In the Estonian border town, the Russian dictator can ideally test whether the North Atlantic Alliance still works and whether the West is willing to go into an open clash. So -called. According to experts, the "Narva scenario" threatens in the next few years.

title: Miliardová ztráta ČD Cargo je zrcadlem průmyslu a ekonomiky. Firma musí projít redukční dietou
description: Český průmysl se v posledních letech trápí a není tomu jinak ani v případě železniční nákladní dopravy. Důvody jsou přitom notoricky známé a jsou vlastně platné pro celý průmysl napříč Evropskou unií – skokový nárůst cen elektrické energie a následná vysoká inflace, závazek Evropské unie k uhlíkové neutralitě znamenající ústup od uhlí či rostoucí regulatorní požadavky nejen v oblasti Green Dealu. To vše se podepsalo na útlumu průmyslové, stavební výroby a na celkové hospodářské stagnaci evropské ekonomiky v posledních letech.
title_translated: The billion loss of ČD Cargo is a mirror of industry and economy. The company must go through a reduction diet
description_translated: The Czech industry has been worried in recent years and it is not otherwise in the case of railway freight transport. The reasons are notorious and are actually valid for the whole industry across the European Union - a jump increase in electricity prices and subsequent high inflation, the European Union commitment to carbon neutrality means retreating from coal or growing regulatory requirements not only in the Green Deal. All this has been influenced by the attenuation of industrial, construction production and the overall economic stagnation of the European economy in recent years.

title: Před Rudolfinem otevřou scénu ke zhlédnutí úvodního koncertu Pražského jara
title_translated: In front of Rudolfin, he will open the scene to see the opening concert of the Prague Spring

description_translated: Pick-ups are primarily working machines, but in some versions they also promise entertainment off the roads. The new Ford Ranger MS-RT has set out upstream and promises fun on the road. But is it even possible to stay a worker?

title: Putin navrhl přímá jednání s Ukrajinou. "Bez jakýchkoliv předběžných podmínek," dodal
description: Hlava ruského státu tak učinila poté, co Moskvu k bezpodmínečnému příměří vyzval ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj a lídři evropských zemí.

title: Trump zvažuje zvýšení daní pro nejbohatší Američany

Listy The Financial Times a The Wall Street Journal se shodují, že šéf Bílého domu chce zvýšit daně pro nejbohatší Američany. Ještě před pár dny přitom vyšší zdanění movitých odmítal.

description_translated: According to foreign media, US President Donald Trump is preparing an unexpected step. The Financial Times and The Wall Street Journal agree that the White House boss wants to raise taxes for the richest Americans. A few days ago, he refused higher taxation of movable movable.

title: Německo je kaput. Musíte staré firmy nechat zemřít, říká komentátor Wolfgang Münchau
description: Málokdo si dovolil v Německu tak otevřenou kritiku německého ekonomického modelu jako Wolfgang Münchau, bývalý šéf deníku Financial Times Deutschland a zakladatel portálu Eurointelligence, ve své široce citované knize Kaput.

description_translated: Few have allowed such an open criticism of the German economic model as Wolfgang Münchau, former head of the Financial Times Deutschland and founder of the Euroinlligence portal, in his widely quoted Kaput book.

title: Kočičí leukémie neznamená smrt. Drahoslav hledá domov, musí být ale jedináčkem
description: Drahoslav (asi 7) je nalezenec, který se do péče spolku Anidef dostal ve zbědovaném stavu. Vyléčili ho, ukázalo se ale, že má tzv. kočičí leukémii. Nijak ho v životě neomezuje, je ale přenosná na jiné kočky. Musí být proto kočičím jedináčkem.

description_translated: Skype began in 2003 in Estonia as a revolutionary way to connect with anyone anywhere. In 2011 it was bought by Microsoft, who now turned it off.

description: Administrativa amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa se chystá přijmout od katarské královské rodiny jako dar luxusní letoun Boeing 747-8, který by měl být upraven tak, aby mohl sloužit jako prezidentský speciál Air Force One. description: V nedělních zápasech play off hokejové NHL se radovaly domácí celky. Dallas porazil 5:2 Winnipeg a ujal se vedení v sérii 2:1 na zápasy. Podruhé za sebou uspěli obhájci Stanley Cupu z Floridy. Naposledy porazili Toronto 2:0 a srovnali tak stav na 2:2 na zápasy.

For the second time in a row, the Stanley Cup defenders succeeded from Florida. Last time they defeated Toronto 2: 0 and compared the condition to 2: 2 for matches.

title: Na stírací los vyhrála seniorka z Floridy milion dolarů. A za čtyři měsíce znovu
description: Neuvěřitelné štěstí měla 67letá Američanka, když v rozmezí čtyř měsíců dvakrát vyhrála na stírací los po jednom milionu dolarů (22 mil. Kč). Druhý tiket si zakoupila na stejném místě, u benzínového čerpadla ve floridském North Portu.
title_translated: Florida's senior senior won a million dollars on the scratch. And in four months again
description_translated: An incredible happiness was 67 -year -old American when she won twice on a scratch of one million dollars (22 million CZK) in four months. She bought the second ticket in the same place, at the gasoline pump in the Florida North port.

title: Jak vnímat realitu. Výstava nabízí šest cest k citlivému zachycení skutečnosti
description: Výstavy mají různé názvy. Některé jsou jasné na první dobrou, jiné je třeba rozklíčovat. Souborná prezentace černobílých fotografií 400 ASA (trvá v pražské Leica Gallery do 15. června) odkazuje ke stupni citlivosti filmového materiálu. A také ke stejnojmenné skupině tvůrců vzniklé na konci roku 2018.
title_translated: How to perceive reality. The exhibition offers six trips to sensitively capture the fact
description_translated: Exhibitions have different names. Some are clear to the first good, others need to decipher. The comprehensive presentation of black and white photographs 400 ASA (lasts in Prague's Leica Gallery until June 15) refers to the degree of sensitivity of film material. And also to the group of the same name for the creators created at the end of 2018.

title: Zatajená dovolená. Šéf nařídil zaměstnanci volno, vědět mu ale nedal
description: Jak je to s čerpáním dovolené, abyste nebyli nepříjemně překvapeni? Třeba jako muž, který zjistil, že dovolenou už čerpal, aniž by o tom věděl. Právník radí, na co si dát pozor a s čím počítat.
title_translated: Hydated holiday. The boss ordered the employee off, but did not give him
description_translated: What about taking a holiday so that you are not unpleasantly surprised? Like a man who found out that he had already taken the holiday without knowing it. The lawyer advises what to watch out for and what to count on.

title: Do centra Loun jen jednosměrkou. Klesají nám tržby, zlobí se podnikatelé
description: Podnikatelé, kteří působí v historickém centru Loun, kritizují místní radnici kvůli zjednosměrnění dopravy v lokalitě. Podle nich jezdí na Mírové náměstí kvůli opatření, které bylo zavedeno před čtyřmi měsíci, méně lidí, a tedy potenciálních zákazníků. Řada z nich hlásí pokles tržeb.

description_translated: Entrepreneurs operating in the historic center of Louny criticize the local town hall to negotiate traffic in the locality. According to them, they go to Peace Square because of measures introduced four months ago, fewer people, and thus potential customers. Many of them report a decline in sales.

title: Na výstavě Smarter E Europe 2025 v Mnichově zazářila řešení „Cloud-PV-ESS-Charger" společnosti Topband, kde firma představila inovativní technologie pro transformaci energetického sektoru
description: Mnichov 13. května 2025 (PROTEXT/PRNewswire) - V německém Mnichově skončila 9. května vysoce očekávaná výstava The Smarter E Europe. Společnost Topband (002139.SZ) zde velice zaujala svým integrovaným řešením „Cloud-PV-ESS-Charger" („cloud-fotovoltaika-systém ukládání energie-nabíječka"). Díky svým špičkovým technologiím a inovačním schopnostem na úrovni systému přilákala společnost Topband rozsáhlou pozornost odborníků a partnerů z oboru, což podtrhuje její klíčovou konkurenceschopnost a atraktivitu na trhu v oblasti digitální energetiky. Přítomnost dále potvrdila dlouhodobý závazek společnosti Topband v oblasti zelené energie a její zrychlující se strategii globální expanze.
title_translated: At the Smarter E Europe 2025 exhibition in Munich, the "Cloud-PV-ESS-Charger" solution, where the company introduced innovative technologies to transform the energy sector
description_translated: Munich on May 13, 2025 (Protext/Prnewswire) - In Munich, Germany, the highly anticipated exhibition The Smarter e Europe ended on 9 May. Topband (002139.SZ) was very impressed by its integrated solution "Cloud-PV-ESS-Charger" ("Cloud-Fotovoltaika-System Energy-Babyr"). Thanks to its top technologies and innovation capabilities at the system level, TopBand has attracted extensive attention to experts and partners in the field, underlining its key competitiveness and attractiveness in the digital energy market. The presence was further confirmed by the long -term commitment of Topband in the Green Energy and its accelerating strategy of global expansion.

title: MTX Group potvrdila stabilní výkonnost i v roce 2024. Více táhl obraný průmysl
description: Průmyslový holding MTX Group zveřejnil nekonsolidované hospodářské výsledky za rok 2024. Nekonsolidované tržby dosáhly výše 56,3 miliardy korun, provozní zisk EBITDA činil 3,0 miliardy korun. Skupina potvrdila stabilní výkon napříč všemi segmenty, výraznější meziroční růst zaznamenala zejména ve výrobě obalových materiálů, produktů pro obranný průmysl a tradingu.
title_translated: MTX Group confirmed stable performance even in 2024. More dragged industry
description_translated: The MTX Group's industrial holding published non -consolidated economic results for 2024. The non -resolid sales reached CZK 56.3 billion, and EBITDA operating profit was CZK 3.0 billion. The Group confirmed stable performance across all segments, and significant year -on -year growth has seen more significant year -on -year growth in the production of packaging materials, defense and trading products.

title: Hertl je s Vegas na pokraji vyřazení. Bude volný pro MS?
description: Carolina porazila Washington 5:2, vede 3:1 na zápasy a je krok od postupu.
title_translated: Hertl is with Vegas on the verge of elimination. Will it be free for the World Championship?
description_translated: Carolina beat Washington 5: 2, leads 3: 1 to the matches and is a step from the progress.

title: Bizarní závislosti slavných, na které nejsou pyšní
description: Závislost nemusí být hned spojena s drogami nebo kouřením a alkoholem. Někdy stačí i obyčejná čokoláda nebo potřeba být čistý. Podívejte se do galerie na bizarnější závislosti slavných osobností, o kterých veřejně promluvily. Občas to hraničí s obsedantně kompulzivní poruchou.
title_translated: The bizarre addictions of the famous they are not proud of
description_translated: The addiction may not be immediately associated with drugs or smoking and alcohol. Sometimes even ordinary chocolate or need to be clean. Take a look at the gallery on the more bizarre dependence of famous personalities they publicly spoke about. Sometimes it borders on obsessive compulsive disorder.

title: Sony Xperia 1 VII je tady: starý známý design, lepší výbava a pekelně vysoká cena
description: Sony představilo nový vlajkový telefon Xperia 1 VIIZáklad zůstal stejný, došlo ale k vylepšení širokoúhlého foťákuCena je opět velmi vysoká, v přepočtu skoro 37 500 korunSony dnes na speciálním briefingu odhalilo svou novou vlajkovou loď z ranku smartphonů, a sice model Xperia 1 VII (označení 7). Novinka opět cílí na extrémně náročné zákazníky, nabízí nový čipset nebo výrazně vylepšenou kameru pro širokoúhlé snímky. Základ ale zůstal stejný, navíc jak jsme u Sony zvyklí, prakticky ve stejném designu jako předchozí generace.Přečtěte si celý článek Sony Xperia 1 VII je tady: starý známý design, lepší výbava a pekelně vysoká cena
title_translated: Sony Xperia 1 VII is here: old known design, better equipment and hellish high price
description_translated: Sony introduced the new flagship phone Xperia 1 Viizeriast remaining the same, but the wide -angle camera has been improved again, almost 37,500 crowns today on a special briefing revealed its new flagship from the Smartphone rank, namely the Xperia 1 VII (designation 7). The novelty again targets extremely demanding customers, offers a new chipset or a significantly improved camera for wide -angle images. But the basis remained the same as we are used to Sony, practically in the same design as the previous generation.

title: Velbloudí kavalerie. V Mauritánii hlídkují proti džihádistům dromedáři
description: V Mauritánii bojují proti radikalismu vojáci Mauritánská národní garda, známí jako Meharisté. Odlehlé písečné oblasti tady brázdí na velbloudech.
title_translated: Camel cavalry. In Mauritania they patrol against jihadists
description_translated: In Mauritania, the Mauritan National Guard, known as meharists, are fighting against radicalism. Outlying sand areas here travel on camels.

title: Konference Unicorn University Open: Budoucnost vzdělávání v éře umělé inteligence
description: Praha 13. května 2025 (PROTEXT) - Jak umělá inteligence mění svět vzdělávání? A jak ji využít jako spojence, který rozvíjí lidský potenciál, nikoli jako nástroj, který ho nahrazuje? Právě těmto otázkám se věnuje další ročník konference Unicorn University Open nesoucí název AI jako partner, nikoli náhrada. Inspirativní přednášky povedou odborníci z oblasti technologií, vzdělávání a vývoje AI nástrojů, kteří nabídnou praktické ukázky a přístupy k využívání umělé inteligence ve výuce a zaměří se především na její roli jako podpůrného nástroje. Konference proběhne 16. května od 9:30 hodin v prostorách vysoké školy nebo online a je zdarma.
title_translated: Unicorn University Open Conference: Future Education in Artificial Intelligence era
description_translated: Prague 13th May 2025 (Protext) - How does artificial intelligence change the world of education? And how to use it as an ally that develops human potential, not as an instrument that replaces it? These questions are dedicated to the next year of the Unicorn University Open conference called AI as a partner, not a replacement. Inspiring lectures will be led by experts in the field of technology, education and development of AI tools who will offer practical demonstrations and approaches to the use of artificial intelligence in teaching and focus primarily on its role as a support tool. The conference will take place on May 16 at 9:30 am at the University of College or online and is free.

title: Dopravní nehoda ve Vršovicích opožďuje tramvaje, na místě jsou zranění
description: Dopravní nehoda vyžadující zásah složek integrovaného záchranného systému zastavila na Kubánském náměstí v pražských Vršovicích provoz páteřních tramvajových linek. Spoje nabírají zpoždění, informoval web Pražské integrované dopravy. Událost má vliv na linky 7, 19 a 22.
title_translated: A traffic accident in Vršovice delayed trams, there are injuries on the spot
description_translated: A traffic accident requiring the intervention of the components of the integrated rescue system stopped the operation of the backbone tram lines in Prague's Vršovice. The connections are delayed, informed the Prague Integrated Transport website. The event affects lines 7, 19 and 22.

title: Knicks dotlačili Boston na hranu vyřazení, Tatum se zranil. Minnesota udělala randál
description: Basketbalisté Bostonu podlehli ve druhém kole play off NBA v New Yorku 113:121 a jsou blízko vyřazení. Obhájci titulu prohrávají už 1:3 na zápasy. Navíc zřejmě přišli o svou hlavní hvězdu Jaysona Tatuma, který se v závěru zápasu zranil. Blízko k postupu má kromě Knicks také Minnesota, která zvítězila 117:110 na hřišti Golden State a v sérii vede rovněž 3:1.
title_translated: Knicks pushed Boston on the edge of the elimination, the tatum was injured. Minnesota made a randal
description_translated: Boston basketball players succumbed to the second round of the NBA in New York 113: 121 and are close to the elimination. The title advocates are already losing 1: 3 for matches. In addition, they probably lost their main star Jayson Tatum, who was injured at the end of the match. In addition to Knicks, Minnesota, which won 117: 110 on the Golden State course, is also close to the procedure and leads 3: 1 in the series.

title: KEMEL: Absolutní nezávislost

title: Zásah antimonopolního úřadu v sídle Seznam.cz byl nezákonný, rozhodl soud
description: Loňská neohlášená kontrola pracovníků Úřadu pro ochranu hospodářské soutěže (ÚOHS) v pražském sídle společnosti Seznam.cz byla nezákonná. Podle informací, které Seznam zveřejnil na svém blogu, o tom rozhodl Krajský soud v Brně.
title_translated: The intervention of the Antimonopoly Office at Seznam.cz headquarters was illegal, the court decided
description_translated: Last year's unannounced inspection of the Office for the Protection of Competition (ÚOH) at the Prague headquarters of Seznam.cz was illegal. According to the information published by the list on its blog, the Regional Court in Brno decided.

title: Seriálový Fallout vás v prosinci vezme do New Vegas, tvůrci rovnou potvrdili i třetí sérii
description: Druhá řada úspěšného seriálové adaptace Falloutu odstartuje už letos v prosinciUž nyní je navíc jasné, že druhou sérií seriál neskončí, tvůrci totiž rovnou potvrdili i třetí řaduFallout patří mezi tři neúspěšnější pořady na Amazon Prime Video, po celém světě už jej vidělo přes 100 milionů divákůZ první série seriálové adaptace Falloutu se na Prime Video vyklubal velký hit, ke kterému si našlo cestu už více než 100 milionů diváků po celém světě. Na streamovací platformě od Amazonu se povedený seriál na motivy slavné postapokalyptické herní značky díky tomu řadí mezi tři nejsledovanější pořady vůbec. Už jen proto bylo jasné, že druhá série na sebe nenechá příliš dlouho čekat – fanoušci musí vydržet do letošního prosince.Přečtěte si celý článek Seriálový Fallout vás v prosinci vezme do New Vegas, tvůrci rovnou potvrdili i třetí sérii
title_translated: The serial Fallout will take you to New Vegas in December, and the creators confirmed the third series
description_translated: The second series of successful serial adaptations of Fallout will start already this December is now clear that the second series will not end, as the creators confirmed the third series of the three unsuccessful programs on Amazon Prime video. More than 100 million viewers around the world have found their way. On the streaming platform from Amazon, a hilarious series based on the famous post -apocalyptic game brand is one of the three most watched shows ever. That's why it was clear that the second series would not wait too long - the fans must last until December.

title: ČEZ: V elektrárně Ledvice si můžete spočítat si přínos fotovoltaiky na střeše rodinného domu
description: Se zajímavou novinkou, která umožňuje simulaci správného rozmístění a využití fotovoltaiky na rodinných domech, se mohou v těchto dnech seznámit návštěvníci Infocentra Skupiny ČEZ v Elektrárně Ledvice. Jedná se o funkční model, u něhož si lze prostřednictvím různých reálných parametrů nastavit vše potřebné pro výpočet optimálního počtu kusů solárních panelů na střeše rodinného domu. Během uplynulé soboty se s modelem mohla seznámit zhruba stovka návštěvníků infocentra. Jeho funkčnost si tak vyzkoušelo i pět radních, včetně starosty z Kobylí. Ano, z vinařské obce ve Velkopavlovické vinařské podoblasti na jižní Moravě.
title_translated: CEZ: In the Ledvice Power Plant you can calculate the benefits of photovoltaics on the roof of the family house
description_translated: With an interesting novelty that allows the simulation of the correct placement and use of photovoltaics on family houses, visitors to the CEZ Group Infocentre in the Ledvice Power Plant can be familiar with these days. It is a functional model where you can set everything needed to calculate the optimal number of pieces of solar panels on the roof of the family house through various real parameters. During the past Saturday, about a hundred visitors to the information center could get acquainted with the model. Five councilors, including the mayor from Kobylí, tried its functionality. Yes, from the wine village in the Velké Pavlovice wine -growing sub -region in South Moravia.

title: Zemřel Robert Benton, režisér filmu Kramerová versus Kramer
description: Držitel několika Oscarů odešel ve věku 92 let v neděli doma na Manhattanu. V roce 1978 se také podílel na scénáři k filmu Superman.
title_translated: Robert Benton, director of Kramer versus Kramer died
description_translated: The holder of several Oscars left at the age of 92 on Sunday at home in Manhattan. In 1978 he also participated in the screenplay for the film Superman.

title: Proč (ne)využít symbiózu? Sparta by mohla ve finále poháru vytasit kosovskou dvojzbraň

Doporučení z minulého angažmá, kupříkladu od exslávisty a někdejšího hráče Plzně Jakuba Hromady, zněla jasně: Ti dva si vyhoví, měli by hrát spolu. Pro kruciální zápas Sparty v sezoně, pro středeční finále poháru v Olomouci s místní Sigmou, se proto nabízí jasná otázka. Neměli by do ofenzivní formace naskočit společně Kosované Albion Rrahmani a Ermal Krasniqi?
title_translated: Why (not) to use symbiosis? Sparta could draw a Kosovo double in the final of the cup
description_translated: The only shot in the derby fell after their cooperation. Recommendations from the last engagement, for example from the exslavist and the former player of Pilsen Jakub Hromady, was clear: the two would fit together. For the Crucial match of Sparta in the season, for the Wednesday final of the Cup in Olomouc with the local Sigma, there is a clear question. Should the Kosnové Albion Rrahmani and Ermal Krasniqi be jumped into the offensive formation?

title: Írán navrhuje Saúdské Arábii a Emirátům, aby u něj obohacovaly uran
description: Írán přišel s překvapivým nápadem, aby blízkovýchodní země vytvořily konsorcium a obohacovaly uran v íránských odstředivkách. Členy konsorcia by podle Teheránu mohly kromě jiných být i Spojené arabské emiráty a Saúdská Arábie, která je hlavním arabským protivníkem Íránu. title_translated: Iran suggests Saudi Arabia and the Emirates to enrich Uranus

title: Budoucí zubaři už mají praxi v nových laboratořích, učí se vyrábět náhrady

description_translated: The first students of the recently opened field of dentistry of the Medical Faculty of the University of Ostrava will have a practice in the newly built laboratories of the Ostrava University Hospital. For example, they learn to produce and assess dental substitutes.

title: Petrovický v Olomouci povýšil, do nové sezony tým povede jako hlavní trenér
description: Novým trenérem hokejistů Olomouce se stal Slovák Róbert Petrovický. Dosavadní asistent nahradil Jana Tomajka, který se po úspěšné baráži o extraligu s Duklou Jihlava rozhodl skončit. „Róbert Petrovický prostředí v klubu již dobře zná. Jeho asistentem bude Petr Svoboda, jenž má trenérské zkušenosti z extraligy a bude se starat primárně o defenzivní činnost týmu. Pevně věřím, že nás nový trenérský tandem znovu dovede do klidných vod extraligové tabulky,“ řekl generální manažer Erik Fürst.

description_translated: The new coach of the Olomouc hockey players became Slovak Robert Petrovický. The current assistant was replaced by Jan Tomajek, who, after a successful relegation about the extra league with Dukla Jihlava, decided to end. "Robert has already known Petrovický in the club. His assistant will be Petr Svoboda, who has coaching experience in the extra league and will take care of the team's defensive activity.

Only another doctor revealed that a forgotten piece of instrument remained in her tooth. According to the patient, the place of apology only encountered the arrogance of the guilty doctor.

description: Zahájení filmového festivalu v Cannes si nenechala ujít řada známých tváří. Organizátoři předem zakázali nahotu a lascivní modely na červeném koberci. Přítomné dámy se snažily zadání vyhovět, přesto si některé zvolily sexy outfity.
title_translated: Picture: Nudity was forbidden, yet sexy outfits in Cannes are not missing
description_translated: The opening of the Cannes Film Festival did not miss a number of well -known faces. The organizers banned in advance nudity and lascivious models on the red carpet. The present ladies tried to meet the assignment, but some chose sexy outfits.

title: Evropská komise pochybila, když nezveřejnila zprávy v aféře Pfizergate
description: Evropská komise pochybila, když zamítla žádost novinářky o přístup k textovým zprávám mezi předsedkyní Evropské komise Ursulou von der Leyenovou a šéfem americké farmaceutické společnosti Pfizer Albertem Bourlou o vakcínách proti covidu-19.
title_translated: The European Commission doubted when it did not publish the news in the Pfizergate affair
description_translated: The European Commission doubted when it rejected the journalist's application to access text messages between the chairman of the European Commission Usulou von der Leyen and the head of the American pharmaceutical company Pfizer Albert Bourlou on vaccines against Covid-19.

title: SINEXCEL Sirius 135K pro komerční a výrobní sféru debutuje na veletrhu Intersolar Europe 2025 – jeden systém konverze energie, globální dosah, celoživotní hodnota
description: Mnichov (Německo) 14. května 2025 (PROTEXT/PRNewswire) - Společnost SINEXCEL (300693.SZ) představila na veletrhu Intersolar své úložné řešení 1000Vdc pro komerční a výrobní sféru, zvané Sirius 135K. Řešením dvou klíčových problémů – špatné přizpůsobivosti a nízké návratnosti – Sirius 135K ztělesňuje koncepci konstrukce Globální připravenost, připravenost na scénáře a připravenost na životní cyklus.
title_translated: Sinexcel Sirius 135K for commercial and production sphere debuts at the Intersolar Europe 2025 - one energy conversion system, global range, lifelong value
description_translated: Munich (Germany) May 14, 2025 (Protext/Prnewswire) - Sinexcel (300693.SZ) presented its 1000VDC storage solution for commercial and production sphere, called Sirius 135k. By solving two key problems - poor adaptability and low return - Sirius 135K, it embodies the concept of designing global readiness, readiness for screenplays and life cycle readiness.

title: V Německu a Švýcarsku zadrželi tři Ukrajince pro podezření ze sabotáže pro Rusko
description: Berlín - Policie v Německu a ve Švýcarsku zadržela tři Ukrajince podezřelé z přípravy sabotáže, informovalo dnes německé generální státní zastupitelství. Podle něj působili zadržení muži pravděpodobně...

description_translated: Berlin - Police in Germany and Switzerland detained three Ukrainians suspected of sabotage preparation, reported the German CEO today. According to him, the detention of the man probably worked ...

title_translated: In Germany and Switzerland, they detained three Ukrainians in Russian services
description_translated: Berlin - Police in Germany and Switzerland detained three Ukrainians suspected of sabotage. Today, the German CEO informed about it today. According to Der Spiegel magazine, they were detained ...

title: GLOSA: Fiasko Sparty po všech stránkách. Je čas na poslední možnost
description: Ostuda. Blamáž. Fotbalová Sparta absolutně nezvládla finále MOL Cupu proti domácí Olomouci a prohrála 1:3. Místo alespoň částečné nápravy sezony upadá slavný klub do ještě větší krize. V posledních dvou ligových zápasech sezony bude tým trenéra Larse Friise zachraňovat to málo, co se dá. Tedy alespoň čtvrté místo a postup do evropských pohárů. Otázkou je, jestli u toho Friis ještě bude. Jako budíček pro bezduchý tým se nabízí jeho okamžité odvolání.
title_translated: GLOSA: Sparta fiasco in all respects. Is the time for the last option
description_translated: Shame. Disgrace. Football Sparta absolutely did not manage the final of the MOL Cup against the home Olomouc and lost 1: 3. Instead of at least partial axles of the season, the famous club is declining into an even greater crisis. In the last two league matches of the season, the team of coach Lars Friis will save little that can be. So at least fourth place and advance to the European Cups. The question is whether there will be Friis. As a wake -up for a mindless team, his immediate appeal is offered.

title: Jak reagovat na neúspěch u přijímaček? Podrobný manuál odborníků pro rodiče
description: Tisíce rodin se dnes dozví konečné výsledky přijímacího řízení na střední školy. Pro děti může být neúspěch tvrdý zásah. Jak jim mohou rodiče pomoci situaci zvládnout? Odbornice radí, jak vše ustát s citlivostí a respektem.
title_translated: How to respond to the failure of the entrance exams? Detailed Manual of Experts for Parents
description_translated: Thousands of families will now learn the final results of the admission procedure for secondary schools. There may be a hard intervention for children. How can parents help them handle the situation? The expert advises on how to withstand everything with sensitivity and respect.

title: Spisovatelka Šrámková o papeži: Pokora a smysl pro humor, podle čeho jiného chcete poznat světce?
description: Spisovatelka JANA ŠRÁMKOVÁ (43) by nakrásně mohla být sběratelkou ocenění. Namátkou: za svou prvotinu Hruškadóttir získala Cenu Jiřího Ortena, její komiks Matylda a Růžovej vlk ukořistil Cenu Muriel, dětská knížka Fánek hvězdoplavec Magnesii Literu a celovečerní animovaný film Tonda, Slávka a kouzelné světlo podle jejího scénáře vyhrál Českého lva, Cenu české filmové kritiky a kategorii Contrechamps na filmovém festivalu v Annecy. Nyní se prostřednictvím experimentálního „románu ve dvou“ s názvem Byt (vyd. Host) od psaní dětských knížek, komiksů a filmových scénářů obloukem vrací ke svým kořenům, totiž k románové tvorbě pro dospělé publikum. Nabízíme vám pár bonusových otázek rozhovoru, který vyšel v Reflexu č. 20/2025.
title_translated: Writer Šrámková About the Pope: Humility and sense of humor, how else do you want to get to know the saint?
description_translated: Writer Jana Šrámková (43) could be a beautiful award collector. Random: for her debut Hruškadóttir won the Jiří Orten Award, her comic Matilda and pink wolf captured the Muriel Award, Children's Book Fánek Star Star Magnesia Litera and feature animated film Tonda, Slávka and Magic Light. Festival in Annecy. Now, through the experimental "novel in two" called the apartment (pub. Host) from writing children's books, comics and screenplays, he returns to his roots, namely the novel for adults. We offer you some bonus questions of the interview, which was published in Reflex No. 20/2025.

title: Lipavský: Evropa musí sankcemi snižovat schopnost Ruska válčit
description: Praha - Evropa musí pomocí sankčních balíků hledat další způsoby, jak omezovat ruskou ekonomiku a jak snižovat schopnost Moskvy vést válku. V rozhovoru to ČTK řekl ministr zahraničí Jan Lipavský (nestr.)....

title: Prezident Pavel bude postupně jednat s šéfy parlamentních stran o bezpečnosti
description: Prezident Petr Pavel ve čtvrtek na Pražském hradě postupně přijme předsedy všech stran zastoupených ve Sněmovně. Jednat s nimi chce o bezpečnosti a připravenosti České republiky, společnosti a jednotlivců reagovat na krize.
title_translated: President Pavel will gradually negotiate with the chiefs of parliamentary parties about security
description_translated: President Petr Pavel will gradually accept the chairmen of all parties represented in the Chamber of Deputies on Thursday. He wants to negotiate with them about the safety and readiness of the Czech Republic, society and individuals to respond to crises.

title_translated: Lipavský: Revision of relations with China has actually taken place
description_translated: Prague - Revision of relations with China actually took place as the government rationally approached communication and its attitudes, said Foreign Minister Jan Lipavský (Nesstr.). With China legislators according to ...

title: ČR loni poskytla pomoc civilistům v Gaze za 22,5 milionu, letos to bude podobné
description: Praha - Česko loni poskytlo humanitární pomoc pro palestinské civilisty v Pásmu Gazy ve výši 22,5 milionu korun, letos bude částka obdobná. ČTK to řekl ministr zahraničí Jan Lipavský (nestr.)....

description_translated: Prague - Last year, the Czech Republic provided humanitarian aid for Palestinian civilians in the Gaza zone of 22.5 million crowns, this year the amount will be similar. Foreign Minister Jan Lipavský (Nesstr.) ....

title: Niedermayer (TOP 09): Čína má dnes nižší celní zatížení než řada amerických spojenců
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k celní politice USA.
title_translated: Niedermayer (TOP 09): China now has lower customs loads than many US allies
description_translated: Commentary on your public Facebook profile for US customs policy.

title: Lipavský věří tomu, že projekt bloků v Dukovanech vláda dokáže dotáhnout
description: Praha - Ministr zahraničí Jan Lipavský (nestr.) věří tomu, že v zájmu energetické bezpečnosti česká vláda dokáže dotáhnout projekt stavby nových bloků dukovanské jaderné elektrárny. Řekl to v rozhovoru...
