description_translated: Prague - Minister of Foreign Affairs Jan Lipavský (nesn.) Believes that in the interest of energy security the Czech government can complete the project of building new blocks of the Dukovany nuclear power plant. He said it in an interview ...

title: Kdy je čas nakoupit dolary a kdy je raději prodat
description: Nárůst výnosů amerických dluhopisů, zejména středních splatností, a revize tržního výhledu snižování sazeb Fedu v letošním roce na úroveň půl procentního bodu signalizuje možnost silnější ekonomiky. Vývoj kurzu dolaru obrázek dokresluje.
title_translated: When is it time to buy dollars and when to sell them
description_translated: This year, the increase in the revenues of US bonds, especially medium maturity, and revise the market outlook of Fed rates, this year signals the possibility of a stronger economy to the level of half a percentage point. The development of the dollar course illustrates the picture.

title: Soulový zpěvák Smokey Robinson čelí několika nařčením ze sexuálního násilí. Věc prověřuje policie
description: Americká policie vyšetřuje, zda se soulový zpěvák Smokey Robinson dopustil sexuálního násilí, jak tvrdí čtveřice žen, které podaly společnou žalobu. Pětaosmdesátiletá hudební legenda podle žaloby nutila své někdejší pomocnice v domácnosti k sexu a omezovala jejich svobodu. Zpěvákův advokát označil obvinění za vymyšlená, ženy se podle něho pouze snaží z Robinsona dostat peníze. Ženy požadují odškodné nejméně 50 milionů dolarů (1,1 miliardy korun).
title_translated: Soul singer Smokey Robinson faces several accusations of sexual violence. The matter is checked by the police
description_translated: The US police are investigating whether the soul singer Smokey Robinson has committed sexual violence, as four women who have filed a complaint claim. According to the lawsuit, eighty -five -year -old music legend forced her former housewife to sex and limited their freedom. The singer's lawyer described the accusation as invented, according to him, women only try to get money from Robinson. Women demand compensation at least $ 50 million (CZK 1.1 billion).

title: Psychologii vyměnila za perníčky. O precizní výtvory maminky na mateřské je rvačka
description: Připadala si jako houba, která do sebe natáhne jen to špatné. Proto opustila roky studovanou psychologii a místo toho ponořila ruce do těsta.
title_translated: She exchanged psychology for gingerbread. About the precise creations of the mother's maternity is a fight
description_translated: She felt like a fungus that would only draw the bad. Therefore, she left her psychology for years and instead immers her hands in the dough.

title: Čech se vydal do pralesa pátrat po tajemné velekryse. Pro místní to je chutný úlovek
description: "Jednou jsem místním ukázal obrázky obrovských vyhynulých zvířat velikosti medvěda a oni hned říkali, že to tu určitě žije," vzpomíná vědec.
title_translated: Bohemia went to the forest to search for a mysterious Great Age. For the locals it is a tasty catch
description_translated: "Once I showed pictures of huge extinct animals the size of the bear, and they immediately said that it certainly lives here," recalls the scientist.

title: Takového soupeře nepamatuji, řekl Sedlák k pasivní hře Maďarů
description: Herning (Dánsko) - Defenzivní taktika a rezignace na útočnou aktivitu maďarských hokejistů překvapila na mistrovství světa útočníka Lukáše Sedláka. Český tým porazil v prvním vzájemném zápase nováčka...
title_translated: I do not remember such an opponent, Sedlák said to the passive game of the Hungarians
description_translated: Herning (Denmark) - The defensive tactics and resignation of the offensive activity of Hungarian hockey players surprised at the World Championship of attacker Lukáš Sedlak. The Czech team defeated a newcomer in the first match ...

title: Byty, jazyky, bezpečnost. Znojmo chystá recept na město, kde se vyplatí žít
description: Ve Znojmě si potvrdili, že k nalákání nových obyvatel a udržení těch současných nestačí nové byty pouze stavět, ale je potřeba budovat je chytře a na správných místech. Analýza, kterou si vedení města nechalo zpracovat, ukázala, že klíčovým problémem současného územního rozvoje je jeho rozptýlenost a nevyužití mnoha volných ploch v centru.
title_translated: Apartments, languages, safety. Znojmo is preparing a recipe for the city where it pays to live
description_translated: In Znojmo, they confirmed that to attract new residents and maintaining the current ones is not enough to build new flats, but it is necessary to build them cleverly and in the right places. The analysis that the city management processed showed that the key problem of contemporary territorial development is its dispersion and not to use many free areas in the center.

title: ‚Nejsme žádné JO!‘ V rychle rostoucí nové alianci hraje absolutní prim SPD. Počty, vlivem i penězi
description: Tomio Okamura zariskoval a začíná sklízet ovoce. Zatím sice jen v průzkumech preferencí, během krátké doby se mu ale podařilo z aliance čtyř stran kolem SPD udělat třetí nejsilnější tuzemský politický subjekt. Ruku v ruce s razantním nárůstem ale jde i několik rizik, které jsou vesměs spojené se „vztahy na pracovišti“. Klíčem k volebnímu úspěchu je pro SPD, Trikoloru, Svobodné a PRO to, zda dokážou sladit ega všech svých lídrů.
title_translated: 'We're no yeah!' In a fast -growing new alliance, the absolute primary SPD plays. The numbers, due to money
description_translated: Tomio Okamura risked and begins to reap the fruit. So far only in preferences surveys, in a short time, he managed to make the four -party alliance around the SPD the third strongest domestic political entity. Hand in hand with a vigorous increase, however, there are also several risks that are mostly associated with the "relationships in the workplace". The key to election success is for SPD, tricolor, free and for whether they can align the ego of all their leaders.

title: Vrchol bankovnictví za socialismu? Vkladní knížky, sporožiro a novomanželské půjčky
description: Téměř 15 milionů vkladních knížek. Tolik jich bylo v oběhu v době největšího rozkvětu na konci osmdesátých let. Byla to jedna z mála možností, kterou omezené socialistické bankovnictví nabízelo řadovým střadatelům.
title_translated: The peak of banking under socialism? Pass books ,vožiro and newlywed loans
description_translated: Almost 15 million passbooks. So many were in circulation at the time of the greatest flourishing in the late 1980s. It was one of the few possibilities that limited socialist banking offered to ordinary savers.

title: Čaputoví: Na oslavy do Moskvy bych nejela
description: Kdyby byla Zuzana Čaputová stále slovenskou prezidentkou, na rozdíl od premiéra Roberta Fica by nevyrazila na oslavy konce druhé světové války do Moskvy. Někdejší hlava státu to řekla tento čtvrtek na veletrhu Svět knihy v Praze.
title_translated: Caputové: I wouldn't go to Moscow to celebrate in Moscow
description_translated: If Zuzana Čaputová was still a Slovak president, unlike Prime Minister Robert Fico, she would not go to celebrate the end of World War II to Moscow. The former head of state said it this Thursday at the World of Book World in Prague.

title: Alergiemi v Česku trpí na 2,5 milionu lidí. A právě ta pylová patří mezi nejčastější (video)
description: Alergiemi v Česku trpí na 2,5 milionu lidí. A právě ta pylová patří mezi nejčastější. Na některé můžou lékaři nasadit imunoterapii, někdy je jedinou možností tlumení příznaků. To ale doprovází i únava a ztráta výkonnosti. Alergiemi v Česku trpí na...
title_translated: Allergies in the Czech Republic suffer from 2.5 million people. And the pollen is one of the most common (video)
description_translated: Allergies in the Czech Republic suffer from 2.5 million people. And the pollen is one of the most common. Some of the doctors can deploy immunotherapy, sometimes the only possibility of damping symptoms. But this is also accompanied by fatigue and loss of performance. Allergies in the Czech Republic suffer from ...

title: Poslední obraz před smrtí. Podívejte se na díla slavných umělců, která namalovali na konci života
description: I když toho za život stihli tito umělci hodně, jejich poslední obrazy jsou opravdu výjimečné. Někteří svůj konec tušili, jiní odešli náhle. Jejich obrazy jsou na pohled opravdu zvláštní a u některých vás dokonce zamrazí. Vědomí toho, že umělci po (ne)dokončení těchto děl už žádné další nepřidali, na ně vrhá úplně jiné světlo. Salvator Dalí, Gustav Klimt, Andy Warhol, Frida nebo Vincent van Goght. Podívejte se na poslední díla slavných malířů v naší galerii.
title_translated: The last picture before death. Look at the works of famous artists that painted at the end of their lives
description_translated: Although these artists have done a lot in their lives, their latest paintings are really exceptional. Some suspected their end, others left suddenly. Their images are really strange to look at and even freeze for some. The consciousness that the artists after the (not) completion of these works have not added any more, throwing a completely different light to them. Salvator Dali, Gustav Klimt, Andy Warhol, Frida or Vincent van Gogh. Take a look at the last works of famous painters in our gallery.

title: Druhý pokus: V Istanbulu mají začít rusko-ukrajinská jednání. Průlom se nečeká
description: Do tureckého Istanbulu přiletěl americký ministr zahraničí Marco Rubio. Informovala o tom dnes ráno agentura AFP, podle níž se šéf americké diplomacie nemá zúčastnit dnešních očekávaných rozhovorů mezi zástupci Moskvy a Kyjeva. Američtí činitelé by ovšem měli dopoledne jednat odděleně s Ukrajinci i Rusy, píše agentura. V Istanbulu se dnes očekávají první přímá jednání mezi Ukrajinou a Ruskem od prvních týdnů ruské invaze do sousední země.
title_translated: Second attempt: Russian-Ukrainian negotiations are to begin in Istanbul. Breakthrough is not expected
description_translated: American Foreign Minister Marco Rubio arrived in Istanbul, Turkey. This morning, AFP reported that the head of American diplomacy should not participate in today's expected interviews between representatives of Moscow and Kiev. American officials, however, should negotiate separately with Ukrainians and Russians in the morning, writes the agency. Today, the first direct negotiations between Ukraine and Russia are expected in Istanbul since the first weeks of the Russian invasion of the neighboring country.

title: Eurozóna - průmyslová produkce v březnu nečekaně silně rostla
description: Příznivá zpráva přišla včera z eurozóny, když v březnu rostla průmyslová produkce o nečekaných 2,6 % meziměsíčně. To je hodně, když trh čekal „jen“ 1,8 %. I celkový pohled na graf vývoje již vypadá optimističtěji.
title_translated: Euro area - industrial production in March unexpectedly strongly grew
description_translated: The favorable report came from the euro area yesterday, when industrial production grew by an unexpected 2.6 % of the monthly. That's a lot when the market waited "only" 1.8 %. Even the overall view of the development chart already looks more optimistic.

title: Válka na Ukrajině ONLINE: Ukrajina přišla o stíhačku F-16, pilot se katapultoval
description: Ukrajina v noci na čtvrtek přišla o víceúčelovou stíhačku F-16, přičemž pilot se před zřícením stroje úspěšně katapultoval. Příčinou incidentu byla blíže nespecifikovaná výjimečná situace na palubě letounu, který byl nasazen k odražení ruského útoku, uvedlo na platformě Telegram ukrajinské letectvo.
title_translated: War in Ukraine Online: Ukraine lost fighter F-16, pilot ejected
description_translated: Ukraine lost a multi-purpose fighter F-16 on Thursday night, while the pilot was successfully ejected before the machine collapsed. The cause of the incident was an unspecified exceptional situation on board the aircraft, which was deployed to reflect the Russian attack, said the Ukrainian Air Force Telegram on the platform.

title: Nejdřív prezident, pak motorky. Petr Pavel se proběhl po mostecké trati
description: Nejprve jednal se šéfy parlamentních stran, pak si čistil hlavu během po mosteckém autodromu. Český prezident Petr Pavel se spolu s více než dvěma stovkami fanoušků vydal ve čtvrtek vpodvečer na závodní dráhu, po které budou od pátku do neděle kroužit nejrychlejší sériové motocykly planety při mistrovství světa superbiků. Symbolicky tak šampionát odstartoval.
title_translated: First, the president, then motorbikes. Petr Pavel took place along the Most track
description_translated: At first he met the bosses of parliamentary parties, then cleaned his head during the Most Autodrome. Czech President Petr Pavel, together with more than two hundred fans, went on a racetrack on Thursday evening, after which the fastest serial motorcycles of the planet at the Superbike World Championship will circle from Friday to Sunday. Symbolically, the championship started.

title: Denver si vynutil sedmý zápas série s Oklahomou, Jokić nastřílel 29 bodů a Nuggets vyhráli 119:107
description: Souboj basketbalistů Oklahomy City a Denveru v 2. kole play-off NBA rozhodne až sedmé utkání. V šestém zápase Nuggets doma porazili nejlepší tým základní části 119:107 a vyrovnali na 3:3. Klíčovou postavou Denveru byl tradičně Nikola Jokić, jenž zaznamenal 29 bodů, 14 doskoků a osm asistencí. Hostům nestačilo 32 bodů nejlepšího střelce sezony Shaie Gilgeous-Alexandera.
title_translated: Denver forced the seventh match of the series with Oklahoma, Jokić scored 29 points and Nuggets won 119: 107
description_translated: Oklahoma and Denver basketball players in the 2nd round of the Playoff NBA will decide until the seventh match. In the sixth match Nuggets at home defeated the best team of the regular season 119: 107 and equalized to 3: 3. The key figure of Denver was traditionally Nikola Jokić, who scored 29 points, 14 rebounds and eight assists. The guests were not enough for the 32 points of the best shooter of the Shai Gilgeous-Alexander season.

title: Rusko a Ukrajina začnou jednat hodinu před polednem
description: První přímá rusko-ukrajinská jednání odstartují v pátek v 11:00 SELČ v istanbulském paláci Dolmabahçe, oznámil ruská agentura TASS. Původně se rozhovory měly uskutečnit už ve čtvrtek.
title_translated: Russia and Ukraine will start acting an hour before noon
description_translated: The first direct Russian-Ukrainian negotiations will start on Friday at 11:00 CEST at the Istanbul Palace Dolmabahçe, the Russian agency TASS announced. Originally, the interviews were to take place on Thursday.

title: 12 % činil meziroční růst spotřeby plynu na distribučním území společnosti GasNet v letošním 1Q
description: Spotřeba plynu roste ve srovnání s předchozím rokem především kvůli chladnější zimě. Největší nárůst (+ 14 %) byl zaznamenán u malých podnikatelů a domácností. V případě velkých firem šlo o meziroční nárůst o 10 procent.
title_translated: 12 % was the year -on -year growth of gas consumption in the distribution area of ​​Gasnet this year 1Q
description_translated: Gas consumption increases compared to the previous year mainly because of the colder winter. The largest increase (14 %) was recorded in small entrepreneurs and households. In the case of large companies, it was a year -on -year increase of 10 percent.

title: Hirt končí na Giru. Po hromadném pádu dojel do cíle, vyšetření odhalilo zlomeninu
description: Český cyklista Jan Hirt nenastoupí do sedmé etapy Gira d’Italia. Hirtova stáj Israel-PremierTech to v pátek ráno oznámila na svých sociálních sítích. Vítěz etapy na italské Grand Tour z roku 2022 byl součástí hromadného pádu v šesté etapě a do cíle v Neapoli dorazil jako poslední závodník. Následná vyšetření odhalila zlomeninu v oblasti kyčle.
title_translated: Hirt ends on Giro. After a mass fall reached the destination, the examination revealed a fracture
description_translated: Czech cyclist Jan Hirt will not join the seventh stage of Gira d´Italia. Hirt's Israel-PrimemTech stable announced it on Friday morning on its social networks. The winner of the Stage on the Italian Grand Tour from 2022 was part of the mass fall at the sixth stage and arrived at the destination in Naples as the last racer. Subsequent examinations revealed a fracture in the hip.

title: Vydařená zimní dovolená v Egyptě spolu s krásnou oslavou Silvestra a Nového roku
description: Recenze hotelu Bliss Nada Beach Resort **** (Egypt - Marsa Alam - Abu Dabbab) Toto ubytovací zařízení nemělo vůbec žádnou chybu. My jsme byli ubytováni hned u moře, s krásným výhledem hlavně na každodenní východ slunce.
title_translated: A successful winter holiday in Egypt along with a beautiful celebration of New Year's Eve and New Year
description_translated: Review of the Bliss Hotel Nada Beach Resort **** (Egypt - Marsa Alam - Abu Dabbab) This accommodation facility had no mistake at all. We were staying right by the sea, with a beautiful view mainly of the daily sunrise.

title: Silnici z Budějovic na Planou čekají úpravy. K letišti se odbočí z nové křižovatky
description: Jihočeský kraj připravuje novou křižovatku v Plané, z níž se bude odbočovat k letišti. Na silnici z Českých Budějovic na Český Krumlov chystá i další změny, které plánuje už roky.
title_translated: The road from Budejovice to Planna is waiting for modifications. To the airport will turn off the new intersection
description_translated: The South Bohemian Region is preparing a new intersection in Planá, from which it will turn to the airport. On the road from České Budějovice to Český Krumlov, he has been preparing other changes he has been planning for years.

title: Americkým státem Missouri se prohnaly extrémní bouře, sedm lidí zemřelo
description: Nejméně sedm lidí přišlo v pátek o život při bouřích, které se přehnaly nad americkým státem Missouri. Informovala o tom agentura AP. Ve městě St. Louis záchranáři v poničených domech hledají lidi, kteří v nich mohli uváznout. Přesný počet zraněných není známý, ale jsou jich nejméně desítky.
title_translated: The US state of Missouri rushed extreme storms, seven people died
description_translated: At least seven people lost their lives on the storms on Friday that exaggerated over the US state of Missouri. Informed about AP. In St. Louis rescuers in damaged houses are looking for people who could get stuck in them. The exact number of injured is not known, but there are at least dozens.

title: „Malér.“ Jak Češi přemýšlí o Ukrajině? Drsná slova z ČT
description: Jednání mezi delegacemi Ruska a Ukrajiny v Istanbulu podle historika a ukrajinisty Davida Svobody nepředstavuje žádný zásadní zlom. Za výmluvné považuje spíše to, jak se Rusko rozhodlo Evropě „naplivat do tváře“ – mj. tím, že vyslalo k jednacímu stolu Vladimira Medinského. Schůzka podle Svobody může být zlomová jen v tom, že teď se ukáže, čeho je „sjednocená Evropa“ schopná. A čeho bude schopen „Donald Trump, až zjistí, že je za šaška“. Rusko podle Svobody nehodlá ustupovat, ale pokračuje ve svých „klamavých tancích“ a v pohrdání mezinárodním právem.
title_translated: "Major." How do Czechs think about Ukraine? Rough words from CT
description_translated: Negotiations between delegations of Russia and Ukraine in Istanbul, according to historian and Ukrainian David Svoboda, is not a fundamental turning point. Rather, he considers the way Russia has decided to "spit into the face" - among others by sending Vladimir Medinský to the negotiating table. According to Svoboda, the freedom can only be that it will now show what the "united Europe" is capable of. And what he will be able to "Donald Trump when he discovers that he is a clown". According to Svoboda, Russia is not going to retreat, but continues its "misleading tanks" and contempt for international law.

title: Růže kralují květinám od dávných dob
description: Růže jsou jedny z nejstarších okrasných rostlin. Již dlouho před naším letopočtem zdobily zahrady čínských císařů a perských a babylonských vládců. Starověký Řím byl růžemi doslova posedlý...
title_translated: Roses reign flowers from ancient times
description_translated: Roses are some of the oldest ornamental plants. Long before our year, the gardens of Chinese emperors and Persian and Babylonian rulers decorated. Ancient Rome was literally obsessed with roses ...

title: Nekompromisní Šichtařová na CNN. Moderátorka se nestačila divit
description: Ekonomka Markéta Šichtařová v pořadu CNN Prima News „Právě dnes“ se střetla s moderátorkou, která zřejmě nebyla připravena na její přímý styl k ukrajinské...Článek Nekompromisní Šichtařová na CNN. Moderátorka se nestačila divit se nejdříve objevil na AC24.cz.
title_translated: Uncompromising Šichtařová on CNN. The presenter was not surprised
description_translated: Economist Markéta Šichtařová on the program CNN Prima News "Just today" met with the presenter, who apparently was not ready for her direct style to Ukrainian ... The article uncompromising Šichtařová on CNN. The presenter was not surprised first at AC24.cz.

title: ChangAn otevírá továrnu v Rayongu se zaměřením na udržitelnou výrobu, efektivitu, náklady a kvalitu
description: Rayong (Thajsko) 17. května 2025 (PROTEXT/PRNewswire) - Otevření závodu se časově shoduje s dosažením milníku 28,59miliontého vozidla značky ChangAn, klíčového momentu v rámci mezinárodní expanze společnosti.
title_translated: Changan opens the Rayong factory focusing on sustainable production, efficiency, cost and quality
description_translated: Rayong (Thailand) May 17, 2025 (Protext/Prnewswire) - The opening of the race is time -consuming to reach a milestone of the 28.59 million Changan vehicle, a key moment in the international expansion of the company.

title: Trumpova vláda chce přesídlit až milion lidí z Gazy do Libye, píše NBC News
description: Administrativa amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa pracuje na plánu trvale přesídlit až milion obyvatel Pásma Gazy do Libye, informuje na svých internetových stránkách americká televize NBC News s odvoláním na pět osob obeznámených s touto věcí. Pásmo Gazy obývá asi 2,3 milionu lidí. Americká vláda bere plán natolik vážně, že o něm debatuje s libyjským vedením.
title_translated: Trump's government wants to move up to a million people from Gaza to Libya, writes NBC News
description_translated: US President Donald Trump's administration is working on a plan to permanently relocate up to a million inhabitants of the Gaza zone to Libya, informing American NBC News on its website, referring to five people familiar with this. About 2.3 million people inhabit the Gaza Strip. The US government takes the plan so seriously that it debates it with Libyan leadership.

title: Pořadatelé odtajnili program letošního Prostějovského léta
description: Také letošní léto bude v Prostějově nabité mnoha kulturními a společenskými událostmi. Od června až do konce letních prázdnin se zájemci mohou těšit nejen na koncerty, ale i na akce pro děti.
title_translated: The organizers declassified the program of this year's Prostějov summer
description_translated: This summer will also be in Prostějov charged with many cultural and social events. From June to the end of the summer holidays, interested parties can look forward not only to concerts, but also to children's events.

title: Hra Fortnite na celém světě zmizela z iOS. My za to nemůžeme, brání se Apple
description: Apple zamítl zveřejnění hry Fortnite v App StorePopulární hra je momentálně na iOS nedostupná na celém světěDříve ji bylo možné stáhnout alespoň v Evropě z alternativních obchodůLetos v srpnu to bude již pět let od vypuknutí právní bitvy mezi společnostmi Apple a Epic Games. Vývojářské studio v roce 2020 propašovalo do své populární hry Fornite vlastní platební systém, což bylo v přímém rozporu s pravidly App Store. Touto provokací chtěla firma Epic Games poukázat jednak na nemravně vysoké poplatky v App Store, ale také na uzavřenost celé platformy iOS a nerovné podmínky pro vývojáře.Přečtěte si celý článek Hra Fortnite na celém světě zmizela z iOS. My za to nemůžeme, brání se Apple
title_translated: Fortnite has disappeared from iOS. We are not responsible for it, Apple defends itself
description_translated: Apple rejected the publication of Fortnite in the App Storepopular game is currently unavailable all over the world at least in Europe from alternative stores in August, it will be five years after the outbreak of the legal battle between Apple and Epic Games. In 2020, the developer studio smuggled its own payment system into its popular game, which was in direct contradiction with the App Store rules. Epic Games wanted to point out the naughty high fees in the App Store, but also the closure of the entire iOS platform and unequal conditions for the developer. We are not responsible for it, Apple defends itself

title: Jana Bernášková: Milenecký vztah je nový vesmír, který se rozpíná a chce prostor
description: Oblíbená herečka a spisovatelka Jana Bernášková vydala nový román Tři hodiny lásky, ve kterém hrají hlavní roli milenci a jejich rodiny. Ona sama se v nedávné době potýkala s osobními i profesními změnami, které ji přiměly přehodnotit svůj život. V rozhovoru pro Deník odhaluje, jak se vyrovnala s rozchodem s manželem, nemocí a novými výzvami, a jak tyto zkušenosti ovlivnily její tvorbu.
title_translated: Jana Bernášková: A lover relationship is a new universe that expands and wants space
description_translated: Favorite actress and writer Jana Bernášková has published a new novel Three hours of Love, in which lovers and their family play the main role. She herself recently faced personal and professional changes that made her rethink her life. In an interview with the daily, she reveals how she coped with a break with her husband, illness and new challenges, and how these experiences influenced her work.

title: Týdeník iROZHLASu: jasný termín voleb, barevné mapy Polska a jeden velký podcastový návrat
description: Volby se blíží. A pro ty, kteří by chtěli začít stříhat metr, už prezident Petr Pavel vyhlásil i jejich termín: 3. a 4. října. Kola volebního servisu se tak nezastavila ani tento týden. Přidáme také pohled do Polska nebo návrat podcastové série Extrém. Vítejte u pravidelného autorského výběru tvorby redakce webu iROZHLAS.cz.
title_translated: Weekly iRozhlai: clear term of elections, color maps of Poland and one big podcast return
description_translated: The elections are coming. And for those who would like to start cutting a meter, President Petr Pavel has already declared their deadline: 3 and 4 October. The electoral service wheels did not stop this week. We will also add a view to Poland or return the podcast series Extreme. Welcome to the regular author's selection of the creation of the editors of the website irozhlas.cz.

title: Eurovizi vyhrálo Rakousko. S písní Wasted Love zemi reprezentoval zpěvák JJ
description: V letošním 69. ročníku Eurovize zvítězilo Rakousko. Reprezentoval je zpěvák JJ, alias Johannes Pietsch, s písní Wasted Love (Promarněná láska) o neopětované lásce. Skladba spojuje prvky opery v návaznosti na rakouskou tradici klasické hudby, techno a vysoké vokály. Získala si srdce odborné poroty i diváků hlasujících po telefonu. Druhý byl Izrael a třetí Estonsko.
title_translated: Eurovision won Austria. With the song Wasted Land represented the singer JJ
description_translated: Austria won this year's 69th EUROVIZE. They were represented by the singer JJ, aka Johannes Pietsch, with the song Wasted Love (wasted love) about the unqualified love. The composition combines the opera elements in connection with the Austrian tradition of classical music, techno and high vocals. She won the hearts of the jury and spectators voting on the phone. The second was Israel and the third Estonia.

title: Vyplavení lidé v Krnově už opouštějí krizové byty. Část v nich však zůstane natrvalo
description: Deset se již uvolnilo, z dalších čtrnácti se nájemníci odstěhují nejpozději do konce července. Vyplavení lidé postupně opouštějí krizové byty v Krnově. V sedmadvaceti případech se však z bydliště dočasného stane trvalé a dalších sedm domácností zůstane tři roky – přišly totiž o dům a hledají či chtějí stavět novou nemovitost.
title_translated: Paying people in Krnov are already leaving crisis apartments. However, part in them will remain permanently
description_translated: Ten have already released, from the other fourteen tenants move no later than the end of July. Paying people gradually leave crisis apartments in Krnov. In twenty -seven cases, however, the temporary residence becomes permanent and another seven households will remain for three years - they lost their house and are looking for or wanting to build a new property.

title: Winnipeg v boji o Stanley Cup končí! Scheifelův gól po smrti otce nestačil
description: Druhé kolo a konec. Winnipeg opět končí svou pouť za ziskem Stanley Cupu ve čtvrtfinále, tentokrát nestačil na Dallas, který si výhrou 2:1 v prodloužení na domácím ledě zajistil vítězství 4:2 v celé sérii. Stars postoupili do konferenčního finále, kde se utkají s Edmontonem.
title_translated: Winnipeg in the Stanley Cup fight ends! Scheifel's goal after his father's death was not enough
description_translated: Second round and end. Winnipeg again ends his pilgrimage to the Stanley Cup in the quarterfinals, this time he was not enough for Dallas, who won 2: 1 in overtime on home ice winning 4: 2 in the whole series. Stars advanced to the conference finals, where they will compete with Edmonton.

title: Nákaza krvácivou horečkou se u pacienta na Bulovce nepotvrdila, uvedl Válek
description: Nákaza virem ebola ani jinými původci krvácivých horeček se u pacienta ve Fakultní nemocnici Bulovka nepotvrdila, uvedl dnes večer ministr zdravotnictví Vlastimil Válek (TOP 09) na sociální síti X. Američana, který nedávno pobýval v Africe, pražská nemocnice přijala s podezřením na vysoce nebezpečnou nákazu v pátek večer. Hygienici kvůli kontaktům s ním poslali do preventivní karantény 26 lidí.
title_translated: The infection with a bleeding fever was not confirmed in the patient on Bulovka, Válek said
description_translated: The infection of the ebola virus or the originators of bleeding fever was not confirmed in the patient at the University Hospital Bulovka, said Minister of Health Vlastimil Válek (TOP 09) on the Social Network X. He recently stayed in Africa. For contacts, hygienists sent 26 people to preventive quarantine.

title: Kvíz: Znáte svět podle barev a pruhů? Otestujte své znalosti státních vlajek
description: Vlajky patří k nejdůležitějším symbolům každého státu. Barvami, tvary, znaky a obrazci často odráží národní identitu a dějiny. Vyzkoušejte si v našem kvízu, jestli patříte mezi znalce, nebo zda je čas oprášit atlas.
title_translated: Quiz: Do you know the world by colors and stripes? Test your knowledge of national flags
description_translated: Flags are among the most important symbols of every state. Colors, shapes, characters and patterns often reflect national identity and history. Try in our quiz, whether you are experts or whether it is time to dust off the atlas.

title: Vyplavení lidé v Krnově už opouštějí krizové byty. Část v nich však zůstane natrvalo
description: Deset se již uvolnilo, z dalších čtrnácti se nájemníci odstěhují nejpozději do konce července. Vyplavení lidé postupně opouštějí krizové byty v Krnově. V sedmadvaceti případech se však z bydliště dočasného stane trvalé a dalších sedm domácností zůstane tři roky – přišly totiž o dům a hledají či chtějí stavět novou nemovitost.
title_translated: Paying people in Krnov are already leaving crisis apartments. However, part in them will remain permanently
description_translated: Ten have already released, from the other fourteen tenants move no later than the end of July. Paying people gradually leave crisis apartments in Krnov. In twenty -seven cases, however, the temporary residence becomes permanent and another seven households will remain for three years - they lost their house and are looking for or wanting to build a new property.

title: Dallas postoupil přes Winnipeg. Ve finále konference vyzve Edmonton
description: Hokejisté Dallasu na svém ledě otočili utkání s Winnipegem, zvítězili 2:1. V prodloužení duel rozhodl obránce Thomas Harley, a poslal tak domácí do finále Západní konference, kde texaský klub vyzve Edmonton. Stars v sérii s Jets zvítězili 4:2 na zápasy.
title_translated: Dallas advanced through Winnipeg. In the final of the conference will invite Edmonton
description_translated: Dallas hockey players turned the match with Winnipeg on their ice, won 2: 1. In the overtime, the defender Thomas Harley decided to send the home to the final of the Western Conference, where the Texas club will invite Edmonton. The Stars in the Jets series won 4: 2 for matches.

title: Svět se dočká nového Disneylandu. Pro Čechy bude druhý nejbližší
description: Milovníci světa pohádek Disney si brzy na seznam míst, která se vyplatí navštívit, připíšou i hlavní město Spojených arabských emirátů. Právě v Abú Zabí totiž v příštích letech vznikne nový Disneyland. Pro Čechy bude druhým nejbližším. Disneylandy jsou mimořádně populární atrakcí, nejstarší z nich letos oslaví už sedmdesáté narozeniny.
title_translated: The world will see a new Disneyland. The second closest to the Czechs will be the second closest
description_translated: The Disney fairy tale lovers will soon be on the list of places that are worth visiting, and the capital city of the United Arab Emirates will also add. It is in Abu Dhabi that a new Disneyland will be created in the coming years. He will be the second closest to the Czechs. Disneylands are an extremely popular attraction, the oldest of them will celebrate their seventies this year.

title: Moos (Stačilo!): Dopady automatizace, robotizace a AI
description: Ekonomicko-sociální změny s příchodem AI a nepřipravenost české politické scény na nadcházející změny.
title_translated: Moos (enough!): Impacts of Automation, Robotization and AI
description_translated: Economic-social changes with the arrival of AI and the unpreparedness of the Czech political scene for upcoming changes.

title: Marta Kubišová se vrací na pódium: Velkolepý koncert v Lucerně!
description: Přesně 55 let od chvíle, kdy byla Marta Kubišová umlčena režimem, se na scéně pražské Lucerny znovu rozezní její nezaměnitelný hlas. 20. září 2025 se uskuteční jedinečný koncert, který vzdá hold této legendární umělkyni, jejímu nezdolnému duchu a bohatému odkazu.
title_translated: Marta Kubišová returns to the stage: A spectacular concert in Lucerna!
description_translated: Exactly 55 years since Marta Kubišová was silenced by the regime, her unmistakable voice will be reinforced on the scene of Prague's Lucerna. September 20, 2025, a unique concert will take place to pay tribute to this legendary artist, its indomitable spirit and a rich legacy.

title: IuRe s partnery spustilo informační portál o digitálních právech
description: Sdružení IuRe, Institut Pí a Ústav státu a práva AV ČR spustily web DigitalniPrava.cz. Portál představuje Obecné nařízení o ochraně osobních údajů (GDPR), Akt o digitálních službách a Akt o datech. Cílem je nejen veřejnost s právy seznámit, ale také podpořit ji, aby tato práva uplatňovala.
title_translated: Iure with partners launched an information portal on digital rights
description_translated: Iure, the Institute of Mrs. and the Institute of the State and Law of the ASCR launched the website Digitalnuvoupova.cz. The portal presents the general data protection regulation (GDPR), an act on digital services and the act of data. The aim is not only to acquaint the public with the rights, but also to support it to exercise these rights.

title: Novodobí zelení komunisté nám chtějí vzít auta, varoval Turek na srazu
description: V království miliardáře Richarda Chlada ve středočeských Všenorech se konalo další setkání Smažák & Káry. Na sraz aut, ve kterém byla hlavními hvězdami garáž Chladových skvostů, dorazil také europoslanec a čestný prezident strany Motoristé sobě Filip Turek. Ten nakonec strhl celou pozornost na sebe, fotil se, rozdával podpisy a v rozhovoru pro iDNES.cz se snažil vysvětlit svou závodní minulost, která je v posledních dnech terčem posměchu.
title_translated: Newly Greens Communists want to take our cars, warned Turk at the meeting
description_translated: In the Kingdom of Billionaire Richard cold in Všenory Central Bohemia

title: Vích (SPD): Tragické neumětelství Fialovy vlády u Dukovan
description: Bude zajímavé sledovat těsně před volbami, jak se prosazují ty správné „evropské hodnoty“ a nezávislost eurokomisařů na domovských státech. Dostavba nových bloků jaderné elektrárny Dukovany je ve hvězdách.
title_translated: Vích (SPD): tragic neutralism of Fial's government at Dukovan
description_translated: It will be interesting to watch just before the elections, as the right "European values" and the independence of the European Commissioners on home states are promoted. The completion of the new Dukovany nuclear power plants is in the stars.

title: Investice v Dubaji? Se správně zvoleným makléřem je to skutečná investiční výhra
description: Praha 19. května 2025 (PROTEXT) - Dubaj je jedním z nejrychleji rostoucích měst na světě a nekonečnými možnostmi. Proto se stala magnetem pro investory z celého světa. Její dynamický rozvoj, moderní infrastruktura a strategická poloha nabízejí jedinečné příležitosti, zároveň přinášejí i určitá rizika. Možnosti rychlého výdělku se chopili také Češi, a to na obou stranách obchodu. Objevuje se stále více investorů, které Dubaj oslovila a buď už mají, a nebo pokukují po správné nemovitosti a zároveň je trh v posledních měsících zaplavený i desítkami makléřů, kteří se na tuto oblast zaměřují. Jsou skutečně všichni erudovaní a mají dostatek informací, aby mohli klientům dobře poradit? Jak investovat v Dubaji a přitom nenaletět?
title_translated: Investment in Dubai? With a properly chosen broker it's a real investment win
description_translated: Prague, May 19, 2025 (PROTEXT) - Dubai is one of the fastest growing cities in the world and endless possibilities. Therefore, it has become a magnet for investors from around the world. Its dynamic development, modern infrastructure and strategic location offer unique opportunities, while bringing some risks. Czechs also took the possibilities of quick earnings on both sides of the trade. There are more and more investors that Dubai has appealed and either have, or they look at the right property, and at the same time the market has been flooded with dozens of brokers in recent months who focus on this area. Are all knowledgeable and have enough information to advise clients well? How to invest in Dubai and not fly?

title: Basketbalisté Oklahomy porazili Denver 125:93 a po devíti letech postupují do semifinále play-off NBA
description: Basketbalisté Oklahomy City v rozhodujícím sedmém utkání čtvrtfinále play-off NBA zvítězili nad Denverem 125:93 a sérii vyhráli 4:3 na zápasy. Do semifinále postoupili poprvé od roku 2016 a utkají se v něm s Minnesotou. Pro předloňského šampiona Denver skončila sezona podruhé za sebou ve čtvrtfinále.
title_translated: Oklahoma basketball players defeated Denver 125: 93 and after nine years they advance to the semifinals of the playoffs NBA
description_translated: Oklahomy City basketball players in the decisive seventh match of the NBA playoffs won over Denver 125: 93 and won the series 4: 3 for matches. They advanced to the semifinals for the first time since 2016 and will compete with Minnesota. The season ended for the second time in the quarterfinals for the Denver champion last year.

title: Když se cesta na letiště zvrtne. Dovolenou mohou pokazit i naprosté banality
description: Možná si říkáte, že cestou na letiště se toho moc pokazit nedá. Ale opak je pravdou a největší problémy často působí ty nejbanálnější věci. Nikdy totiž nevíte, jaká bude situace na silnici, a zpoždění si v tomto případě nemůžete dovolit. Vyrazte proto raději dřív. Mnohem důležitější, než jestli máte plavky, které si přinejhorším můžete kdekoli koupit, je hlavně nezapomenout platné a správné doklady pro cestu do zahraničí.
title_translated: When the road to the airport goes wrong. The holidays can spoil even complete banality
description_translated: You may think that on the way to the airport, there is not much to go wrong. But the opposite is true, and the biggest problems often cause the most banal things. You never know what the situation will be on the road, and in this case you cannot afford to delay. So go before. Much more important than if you have a swimsuit that you can buy at least anywhere, it is mainly not forgotten and the right documents for travel abroad.

title: Oklahoma City jasně přehrála Denver a postoupila do semifinále play off NBA
description: Basketbalisté Oklahomy City v rozhodujícím sedmém utkání čtvrtfinále play off NBA zvítězili nad Denverem 125:93 a sérii vyhráli 4:3 na zápasy. Do semifinále postoupili poprvé od roku 2016 a utkají se v něm s Minnesotou. Pro předloňského šampiona Denver skončila sezona podruhé za sebou ve čtvrtfinále.
title_translated: Oklahoma City clearly played Denver and advanced to the semifinals of the playoff NBA
description_translated: OKLAHOMY CITY Basketball players in the decisive seventh match of the NBA playoff quarterfinals won over Denver 125: 93 and won the series 4: 3 for matches. They advanced to the semifinals for the first time since 2016 and will compete with Minnesota. The season ended for the second time in the quarterfinals for the Denver champion last year.

title: Chytré hodinky, které ladí s vaším životním stylem. Huawei představuje nové generace nositelných zařízení
description: Moderní stylový design a špičkové funkce v dokonalé rovnováze. Společnost Huawei na trh uvádí dvě nové generace hodinek, které potěší jak sportovní nadšence, tak i ty, kteří hledají chytrého parťáka pro každodenní činnosti. Řada Huawei Watch Fit 4 vyniká hranatým designem a bohatou nabídkou funkcí pro outdoorové nadšence, zatímco Huawei Watch 5 osloví chytrými funkcemi i do detailu propracovaným vzhledem.Přečtěte si celý článek Chytré hodinky, které ladí s vaším životním stylem. Reaguje tím na rostoucí obavy rodičů i odborníků o dopad sociálních sítí na spánek, duševní zdraví a schopnost soustředit se během dne. This responds to the growing concerns of parents and experts on the impact of social networks on sleep, mental health and the ability to concentrate during the day. And it does surprisingly thoughtfully - using controlled meditations directly in the application. You can read the newly introduced feature [...] The whole article can be read on Tiktok. Help teenagers sleep better and parents partially relieve fear of fear

title: Dostali se až ve druhém kole. Teď deváťákům radí, na co si dát pozor
description: Téměř 30 tisíc uchazečů o místo na střední škole nebo víceletém gymnáziu se v prvním kole přijímacích zkoušek na žádnou ze škol nedostalo. O místa mohou zabojovat ještě v druhém kole, které startuje dnes. Podobně na tom před rokem byli i Lukáš a Antonie, oba už studenti pražských středních škol. Mladším uchazečům radí, co při druhém pokusu nepokazit.

title: Senát schválil Trumpova zetě Kushnera na post velvyslance ve Francii
description: Realitní magnát Charles Kushner byl v minulosti odsouzen za ovlivňování svědků a daňové úniky. Americký prezident Donald Trump ho omilostnil a teď z něj udělal velvyslance ve Francii.
title_translated: The Senate approved Trump's son -in -law Kushner as an Ambassador in France
description_translated: Real estate tycoon Charles Kushner was convicted in the past for influencing witnesses and tax evasion. US President Donald Trump pardoned him and now made him an ambassador in France.

title: Průzkum: Volby by vyhrálo ANO před Spolu, SPD překvapivě třetí před STAN
description: Sněmovní volby by letos v dubnu vyhrálo hnutí ANO stále s velkým náskokem před koalicí Spolu (ODS, KDU-ČSL, TOP 09) na druhém místě. Spolu oproti březnu mírně snížilo náskok ANO. To by nyní získalo 33 procent hlasů a Spolu 20,5 procenta. Vyplývá to z aktuálního volebního modelu agentury Median. Hnutí SPD poskočilo od března na třetí příčku. Odsunulo tak na čtvrté místo STAN. Do Sněmovny by se dostali také Motoristé, Piráti a uskupení Stačilo!.
title_translated: Survey: The elections would win YES before together, SPD surprisingly third in front of the tent
description_translated: This April elections would be won by the YES movement with a big lead over the coalition together (ODS, KDU-ČSL, TOP 09) in second place. Together, the lead of YES slightly reduced compared to March. This would now gain 33 percent of the vote and together 20.5 percent. This stems from the current election model of Median. The SPD movement jumped from March to third place. The tent moved to the fourth place. Motorists, Pirates and groupings would also be enough to the Chamber of Deputies!.

Do maturitních oborů, ve kterých se vyžaduje jednotná přijímací zkouška, se v druhém kole mohou hlásit jen žáci, kteří ji skládali v prvním kole. An overview of schools that offer vacancies for the second round of the admission procedure can be found on the electronic system website.

title_translated: Thai police arrested men who robbed tourists in the resort
description_translated: The Thai police detained two men who robbed drunken sleeping tourists in the East Town resort of Pattaya. The value of more than 100 stolen items is estimated to be hundreds of thousands of fear (at least 67 thousand crowns), wrote the website Bangkok Post.

title: ‚Současná situace může způsobit škody.‘ KHNP podala kasační stížnost na soudní opatření k Dukovanům
description: Korejská společnost KHNP v úterý podala kasační stížnost na soudní opatření, které zablokovalo podpis finální dohody o stavbě jaderných bloků v elektrárně Dukovany. Chce se tím bránit vzniku škod, které mohou firmě vzniknout. KHNP o tom informovala ve středu. Kasační stížnost k Nejvyššímu správnímu soudu v minulých dnech podala také společnost Elektrárna Dukovany II (EDU II), která má jaderný tendr na starosti.
title_translated: 'Current situation may cause damage.' KHNP filed a cassation complaint on court measures to Dukovany
description_translated: On Tuesday, the Korean company KHNP filed a cassation complaint against court measures that blocked the signature of the final agreement on the construction of nuclear blocks at the Dukovany power plant. It wants to prevent the damage that the company may arise. KHNP reported on Wednesday. In recent days, the Dukovany II (EDU II) power plant, which is in charge of the nuclear tender, has also filed a cassation complaint about the Supreme Administrative Court.

title: Vláda posoudí restart technologie Cell Broadcast pro varovný systém
description: Vláda dnes projedná záměr vybudovat varovný systém s využitím technologie Cell Broadcast. Ta umožní plošně varovat majitele mobilních telefonů v přesně definovaném území, bez ohledu na to, jakého používají operátora.
title_translated: The government will assess the restart of Cell Broadcast technology for a warning system
description_translated: Today, the government will discuss the intention to build a warning system using Cell Broadcast technology. This allows you to warn the owners of mobile phones in a precisely defined area, no matter what they use the operator.

title: Reju vybuduje své první velkokapacitní centrum recyklace textilu na textil, Regeneration Hub One, v průmyslovém parku Chemelot v nizozemském Sittard-Geleen
description: Paříž (Francie) 21. května 2025 (PROTEXT/PRNewswire) - Společnost RejuTM, průkopník v oblasti recyklace textilu na textil, dnes oznámila, že si pro své první recyklační centrum v průmyslovém měřítku vybrala průmyslový park Chemelot. Tento park se nachází v nizozemském městě Sittard a patří mezi přední průmyslová a inovační centra v Evropě. Toto rozhodnutí navazuje na úspěšné otevření recyklačního centra Regeneration Hub Zero v německém Frankfurtu v říjnu 2024.
title_translated: Reju builds its first large-capacity recycling center of textile recycling, Regeneration Hub One, in the industrial park Chemelot in Sittard-Geleen, Netherlands
description_translated: Paris (France) 21st May 2025 (Protext/Prnewswire) - Rejutm, a pioneer in textile recycling on textiles, today announced that for its first recycling center on an industrial scale, the Chemelot Industrial Park has chosen. This park is located in the Dutch city of Sittard and is one of the leading industrial and innovation centers in Europe. This decision follows the successful opening of the Regeneration Hub recycling center in Frankfurt, Germany in October 2024.

title: KOMENTÁŘ: Dobrá zpráva z Bukurešti - Alex Švamberk
description: Prezidentské volby v Rumunsku vyhrál bukurešťský primátor Nicușor Dan. I když v průzkumech dlouho zaostával za ultrapravicovým nacionalistickým populistou Georgem Simionem, nakonec ho jasně porazil. Ve druhém kole získal 54 procent hlasů, i když v prvním měl jen dvacet procent. Výsledky opět ukázaly limity národoveckých pravicových populistů.
title_translated: Comment: Good news from Bucharest - Alex Švamberk
description_translated: The presidential election in Romania was won by Bucharest Mayor Nicușor Dan. Although he lagged behind the ultra -right nationalist populist George Simion in the surveys, he finally defeated him clearly. In the second round he won 54 percent of the vote, although he had only twenty percent in the first. The results again showed the limits of national right -wing populists.

title: ONLINE: Tottenham - Man. United. Anglické finále v EL, hraje se o trofej i Ligu mistrů

Oba týmy se v Premier League trápí a vítězství v Bilbau pro ně představuje jedinou šanci, jak si v příští sezoně zahrát poháry, respektive Ligu mistrů. title: Klacky i elektrické pohaněče. Spolek zveřejnil záběry z dalších českých kravínů
description: Spolek Zvířata nejíme v úterý zveřejnil další případy nevhodného zacházení se zvířaty v chovech skotu. Tři jsou z Jihomoravského kraje a jeden z Vysočiny. Podle aktivistů jsou záběry z roku 2024 či starší a spojují je s mlékárnou Miltra Europe z Městečka Trnávky na Svitavsku. Státní veterinární správa (SVS) se začne záběry zabývat, protože chování jednotlivců na záběrech je neakceptovatelné, řekl její mluvčí Petr Majer.
title_translated: Sticks and electric padding. The association published shots from other Czech cowshed
description_translated: We do not eat animals on Tuesday published other cases of inappropriate treatment of animals in cattle breeding. Three are from the South Moravian Region and one of the Highlands. According to activists, the shots from 2024 or older are associated with the dairy Miltra Europe from the town of Trnávka in the Svitavy region. The State Veterinary Administration (SVA) begins to deal with the shots, because the behavior of individuals in the shots is unacceptable, its spokesman Petr Majer said.

title: Putin obnovuje ruskou sféru vlivu
description: Chaos kolem vyjednávání překryl summit NATO. Proto i v Česku zaniklo, že Aliance se nejen nerozhádala, ale dokázala se shodnout i s Američany. Stojí jasně za Ukrajinou a je funkční i v případě napadení některého ze svých členů.
title_translated: Putin renews the Russian sphere of influence
description_translated: The chaos around the negotiations covered the NATO summit. Therefore, in the Czech Republic, the alliance not only did not catch up with, but could also agree with the Americans. It is clearly behind Ukraine and is also functional in the case of attacking one of its members.

title: Nejvlivnější historik současnosti Harari v novince Nexus řeší otázku, jak zabránit AI katastrofě
description: Brno 21. května 2025 (PROTEXT) - Yuval Noah Harari, autor bestsellerů Sapiens a Homo Deus, přichází s novinkou Nexus: Stručná historie informačních sítí od doby kamenné po AI, která právě vyšla česky v Jan Melvil Publishing. Na 512 stranách nabízí strhující pohled na roli informací v dějinách a varuje před nebezpečím informačních sítí řízených nelidskými entitami (AI). Argumentuje, že současná technologická revoluce je bezprecedentní a navrhuje několik cest, jak se vyhnout katastrofickým scénářům.
title_translated: The most influential historian of today's harari in the news Nexus solves the question of how to prevent AI disaster
description_translated: Brno on May 21, 2025 (Protext) - Yuval Noah Harari, author of the bestsellers Sapiens and Homo Deus, comes with the novelty Nexus: Brief history of information networks since the Stone to AI, which has just been published Czech in Jan Melvil Publishing. On 512 pages, it offers a stunning view of the role of information in history and warns against the dangers of information networks controlled by inhuman entities (AI). He argues that the current technological revolution is unprecedented and suggests several ways to avoid catastrophic scenarios.

title: Akce ve Washingtonu, po níž zavraždili dva Izraelce, se účastnil i český diplomat
description: Česká diplomacie odsuzuje odporný antisemitský útok před židovským muzeem ve Washingtonu, při němž byli zavražděni dva mladí zaměstnanci izraelské ambasády, uvedlo na síti X ministerstvo zahraničí. Akce v muzeu se účastnili různí diplomaté včetně českého, dodal mluvčí ministerstva Daniel Drake.
title_translated: The event in Washington, after which they murdered two Israelis, was also attended by the Czech diplomat
description_translated: Czech diplomacy condemns the disgusting anti -Semitic attack in front of the Jewish Museum in Washington, in which two young employees of the Israeli embassy were murdered, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said. The event in the museum was attended by various diplomats, including Czech, added ministry spokesman Daniel Drake.

title: Rumunský ústavní soud odmítl Simionovu žádost o zrušení prezidentské volby

title_translated: The Romanian Constitutional Court rejected Simion's request to cancel the presidential election
description_translated: Sunday's second round of Romanian presidential elections is valid. The Constitutional Court ruled not to comply with the defeated candidate and election.

title: Pražští radní umožní středním školám přijmout více žáků, schválili výjimku

title_translated: Prague councilors will allow secondary schools to accept more pupils, approved an exception
description_translated: Prague - Prague councilors approved an exception to the highest permitted number of secondary school pupils by four pupils per class. They decided this morning at an extraordinary meeting. There could be up to 34 pupils in one class ....

title: Putin nechce ukončit válku. Věří ve své vítězství, údajně poprvé připustil Trump
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump po rozhovoru se svým ruským protějškem Vladimirem Putinem evropským lídrům sdělil, že šéf Kremlu není připraven ukončit válku na Ukrajině. Šéf Kremlu si totiž myslí, že vyhrává. S odvoláním na své zdroje to tvrdí list Wall Street Journal (WSJ). Podle něj jde o první takové přiznání Trumpa, na veřejnosti ale tvrdí opak.
title_translated: Putin does not want to end the war. Believe in his victory, reportedly admitted Trump for the first time
description_translated: US President Donald Trump, after talking to his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin, told European leaders that the Kremlin chief is not ready to end the war in Ukraine. The Kremlin boss thinks he's won. Referring to their sources, it is said by Wall Street Journal (WSJ). According to him, this is the first such confession of Trump, but in public claims the opposite.

title: Německý Ifo index podnikatelského klimatu nad očekáváním
description: 10:00, Německo – údaje o podnikatelské náladě za květen: Ifo index podnikatelského klimatu: skutečnost 87,5; prognóza 87,4; předchozí 86,9; Očekávání podnikatelů: skutečnost 88,9; prognóza 88,0; předchozí 87,4; Současné hodnocení: skutečnost 86

title: Explozivní růst CoreWeave překonal všechny odhady analytiků, ti jsou však stále v pozoru
description: Akcie společnosti CoreWeave za uplynulý obchodní den vyskočily o téměř pětinu na 107,4 dolaru, čímž dosáhly nového historického maxima a rozšířily tím svůj celkový měsíční nárůst o 145 procent. CoreWeave, podporovaná společností Nvidia (je jejím klíčovým zákazníkem, Nvidia v CoreWeave vlastní asi pět procent akcií), získává pozornost investorů jako jeden z nejžhavějších hráčů v oblasti cloudové infrastruktury pro umělou inteligenci (AI). Společnost těží z prudkého růstu poptávky a strategických partnerství s předními technologickými giganty.
title_translated: Exposive Coreweave growth has surpassed all analysts' estimates, but they are still at the point of view
description_translated: Coreweave shares have jumped by almost one fifth to $ 107.4 over the past trading day, reaching a new historical maximum and expanding their total monthly increase of 145 percent. Coreweave, supported by NVIDIA (is a key customer, Nvidia in Coreweave owns about five percent of shares), it gains attention to investors as one of the hottest cloud infrastructure players for artificial intelligence (AI). The company benefits from sharp growth in demand and strategic partnership with leading technology giants.

title: USA přijaly od Kataru luxusní letadlo, které bude přepravovat Trumpa
description: Spojené státy přijaly od Kataru darem luxusní dopravní letadlo Boeing 747. Informoval o tom Pentagon. Podle té bylo letectvo pověřeno rychlou modernizací pro brzké využití letadla jako Air Force One k přepravě amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa.
title_translated: The US has received a luxury aircraft from Qatar that will carry Trumpa
description_translated: The United States received a luxury Boeing 747 from Qatar. Informed the Pentagon. According to this, the Air Force was commissioned by rapid modernization for the early use of the aircraft as Air Force One to transport US President Donald Trump.

title: Rotvajler Ozzy bude pomáhat krotit fanoušky, zatím si zvyká na jízdu autem
description: Momentálně je to spíš chomáč chlupů. Jednou ale bude plnit důležitou roli. Nemotorné tříměsíční štěně rotvajlera podstupuje výcvik u městské policie v Pardubicích. Ten potrvá 15 měsíců, pak nastoupí do služby.
title_translated: Rottweiler Ozzy will help tame fans, so far he gets used to driving by car
description_translated: At the moment it is more of a tuft of hair. But one day it will play an important role. The clumsy three -month -old Rottweiler puppy undergoes training at the Municipal Police in Pardubice. It will take 15 months, then start service.

title: V Jablonci hořel rodinný dům, na místě našli mrtvou seniorku
description: Smrt seniorky si zřejmě vyžádal ranní požár, který zachvátil rodinný dům v Jablonci nad Nisou. Hasiči bojovali s plameny od osmé hodiny ráno. Příčina i škoda, kterou požár napáchal, jsou v šetření.
title_translated: In Jablonec burned a family house, found a dead senior on the spot
description_translated: The death of the senior woman probably required a morning fire that engulfed a family house in Jablonec nad Nisou. Firefighters fought with flames from eight o'clock in the morning. The cause and damage that the fire did is under investigation.

title: Nejlepší evropský basketbal žen míří do Brna! Podpořte Češky na FIBA Women’s EuroBasket
description: Česko bude hostit to nejlepší, co evropský ženský basketbal nabízí! Evropský šampionát v basketbalu žen se koná ve STAREZ Aréně v Brně od 19. do 22. června. Máte jedinečnou šanci zažít atmosféru velkého turnaje na vlastní kůži a podpořit české reprezentantky v jejich cestě za postupem do play-off. Každý zápas bude pro české lvice klíčový a podpora z tribun jim dodá potřebnou energii.
title_translated: The best European women's basketball heads to Brno! Support Czechs at FIBA ​​Women’s Eurobasket
description_translated: The Czech Republic will host the best that European women's basketball offers! The European Women's Basketball Championship takes place in the Starez Arena in Brno from 19 to 22 June. You have a unique chance to experience the atmosphere of a large tournament and to support Czech representatives in their journey to advance to the playoffs. Every match will be crucial for Czech lioness and support from the stands will give them the necessary energy.

title: Havárie kamionu uzavřela dálnici D55 u Hulína, směrem na Zlín je neprůjezdná
description: Dálnice D55 je mezi Hulínem na Kroměřížsku a Otrokovicemi na Zlínsku ve směru na Zlín neprůjezdná kvůli ranní havárii kamionu. Při nehodě se převrátil návěs nákladního vozidla. Uzavírka poloviny dálnice potrvá několik hodin. Nehoda se obešla bez zranění, řekl v pátek ráno policejní mluvčí Radomír Šiška.
title_translated: The truck crash closed the D55 motorway near Hulin, in the direction of Zlín is impassable
description_translated: The D55 motorway is impassable between Hulín in the Kroměříž and Otrokovice in the Zlín region in the direction of Zlín due to the morning crash of the truck. In the accident, the truck trailer overrun. The closure of half the highway will take several hours. The accident was without injury, police spokesman Radomir Šiška said on Friday morning.

title: KOMENTÁŘ: Ukrajina není téma voleb - Alex Švamberk
description: Ukrajinci se stále častěji stávají terčem nenávisti. Připívají k tomu politické strany z okraje politického spektra, které před podzimními volbami opět vytáhli ukrajinskou kartu. SPD by nejraději poslalo Ukrajince domů do vlasti, vždyť našim lidem berou práci a vůbec vysávají stát. Podobně se vyjadřuje i Stačilo!, které se zase ohání potřebou míru.
title_translated: Comment: Ukraine is not the topic of elections - Alex Švamberk
description_translated: Ukrainians are increasingly becoming the target of hatred. They are attached to the political parties from the edge of the political spectrum, which again pulled the Ukrainian card before the autumn elections. The SPD would prefer to send Ukrainians home to their homeland, for they take our people and suck the state at all. Similarly, it was enough!

title: Cesta k bronzu mezi hvězdami a pruhy, pětice Američanů Olomoucku zafungovala
description: Čtyři roky po přestěhování z prostějovské haly do Olomouce se na Hanou vrací také basketbalový úspěch, jenž ozdobil klub pojmenovaný Olomoucko v roce 2019. Převážně americká sestava zámořského trenéra Andyho Hipshera ve čtvrtek proměnila mečbol získaný na půdě Děčína a domácí výhrou 83:73 ovládla ligovou sérii o bronz 2:0 na zápasy.
title_translated: The way to the bronze between the stars and the stripes, the five Americans Olomouc worked
description_translated: Four years after moving from the Prostějov hall to Olomouc, the basketball success, which was decorated with the club named Olomouc region in 2019, is also returning to Hana. Mostly the American line -up of Overseas coach Andy Hipsser turned the mečbol acquired in Děčín.

description: Xiaomi není jen výrobcem chytrých telefonů a produktů do chytré domácnosti – v posledním roce ukazuje, že to s automobilovým průmyslem myslí naprosto vážně. title: Televizní tipy na víkend: Pocta Mukovi, Hunger Games i Tancuj Matyldo
description: Televize budou o víkendu mimo jiné vzpomínat. Na dobré francouzské detektivky, na českého zpěváka Petra Muka i na kultovní sci-fi Blade Runner. Kdo nestihl skvěle natočené rodinné drama s humornými prvky Tancuj Matyldo, má šanci nyní, v kinech dlouho nepobylo. Už kvůli hereckému koncertu Karla Rodena a Reginy Rázlové stojí za to. Deník přináší také další televizní tipy.
title_translated: TV Tips for Weekend: Homage to Muk, Hunger Games and Dance Matyldo
description_translated: Television will remember, among other things, on the weekend. For good French detective stories, Czech singer Petr Muk and the cult sci-fi Blade Runner. Who did not manage to make a well -filmed family drama with humorous elements dance Matyldo, has a chance now, not long in cinemas. Already because of the acting concert Karel Roden and Regina Rázlová is worth it. The diary also brings other TV tips.

title: Kdo staví, ať neotálí. Blíží se další zelená přirážka
description: Od ledna 2026 začne systém emisních povolenek v EU dopadat na nové průmyslové obory, které byly dosud kvůli náročnosti výroby chráněné. Náběh poplatků bude pozvolný, ale zdražení těžko půjde zastavit. Byť k němu nemusí dojít hned.
title_translated: Whoever builds, do not delay. Another green surcharge is approaching
description_translated: As of January 2026, the EU emission allowances system will begin to affect new industrial fields that have so far been protected due to the demands of production. The start of fees will be gradual, but it will be difficult to stop the price increase. Although it may not happen immediately.

title: Historická auta pojedou Stezku mezi zámky, Bolt Tower chystá oslavy, Slezské dny folklor
description: Řešili jste, kam se vydáte s rodinou o víkendu? Třeba vám s vymýšlením pomůže náš výběr akcí napříč Moravskoslezským krajem.
title_translated: Historic cars will go the trail between the castles, Bolt Tower is preparing to celebrate, Silesian Days Folklore
description_translated: Did you deal with where to go with your family at the weekend? Maybe with inventing our selection of events across the Moravian -Silesian Region will help you.

title: To dokáže jen on. Zlomený muž už je zase talismanem. Jak van Aert našel své kouzlo
description: Návrat po těžkém zranění, zklamání z jarních klasik, pomalý rozjezd na Giru d ́Italia. Velmi náročné období prožíval v posledních měsících Wout van Aert. Dokonce zvažoval, že z Itálie předčasně odjede. Teď je vše zapomenuto. V neděli sám vyhrál, ve čtvrtek dotlačil k triumfu kolegu Olava Kooije. Už je zase nejcennějším kolegou cyklistického světa.
title_translated: Only him can do that. A broken man is already a talisman. How Van Aert found its magic
description_translated: Return after severe injury, disappointment from spring classics, slow start to Giru d ́Italia. Wout van Aert has lived a very difficult period in recent months. He even considered to leave Italy prematurely. Now everything is forgotten. On Sunday he won himself, on Thursday he pushed his colleague Olava Kooije to the triumph. He is the most valuable colleague of the cycling world.

title: Rusové zaútočili na Kyjev. Rakety a drony vyhnaly lidi do krytů
description: Ukrajinská metropole Kyjev čelila v noci útoku ruských raket a dronů. Obyvatelé se museli evakuovat do krytů a metra.
title_translated: The Russians attacked Kiev. Rockets and drones drove people into covers
description_translated: The Ukrainian metropolis Kyiv faced an attack by Russian missiles and drones at night. The inhabitants had to evacuate to cover and metro.

title: Ranní sprcha probere, večerní zklidní mysl. Mikrobiologové vysvětlují optimální načasování hygieny
description: ** Ranní sprcha odstraňuje noční pot, bakterie a alergeny pro svěží start dne ** Večerní očista smývá pyl, prach a podporuje spánek poklesem tělesné teploty ** Vlažná voda a krátké sprchování chrání pokožku před vysušením a podrážděním
title_translated: The morning shower wakes up, the evening calms the mind. Microbiologists explain the optimal timing of hygiene
description_translated: ** Morning shower removes night sweat, bacteria and allergens for fresh start day ** evening cleansing wash pollen, dust and promotes sleep by a drop in body temperature ** lukewarm water and short showering protects the skin from drying and irritation

title: Ocelárna U.S. Steel se spojí s japonským konkurentem, oznámil Trump
description: Americká ocelářská společnost U.S. Steel uskuteční plánované spojení s japonským konkurentem Nippon Steel, uvedl americký prezident Donald Trump. Japonská společnost již dříve podala nabídku na převzetí americké ocelárny za téměř 15 miliard dolarů (téměř 330 miliard korun). Tehdy ale transakci zablokoval předchozí americký prezident Joe Biden. U.S. Steel má výrobní aktivity také na Slovensku.
title_translated: Steel plant U.S. Steel connects with Japanese competitor, Trump announced
description_translated: American steel company U.S. Steel will make a planned connection with Japanese competitor Nippon Steel, said US President Donald Trump. The Japanese company has previously filed an offer to take over an American steel plant for nearly $ 15 billion (almost $ 330 billion). But then the transaction was blocked by previous US President Joe Biden. U.S. Steel also has production activities in Slovakia.
