title: Napínavá dobrodružství, která odvál čas. Připomeňte si slavné textové hry
description: Textové hry mají dobu své největší slávy za sebou, v módě jsou nyní spíše tituly s propracovanou grafikou, která se co nejvíce podobá realitě. Textovky ale dovolovaly v minulém století hráčům prožít nezapomenutelná dobrodružství. První tituly založené pouze na slovech zobrazujících se na obrazovce monitoru programátoři tvořili již v 60. letech minulého století. Série textových her Zork, adventura Colossal Cave Adventure, ještě starší Stark Trek či The Oregon Trail vznikly mezi prvními.
title_translated: A thrilling adventure that has taken time. Recall the famous text games
description_translated: Text games have the time of their greatest glory in a row, in fashion now are titles with sophisticated graphics, which resembles as much as possible. But the textbooks allowed players to experience unforgettable adventures in the last century. The first titles based solely on the words depicting on the monitor screen programmers were already in the 60s of the last century. The Zork Text Games series, Adventura Colossal Cave Adventure, even older Stark Trek and The Oregon Trail were among the first.

title: Florida - Carolina 6:2. Drtivá jízda Panthers. Bohové, srovnejte to, žádal Staal
description: Vloni donutili k slzám velikána Connora McDavida, došli si pro Stanley Cup. Letos hokejisté Floridy směřují neohroženě za obhajobou. V NHL by byla první od roku 2021, kdy dvakrát uspěla Tampa Bay, a celkově třetí v novém století. Důležitý skok udělali Panthers v noci na neděli výhrou 6:2 nad Carolinou, v sérii konferenčního finále vedou 3:0. „Přesto je to těsnější, než si myslíte,“ upozorňoval kouč posledních šampionů Paul Maurice. Gólový poměr hovoří jinak – zatím 16:4 pro Cats.
title_translated: Florida - Carolina 6: 2. Crushing Panthers ride. Gods, compare it, asked Staal
description_translated: Last year, Connor McDavid forced the tears to the Stanley Cup. This year, Florida hockey players are heading intensely behind the defense. It would be the first in the NHL since 2021, when Tampa Bay succeeded twice, and the third overall in the new century. The Panthers made an important leap on Sunday night 6: 2 over Carolina, in the series of conference finals lead 3: 0. "Yet it's tighter than you think," said Paul Maurice's last champions. The goal ratio speaks differently - so far 16: 4 for Cats.

title: Florida - Carolina 6:2. Drtivá jízda Panthers, šampiona dělí krok od dalšího finále
description: Pro boj o další Stanley Cup odmítají jakkoliv zpomalit. Hokejisté Floridy ve třetím duelu play off NHL proti Carolině vyhráli 6:2 a s vedením 3:0 na zápasy už je jen jedna výhra dělí od postupu do finále. Po přesunu na led Panthers se přitom dlouho hrálo za vyrovnaného stavu. Hurricanes se však katastrofálně nepovedla třetí třetina, kdy úřadující šampioni v rozmezí necelých deseti minut nastříleli pět gólů. Dařilo se obzvláště dvojici Aleksandr Barkov (2+1) a Jesper Boqvist (1+2).
title_translated: Florida - Carolina 6: 2. Panthers' overwhelming ride, champion divides a step away from the next final
description_translated: They refuse to slow down in any way to fight for the next Stanley Cup. Florida hockey players won 6: 2 in the third duel of the NHL playoffs against Carolina and with 3: 0 leadership, there is only one win from progress to the finals. After moving to the LED Panthers, it was played for a long time in a balanced state. Hurricanes, however, disastrously failed the third period, when the reigning champions ran five goals in less than ten minutes. Aleksandr Barkov (2 1) and Jesper Boqvist (1 2) were particularly successful.

title: Prokop Zach: Čekám, kdy lidé pochopí, že jsem úplně jiný než táta
description: Herectví se věnuje od dětství. Objevil se v seriálech Já, Mattoni nebo Svět pod hlavou. Dvacetiletý Prokop Zach profesně kráčí ve šlépějích svého otce Romana Zacha. Jeho synem je nyní i na plátně. V teenagerské komedii z gymnaziálního prostředí High School Heist režiséra Jana Haluzy, která ve čtvrtek 29. května vstoupí do kin, ztvárnil třídního outsidera.
title_translated: Prokop Zach: I wait for people to understand that I am completely different than my dad
description_translated: He has been acting since childhood. He appeared in the series Me, Mattoni or the world under his head. Twenty -year -old Prokop Zach walks professionally in the footsteps of his father Roman Zach. His son is now on canvas. In a teenage comedy from the high school environment High School Heist directed by Jan Haluza, who will enter cinemas on Thursday 29 May, he played a class outsider.

title: Při nočním dronovém útoku na Kyjevskou oblast zemřeli tři lidé
description: Při nočním ruském dronovém útoku na Kyjevskou oblast zemřeli tři lidé a nejméně deset dalších bylo zraněno. Podle agentury AFP to uvedl šéf správy Kyjevské oblasti Mykola Kalašnyk. Útoky ruských dronů byly hlášeny také z Charkova na východě, Mykolajiva na jihu a Oděsy, informovala agentura DPA.
title_translated: Three people died at a night drone attack on the Kiev region
description_translated: Three people died in a Russian drone attack on the Kiev region and at least ten others were injured. According to AFP, the head of the Kiev region of Mykoko Kalashnyk said it. The attacks of the Russian drones were also reported from Kharkov in the east, mycarias in the south and Odessa, DPA reported.

title: Nikdy jste o ní neslyšeli, přesto ji znáte. Jugoslávská sanitka IMV doplnila škodovky
description: Jugoslávská značka IMV je zapomenutá, její sanitky ale jezdily i v Československu.
title_translated: You have never heard of her, yet you know her. Yugoslav Ambulance IMV added Skoda
description_translated: The Yugoslav brand IMV is forgotten, but its ambulances also used in Czechoslovakia.

title: Němci místo Američanů. V Pobaltí chce mít kancléř Merz pět tisíc vojáků s tanky
description: Ruská agrese na Ukrajině probudila ze zimního spánku největší evropskou mocnost. Spolková republika Německo chce být do několika let nejen ekonomicky, ale i vojensky nejsilnější zemí kontinentu. Velká německá vojenská základna v Litvě je toho jasným příkladem.
title_translated: Germans instead of Americans. In the Baltic, Chancellor Merz wants to have five thousand troops with tanks
description_translated: Russian aggression in Ukraine awakened the greatest European power from winter sleep. Germany wants to be not only economically but also the strongest country of the continent within several years. The large German military base in Lithuania is a clear example.

title: Neporažený Čech exceloval. Soupeři dal K.O. a vybojoval dva tituly
description: Z pozice české boxerské jedničky znovu dobyl Polsko, z nějž si během víkendu odvezl hned dva mistrovské tituly. Elitní rohovník Lukáš Dekýš si tentokrát vyšlápl na tamní sedmičku veltrové váhy Przemyslawa Runowského, jehož knokautoval v devátém kole a připsal si již 16. profesionální vítězství. „Porazil jsem osmého Poláka v řadě, i proto mi tu říkají polský kat či česká noční můra,“ usmívá se v rozhovoru pro Sport.cz nejlepší domácí boxer Dekýš.
title_translated: The undefeated Czech excelled. The opponents gave K.O. and won two titles
description_translated: From the position of the Czech boxing number one, Poland again conquered, from which he took two championship titles over the weekend. This time the elite horn of Lukáš decstered on the local seven Veltová weight of Przemyslaw Runowski, whose knocauty in the ninth round and scored 16. "I defeated the eighth Pole in a row, and that's why they call me a Polish executioner or a Czech nightmare," smiles the best home boxer decys in an interview for Sport.cz.

title: Falešný Karibik mají Češi hned za humny. Na skutečné moře si u něj ani nevzpomenou
description: Barvu má při jasné obloze pronikavě tyrkysovou. Místo dlouhých písečných pláží a palem ho sice obklopuje tráva a o kus dál hory, jinak se ale tento falešný Karibik pyšní podobně omamnou atmosférou jako ten skutečný. Rakouské jezero Attersee má navíc tu výhodu, že za ním Češi nemusejí cestovat přes polovinu světa, nachází se totiž jen nějakou hodinku a půl od hranic.
title_translated: Czechs have a fake Caribbean right behind the humans. To the real sea do not even indire
description_translated: The color is penetrating turquoise in a clear sky. Instead of long sandy beaches and palm trees, it is surrounded by grass and a little further mountains, but otherwise this false Caribbean boasts a similarly narcotic atmosphere as the real one. In addition, the Austrian Lake Attersee has the advantage that the Czechs do not have to travel over half the world, because it is just an hour and a half from the border.

title: Křetínského EPH ovládla slovenského největšího výrobce elektřiny
description: Společnost Energetický a průmyslový holding (dále jen EPH) se zprostředkovaně stala vlastníkem již majoritního 66% podílu ve společnosti Slovenské elektrárne. Tedy již začala ovládat největšího výrobce elektřiny na Slovensku, který se stará zhruba o...

description_translated: Energy and industrial holding (hereinafter referred to as EPH) has become a major 66% share in the Slovak power plant. So she has already started to control the largest electricity manufacturer in Slovakia, which takes care of ...

title: Dvě velké jahodárny zničily povodně. Plody jsou kvůli suchu malé
description: Oblíbenou plantáž ve Skrbeni na Olomoucku utopily povodně, jahodárna neotevře. Na zbylých místech budou plody menší. Už tento týden v kraji vypuknou oblíbené samosběry. Ty poznamená výpadek dvou velkých jahodáren a také extrémní sucho, kvůli kterému sladké ovoce tolik nenarostlo a bude menší než obvykle.
title_translated: Two large strawberries destroyed the floods. Fruits are small due to dry
description_translated: The popular plantation in Skrbenní in the Olomouc region drowned floods, the strawberry will not open. In the remaining places the fruits will be smaller. Already this week, popular self -deficits will break out in the region. These will be marked by a failure of two large strawberries, as well as extreme drought, which caused the sweet fruit so much and will be less than usual.

title: Zvykejte si, hokeji vládnou po dekádách Američané. A dáme si hodně piva, hlásí
description: Tak dlouho se čekalo na gól! Dramatický boj o zlato nakonec rozseklo prodloužení a hokejové mistrovství světa po 65 letech ovládli Američané, kteří přemohli Švýcarsko 1:0. Taková smůla pro poražené – už popáté ve finále, ale premiérový titul jim stále uniká.

The dramatic struggle for gold eventually chopped the extension and after 65 years, the Americans who overwhelmed Switzerland 1: 0 dominated the World Championship after 65 years. Such bad luck for the losers - for the fifth time in the finals, but they still miss the premiere title.

title: Epidemie krátkozrakosti: Děti tráví hodiny u mobilů, zrak jim slábne už od útlého věku
description: Počet dětí s krátkozrakostí za poslední dekádu narostl o čtvrtinu. Oční lékařka Eva Jerhotová varuje, že hlavní viník je jasný – obrazovky. Přetěžování zraku zblízka přináší potíže nejen dětem, ale i dospělým. Pomoci může prevence, pravidelné pauzy i návštěva očního lékaře. „Glaukom si nevybírá a dlouho nebolí,“ připomíná odbornice.
title_translated: Epidemics of myopia: children spend hours on mobile phones, their eyes have faded away from an early age
description_translated: The number of children with myopia has increased by a quarter over the last decade. Eye doctor Eva Jerhotová warns that the main culprit is clear - screens. Earness overloading brings problems not only to children but also to adults. Prevention, regular pauses and an eye doctor can help. "He does not choose glaucoma and does not hurt for a long time," reminds the expert.

description_translated: This year you can get a car allowance of up to CZK 285,000, which is 85 thousand crowns more than in 2024. What are the conditions in 2025 and how to apply for a car allowance?

description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k jasné pozici vlády ČR.
title_translated: Minister Ženíšek: The government knows who is the aggressor and who the victim
description_translated: Commentary on his public Facebook profile to the clear position of the Government of the Czech Republic.

title: Války, pouliční osvětlení, mikroplasty. Včely podle vědců čelí novým hrozbám
description: Válečné zóny, mikroplasty a pouliční osvětlení – to jsou nové hrozby, kterým čelí podle vědců včelí populace. Odborníci na včely z britské Univerzity v Readingu sestavili a zveřejnili seznam 12 nejnaléhavějších hrozeb pro opylovače v příštím desetiletí. Minulý týden to napsal zpravodajský server listu The Guardian.
title_translated: Wars, street lighting, microplastics. Bees according to scientists face new threats
description_translated: War zones, microplastics and street lighting - these are the new threats that the bee populations face according to scientists. Bees experts from the British University of Reading have compiled and published a list of 12 most urgent threats for pollinators in the next decade. Last week it wrote the news server The Guardian.

title: Carolina odmítla vyřazení, sérii porážek zastavil Andersen vychytanou nulou
description: Hokejisté Caroliny v play off NHL zvítězili 3:0 na ledě Floridy a snížili tak stav finále Východní konference na 1:3 na zápasy. Gólman Hurricanes Frederik Andersen zastavil všech 20 pokusů domácích, v ofenzivě se prosadili Stankoven, Aho a Staal.
title_translated: Carolina refused to eliminate, a series of defeats stopped Andersen a good zero
description_translated: Carolina hockey players in the NHL play off won 3: 0 on the ice of Florida and reduced the state of the Eastern Conference final to 1: 3 to matches. The goalkeeper Hurricanes Frederik Andersen stopped all 20 attempts of the domestic, and Stankoven, Aho and Staal succeeded in the offensive.

title: V Ostravě po střetu s autem vykolejila tramvaj až na chodník
description: Tramvaj vykolejila celou svou délkou, zůstala stát napříč ulicí, zastavila se až na chodníku o strom.
title_translated: In Ostrava after a collision with the car derailed the tram to the sidewalk
description_translated: The tram derailed with its entire length, remaining across the street, stopping on the sidewalk against a tree.

title: Bojovník Necid. Nejlepší střelec druhé ligy odehrál několik zápasů s vážným zraněním
description: Na stará kolena se pořádně rozstřílel. Útočník Viktorie Žižkov Tomáš Necid prožil v pětatřiceti letech nejgólovější sezonu své bohaté kariéry. Po výhře nad Varnsdorfem (6:2), na které se podílel jednou brankou, přiznal, že několik posledních zápasů odehrál se vážným zraněním. „Zlomené žebro není nic příjemného. Bolelo to,“ přiznal bývalý reprezentant.
title_translated: Warrior Necid. The best shooter of the second league played several matches with serious injury
description_translated: He was shooting on his old knees. At the age of thirty -five, the striker Viktorie Žižkov experienced his rich career at the age of thirty -five. After winning over Varnsdorf (6: 2), in which he participated in one goal, he admitted that the last few matches played with serious injuries. "The broken rib is not pleasant. It hurt," the former representative admitted.

description: Americké akciové trhy byly včera kvůli svátku uzavřené, i když futures na americké indexy rostly a v zelených číslech se drží také během dnešního rána. description_translated: About 40 percent of action sales are not worth manufacturers or retailers. Yet they go to them. "It's like drugs you teach consumers. They run discounts, but don't look for stability," says Jan Jírovec, Logio chief.

Telefony se zasekávají během bootování a nedokážou se dostat až k hlavní obrazovce systému. title: Blažek kritizuje Fouska za fotbalovou revoluci: Kapři si rybník sami nevypustí
description: Říká o sobě, že je slávista, ale podporu mu vyjádřila Sparta. Zní to jako paradox, zvláště když pochází z úplně jiného světa. Rudolf Blažek, jeden ze tří kandidátů na předsedu Fotbalové asociace České republiky (FAČR), se totiž v první řadě stará o zájmy dětí a neprofesionálů. Je šéfem Motorletu, tradičního pražského klubu, jenž v kategorii dospělých hraje třetí nejvyšší soutěž.
title_translated: Blazek criticizes Fouska for the football revolution: the carp does not release the pond himself
description_translated: He says he is Slavist, but Sparta expressed his support. It sounds like a paradox, especially when it comes from a completely different world. Rudolf Blažek, one of the three candidates for the chairman of the Football Association of the Czech Republic (FAČR), is primarily the interests of children and non -professionals. He is the head of Motorlet, a traditional Prague club that plays the third highest competition in the adult category.

title: Pardubice čeká dvojzápas sezony. Bude to boj o sportovní život, říká Krejčí
description: Tragická, marná a svým způsobem i šťastná sezona. Fotbalové Pardubice skončily v lize patnácté, a nebýt beznadějných Českých Budějovic, mohlo být ještě hůř. Baráži se svěřenci trenéra Střihavky nevyhnuli, čeká je regionální derby s nedalekou Chrudimí. „Bude to pikantní duel,“ říká před úvodním středečním zápasem v rozhovoru pro Sport.cz poradce a bývalý trenér Jiří Krejčí. První duel se odehraje v pardubické CFIG Areně od 18:00.
title_translated: Pardubice is waiting for the double match of the season. It will be a struggle for a sporting life, says Krejčí
description_translated: Tragic, futile and in a way a happy season. Football Pardubice ended in the league for the fifteenth, and if it were not for the hopeless České Budějovice, it could have been even worse. The relegation and the coach of the editing did not avoid, the regional derby with the nearby Chrudim awaits them. "It will be a spicy duel," says advisors and former coach Jiří Krejčí before the opening Wednesday match in an interview for Sport.cz. The first duel will take place in the CFIG Arena from 18:00.

title: Vědci se rozhodli postavit Trumpovi. Bojovat budou unikátním způsobem
description: Vědci se rozhodli pro netradiční formu protestu proti škrtům v oblasti klimatického a meteorologického výzkumu během druhého funkčního období prezidenta Donalda Trumpa. Místo demonstrací s transparenty se obrací na veřejnost prostřednictvím vědeckého maratonu – sto hodin nepřetržitého živého vysílání prezentací, kde každých 15 minut vystoupí jiný odborník, aby představil svou práci a vysvětlil její význam pro americkou společnost.
title_translated: Scientists decided to build Trump. Will fight in a unique way
description_translated: Scientists have decided on the unconventional form of protest against cuts in the field of climatic and meteorological research during the second term of President Donald Trump. Instead of demonstrations with banners, he turns to the public through a scientific marathon - a hundred hours of continuous live broadcasting of presentations, where a different expert will perform every 15 minutes to present his work and explain its importance to American society.

title: Policie pátrala po dvou dětech (13, 14) z Aše: Našli je v Německu!
description: V Aši na Chebsku zmizely dvě školní děti, chlapec (13) a dívka (14). Domů se nevrátily po vyučování. Po obou intenzivně pátrali čeští i němečtí policisté. Našli je v Německu! Obě děti jsou v pořádku.
title_translated: The police searched for two children (13, 14) from Aš: They found them in Germany!
description_translated: Two school children, boy (13) and girl (14) disappeared in Aš in the Cheb region. They did not return home after teaching. Czech and German police officers searched for both intensively. They found them in Germany! Both children are fine.

title: Mladí potřebují pomoc. Tomajko povede osmnáctku, prozradil Hadamzcik
description: Český hokej opět bez medaile. Po zlatém úspěchu z Prahy přišlo pro mnohé vystřízlivění. Konec českého týmu na mistrovství světa už ve čtvrtfinále by ale neměl ohrozit pozici hlavního trenéra Radima Rulíka. „Pro mě to vůbec není v tuhle chvíli téma, navrhnu výkonnému výboru jeho pokračování ve funkci,“ říká prezident Českého hokeje Alois Hadamczik ve speciálním vydání podcastu Za mantinelem. V něm ho vyzpovídal šéfredaktor Sport.cz Martin Kézr.
title_translated: Young people need help. Tomajko will lead eighteen, Hadamzcik revealed
description_translated: Czech hockey again without a medal. After the golden success of Prague came for many sobering. However, the end of the Czech team at the World Championship in the quarterfinals should not endanger the position of head coach Radim Rulík. "For me it is not at all at all at the moment, I will propose the Executive Committee of its continuation in office," says Czech hockey president Alois Hadamczik in a special edition of podcast behind Mantinel. He was interviewed by the editor -in -chief of Sport.cz Martin Kézr.

title: KEMEL: Prasata se perou
description: Chlapi, pojďte honem! Prasata v žitě se perou s prasatama z žlabu!
title_translated: CEMEL: Pigs are fighting
description_translated: Guys, come on! Pigs in the rye are fighting with pigs from the trough!

title: Wilders představil plán na radikální omezení migrace. Nizozemská vláda se otřásá
description: Nizozemský národovecký politik a lídr nejsilnější vládní partaje Strana pro svobodu (PVV) Geert Wilders představil v pondělí desetibodový plán na radikální omezení migrace. Ten počítá mimo jiné s odmítáním všech žadatelů o azyl na hranicích stejně jako s nasazením armády k ochraně hranic. Wilders přitom pohrozil, že PVV z nizozemské vlády odejde, pokud se migrační politika nezmění. Návrh vyvolal další třenice v už tak křehké nizozemské vládní čtyřkoalici.
title_translated: Wilders introduced a plan to a radical reduction in migration. The Dutch government is shaking
description_translated: Geert Wilders introduced the Dutch national politician and leader of the strongest government party for freedom (PVV) on Monday to radical migration restrictions on Monday. Among other things, he envisages the rejection of all asylum seekers at the border as well as the deployment of the army to protect borders. Wilders threatened that PVV would leave the Dutch government unless the migration policy changed. The proposal was triggered by other frictions in the already fragile Dutch government four -coalition.

title: Brno se dnes mění na střed obranných inovací. Premiérově se představí také nové „uši a ústa“ vojáků v terénu
description: Letošní ročník veletrhu IDET 2025 dnes slavnostně otevírá brány a očekává se rekordní účast návštěvníků i vystavovatelů. V moravské metropoli se scházejí stovky předních světových i českých výrobců obranné a bezpečnostní techniky. Mezi horké novinky, které letos přitahují mimořádnou pozornost, patří i náhlavní souprava M20 od technologické společnosti MESIT z Uherského Hradiště.
title_translated: Today, Brno is changing to the center of defense innovations. The new “ears and mouth” of the fields in the field will also present themselves in the first time
description_translated: This year's Idet 2025 is inaugurated today with gates and is expected to participate in both visitors and exhibitors. Hundreds of leading world and Czech defense and safety technology manufacturers meet in the Moravian metropolis. Hot news that attracts special attention this year is the headset of the M20 from the Technology Society of Mesit from Uherské Hradiště.

title: Novák (ANO): Neustálé odkládání soudu v kauze Dozimetr
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu ke kaze Dozimetr.
title_translated: Novák (YES): Constant postponement of court in the case of a dosimeter
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile to Kaze dosimeter.

title: První letní předpověď počasí. Víkend potěší milovníky tepla
description: Pro meteorology začne o víkendu léto a podle nejnovější aktuální předpovědi tomu budou odpovídat nejvyšší teploty během volných dnů. Maxima totiž mají překročit třicítku. Vyplývá to z informací Českého hydrometeorologického ústavu (ČHMÚ).
title_translated: The first summer weather forecast. The weekend will please heat lovers
description_translated: For meteorologists, summer will begin at the weekend and according to the latest current predictions, the highest temperatures will correspond to it during free days. The maximum is to exceed thirty. This stems from the information of the Czech Hydrometeorological Institute (CHMI).

title: Dva Češi ve finále Stanley Cupu. Florida vyřadila Carolinu, duel musela otáčet
description: Florida s Noskem a Vaněčkem v pátém zápase finálové série Východní konference porazila Carolinu 5:3 a po roce si opět zahraje o Stanley Cup.
title_translated: Two Czechs in the Stanley Cup final. Florida eliminated Carolina, the duel had to rotate
description_translated: Florida with Nosek and Vaněček in the fifth match of the final series of the Eastern Conference defeated Carolina 5: 3 and after a year he will play again for the Stanley Cup.

title: Napište si poznámku jen pro sebe. Příjemce platby ji neuvidí
description: Možnost přidat si k odeslané platby poznámku, kterou uvidíte jenom vy jako odesílatel, už nabízejí skoro všechny banky v Česku. Jako zatím poslední ji v dubnu přidala ČSOB.
title_translated: Write a note just for yourself. The recipient of the payment will not see it
description_translated: Almost all banks in the Czech Republic offer the option to add to the payment that you can see as the sender. As the last in April, ČSOB added it.

title: Důchod, o jakém sníte. Jak si vybrat úspory z DIPu
description: Konečně je vám 60 let a můžete si vybrat úspory z dlouhodobého investičního produktu. Vysvětlíme, jak to funguje. I pro horší situace: když chcete DIP zrušit předčasně, nebo když se šedesátky nedožijete.
title_translated: The pension you dream of. How to choose the savings from the dipua
description_translated: Finally, you are 60 years old and you can choose savings from the long -term investment product. We will explain how it works. Even for worse situations: if you want to cancel the dip prematurely or if you do not live.

title: Ranní postřeh Olgy Lomové: „Masakr na náměstí Tchien-an-men“
description: Každé všední ráno najdete na webu Respektu postřeh osobností k aktuálním událostem
title_translated: Olga Lomová Morning Morning: “Massacre on Tchien-An-Men Square”
description_translated: You can find the observations of the observation of personalities for the current events every weekly morning

title: Byty u moře za 1,5 milionu. Za to koupíte v Praze tak garáž, říká expert
description: Apartmán u moře v Itálii za 1,5 milionu. Domek u norského fjordu za dva miliony, garsonka v dubajské Marině za 5,5 milionu. Nákupy rekreačních nemovitostí v cizině jsou mezi Čechy v kurzu, ty české jim cenou nemohou konkurovat.
title_translated: Byty u moře za 1,5 milionu. You can buy a garage in Prague, says an expert
description_translated: Apartment by the sea in Italy for 1.5 million. House at Norwegian fjord for two million, studio in Dubai Marina for 5.5 million. Purchase of recreational properties abroad are among Czechs in course, they cannot compete with the Czech price.

title: Útok na etapové prvenství i elitní desítku. Čeští cyklisté chtějí být na Závodu míru vidět
description: Už dnes začíná dvanáctý ročník Závodu míru cyklistů do 23 let. Ambice na etapové prvenství či pořadí v elitní desítce celkového pořadí má i šestičlenná česká sestava, jejímž lídrem bude 21letý Tomáš Přidal. Tradiční etapová bitva zařazená do seriálu Nations Cup se jede od čtvrtka do neděle v Moravskoslezském a Olomouckém kraji.
title_translated: Attack on stage primacy and elite ten. Czech cyclists want to be at the Peace race to see
description_translated: Already today begins the twelfth year of the Peace Míru race under 23 years. The six -member Czech line -up, the leader of which will be the 21 -year -old Tomáš Přidal, has the ambitions for the stage first or ranking in the top ten overall ranking. The traditional stage battle included in the Nations Cup series is going from Thursday to Sunday in the Moravian -Silesian and Olomouc regions.

title: Dua Lipa pozvala na pódium Ewu Farnou a zpívala s ní
description: Britsko-albánská zpěvačka Dua Lipa překvapila v úterý večer návštěvníky svého prvního koncertu v pražské O2 areně, když zazpívala písničku Na ostří nože od Ewy Farne. Ve středu překvapila přítomné publikum ještě víc. Svou českou kolegyni pozvala na pódium a zpívala s ní.
title_translated: Dua Lipa invited Ewu Farna to the stage and sang with her
description_translated: The British-Alban singer Dua Lipa surprised visitors to her first concert at O2 Arena in Prague on Tuesday evening when she sang a song on the blade from Ewa Farne. On Wednesday, the audience surprised even more. She invited her Czech colleague to the stage and sang with her.

title: Americká odvetná cla neplatí, Trump porušil ústavu, rozhodl federální soud
description: Americký federální obchodní soud ve středu pozastavil platnost takzvaných recipročních cel, která prezident Donald Trump začátkem dubna uvalil na řadu zemí světa včetně Evropské unie. Informují o tom tiskové agentury. Podle soudu je zavádění cel pravomocí Kongresu. Bílý dům se proti rozhodnutí odvolal a jeho mluvčí zpochybnil autoritu soudu. Dolar na zprávu o pozastavení cel reagoval posílením.
title_translated: US retaliatory duties do not pay, Trump violated the institute, decided the federal court
description_translated: The US Federal Commercial Court suspended the so -called reciprocal cells on Wednesday, which President Donald Trump imposed on a number of countries in the world, including the European Union in early April. They inform press agencies. According to the court, the introduction of the whole congress. The White House appealed against the decision and its spokesman questioned the authority of the court. The dollar responded to a reinforcement report by strengthening.

title: Elon Musk končí jako Trumpův poradce. Rozloučil se na své sociální síti
description: Miliardář Elon Musk opouští post v exekutivním týmu amerického prezidenta Donalda Trumpa, kde se věnoval omezování výdajů federálních úřadů. Informovala o tom agentura AP s odvoláním na činitele Bílého domu. Sám Musk napsal na své síti X, že děkuje Trumpovi za poskytnutou příležitost s tím, že přichází konec jeho angažmá. Jeho úřad však nekončí, dodal později.
title_translated: Elon Musk ends as Trump's advisor. Said goodbye to his social network
description_translated: Billionaire Elon Musk leaves the post in the executive team of US President Donald Trump, where he devoted himself to limiting the expenditure of the Federal authorities. The AP reported on it, referring to the White House officials. Musk himself wrote on his network X for thank Trump for the opportunity to give the end of his engagement. However, his office does not end, he added later.

title: Máme moc stran, shodují se Češi. Důsledkem velkého spojování ale může být nejrozdrobenější Sněmovna
description: Strašák milionu propadnutých hlasů z minulých sněmovních voleb letos donutil ke spojování téměř všechny. I ty, kteří se v minulosti proti koalicím a předvolebním spojenectvím výrazně vymezovali. Tuto snahu oceňují i voliči. Podle průzkumu agentury NMS Market Research pro iROZHLAS.cz si většina Čechů myslí, že je politických stran zbytečně moc. Paradoxem ale nakonec může být, že když se do Sněmovny dostanou zástupci i těch nejmenších straniček na kandidátkách větších partají, může získat svého poslance i více než 20 politických stran.
title_translated: We have many pages, the Czechs agree. However, the result of a large joining may be the most distant House
description_translated: This year, the scarecrow of a million votes from the past parliamentary elections forced almost all to join. Even those who have significantly defined themselves against coalition and election alliance. This effort is also appreciated by voters. According to a survey by NMS Market Research for iROZHLAS.cz, most Czechs think they are unnecessarily much political parties. In the end, however, the paradox may be that if representatives of even the smallest parties to the candidates of the larger parties can get their deputies more than 20 political parties.

title: Musely jsme naši lásku skrývat, nezapadala do barvotiskového obrázku mladých budovatelek, říká Pirkko Saisio
description: Finská dramatička, spisovatelka, režisérka a herečka PIRKKO SAISIO (76) poskytla Reflexu u příležitosti knižního veletrhu a literárního festivalu Svět knihy rozhovor; najdete ho v Reflexu č. 22/2025, zde pro vás máme bonusové otázky a odpovědi týkající se tvorby, sexuality i ideologie. V češtině Pirkko Saisio vyšly čtyři prózy. Rozsáhlý historický román Trýzeň se dostal mezi tři finalisty ceny Magnesia Litera za překladovou knihu, před dvěma týdny spatřily světlo světa Protisvětlo a Červená kniha loučení.
title_translated: We had to hide our love, did not fit into the color printing picture of young builders, says Pirkko Saisio
description_translated: The Finnish playwright, writer, director and actress Pirkko Saisio (76) provided a reflex on the occasion of the Book Fair and the Literary Festival World of the Books of the Books; You can find it in Reflex no. 22/2025, here we have bonus questions and answers regarding creation, sexuality and ideology. In Czech, Pirkko Saisio came out four prose. The extensive historical novel The Mernification was among the three finalists of the Magnesia Litera Award for the translation book, two weeks ago the light of the light and the red book Farewell.

title: Postižení se stěhují ze starých ústavů do nového. I tam, kde je nechtějí
description: Ze starých ústavů v Jihomoravském kraji se přesouvají první klienti s tělesným postižením do moderního prostředí. Opozice varuje, že pro postižené, zvyklé dlouhodobě na jedno místo a jednu komunitu, může jít o velmi problematický proces, s nímž můžou mít problém se sžít. Přesto hejtmanství chystá další místa pro jejich umístění.
title_translated: The disabilities move from old institutions to a new one. Even where they don't want them
description_translated: From the old institutions in the South Moravian Region, the first clients with physical disabilities move to a modern environment. The opposition warns that it can be a very problematic process for the disabled, accustomed to one place and one community for a long time, with which they may have a problem to get acquainted. Yet the governor is preparing additional places for their location.

title: Dříve po něm plavili dřevo. Dnes šumavský kanál láká na dokonalý civilizační detox
description: Vydejte se společně s námi šumavskou krajinou podél Schwarzenberského plavebního kanálu, Plešného jezera a za dalšími místy, která se jen tak neokoukají. Na trase mineme i místo, kde sloužil proslulý Král Šumavy, ale nepředbíhejme. Cesta, kterou jsme se vydali, je vhodná pro pěší i cyklisty, my tentokrát zvolili kola.
title_translated: Previously, wood sailed after him. Today the Šumava channel attracts to the perfect civilization detox
description_translated: Go along with the Šumava landscape along the Schwarzenberg canal, Plešné Lake and other places that do not just look. On the route we miss the place where the famous King of Šumava served, but let's not overtake. The path we set out is suitable for pedestrians and cyclists, this time we chose bikes.

title: Střípky z trhu – další Insider transakce na akcích MONETA, COLT i KOFOLA
description: Poslední týdny se na pražské burze poměrně zvýšila četnost tzv. Insider transakcí. Tedy obchodů s akciemi ze strany managementu dané firmy. Již druhý Insider nákup v tomto měsíci se týká akcií MONETA. Na nákup téměř 5 tis. akcií z 12.
title_translated: Fragments from the market - another insider transaction at Moneta, Colt and Kofola events
description_translated: In the last weeks, the frequency of insider transactions has increased relatively on the Prague Stock Exchange. That is, shares shops from the company management. The second insider purchase this month concerns the shares of Moneta. For purchase nearly 5 ths. Shares of 12.

title: Senátor Smoljak: Rýsuje se nám nečekaný tandem. Rusko a USA!
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu k ovlivňování voleb.
title_translated: Senator Smoljak: Unexpected tandem is looming. Russia and the US!
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile to influence elections.

title: Rozhodnuto! Ve finále Stanley Cupu dojde na reprízu loňského souboje
description: Je rozhodnuto, ve finále hokejového Stanley Cupu dojde na reprízu loňského souboje mezi Floridou a Edmontonem. Oilers si ve čtvrtek zajistili postup výhrou v pátém duelu semifinálové série nad Dallasem 6:3. Celkově zvítězili na zápasy 4:1.
title_translated: Decided! In the final of the Stanley Cup, the last year's battle will be reached
description_translated: It is decided, in the final of the Stanley Cup hockey, the last year's fight between Florida and Edmonton will be reached. On Thursday, Oilers secured the progress of winning in the fifth duel of the semifinal series over Dallas 6: 3. Overall, they won 4: 1 matches.

title: Musk se mění ze sebejistého Trumpova sekundanta v opatrného skeptika
description: DOGE nás nezachrání. Zachránit nás může jen radikální růst produktivity. Z úst Elona Muska, který už vedení DOGE opustil, to zní jako překvapení. Ještě nedávno sliboval, že osekání státu zařídí samo o sobě vyrovnání státního rozpočtu. Dnes už si to nemyslí.
title_translated: Musk is changing from the confident Trump second in a cautious skeptic
description_translated: DOGE nás nezachrání. Only radical growth in productivity can save us. From Elon Musk's mouth, who has already left the lead of DOGE, it sounds like a surprise. Until recently, he promised to cut off the state in itself. He doesn't think it anymore.

title: Nové procesory Intelu nebudou potřebovat nový chladič. Nova Lake zachová kompatibilitu
description: Nová platforma LGA 1954 sice použije zase nový socket, ale půjde s ní použít starší chladiče. Bylo totiž zjištěno, že rozměry a montážní systém se zřejmě nezmění.
title_translated: Intel's new processors will not need a new cooler. Nova Lake will maintain compatibility
description_translated: The new LGA 1954 platform will use a new socket again, but it will be possible to use older coolers with it. It was found that the dimensions and assembly system would probably not change.

title: Zralost je sexy, když ji umíte prodat. Vyberte si plavky, co lichotí
description: Že se krása skrývá uvnitř, neznamená, že nemáme pečovat o svůj vnější půvab. Naopak, čím hrději se budeme hlásit ke svému tělu, tím krásnější budeme.
title_translated: Maturity is sexy when you can sell it. Choose a swimsuit to flatter
description_translated: That beauty is hidden inside does not mean that we should not take care of our external charm. On the contrary, the more proud we will report to our body, the more beautiful we will be.

title: Námluvy s SPD? ANO slibuje zákon o celostátním referendu
description: Jedním z prvních návrhů, který hnutí ANO předloží, pokud bude v příští vládě, se stane zákon o celostátním referendu, prohlásil místopředseda hnutí Radek Vondráček. Celostátní referendum přitom dlouhodobě požaduje SPD, které trvá na tom, aby lidé mohli rozhodnout i o setrvání v EU a NATO. Tato otázka by však měla být podle ANO v referendu zapovězena.
title_translated: Courtship with SPD? YES promises a law on national referendum
description_translated: One of the first proposals to submit the YES movement, if it is in the next government, will be the National Referendum Act, said the vice -chairman of the movement Radek Vondráček. The nationwide referendum has long demanded the SPD that insists that people can decide to stay in the EU and NATO. However, this question should be forbidden in the referendum.

title: Do festivalu Pražské vinice se zapojí 19 vinařů, nabízí ochutnávky i exkurze
title_translated: 19 winemakers will participate in the Prague Vineyard Festival, offers tastings and excursions

title: Jak Zelenskyj otevře zobák, přijde průšvih, popisuje Trumpův vztah k Ukrajině Volker
description: Bývalý americký velvyslanec pro jednání o Ukrajině Kurt Volker popisuje v rozhovoru pro Aktuálně.cz, proč Trump nemá rád Zelenského.
title_translated: As Zeletskyj opens the beak, a trouble comes, describes Trump's relationship with Ukraine Volker
description_translated: Former US Ambassador to Ukraine's negotiations Curt Volker describes in an interview for Aktualne.cz, why Trump does not like Zelena.

title: Zakázka vzhůru nohama. Byla hotova dříve, než u Jurečky podepsali smlouvu
description: Nestandardní posloupnost při zadávání IT zakázky na Jurečkově ministerstvu nyní dokládají i interní dokumenty, jež redakce získala. A vyplývá to i z údajů, které resort poskytl na vyžádání podle informačního zákona.
title_translated: The order upside down. Was done before Jurečka signed a contract
description_translated: The non -standard sequence in the awarding of IT contracts at Jureček's Ministry is now also evidenced by the internal documents that the editors have acquired. And this also stems from the data provided by the resort on request under the Information Act.

title: Jaký je pay gap v 27 zemích EU? Ženy vydělávají víc než muži v jediné zemi, Česko je na chvostu žebříčku
description: Rozdíl v odměňování mužů a žen v Evropské unii činí v průměru 12 procent, což znamená, že ženy vydělávají v průměru o 12 procent méně za hodinu než muži. Na každých 100 eur, které vydělá muž (asi 2500 korun), ženy vydělají pouze 88 eur (zhruba 2200 korun), vyplývá z dat Eurostatu za rok 2023. Nůžky se podle Evropské komise sice uzavírají stabilně, ale velmi pomalu. Takzvaný gender pay gap mezi pohlavími se totiž za 10 let snížil o pouhé čtyři procentní body. V žebříčku sedmadvacítky je navíc jediný stát, kde ženy vydělávají více než muži.
title_translated: What is Pay Gap in 27 EU countries? Women earn more than men in a single country, the Czech Republic is on the tail of the ranking
description_translated: The difference in remuneration of men and women in the European Union is 12 percent on average, which means that women earn an average of 12 percent less per hour than men. For every 100 euros earned by a man (about 2500 crowns), women earn only EUR 88 (about 2200 crowns), result from Eurostat data for 2023. Although the scissors are closed stable, but very slowly. The so -called Gender Pay Gap among sexes has decreased by only four percentage points in 10 years. Moreover, there is the only state in the 27 ranking where women earn more than men.

title: Na co si dát pozor letos v Chorvatsku: Na pokuty, poplatky, alkohol i plavky
description: I přes zprávy o zdražování v posledních letech se Chorvatsko drží na špici oblíbenosti mezi letními destinacemi českých turistů. Cestování na Jadran a pobyt u moře ale mohou zbytečně znepříjemnit některé poplatky navíc, pokuty nebo nové místní vyhlášky. Deník vybral několik novinek a úskalí, která je dobré znát před letošní dovolenou v Chorvatsku. Náš průvodce přináší tipy na cestu. Ať už jedete autem, autobusem, vlakem nebo letecky.
title_translated: What to watch out for this year in Croatia: for fines, fees, alcohol and swimwear
description_translated: Despite the news of price increases in recent years, Croatia has been at the forefront of the popularity between summer destinations of Czech tourists. However, traveling to the Adriatic and Sea stay can unnecessarily make some extra charges, fines or new local decrees. The daily chose several innovations and pitfalls, which is good to know before this year's holiday in Croatia. Our guide brings tips for travel. Whether you drive by car, bus, train or air.

title: Lodě plují jako duchové, letadla mizí z radarů. Rušení GPS v Baltském moři hrozí katastrofou
description: Finský záliv ve východní části Baltského moře se stává jakýmsi „Bermudským trojúhelníkem“. Z lodních radarů mizí plavidla, jako by se stala duchy, a ruské stíhačky se „potulují“ vzdušným prostorem NATO, píše dánský portál Danwatch. „Selhaly“ letecké a námořní GPS. Z rušení leteckých a námořních GPS a radarů je obviňováno Rusko.
title_translated: Ships sail like ghosts, aircraft disappear from radar. GPS interference in the Baltic Sea is threatened with a disaster
description_translated: The Finnish Gulf in the eastern part of the Baltic Sea becomes a kind of "Bermuda triangle". The ship's radars disappear as if they become ghosts, and Russian fighters "roam" the airspace of NATO, writes the Danish portal Danwatch. "Failed" Air and Maritime GPS. Russia is accused of canceling air and naval GPS and radars.

title: Jak se chovat při bouřce? Vhodný úkryt jde najít i v přírodě, nemít vodivé věci
description: Meteorologové varovali před silnými bouřkami, které hrozí v sobotu odpoledne na většině území České republiky. Doprovázat je mohou přívalový déšť, vítr a kroupy. I když jde u nás o běžný přírodní živel, není vhodné ho podceňovat. Experti pravidelně upozorňuji, jak se lidé mají chovat během bouřky, aby se vyvarovali například zásahu bleskem, ačkoliv pravděpodobnost, že elektrický výboj zasáhne přímo člověka, je jedna ku milionu. Ve větší míře ale může ohrozit elektronická zařízení, a to včetně dronů.
title_translated: How to behave in a storm? Suitable shelter can be found in nature, not to have conductive things
description_translated: Meteorologists warned against strong thunderstorms, which are threatened on Saturday afternoon in most of the Czech Republic. They can be accompanied by torrential rain, wind and hail. Although it is a common natural element in our country, it is not advisable to underestimate it. Experts I regularly point out how people should behave during a thunderstorm to avoid, for example, lightning intervention, although the likelihood that an electric discharge will hit a person is one to a million. But to a greater extent, electronic devices, including drones, can endanger.

title: Test modernizovaného Opelu Mokka: Stylově a hybridně
description: Modernizace populárního německého crossoveru Opel Mokka sice není na první pohled příliš výrazná, dál však podtrhuje důraz značky na jeho moderní styl. A to zvenčí i uvnitř.
title_translated: Modernized Opel Mokka test: stylish and hybrid
description_translated: The modernization of the popular German crossover Opel Mokka is not very significant at first glance, but it continues to underline the emphasis of the brand on its modern style. And from the outside and inside.

title: Ministr obrany USA varoval před hrozbou Číny, vyzval k vyšším výdajům na obranu
title_translated: US Defense Minister warned of China's threat, called for higher defense expenses

title: Izraelský útok zabíjel v centru pomoci v Rafáhu, tvrdí úřady ovládané Hamásem
description: Izraelský útok na centrum humanitární pomoci v Rafáhu v Pásmu Gazy zabil nejméně 26 lidí. S odvoláním na palestinská média a média napojená na palestinské teroristické hnutí Hamás to dnes napsala agentura Reuters. Izrael se k události zatím nevyjádřil.
title_translated: Israeli attack killed in the center of assistance in Rafáh, says the authorities controlled by Hamas
description_translated: The Israeli attack on the Humanitarian Aid Center in Rafah in the Gaza Strip killed at least 26 people. Referring to the Palestinian media and the media connected to the Palestinian terrorist movement Hamas, Reuters wrote it today. Israel has not yet commented on the event.

title: Po smrti manžela začala poznávat svět. Ani v 86 letech se své vášně neplánuje vzdát
description: V 86 letech touží většina lidí po klidu. Britka Valerie Simpsonová ze Sudbury je ale pravým opakem. Krátce po smrti manžela ji chytlo cestování a posledních 11 let tak poznává rozmanitá zákoutí Evropy, Asie, Afriky i Severní Ameriky. Vyloženě špatné zkušenosti nemá, a proto chce svým světoběžnictvím inspirovat i další lidi, a to nejen ze své generace.
title_translated: After her husband's death, she began to explore the world. Even at the age of 86, he does not plan to give up his passion
description_translated: At the age of 86, most people long for peace. But British Valerie Simpson of Sudbury is the opposite. Shortly after her husband's death, she was caught by traveling, and she has been recognizing the diverse corners of Europe, Asia, Africa and North America for the past 11 years. He does not have bad experiences, so he wants to inspire other people, not only from his generation.

title: Oprava zbývající části obchodního domu Ostravica je stále ve hře, jde i o pozemky
description: Zatímco hlavní část bývalého módního domu Ostravica-Textilia je opravená a ožívá, navazující památkově chráněný dům dál chátrá. Podnikatel Michalis Dzikos, jenž koupil někdejší banku z počátku 20. století před šesti lety, teď podle svého mluvčího udělal kroky, které už mají vést k zahájení rekonstrukce i této části objektu.
title_translated: Repairing the remaining part of the Ostravica department store is still in the game, it is also land
description_translated: While the main part of the former fashion house Ostravica-Textilia is repaired and comes to life, the adjoining listed house continues to deteriorate. Entrepreneur Michalis Dzikos, who bought a former bank at the beginning of the 20th century six years ago, now, according to his spokesman, has taken steps to start the reconstruction of this part of the building.

title: V Rusku narazil vlak do zříceného mostu. Nejméně sedm mrtvých, desítky zraněných
title_translated: In Russia, the train crashed into the ruined bridge. At least seven dead, dozens of injured

title: Nothing Phone (3) přijde o ikonický prvek. Britská firma zkusí něco odvážnějšího
description: Chystaný Nothing Phone (3) nedostane ikonické světelné rozhraní GlyphO blikající záda ale uživatelé zřejmě nepřijdouSpekuluje se o nasazení matice barevných diod, která bude schopná zobrazit všemožné obrazceBritská značka Nothing představila ve své krátké historii několik smartphonů, víceméně se jednalo o povedené telefony patřící do střední a vyšší střední třídy. Za vlajkovou loď lze považovat snad jen dva roky starý model Nothing Phone (2) poháněný výkonným čipsetem Qualcomm Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, tento telefon se ale dosud svého nástupce nedočkal. Situace se změní letos v létě – šéf značky Carl Pei potvrdil, že v červenci bude představen prémiový Nothing Phone (3).Přečtěte si celý článek Nothing Phone (3) přijde o ikonický prvek. Britská firma zkusí něco odvážnějšího
title_translated: Nothing Phone (3) loses an iconic element. A British company will try something bolder
description_translated: The upcoming Nothing Phone (3) will not get an iconic light -lighting light interface, but users are unlikely to lose the use of a color diodes that will be able to display all sorts of Nahing. The flagship can be considered only a two -year -old model Nothing Phone (2) powered by a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, but this phone has not yet received its successor. The situation will change this summer - Carl Pei chief confirmed that in July a premium Nothing Phone (3) will be presented. A British company will try something bolder

title: Online: Poláci v prezidentských volbách určují i další osud Tuskovy vlády
description: Rafał Trzaskowski vs. Karol Nawrocki. Poláci volí mezi kandidáty koalice a opozice. Kabinet nemá v parlamentu dost poslanců na překonání silného prezidentského veta, a tak by mu vítězství koaličního kandidáta usnadnilo vládnutí.
title_translated: Online: Poles in the presidential election determine the fate of Tuska's government
description_translated: Rafał trzaskowski vs. Karol Nawrocki. Poles choose coalition and opposition candidates. The Cabinet does not have enough deputies in the parliament to overcome a strong presidential veto, and so the victory of the coalition candidate would make it easier for him to rule.

title: Bouřlivé počasí pokračuje. V neděli může být ještě hůře, varuje ČHMÚ
description: Bouřky se s Českem ani zdaleka neloučí. Ty nedělní mohou být i velmi silné, varuje Český hydrometeorologický ústav (ČHMÚ) ve výstraze, kterou vydal během soboty. Hrozí přívalové deště, silné nárazy větru a krupobití.
title_translated: Stormy weather continues. It may be worse on Sunday, warns CHMI
description_translated: The thunderstorms are far from being announced with the Czech Republic. The Sundays can be very strong, warns the Czech Hydrometeorological Institute (CHMI) in the outform, which he published on Saturday. There is a risk of torrential rains, strong winds of wind and hail.

title: Den dětí má už sto let. Oslavy vznikly i k připomínce vyhlazení Lidic
description: První červnový den už tradičně patří všem dětem. Právě na toto datum připadá Mezinárodní den dětí. Svým způsobem letos slaví sté výročí. Oslavy totiž sice začaly až o několik let později, právě v roce 1925 se však konala konference, na níž bylo doporučeno, aby byl dětem věnován speciální den. Ke skutečnému zavedení oslav pak přispěly i válečné tragédie, při nichž umíraly nevinné děti, včetně vyhlazení českých Lidic německými nacisty.
title_translated: Children's Day has been a hundred years old. Celebrations also arose to commemorate the extermination of Lidice
description_translated: Traditionally, the first day of June belongs to all children. This date is the International Children's Day. In a way, this year it celebrates its centenary. The celebrations began only a few years later, but in 1925 there was a conference on which it was recommended that the children be given a special day. War tragedies, in which innocent children were dying, including the extermination of České Lidice by the German Nazis, contributed to the real introduction of the celebrations.

title: Trauma pro celou generaci. Scéna z filmu šokovala, cesta autem už nikdy nebyla stejná
description: "Tahle scéna je divoká. Pověstně traumatizovala mileniály," píše novinářka k části hororu, kde jsou hlavním "strašákem" padající klády na dálnici.
title_translated: Trauma for the whole generation. The scene from the movie shocked, the journey by car has never been the same again
description_translated: "This scene is wild. She has related the millennium," writes a journalist to a part of the horror movie, where they are the main "scarecrow" falling logs on the highway.

title: Liberální varšavský starosta Trzaskowski, nebo konzervativní historik Nawrocki? Poláci rozhodují o příštím prezidentovi
description: Polští voliči v neděli ve druhém kole prezidentských voleb rozhodují o tom, zda dosluhující konzervativní hlavu státu Andrzeje Dudu nahradí varšavský starosta Rafal Trzaskowski považovaný za proevropského liberála, nebo historik Karol Nawrocki označovaný za euroskeptika a pravicového nacionalistu.
title_translated: Liberal Warsaw Mayor of TRZASKOWSKI, or conservative historian Nawrocki? Poles decide on the next president
description_translated: Polish voters on Sunday on the second round of the presidential election decide whether the outgoing conservative head of Andrzej Dudu will be replaced by the Warsaw Mayor Rafal Trzaskowski considered to be a pro -European liberal, or historian Karol Nawrocki called Eurosceptics and right -wing nationalist.

title: Nebyla teplá voda, elektřina a dva měsíce ani výplata, popisuje Vaclíkův slovenský spoluhráč
description: Byla to pro něj sezona, na kterou určitě nikdy nezapomene. Měl už domluvený přestup, ale jeho zaměstnavatel Boavista už podruhé na poslední chvíli chtěl více peněz. Nakonec slovenský útočník Róbert Boženík s portugalským fotbalovým klubem, za který chytal i český gólman Tomáš Vaclík, sestoupil do druhé ligy.
title_translated: There was no hot water, electricity and two months or paycheck, Vaclík's Slovak teammate describes
description_translated: It was a season for him he would never forget. He had already agreed, but his employer Boavista wanted more money for the second time. In the end, the Slovak striker Róbert Boženík with the Portuguese football club, which was caught by the Czech goalkeeper Tomáš Vaclík, descended to the second league.

title: Zlotý oslabuje v návaznosti na výsledky polských prezidentských voleb
description: Růst českého HDP v 1. čtvrtletí revidován nahoru. Polský zlotý oslabuje kvůli výsledku polských prezidentských voleb. Náladu na finančních trzích kazí opětovné zhoršování vztahů mezi USA a Čínou.
title_translated: Zloty weakens in connection with the results of the Polish presidential elections
description_translated: Growth of Czech GDP in the 1st quarter revised up. Polish zloty weakens due to the outcome of the Polish presidential elections. The mood on the financial markets spoils the re -impairing of relations between the US and China.

title: Sadovský (ANO): Po boku Panamy a Kolumbie. Drogy a státní rozpočet
description: Komentář na svém veřejném facebookovém profilu ke kauze s bitcoiny.
title_translated: Sadovský (YES): Alongside Panama and Colombia. Drugs and state budget
description_translated: Comment on your public Facebook profile to the Bitcoins case.

title: Při útoku na proizraelské shromáždění v Coloradu bylo zraněno šest lidí
description: V Coloradu na proizraelském shromáždění došlo k útoku, pachatel zřejmě použil zápalné lahve. FBI uvedla, že při útoku bylo zraněno šest lidí. Podezřelého kriminalisté zadrželi.
title_translated: Six people were injured in an attack on the pro -Israeli assembly in Colorado
description_translated: There was an attack in Colorado at the Provizrael Assembly, and the perpetrator apparently used incendiary bottles. The FBI said six people were injured in the attack. The suspect criminalists detained.

title: Čeká nás deštivý týden s bouřkami, teploty ale už budou stoupat nad 20 stupňů
description: Na pondělí platí po celé České republice výstraha před silnými bouřkami.
title_translated: We will have a rainy week with storms, but temperatures will rise above 20 degrees
description_translated: On Monday, there is a warning of strong thunderstorms throughout the Czech Republic.

title: Nawrocki bude směřovat prozápadně. Česko a Polsko by měly pokračovat ve spolupráci, věří Pavel
description: Prezident Petr Pavel věří, že pod vedením nově zvoleného prezidenta Karola Nawrockého bude Polsko nadále rozvíjet své demokratické a prozápadní směřování. Česko a Polsko by podle něj měly pokračovat ve spolupráci. Pavel to uvedl v gratulaci Nawrockému, kterou v pondělí zveřejnil na síti X.
title_translated: Nawrocki will be directed pro -Western. The Czech Republic and Poland should continue cooperation, Pavel believes
description_translated: President Petr Pavel believes that under the leadership of the newly elected President Karol Nawrocký, Poland will continue to develop its democratic and pro -Western direction. According to him, the Czech Republic and Poland should continue cooperation. Pavel said this in congratulations to Nawrocký, which he published on Monday on the X network.

title: Seznam.cz už nekupuje servery od běžných dodavatelů. Vyrábí si je sám a chystá pátou generaci
description: Nejvetší tuzemská internetová firma Seznam.cz chystá výrobu už páté generace svých vlastních serverů, kterými nahrazuje modely od standardních dodavatelů jako jsou Dell, Super Micro, Hewlett Packard Enterprise a podobně. Jde o projekt Montovna, v rámci něhož se Seznam snaží být v mnoha ohledech nezávislý. I kvůli tomu si buduje vlastní datová centra.
title_translated: Seznam.cz no longer purchases servers from ordinary suppliers. It makes them alone and is preparing the fifth generation
description_translated: The largest domestic internet company Seznam.cz is preparing to produce the fifth generation of its own servers, which replaces models from standard suppliers such as Dell, Super Micro, Hewlett Packard Enterprise and so on. It is a project of assembly, in which the list seeks to be independent in many ways. That's why he builds his own data centers.

title: My neprohráli, město ano, líčil po baráži kouč Vyškova. Do ligy má zamířit i tak
description: Ještě jednou si v své šatně po utkání pustili letitý šlágr Lásko má, já stůňu. Vyhrával jim po úspěšných zápasech, zahrál jim i po barážové odvetě o účast v první lize na stadionu pražské Dukly. Přestože fotbalisté Vyškova v hlavním městě odvážné snažení až k postupu do nejvyšší soutěže nedotáhli, když po remíze 1:1 po základní hrací době a bezgólovém prodloužení prohráli na penalty 2:4, cítili se jako vítězové.
title_translated: We did not lose, the city yes, said after the relegation coach Vyškov. He is to head to the league anyway
description_translated: Once again, in their dressing room after the match they played the long -time hit of the love, I am a hundred. He won them after successful matches, playing them after the relegation of retaliation to participate in the first league at the Dukla Stadium. Although the Vyškov footballers in the capital of the courageous endeavor did not make it to the highest competition when they lost to penalties 2: 4 after 1: 1 after the basic time and a non -goal extension, they felt like the winners.

title: Americké indexy v pátek většinou ustoupily v reakci na obnovené obchodní napětí mezi Čínou a USA. - Ranné zhrnutie (02.06.2025)
description: Americké indexy v pátek většinou ustoupily v reakci na obnovené obchodní napětí mezi Čínou a USA. Futures naznačují pokračující pokles i v dnešní seanci(US100: -0,6 %, US500: -0,4 %, US30: -0,34 %). Čínské ministerstvo obchodu obvinilo Donalda Trumpa z...
title_translated: American indices on Friday mostly retreated in response to renewed trade tensions between China and the USA. - Early collapse (02.06.2025)
description_translated: American indices on Friday mostly retreated in response to renewed trade tensions between China and the USA. Futures suggest a continuing decline in today's session (US100: -0.6 %, US500: -0.4 %, US30: -0.34 %). The Chinese Ministry of Trade accused Donald Trump of ...

description: Americké indexy v pátek většinou ustoupily v reakci na obnovené obchodní napětí mezi Čínou a USA. Futures naznačují pokračující pokles i v dnešní seanci(US100: -0,6 %, US500: -0,4 %, US30: -0,34 %). Čínské ministerstvo obchodu obvinilo Donalda Trumpa z...

title: Výsměch. Výsledky rozhovorů mezi Ruskem a Ukrajinou
description: Ruská a ukrajinská delegace absolvovaly další kolo jednání o ukončení ruské agrese vůči Ukrajině. Zatímco ukrajinský prezident Volodymyr Zelenskyj neskrýval po jednání hněv, turecký ministr zahraničí Fidan prý hýřil optimismem. Na jednání měla padnout i slova o „divadle pro evropské, bezdětné, staré dámy“.
title_translated: Ridicule. Results of interviews between Russia and Ukraine
description_translated: The Russian and Ukrainian delegations completed another round of negotiations on the end of Russian aggression towards Ukraine. While Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenky did not hide anger after negotiations, Turkish Foreign Minister Fidan was said to be optimistic. The talks were supposed to fall words about "theater for European, childless, old ladies".

title: Co se stalo s Maddie? Policie rozjela nové pátraní v případu zmizelé dívky
description: Portugalská a německá policie zahájily tento týden v Portugalsku nové pátrání v rámci pokračujícího vyšetřování zmizení tehdy tříleté Madeleine McCannové. Pátrání se týká obce Lagos, která leží vedle města Praia da Luz v regionu Algarve, odkud dívka před téměř dvěma desítkami let zmizela.
title_translated: What happened to Maddie? Police started a new search in the case of the disappeared girl
description_translated: The Portuguese and German police launched a new search in Portugal this week as part of the continuing investigation of the disappearance of the then three -year -old Madeleine McCann. The search concerns the village of Lagos, which lies next to the town of Praia da Luz in the Algarve region, where the girl disappeared almost two decades ago.

title: Turecko a Rhodos zasáhlo zemětřesení. Na panickou ataku zemřela čtrnáctiletá dívka
description: Západní pobřeží Turecka a řecký ostrov Rhodos v úterý nad ránem zasáhlo zemětřesení o síle 5,8 stupně. Informovalo o tom Evropské seismologické středisko (EMSC). Turecké úřady podle agentury DPA sdělily, že následkem panického záchvatu zemřela 14letá dívka. Zraněno bylo několik desítek lidí. Hmotné škody hlášeny nejsou.
title_translated: Turkey and Rhodes hit an earthquake. A fourteen -year -old girl died on a panic attack
description_translated: The West Coast of Turkey and the Greek island of Rhodes on Tuesday in the morning hit an earthquake of 5.8 degrees. The European Seismological Center (EMSC) informed about it. According to DPA, the Turkish authorities said a 14 -year -old girl died as a result of a panic seizure. Several dozen people were injured. Material damage is not reported.

title: Cesta do pravěku láká ve Faunaparku děti i rodiče na den plný her a sportovních aktivit
description: Odpoledne plné zábavných úkolů a hravých soutěží pro děti. Přijďte se pobavit s dětmi a prožijte den plný her, úsměvů a sportovních aktivit ve Faunaparku Frýdek-Místek.
title_translated: The journey to prehistoric times attracts children and parents for a day full of games and sports activities
description_translated: In the afternoon full of fun tasks and playful competitions for children. Come and have fun with children and experience a day full of games, smiles and sports activities in the Faunapark Frýdek-Místek.

title: Nastal čas oslav. Šedesátiny Večerníčka připomínají podcasty i výstava
description: Sice už něco pamatuje, přesto stále promlouvá k divákům. Večerníček, malý kluk v papírové čepici a šlapající na kole, se na obrazovkách objevuje už od roku 1965, tedy šedesát let, kdy s jeho vysíláním začala tehdejší Československá televize. Nyní přichází čas oslav. Jemu věnovanou výstavu ve Strahovském klášteře v Praze, která bude přístupná až do 30. září, jistě ocení nejen současní diváci, ale i pamětníci.
title_translated: It was time of celebration. Podcasts and exhibitions resemble the sixtieth of the bedtime stories
description_translated: Although he already remembers something, he still speaks to the audience. The bedtime story, a small boy in a paper cap and a bicycle, has been appearing on the screens since 1965, sixty years, when its broadcast began with the then Czechoslovak Television. Now comes the time of celebration. It will be appreciated by the exhibition in the Strahov Monastery in Prague, which will be accessible until 30 September, will surely be appreciated not only by contemporary viewers but also by witnesses.

title: Pokuty od Správy Krkonoš? Nezákonné, domnívá se spolumajitelka Luční boudy
description: „Krkonošský národní park je přísnější než dřív, a to nám dělá problémy,“ stěžuje si spolumajitelka Luční boudy Klára Sovová. Kvůli sporům s ochránci přírody uzavřela Luční bouda od prvního června pro kolemjdoucí bufet a veřejné záchody. „Zrušili jsme objednávku na 500 kilo hovězího na guláš pro příští sobotu,“ zmínila Sovová.
title_translated: Fines from the Giant Mountains Administration? Illegal, the co -owner of Luční bouda believes
description_translated: "The Krkonoše National Park is stricter than before, and that makes us problems," complains the co -owner of Luční bouda Klára Sovová. Due to disputes with nature conservationists, Luční bouda has closed the buffet and public toilets since June 1st for passers -by. "We canceled the order for 500 pounds of beef for goulash for the next Saturday," Sovova said.

title: Squatteři ve Španělsku nelegálně obsadili dům a nainstalovali si do něj alarm
description: Obyvatelé severošpanělské vesničky žijí už zhruba měsíc ve strachu ze squatterů, kteří protizákonně obsadili dlouhé roky neobydlený dům a později i přilehlé pozemky. Aby si své nové bydlení zabezpečili, nainstalovali si dokonce alarm.

description_translated: The inhabitants of the North Spanish village have lived for about a month in fear of squatters who have been illegally occupied for many years uninhabited house and later adjacent land. To secure their new housing, they even installed an alarm.

title: Krveprolití v Rafahu: Izraelská armáda při čekání na humanitární pomoc postřílela desítky lidí
description: Jižní část Pásma Gazy se opět stala svědkem krveprolití. Podle palestinských úřadů přišlo nejméně 24 lidí o život a desítky dalších byly zraněny poté, co izraelská armáda zahájila palbu na civilisty shromážděné u distribučního centra humanitární pomoci ve městě Rafah. Incident se odehrál v blízkosti kruhového objezdu al-Alam, zhruba jeden kilometr od humanitárního centra, kde se tisíce lidí snažily získat potraviny a další nezbytnosti.
title_translated: Bloodpress in Rafah: Israeli army while waiting for humanitarian aid shot dozens of people
description_translated: The southern part of the Gaza band has again witnessed the bloodshed. According to the Palestinian authorities, at least 24 people lost their lives and dozens of others were injured after the Israeli army launched fire on civilians collected at the distribution center of the humanitarian aid in Rafah. The incident took place near the roundabout Al-Alam, about one kilometer from the humanitarian center, where thousands of people tried to get food and other necessities.

To měl brankář karvinských házenkářů Petr Mokroš fantastickou úspěšnost 49 procent. A důležitými zákroky pomohl i v neděli k výhře 32:30 znamenající mistrovský titul.

The goalkeeper of the Karviná handball players Petr Mokroš had a fantastic success rate of 49 percent. And important interventions helped to win 32:30 on Sunday mean championship title.

description: Dostala se ke mně zajímává roguelite hra v izometrickém pohledu jménem The Book of Aaru, která si hlasitě říká o vaši pozornost. Je to prvotina českého studia Amenti, a i když ze hry číší snaha zaujmout originálním konceptem, nevyvarovali se autoři některých přešlapů, které kazí pohodové hraní.

title: Nejméně 24 Palestinců zabila izraelská palba, když čekali na humanitární pomoc
description: Nejméně 24 Palestinců zabila izraelská palba, když čekali na distribuci humanitární pomoci v oblasti Rafáhu na jihu Pásma Gazy, píše v úterý agentura Reuters s odvoláním zdravotnické úřady napojené na teroristické hnutí Hamás. Je to několikátý takový incident v poslední době. V neděli podle médií izraelský útok poblíž centra humanitární pomoci v Rafáhu zabil nejméně 31 lidí. Jeho nezávislé vyšetření požaduje generální tajemník OSN António Guterres.
title_translated: At least 24 Palestinians killed Israeli fire while waiting for humanitarian aid
description_translated: At least 24 Palestinians were killed by Israeli fire when they were waiting for the distribution of humanitarian aid in the area of ​​the South Gaza zone, writes Reuters on Tuesday, referring to the health authorities connected to the terrorist movement Hamas. It's been several such incidents lately. On Sunday, according to the media, an Israeli attack near the Humanitarian Aid Center in Rafah killed at least 31 people. His independent examination is required by the UN Secretary General António Guterres.

title: Která je nejkrásnější? Euro Bike Fest nabídl tisíce motorek na jednom místě
description: Tisíce domácích i zahraničních motorkářů se o víkendu od 29. května do 1. června sjely do Pasohlávek, kde se konal oblíbený Euro Bike Fest. Rozlehlý areál festivalu, rozprostírající se na více než čtyřiceti hektarech pod malebnými Pálavskými vrchy, je propojen i s Mušovskými jezery.
title_translated: Which is the most beautiful? Euro Bike Fest offered thousands of motorbikes in one place
description_translated: Thousands of domestic and foreign bikers on the weekend from May 29 to June 1. The large area of ​​the festival, extending over forty hectares under the picturesque Pálava Hills, is connected to Musovských lakes.
