title: Nový prezident jihokorejské kormidlo neobrátí. Pokud tedy neblafoval
description: Strana vítěze jihokorejských prezidentských voleb I Če-mjonga je tradičně skeptická vůči USA i Japonsku a přátelská k Číně i KLDR. Jestli ale I v kampani neblafoval, obrat v zahraniční politice důležitého hráče se konat nebude.
title_translated: The new President of the South Korean helm will not return. So if he was unfortunate
description_translated: The party of the South Korean presidential elections and Če-Mjonga is traditionally skeptical about the US and Japan and friendly to China and the DPRK. But if he did not fool even in the campaign, a turnover in foreign policy of an important player will not take place.

title: Operace Dynamo: Zázračná evakuace spojeneckých vojáků z Dunkerku změnila budoucí průběh 2. světové války
description: Mezi 26. květnem a 4. červnem 1940 se u města Dunkerque v severní Francii uskutečnila operace Dynamo, při které spojenecké síly evakuovaly přes 338 tisíc britských, francouzských a částečně belgických vojáků z obklíčení německými silami. Tato akce byla reakcí na rychlý postup Německa ve druhé světové válce, které za pouhých 14 dní od zahájení své ofenzívy dokázalo dohnat spojenecké síly k severnímu pobřeží. Přes počáteční nepřízeň situace a obtížné podmínky se díky nečekaně úspěšné evakuační operaci podařilo zachránit stovky tisíc vojáků, čímž se předešlo mnohem větší vojenské i morální porážce Spojenců.
title_translated: Operation Dynamo: Miraculous evacuation of allied soldiers from Dunkirk changed the future course of the 2nd World War
description_translated: Between May 26 and June 4, 1940, Operation Dynamo took place near Dunkerque, in northern France, in which the allied forces evacuated over 338 thousand British, French and partly Belgian soldiers from the siege of German forces. This event was a reaction to Germany's rapid advancement in World War II, which in just 14 days after its offensive began to catch up with the Allied forces to the north coast. Despite the initial adversity of the situation and the difficult conditions, thanks to the unexpectedly successful evacuation operation, hundreds of thousands of soldiers have been saved, preventing a much greater military and moral defeat of the Allies.

title: Trump zdvojnásobí cla na ocel a hliník. Krok se dotkne všech zemí kromě Británie
description: Americký prezident Donald Trump v úterý večer místního času podepsal exekutivní příkaz, kterým se od středy zvyšuje clo na dovoz oceli a hliníku do Spojených států na 50 procent ze současných 25 procent. Opatření platí pro všechny země světa kromě Británie, která v květnu uzavřela s USA obchodní dohodu. Informovala o tom agentura Reuters.
title_translated: Trump doubles duties on steel and aluminum. Step will affect all countries except Britain
description_translated: On Tuesday evening, US President Donald Trump has signed an executive order that increases duty on the import of steel and aluminum to the United States to 50 percent of the current 25 percent. Measures apply to all countries of the world except Britain, which in May concluded a trade agreement with the US. Reuters reported.

title: Pekař vyrábí chleba z kvásku a bez chemie. Inspiraci našel v horách ve Francii
description: Před patnácti lety požádal David Španbauer v zapadlé uličce městečka ve francouzských Pyrenejích tamního pekaře, zda mu může pomoci péct chleba. Ten nebyl proti a díky tomu vznikla v Tisé na Ústecku oblíbená a úspěšná pekárna. Peče se v ní s láskou k řemeslu žitný a pšenično-žitný chléb, které si získaly oblibu nejen v Česku, ale i v sousedním Německu.
title_translated: Pekař vyrábí chleba z kvásku a bez chemie. Found inspiration in the mountains in France
description_translated: Fifteen years ago, David Španbauer asked in a remote street of the town in the French Pyrenees of the local baker to help him bake bread. It was not against it and as a result, a popular and successful bakery was created in Tisá in the Ústí nad Labem region. It is baked with love for the craft of rye and wheat-grade bread, which have gained popularity not only in the Czech Republic but also in neighboring Germany.

title: Kombinace školy a sportu? Odnesla jsem to nemocemi, líčí Hamzová. Ségra je tvrdá
description: Ačkoliv se může zdát, že ji k basketbalové kariéře předurčilo rodinné prostředí, česká reprezentantka Eliška Hamzová přesvědčuje: „Kdo má ambiciózní rodiče, tak to pak nechce dělat. Člověk by si měl najít cestu sám.“ O to se snaží také při náročné kombinaci profi sportu s vysokoškolským studiem biologie a zeměpisu, kvůli kterému se chystá na univerzitní přestup.
title_translated: Combination of school and sport? I took it through illness, Hamz recounts. The sister is hard
description_translated: Although it may seem that she has predetermined her family environment, Czech representative Eliška Hamzová convinces: "Who has ambitious parents, then does not want to do it. One should find his way alone." This is also trying to do a challenging combination of professional sport with college studies of biology and geography, for which he is going to a university transfer.

title: AI modely si vymýšlejí méně než lidé, tvrdí šéf Anthropicu
description: Podle generálního ředitele technologické společnosti Anthropic Daria Amodeia modely umělé inteligence halucinují (vymýšlejí si nepravdivé informace, které působí věrohodně) v menší míře než lidé. Ředitel to uvedl na tiskové konferenci první vývojářské akce Anthropic Code with Claude, která se konala před skoro dvěma týdny v San Francisku.
title_translated: AI models invent less than humans, says Anthropic boss
description_translated: According to Anthropic CEO Daria Amodeia, artificial intelligence models are hallucinating (inventing false information that has credible) to a lesser extent than humans. The director said this at a press conference of the first Anthropic Code with Claude, which took place almost two weeks ago in San Francisco.

title: Lidé čtěte!
description: Většina z nás se dnes věnuje více sledování televize a internetu, než čtení. Je to však chyba, protože četba posiluje nejen mysl, ale především ducha.
title_translated: People read!
description_translated: Most of us today are more watching TV and the Internet than reading. But it is a mistake, because reading strengthens not only the mind but above all the spirit.

title: Hrozba jménem Muradov. Vylepšený Kincl bude v Edenu útočit na královskou pozici
description: Po ztrátě titulu v minulém roce směřují kroky českého bojovníka Patrika Kincla zpět na výsluní. Nejprve ale musí 14. června na fotbalovém stadionu v pražském Edenu zdolat favorizovaného Uzbeka Machmuda Muradova. Pokud uspěje, stane se prozatímním králem střední váhy. „Nejenom navenek, ale i osobně to beru jako velký zápas,“ říká pětatřicetiletý Kincl, jenž se vyjádřil i k soupeřově žádosti o dopingovou kontrolu pro oba bojovníky krátce před galavečerem Oktagon 72.
title_translated: Threat named Muradov. Improved Kincl will attack the royal position in Eden
description_translated: After the loss of the title last year, the steps of Czech warrior Patrik Kincl are heading back to the limelight. At first, however, on June 14 must overcome the favorite Uzbek Machmud Muradov at the football stadium in Eden in Prague. If he succeeds, he becomes the provisional king of middle weight. "Not only outside, but also personally I take it as a big match," says 35 -year -old Kincl, who also commented on the opponent's request for doping control for both fighters shortly before the octagon 72 gala.

title: Trump přikázal vyšetřit Bidenovo užívání strojových podpisů
description: Americký republikánský prezident Donald Trump nařídil ministerstvu spravedlnosti a právnímu zástupci Bílého domu prověřit, jak jeho demokratický předchůdce v prezidentském křesle Joe Biden používal podpisový automat. Ve středu podepsal Trump příslušné nařízení, ve kterém poukázal na právní pochybnosti v používání automatu za Bidenovy vlády. Biden v prohlášení, které zveřejnila agentura Reuters, uvedl, že všechna prezidentská rozhodnutí činil sám, opačná tvrzení považuje za směšná a nepravdivá.

On Wednesday, Trump signed a relevant regulation in which he pointed out legal doubts in the use of the vending machine under the Biden government. In a statement published by Reuters, Biden said that all presidential decisions made himself, the opposite claims considered ridiculous and false.

title: Zemí se prohnaly silné bouřky, hasiči vyjížděli k desítkám případů. Nejzasaženější jsou střední Čechy
description: Při nočních bouřkách v Česku hasiči vyjížděli do středeční půlnoci ke 168 událostem, nejčastěji čerpali vodu a odklízeli spadlé stromy. Nejvíc práce měli ve středních Čechách. Hasičský záchranný sbor ČR to ve čtvrtek uvedl na sociální síti X. Silné bouřky s kroupami a silným větrem v noci přešly přes Čechy od jihozápadu k severovýchodu.
title_translated: Strong thunderstorms rushed to the ground, firefighters went to dozens of cases. Central Bohemia is the most affordable
description_translated: During the night storms in the Czech Republic, firefighters went to 168 events, most often pumped water and cleared fallen trees. They had the most work in Central Bohemia. The Fire Rescue Service of the Czech Republic said it on Thursday on the social network X. Strong storms with hail and strong winds at night switched across Bohemia from southwest to northeast.

title: Den plný energie, inovací a partnerství: Velvyslanec Ivan Jančárek v Ulsanu posiluje česko
description: Dne 13. května 2025 navštívil velvyslanec České republiky Ivan Jančárek město Ulsan s cílem prohloubit spolupráci mezi Českem a Koreou v
title_translated: Day full of energy, innovation and partnership: Ambassador Ivan Jančárek in Ulsan strengthens the Czech Republic
description_translated: On 13 May 2025, the Ambassador of the Czech Republic Ivan Jančárek visited the town of Ulsan in order to deepen the cooperation between the Czech Republic and Korea in

title: Českem se v noci prohnaly silné bouřky: Obří kroupy a přes sto zásahů hasičů! Sledujte radar Blesku
description: Dramatické bouřky – velmi silné – udeřily ve středu večer v Česku. Padaly velké kroupy, na Nymbursku a Hradecku kolem 4 cm. Český hydrometeorologický ústav (ČHMÚ) varoval před intenzivními nárazy větru a silnou bleskovou aktivitou. Německá média hovořila dokonce o akutním ohrožení života a blížící se jev přirovnávají k tropické cyklóně. Pro střední Čechy vydali před půlnocí výstrahu nejvyššího stupně - extrémní nebezpečí. Hasiči do středeční půlnoci vyjížděli ke 168 událostem. Spadlé stromy na některých místech omezovaly železniční dopravu.
title_translated: There were strong thunderstorms at night: giant hail and over a hundred interventions of firefighters! Follow the flash radar
description_translated: Dramatic thunderstorms - very strong - struck on Wednesday evening in the Czech Republic. Large hail, in Nymburk and Hradec Králové around 4 cm. The Czech Hydrometeorological Institute (CHMI) warned against intense wind impacts and strong lightning activity. The German media even spoke of an acute life threat and compared the phenomenon to a tropical cyclone. For Central Bohemia, they released the highest level before midnight - extreme danger. Firefighters went to 168 events by Wednesday midnight. Fallen trees in some places limited rail transport.

title: Macinka: Z Motoristů mají všichni strach, vede se proti nám organizovaná kampaň. Důkazy nemám
description: Filip Turek pouhý rok po zvolení do Evropského parlamentu oznámil, že bude kandidovat do Poslanecké sněmovny. Pro Motoristy sobě jde o vítanou vzpruhu poté, co jim v poslední době klesá podpora. Podle předsedy Petra Macinky za tím může být i „organizovaná kampaň různých influencerů“ a stopa může vést i k vládě. „Kdyby mi to někdo tvrdil, tak bych tomu věřil, žádné důkazy ale nemám a hledat je nebudu,“ říká Macinka v rozhovoru pro iROZHLAS.cz.
title_translated: Macinka: Everyone is afraid of motorists, there is an organized campaign against us. I have no evidence
description_translated: Filip Turek announced just a year after election to the European Parliament that he would run for the Chamber of Deputies. For motorists, it is a welcome boost after their support has been declining recently. According to chairman Petr Macinka, this may also be a "organized campaign of various influencers" and the trace can lead to the government. "If someone told me, I would believe it, but I have no evidence and I will not look for them," says Macinka in an interview for iRozhlas.cz.

title: Rozvoral (SPD): Požadujeme demisi celé vlády Petra Fialy!
description: Politické usnesení předsednictva hnutí Svoboda a přímá demokracie (SPD) k aktuální politické situaci.
title_translated: Distributor (SPD): We demand the resignation of the whole government of Petr Fiala!
description_translated: Political Resolution of the Bureau of the Freedom and Direct Democracy (SPD) movement on the current political situation.

title: Trumpův vysněný dóm může začít největší závody ve zbrojení v dějinách
description: Donald Trump obdivuje izraelský systém Iron Dome a sní o něčem podobném i pro USA. Jeho Golden Dome to ale bude mít mnohem těžší - chráněné území je násobně větší a potenciální hrozby mnohem pokročilejší. Míří tedy do vesmíru.
title_translated: Trump's dream dome can begin the biggest races in arms in history
description_translated: Donald Trump admires the Israeli Iron Dome system and dreams of something similar to the US. But his Golden Dome will be much harder - the protected area is multiple and potential threats much more advanced. So they are heading to space.
